K09bsu016_u:1426: mañjuśriyaḥ kumārabhūtasya pādau śirasābhivandya mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte nyaṣīdat //
K09bsu016_u:1427: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto dhanyākarānnagarāt tāḥ strīpuruṣadārakadārikāḥ saṃnipatitāḥ

K09bsu016_u:1434: yataste ratnāṅkurāḥ samutpatya dharaṇitalamabhinirbhidya abhyudgatāḥ suvarṇasya rūpyasya vaiḍūryasya sphaṭikasya lohitamukteraśmagarbhasya musāaragalvasya saptamasya ratnasya /
K09bsu016_u:1435: sa yadā sarvāṅgapratyaṅgaiḥ paripūrṇo daśānāṃ māsānāmatyayājjātaḥ,
K09bsu016_u:1436: tadā tāni sapta mahānidhānāni saptahastāyāmavistārodvedhapramāṇāni dharaṇitalādabhyudgamya vivṛttāni virocanti bhrājante sma /
K09bsu016_u:1437: pañca ca bhājanaśatāni tasmin gṛhe prādurbhūtāni nānāratnamayāni,
K09bsu016_u:1453: pañca ratnabhājanaśatāni sahajātasya khalu sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya gṛhe sarvakośakoṣṭhāgāreṣu dhanadhānyahiraṇyasuvarṇavividharatnavarṣāṇyabhipravarṣitāni
K09bsu016_u:1454: tasya naimittikairbrāhmaṇairmātāpitṛbhyāṃ jñātivargeṇa ca vipulasamṛddhirasya jātamātrasya gṛhe prādurbhūteti sudhanaḥ sudhana iti nāmadheyaṃ kṛtam /
K09bsu016_u:1458: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakamavalokya pratisaṃmodate sma,
K09bsu016_u:1459: dharmaṃ cāsya deśayāmāsa - yaduta sarvabuddhadharmānārabhya sarvabuddhadharmasamudayāvāptimārabhya
K09bsu016_u:1464: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ taṃ ca mahājanakāyaṃ dharmakathayā
K09bsu016_u:1465: saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣayitvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya
K09bsu016_u:1466: pūrvakuśalamūlaṃ saṃsmārya dhanyākare mahānagare yathāśayānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmadeśanādhiṣṭhānaṃ
K09bsu016_u:1468: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako mañjuśriyaḥ kumārabhūtasya sakāśādidamevaṃrūpaṃ
K09bsu016_u:1471: tvatprabhāvata ahaṃ mahāmate bodhi prasthitu hitāya dehinām /
K09bsu016_u:1472: tatra niścayu anantagocaro yo mamā bhavati taṃ śṛṇohi me // 1 //
K09bsu016_u:1476: māraīśvaravaśaṃgatāḥ sadā yatra bāla abudhā bhiniśritāḥ // 3 //
K09bsu016_u:1480: īrṣya mātsarya sadā sudāmitāḥ pretatiryannarakākṣaṇe gatāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:1506: sattvasārasugatān diśaṃ gatāṃstān pi darśayahi mārgadeśaka // 17 //
K09bsu016_u:1521: prajñapāyasamayogavāha te dharmayāni pravare sthapehi me // 24 //
K09bsu016_u:1545: jñānavajra dṛḍhamārya dehi me yena saṃskṛtapuraṃ vidāryate // 35 //
K09bsu016_u:1550: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto nāgāvalokitenāvalokya sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
K09bsu016_u:1556: tasmāttarhi kulaputra aparikhinnena te bhavitavyaṃ kalyāṇamitraparyupāsanatāyai /
K09bsu016_u:1557: sudhana āha - yadārya vistareṇa kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam?
K09bsu016_u:1569: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ sudhanaṃ śreiṣṭhidārakaṃ gāthābhirabhyabhāṣata -
K09bsu016_u:1570: sādhu śubhapuṇyasāgara yo hi tvamupāgato mama sakāśam /
K09bsu016_u:1574: ye bodhisattva sudṛḍhā akhinnamanasaḥ saṃsāri te carim /
K09bsu016_u:1577: yastvaṃ samantabhadrāṃ praṇidhi si sacārikāṃ jagadartham // 41 //
K09bsu016_u:1581: sa tvaṃ jinan daśaddiśi paśyannapi yeṣu buddhakṣetreṣu /
K09bsu016_u:1586: caryāṃ samantabhadrāṃ spṛśiṣyasi śivāṃ prasara bodhim // 45 //
K09bsu016_u:1589: prekṣasva sattvanayutān śrutvā tava praṇidhiprīti saṃjātā /
K09bsu016_u:1591: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūta imā gāthā bhāṣitvā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
K09bsu016_u:1592: yastvamanuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye cittamutpādya bodhisattvacaryāṃ parigaveṣitavyāṃ manyase /
K09bsu016_u:1593: durlabhāste kulaputra sattvā ye 'nuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye cittamutpādayanti /
K09bsu016_u:1594: ataste durlabhatamāḥ sattvā ye 'nuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye cittamutpādya bodhisattvacaryāṃ parigaveṣante /
K09bsu016_u:1595: tena hi kulaputra bhūtakalyāṇamitreṣu niścayaprāptena bodhisattvena bhavitavyaṃ sarvajñajñānapratilambhāya /
K09bsu016_u:1600: asti kulaputra ihaiva dakṣiṇāpathe rāmāvarānto nāma janapadaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:1603: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:1616: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto
K09bsu016_u:1617: mañjuśriyaḥ kumārabhūtasya pādau śirasābhivandya mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ
K09bsu016_u:1622: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako 'nupūrveṇa yena rāmāvarānto janapadastenopajagāma /
K09bsu016_u:1623: upetya rāmāvarānte janapade vicaran pūvakuśalamūlasaṃbhavo dārakarmādhiṣṭhānamanobhirucitān
K09bsu016_u:1624: bhogān paribhuñjāno yena sugrīvaḥ parvatastenopasaṃkramya sugrīvaṃ parvatamadhiruhya
K09bsu016_u:1626: evaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ paścimāmuttarāmuttarapūrvāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāṃ paścimottarāmapi diśaṃ niryayau /
K09bsu016_u:1630: sa yena meghaśrīrbhikṣustenopasaṃkramya meghaśriyo bhikṣoḥ pādau śirasābhivandya
K09bsu016_u:1631: meghaśriyaṃ bhikṣuṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā etadavocat - yatkhalu
K09bsu016_u:1632: āryo jānīyāt - mayā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
K09bsu016_u:1633: na ca jāne kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:1645: śrutaṃ ca me āryo bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /
K09bsu016_u:1646: tadvadatu me āryaḥ kathaṃ bodhisattvā niryānti anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
K09bsu016_u:1647: evamukte meghaśrīrbhikṣuḥ sudhanaṃ śriṣṭhidārakametadavocat - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
K09bsu016_u:1649: duṣkaraṃ hi etat kulaputra paramaduṣkaraṃ yaduta bodhisattvacaryāparimārgaṇaṃ bodhisattvogocaraparimārgaṇaṃ
K09bsu016_u:1659: yaduta pūrvasyāṃ diśi ekaṃ tathāgataṃ paśyāmi /
K09bsu016_u:1685: evaṃ dakṣiṇāyāṃ paścimāyāmuttarāyāmuttarapūrvāyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇāyāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ paścimottarāyāmadha ūrdhvaṃ diśi ekamapi tathāgataṃ paśyāmi
K09bsu016_u:1687: ekaikasyāṃ diśi anuvilokayan nānāvarṇāṃstathāgatān paśyāmi nānāsaṃsthānān nānāvikurvitān
K09bsu016_u:1733: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako meghaśriyo bhikṣoḥ pādau śirasābhivandya meghaśriyaṃ
K09bsu016_u:1734: bhikṣumanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛty avalokya ca meghaśriyo bhikṣorantikāt prakrāntaḥ // 2 //
K09bsu016_u:1748: anupūrveṇa yena sāgaramukhaṃ dikpratyuddeśo yena ca sāgaramegho bhikṣustenopasaṃkramya
K09bsu016_u:1749: sāgarameghasya bhikṣoḥ pādau śirasābhivandya sāgarameghaṃ bhikṣumanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ
K09bsu016_u:1750: pradakṣiṇīkṛtya sāgarameghasya bhikṣoḥ purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā etadavocat - ahamārya
K09bsu016_u:1752: na ca jāne kathaṃ bodhisattvā vivartante lokavaṃśāt /
K09bsu016_u:1772: evamukte sāgaramegho bhikṣuḥ sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
K09bsu016_u:1774: na hi kulaputra anavaropitakuśalamūlānāṃ sattvānāṃ bodhāya cittamutpadyate /
K09bsu016_u:1790: ahaṃ kulaputra pūrṇāni dvādaśa varṣāṇi iha sāgaramukhe dikpratyuddeśe viharāmi imaṃ mahāsāgaramārambaṇīkṛtya āmukhīkṛtya,
K09bsu016_u:1791: yaduta mahāsāgarasya vipulāpramāṇatāmanuvicintayan vimalaprasannatāṃ ca gambhīraduravagāhatāṃ
K09bsu016_u:1792: ca anupūrvanimnasusthitāṃ ca anekaratnākaravicitratāṃ ca vāriskandhāpramāṇatāṃ ca
K09bsu016_u:1794: ca mahāmeghapraticchannatāṃ ca antarāpurṇatāṃ ca anuvicintayan /
K09bsu016_u:1795: tasya mama kulaputra evaṃ bhavati - asti na punaranyaḥ kaścidiha loke yo 'smānmanāsāgarādvipulataraśca vistīrṇataraśca apramāṇataraśca gambhīrataraśca vicitrataraśca /
K09bsu016_u:1796: tasya mama kulaputra evaṃ yoniśaścintāmanasikāraprayuktasya mahāsāgarasyādhastānmahāpadmaṃ prādurabhūt /
K09bsu016_u:1817: taṃ ca tathāgatakāyamita upādāya yāvadbhavāgraparamaṃ paśyāmi /
K09bsu016_u:1836: sa ca me tathāgato dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇiṃ prasārya śirasaṃ parimārjya samantanetraṃ nāma
K09bsu016_u:1841: taṃ cāhaṃ samantanetraṃ dharmaparyāyamudgṛhṇāmi saṃdhārayāmi pravartayāmi puanidhyāyāmi evaṃrūpeṇodgaheṇa,
K09bsu016_u:1844: na ca tasya dharmaparyāyasya ekaikasmātparivartādekaikasmāddharmadvārākaikasmāddharmanayādekaikasmāddharmayoneḥ ekaikasmāddharmapadaprabhedāt kṣaya upalabhyate,
K09bsu016_u:1845: na ūnatvaṃ vā paryādānaṃ vā paryavasthānaṃ vā paryantaniṣṭhā vā //
K09bsu016_u:1846: iti hi kulaputra pūrṇāni dvādaśa varṣāṇyahamimaṃ samantanetraṃ dharmaparyāyamudgṛhītavān /
K09bsu016_u:1847: evaṃrūpeṇodgaheṇa yadekadivasena asaṃkhyeyan parivartān paryavāpnomi śrutodgahaṇadhāraṇyālokāvabhāsena /
K09bsu016_u:1858: ye ca me kecit sattvā upasaṃkrāmanti pūrvasyāṃ diśi devā vā devendrā vā nāgā vā nāgendrā
K09bsu016_u:1859: vā yakṣā vā yakṣendrā vā asurā vā asurendrā vā garuḍā vā garuḍendrā vā mahoragā vā
K09bsu016_u:1860: mahoragendrā vā manuṣyā vā manuṣyendrā vā brahmāṇo vā brahmendrā vā,
K09bsu016_u:1861: tān sarvānatraiva samantanetre tathāgatabodhisattvacaryāvabhāse dharmaparyāye pratiṣṭhāpayāmi niveśayāmi /
K09bsu016_u:1862: sarveṣāṃ ca teṣāmeva samantanetraṃ dharmaparyāyaṃ rocayāmi nirūpayāmi paridīpayāmi saṃvarṇayāmi saṃdarśayāmi vibhajāmi vistārayāmi uttānīkaromi vivarāmi pramuñcāmi avabhāsayāmi /
K09bsu016_u:1864: evaṃ dakṣiṇāyāḥ paścimāyā uttarāyā uttarapūrvāyāḥ purvadakṣiṇāyā dakṣiṇapaścimāyāḥ paścimottarāyā adha urdhvāyāśca diśaḥ ye kecit sattvā upasaṃkrāmanti - pūrvavat //
K09bsu016_u:1868: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ caryā jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktuṃ sarvabodhisattvacaryāsamudrāvatīrṇānāṃ pariśuddhapraṇidhyanugamena,
K09bsu016_u:1879: ayamihaiva dakṣiṇāpathe itaḥ ṣaṣṭiyojanaiḥ sāgaratīraṃ nāma laṅkāpatham /
K09bsu016_u:1881: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha kathaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bodhisattvacaryā pariśodhayitavyā //
K09bsu016_u:1882: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ sāgarameghasya bhikṣoḥ pādau śirasābhivandya sāgarameghaṃ
K09bsu016_u:1883: bhikṣumanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya avalokya sāgarameghasya bhikṣorantikāt prakrāntaḥ // 3 //
K09bsu016_u:1886: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakastāṃ kalyāṇamitrānuśāsanī taṃ ca samantanetraṃ dharmaparyāyamanusmaran,
K09bsu016_u:1895: anupūrveṇa yena sāgaratīraṃ laṅkāpathastenopasaṃkramya pūrvāṃ diśamavalokayāmāsa supratiṣṭhitasya bhikṣordarśanakāmatayā /
K09bsu016_u:1896: evaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ paścimāmuttarāmuttarapūrvāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāṃ paścimottarāmadha ūrdhvāṃ diśamavalokayāmāsa supratiṣṭhitasya bhikṣordarśanakāmatayā
K09bsu016_u:1902: acintyāṃśca sūkṣmasphuṭavastrameghān gaganatale prītimanobhirmahoragendraiḥ prahitān prasṛtānapaśyat supratiṣṭhitasya bhikṣoḥ spṛhamāṇarūpaiḥ
K09bsu016_u:1905: acintyāni ca yakṣendraśatasahasrāṇi saparivārāṇi vikṛtaśarīrāṇi gaganatalagatānapaśyat supratiṣṭhitasya bhikṣormaitryādhipateyatayā /
K09bsu016_u:1906: acintyāni ca rākṣasendraśatasahasrāṇi saparivārāṇi gaganatale anuparivartamānāni supratiṣṭhitasya bhikṣorārakṣāpratipannānyapaśyat /
K09bsu016_u:1908: acintyāni ca śuddhāvāsakāyikadevatāśatasahasrāṇi gaganatale vimānagatānyapaśyat supratiṣṭhitasya bhikṣoḥ
K09bsu016_u:1910: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ supratiṣṭhitaṃ bhikṣuṃ gaganatale caṃkramyamāṇaṃ
K09bsu016_u:1911: dṛṣṭvā tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ prāñjaliḥ supratiṣṭhitaṃ
K09bsu016_u:1912: bhikṣuṃ namaskṛtya evamāha - mayā ārya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
K09bsu016_u:1913: na ca jānāmi - kathaṃ bodhisattvena buddhadharmā anveṣṭavyāḥ?
K09bsu016_u:1924: tadvadatu me āryaḥ - kathaṃ bodhisattvena buddhadharmeṣu prayoktavyam,
K09bsu016_u:1935: evamukte supratiṣṭhito bhikṣuḥ sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
K09bsu016_u:1936: yastvamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya buddhadharmān sarvajñatādharmān svayaṃbhūdharmān paripṛcchasi /
K09bsu016_u:1938: etaṃ me kulaputra asaṅgamukhaṃ bodhisattvavimokṣamāyūhatā niryūhatā anusaratā vibhajatā vicinvatā pravicinvatā pratibhāsayatā prabhāsayatā asaṅgakoṭirnāma jñānālokaḥ pratilabdhaḥ,
K09bsu016_u:1949: asyāhaṃ kulaputra anabhisaṃskārikāyā ṛddheranubhāvena iha gaganatale caṃkramāmi,
K09bsu016_u:1959: tiraḥkuḍyaṃ tiraḥprākāramasajjan gacchāmi tadyathāpi nāma ākāśe /
K09bsu016_u:1960: ākāśe 'pi paryaṅkena kramāmi tadyathāpi nāma pakṣī śakuniḥ /
K09bsu016_u:1965: imāvapi candrasūryau evaṃ maharddhikau evaṃ mahānubhāvau evaṃ mahaujasvinau pāṇinā saṃparimārjayāmi /
K09bsu016_u:1969: anantavarṇaprabhājālameghān pramuñcan samantāddiśo niryāmi - yaduta pūrvāṃ diśaṃ niryāmi,
K09bsu016_u:1970: (Gv 57) dakṣiṇāṃ paścimāmuttarāmuttarapūrvāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāṃ paścimottarāmadha urdhvāmapi diśaṃ niryāmi /
K09bsu016_u:1971: ekaikena cittakṣeṇena pūrvasyāṃ diśi ekaṃ lokadhātumatikramāmi /

K09bsu016_u:1975: asaṃkhyeyānapi acintyānapi atulyānapi amāpyānapi asamantānapi aparyantānapi asīmāprāptānapi anabhilāpyānabhilāpyānapi lokadhātūnatikramāmi /
K09bsu016_u:1976: ye ca teṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
K09bsu016_u:1988: teṣu teṣu lokadhātuparṣanmaṇḍaleṣu ye buddhābhagavanto dharmaṃdeśayanti,
K09bsu016_u:1989: teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmekaikaṃ tathāgatamanantabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamaiḥ kāyanānātvairekaikena kāyena anantabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamaiḥ pūjāmeghaiḥ pravarṣannupasaṃkramāmi /
K09bsu016_u:1990: upasaṃkramya pūjāṃ karomyapratiprasrabdhaḥ sarvapuṣpaiḥ sarvagandhaiḥ sarvamālyaiḥ
K09bsu016_u:1991: sarvavilepanaiḥ sarvavastraiḥ sarvadhvajaiḥ sarvapatākābhiḥ sarvavitānaiḥ sarvajālaiḥ sarvavigrahaiḥ /
K09bsu016_u:1992: yacca te buddha bhagavanto bhāṣante deśayanti udīrayanti saṃprakāśayanti saṃvarṇayanti paridīpayanti upadiśanti nirdiśanti prabhāvayanti,
K09bsu016_u:1994: yā ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhakṣetrapariśuddhistāṃ sarvāmanusmarāmi /
K09bsu016_u:1996: evameva dakṣiṇāyāṃ paścimāyāmuttarāyāmuttarapūrvāyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇāyāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ paścimottarāyāmadha ūrdhvāyāṃ diśi ekamapi lokadhātumatikramāmi
K09bsu016_u:1998: ye ca teṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
K09bsu016_u:1999: teṣu teṣu lokadhātusamudreṣu tāsu tāsu lokadhātuviśuddhiṣu,
K09bsu016_u:2000: yāvat teṣu teṣu lokadhātuṣu parṣanmaṇḍaleṣu dharmaṃ deśayanti,

K09bsu016_u:2849: tasya codyānasya madhya vicitradhvajaṃ nāma mahāvimānaṃ sāgaragarbharatnapṛthivītalasaṃsthānaṃ
K09bsu016_u:2853: tasmiṃśca vicitradhvaje mahāvimāne 'parimitānyāsanāni prajñaptāni - yaduta padmagarbhāṇi
K09bsu016_u:2859: tasya ca vicitradhvajasya mahāvimānasya aneke niryūhā acintyaratnamayā vicitraratnavyūhā acintyavarṇanirbhāsarucirasaṃsthānāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:2884: tatra ye āśāyā upāsikāyāḥ sakāśamaparimāṇāḥ sattvāḥ pūrvasyā diśa āgacchanti,
K09bsu016_u:2885: mahābrahmāṇo vā brahmapurohitā vā brahmakāyikā vā vaśavartino vā paranirmitavaśavartikāyikā
K09bsu016_u:2886: vā sunirmitā vā nirmāṇaratikāyikā vā saṃtuṣitā vā tuṣitakāyikā vā suyāmā vā suyāmakāyikā
K09bsu016_u:2887: vā devendrā vā trāyastriṃśatkāyikā vā yakṣendrā vā yakṣā vā gandharvendrā vā gandharvā
K09bsu016_u:2888: vā kumbhāṇḍendrā vā kumbhāṇḍā vā nāgendrā vā nāgā vā asurendrā vā asurā vā garuḍendrā
K09bsu016_u:2889: vā garuḍā va kinnarendrā vā kinnarā vā mahoragendrā va mahoragā vā yamā vā yamakanyā vā,
K09bsu016_u:2890: pretamaharddhikā vā pretā vā manuṣyendrā vā manusyā vā /
K09bsu016_u:2891: evaṃ ye dakṣiṇāyā vā paścimāyā uttarāyā uttarapūrvāyā pūrvadakṣiṇāyā dakṣiṇapaścimāyāḥ paścimottarāyā adha (Gv 81)
K09bsu016_u:2893: mahābrahmāṇo va brahmapurohitā vā brahmakāyikā vā vaśavartino vā vaśavartikāyikā
K09bsu016_u:2894: vā yāvanmanuṣyendrā vā manuṣyā vā āgacchanti nānāvyādhispṛṣṭā nānākleśaparyavasthitā
K09bsu016_u:2908: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ samantavyūhamudyānaṃ praviśya samantādanuvilokayan adrākṣīdāśāmupāsikāṃ bhadrāsane niṣaṇṇām /
K09bsu016_u:2910: upetya āśāyā upāsikāyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya āśopāsikāmanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya etadavocat - mayā ārye anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
K09bsu016_u:2911: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:2913: śrutaṃ ca me āryā bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /
K09bsu016_u:2914: tadvadatu me āryā - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:2918: sāhaṃ kulaputra amoghadarśanā amoghaśravaṇā amoghaparyupāsanā amoghaikavāsasaṃvāsanā amoghānusmaraṇā /
K09bsu016_u:2922: mama kulaputra sahadarśanena sattvā avaivartikā bhavantyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
K09bsu016_u:2924: pūrvasyāṃ diśi tathāgatā āgatya iha ratnāsane niṣadya dharmaṃ deśayanti /
K09bsu016_u:2930: yānyapīmāni kulaputra caturaśītiḥ prāṇikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi iha samantavyūhe mahodyāne prativasanti,
K09bsu016_u:2935: āha - kiyaccirotpāditaṃ tvayā ārye anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam?
K09bsu016_u:2953: anena kulaputra paryāyeṇa jātiparaṃparayā kalpaparaṃparayā buddhaparaṃparāmavatarantī
K09bsu016_u:2955: ye mayā ārāgitā upasthitāḥ pūjitā arcitāḥ yeṣāṃ mayā antikāddharmadeśanā śrutā,
K09bsu016_u:2956: yeṣāṃ ca me śāsane brahmacaryaṃ cīrṇam /
K09bsu016_u:2972: sudhana āha - kiyaccireṇa ārye tvamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase?
K09bsu016_u:2973: āha - na khalu kulaputra ekasattvārambaṇatayā bodhisattvānāṃ bodhāya cittamutpadyate yaduta paripākavinayāya /
K09bsu016_u:2980: na sattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrasya arthāya bodhisattvānāṃ bodhāya cittamutpadyate /
K09bsu016_u:3039: na sattvavimantrāyāḥ na sattvahimantrāyāḥ na sattvaparamantrāyāḥ,
K09bsu016_u:3115: na yāvadanabhilāpyānabhilāpyatrisāhasramahāsāhasralokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamalokadhātuparyāpannānāṃ sattvānāmarthāya bodhisattvānāṃ bodhāya cittamutpadyate yaduta paripākavinayāya,
K09bsu016_u:3116: api tu aśeṣaniḥśeṣānavaśeṣasarvalokadhātuparyāpannānāṃ sarvasattvānāmarthāya bodhisattvānāṃ bodhāya cittamutpadyate yaduta paripākavinayāya
K09bsu016_u:3171: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputra sarvadharmasamavasaraṇā bodhisattvānāṃ caryā yaduta jñānānugamāya /
K09bsu016_u:3173: tasyā mama kulaputra evaṃpraṇidheryanniṣṭhā kāma dhātuviśuddhiḥ,
K09bsu016_u:3179: āha - ko nāma ārye eṣa vimokṣaḥ?
K09bsu016_u:3180: āha - aśokakṣemadhvajo nāma kulaputra eṣa vimokṣaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:3183: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ sāgarasamacittānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sarvabuddhadharmasaṃpratīcchanatayā,
K09bsu016_u:3192: śakropamānāṃ sarvajagadārakṣāpratipannatayā caryā jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum,
K09bsu016_u:3195: gaccha kulaputra ayamihaiva dakṣiṇāpathe samudravetālyāṃ nālayurnāma janapadaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:3200: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidāraka āśāyā upāsikāyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya āśāmupāsikāmanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ
K09bsu016_u:3201: pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ punaravalokya praṇipatya aśrumukho rudan bodhiparamadurlabhatāmanuvicintayan,
K09bsu016_u:3214: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako bodhisattvānuśāsanyanugatacitto bodhisattvacaryāpariśodhanānugatacitto
K09bsu016_u:3220: tena ca samayena bhīṣmottaranirghoṣarṣiranyatamasminnāśramapade viharati sma asaṃkhyeyavicitradrumalatāvanaramaṇīye
K09bsu016_u:3239: anekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya prāñjalibhūtaḥ purataḥ sthitvā manojñopacāreṇa manojñāṃ vācamudīrayan evamāha - mayā ārya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
K09bsu016_u:3240: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:3242: śrutaṃ ca me āryo bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /
K09bsu016_u:3243: tadvadatu me āryaḥ - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:3245: atha khalu bhīṣmottaranirghoṣaṛṣistāni daśa māṇavakasahasrāṇyanuvilokya evamāhaanena māṇavakāḥ kulaputreṇa anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam
K09bsu016_u:3247: ayaṃ sa kulaputrāḥ sarvasattvahitasukhāya pratyupasthito jñānasāgarābhimukhaḥ (Gv 88)
K09bsu016_u:3250: mahājñānāloke candre udāgatya sarvakleśapratāpaṃ praśamayitukāmo sarvasattvakuśalamūlāni vardhayitukāmaḥ //
K09bsu016_u:3251: atha khalu tāni daśa māṇavakasahasrāṇi nānāvarṇaiḥ suruciraiḥ sugandhaiḥ puṣpaiḥ
K09bsu016_u:3252: sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakamavakīrya abhyavakīrya abhivandya namaskṛtvā praṇipatya pradakṣiṇīkṛtya
K09bsu016_u:3267: atha khalu bhīṣmottaranirghoṣa ṛṣiḥ tān māṇavakānevamāha - yena māṇavakā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditaṃ bhavati,
K09bsu016_u:3270: anena māṇavakāḥ kulaputreṇa anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
K09bsu016_u:3272: atha khalu bhīṣmottaranirghoṣa ṛṣiḥ sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat - ahaṃ kulaputra aparājitadhvajasya bodhisattvasya vimokṣasya lābhī /
K09bsu016_u:3273: sudhana āha - ka etasya ārya aparājitadhvajasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya viṣayaḥ?
K09bsu016_u:3274: tato bhīṣmāttaranirghoṣaṛṣiḥ dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇiṃ prasārya sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ śirasi parimārjya dakṣiṇena pāṇinā paryagṛhṇāt /
K09bsu016_u:3275: samanantaraparigṛhītaśca sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako bhīṣmottaranirghoṣeṇa ṛṣiṇā dakṣiṇena pāṇinā,
K09bsu016_u:3276: atha tāvadeva sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako 'paśyaddaśasu dikṣu daśabuddhakṣetraśatasahasraparamāṇurajaḥsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi /
K09bsu016_u:3277: teṣu ca daśabuddhakṣetraśatasahasraparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ pādamūlagatamātmānaṃ saṃjānāti sma /
K09bsu016_u:3295: kvacidvarṣakoṭīśataṃ kvacidvarṣakoṭisahasraṃ kvacidvarṣakoṭīśatasahasraṃ kvacidvarṣakoṭyayutaṃ kvacidvarṣakoṭīniyutaṃ kvacidardhakalpaṃ saṃjānāti
K09bsu016_u:3305: atha khalu bhīṣmottaranirghoṣa ṛṣiḥ sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ vyamuñcat /
K09bsu016_u:3306: sa punarapi bhīṣmottaranirghoṣasya ṛṣeḥ purataḥ sthitamātmānaṃ saṃjānāti /
K09bsu016_u:3309: āha - etamahaṃ kulaputra aparājitadhvajaṃ bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ jānāmi /
K09bsu016_u:3315: vā vaktuṃ praṇidhiviśeṣo vā sūcayituṃ kṣetrābhisaṃskāro vā jñātuṃ jñānaviṣayo avagāhituṃ
K09bsu016_u:3316: samādhigocaro vā anusartuṃ ṛdvivikurvitaṃ vā avatarituṃ vimokṣavṛṣabhitāvikrīḍitaṃ
K09bsu016_u:3317: vā anugantuṃ śarīravibhaktinimittaṃ vā udgrahītuṃ svaramaṇḍalaviśuddhirvā prabhāvayituṃ
K09bsu016_u:3322: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:3324: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto
K09bsu016_u:3325: bhīṣmottaranirghoṣasya ṛṣeḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhīṣmottaranirghoṣaṃ ṛṣimanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ
K09bsu016_u:3346: tena ca samayena jayoṣmāyatano brāhmaṇa ugraṃ tapaḥ tapyati sarvajñatāmārambaṇīkṛtya /
K09bsu016_u:3349: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako jayoṣmāyatanasya brāhmaṇasya pādau śirasābhivandya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā ārya,
K09bsu016_u:3351: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:3353: śrutaṃ ca me āryo bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /
K09bsu016_u:3354: tadvadatu me āryaḥ - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:3357: etaṃ kṣuradhāramārgaṃ parvatamabhiruhya atra agnikhadāyāṃ prapata /
K09bsu016_u:3359: atha khalu sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya etadabhavat - durlabhā aṣṭākṣaṇavinivṛttiḥ /
K09bsu016_u:3370: mā haivāyaṃ māro bhaviṣyati mārādhiṣṭhito vā mārakāyiko vā kalyāṇamitrapratirūpako vā bodhisattvakhaṇḍako vā,
K09bsu016_u:3375: mā khalu māṃ viṣameṇa pathā praṇetukāmaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:3376: mā khalu me dharmamukhāntarāyaṃ kartukāmo buddhadharmādhigamāya /
K09bsu016_u:3377: tasyaivaṃ cintāmanasikāraprayuktasya daśa brahmasahasrāṇyuparyantarikṣe sthitvā evamāhuḥ - mā kulaputra evaṃ cetanāṃ dṛḍhīkārṣīḥ /
K09bsu016_u:3378: eṣa kulaputra āryo vajrārciḥsamādhyavabhāsalabdhaḥ avivartyavīryo mahārambhottāraṇapratipannaḥ,
K09bsu016_u:3391: tāneṣa āgatānṛddhayanubhāvenābhibhūya ugravratatapasā ca tebhyaḥ sarvadṛṣṭigatavinivartanāya sarvamānamadaprahāṇāya ca dharmaṃ deśayati /
K09bsu016_u:3395: daśa ca mārasahasrāṇyuparyantarīkṣe sthitvā divyairmaṇiratnairabhyavakīrya evamāhuḥ - asya kulaputra,
K09bsu016_u:3397: te vayaṃ saṃvegajātāḥ saparivārāḥ etasya sakāśamupasaṃkramāma /
K09bsu016_u:3399: yathā svacittapratilabdhā bodhāya cittamutpādya avinivartanīyā bhavāmo 'nuttarayāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau //
K09bsu016_u:3400: daśa ca vaśavartidevarājasahasrāṇi divyaiḥ puṣpairabhyavakīrya evamāhuḥ - vayaṃ kulaputra,
K09bsu016_u:3401: asya pañcatapastapyataḥ svabhavaneṣu ratiṃ na vindāmaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:3408: pūjāṃ kṛtvā evamāhuḥ - etasya kulaputra pañcatapastapyata ebhyo 'gnikūṭebhyastadrūpā prabhā niścarati,
K09bsu016_u:3414: vayamapīdānīṃ sadevaputrāpsarogaṇaparivārā na kāmeṣu ratiṃ vindāmaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:3419: mahādharmavegavivardhanatayai kāyaviśuddhaye apramāṇabuddhakāyābhinirharaṇatāyai vāgviśuddhaye tathāgataghoṣapratilābhāya cittaviśuddhaye sarvajñatāpratilābhāya dharmaṃ deśayati //
K09bsu016_u:3420: daśa ca saṃtuṣitadevarājasahasrāṇi sadevaputrāpsaragaṇoparivārāṇi uparyantarikṣe sthitvā sarvagandhacūrṇameghavarṣamabhipravṛṣya pūjayitvā namaskṛtya evamāhuḥ - asya kulaputra,
K09bsu016_u:3424: saṃtuṣṭicittatāyai cittaparituṣṭitāyai kuśalamūlasaṃjananatāyai bodhicittotpādapratilābhāya yāvatsarvabuddhadharmaparipūraṇāya dharmaṃ deśayati
K09bsu016_u:3425: daśa ca suyāmadevarājasahasrāṇi sadevaputrāpsarogaṇaparivārāṇi divyāni māndāravakusumavarṣāṇyabhipravṛṣya
K09bsu016_u:3426: evamāhuḥ - asya kulaputra pañcatapastapyamānasya asmākaṃ divyasaṃgītiṣu ratirna bhavati /
K09bsu016_u:3428: tata eṣo 'smākamupasaṃkrāntānāṃ sarvakāmarativinivartanatāyai yāvatsarvabuddhadharmapratilābhāya dharmaṃ deśayati //
K09bsu016_u:3429: daśa ca śakradevendraśatasahasrāṇi pratyekaṃ dvātriṃśadbhirupendraiḥ sadevaputrāpsarogaṇaparivāraiḥ
K09bsu016_u:3436: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputra asya saṃprekṣitena imāni meruśikharāṇi saṃprakampitāni /
K09bsu016_u:3437: te vayaṃ vyathitasaṃvignacittāḥ sarvajñatācittotpādanadṛḍhatayā sarvajñatājñāne praṇidhimabhinirharāmaḥ //
K09bsu016_u:3438: daśa ca nāgasahasrāṇi airāvatanandopanandanāgarājapramukhāni uparyantarikṣe gatāni
K09bsu016_u:3440: evamāhuḥ - asya kulaputra pañcatapastapyata ebhyo mahāgniskandharāśibhya ābhāḥ pramuktāḥ
K09bsu016_u:3442: krodhapravṛttiṃ caiṣāṃ praśamayitvā āśayaṃ prahlādya manaḥ prasādayanti /
K09bsu016_u:3445: atyayaṃ deśayitvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpādya sarvajñatāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati //
K09bsu016_u:3446: daśa ca yakṣendrasahasrāṇi gaganatale sthitvā nānāvidhayā pūjayā pūjayitvā jayoṣmāyatanaṃ
K09bsu016_u:3447: brāhmaṇaṃ sudhanaṃ ca śreṣṭhidārakamevamāhuḥ - asya kulaputra pañcatapastapyamānasya
K09bsu016_u:3451: aviheṭhanapratipannā asmatsakāśamupasaṃkrāmanti - vayamapīdānīṃ maitryādhipatyenābhibhūtāḥ sveṣu sveṣu bhavaneṣu ratiṃ na vindāmaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:3453: tadasmākamupasaṃkrāntānāmasya śarīraniryātā prabhā avabhāsya sarvaśarīraṃ sukhena spharati /
K09bsu016_u:3454: sa eṣo 'smākaṃ prīṇitakāyacittānāṃ tathā dharmaṃ deśayati,
K09bsu016_u:3456: daśa ca gandharvendrasahasrāṇyuparyantarikṣe sthitvā evamāhuḥ - asmākamapi kulaputra
K09bsu016_u:3457: svabhavaneṣu vasatāmasya pañcatapastapyata ebhyo 'gnikūṭebhya ābhā niścaritvā asmadbhavanānyavabhāsayati /
K09bsu016_u:3458: te vayaṃ tayā prabhayā spṛṣṭā acintyasukhasamarpitā etasyāntikamupasaṃkramāmaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:3461: daśa ca asurendrasahasrāṇi mahāsamudrādabhyudgamya ākāśe dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalamavanāmyakṛtāñjalipuṭāni namasyamānāni evamāhuḥ - asya kulaputra,
K09bsu016_u:3462: pañcatapastapyato 'smākaṃ sarve 'suralokāḥ sasāgarāṇi saśailāni ca mahāpṛthivīmaṇḍalāni prakampante /
K09bsu016_u:3463: tato vayaṃ save nihatamānamadadarpā vratatapobhibhūtā etasya sakāśamupasaṃkramāmaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:3464: upasaṃkrāntānāmeṣo 'smākaṃ sarvamāyāśāṭhyaprahāṇāya gambhīradharmakṣāntyavatārāya acaladharmatāpratiṣṭhānāya daśabalajñānapariniṣpattaye ca dharmaṃ deśayati //
K09bsu016_u:3465: daśa ca garuḍendrasahasrāṇi mahāvegadhārigaruḍendrapramukhāni udāraṃ māṇavakarūpamabhinirmāya evamāhuḥ - asya kulaputra,
K09bsu016_u:3466: pañcatapastapyata ebhyo 'gnirāśibhyaḥ prabhā niścaritvā asmadbhavanānyavabhāsya saṃkampayati /
K09bsu016_u:3476: daśa ca kinnarendrasahasrāṇi uparyantarikṣe sthitvā evamāhuḥ - asya kulaputra pañcatapastapyato
K09bsu016_u:3480: amuṣyāṃ lokadhātusaṃkhyāyāmamuko nāma bodhisattvo bodhāya praṇidadhāti /
K09bsu016_u:3481: amuṣyāṃ lokadhātusaṃkhyāyāmamuko nāma bodhisattvo duṣkaraparityāgaṃ karoti /
K09bsu016_u:3484: amuṣyāṃ lokadhātusaṃkhyāyāmevaṃnāmā bodhisattvo savāhanaṃ māraṃ parājitya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /
K09bsu016_u:3486: amuṣyāṃ lokadhātusaṃkhyāyāmamuko nāma tathāgato 'navaśeṣabuddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā anupadhiśeṣanirvāṇadhātau (Gv 94)
K09bsu016_u:3488: aparyantaḥ kulaputra bhavejjambudvīpe sarvatṛṇakāṣṭhaśākhāpatrapalāśānāṃ paramāṇubhāgaśaḥ paricchinnānām,
K09bsu016_u:3489: na tveva teṣāṃ tathāgatanāmnāṃ bodhisattvapraṇidhīnāṃ bodhisattvacaryāprasthānaviśeṣāṇām,
K09bsu016_u:3495: yadasmatpariṣadi aneke sattvā avivartyā bhavantyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ //
K09bsu016_u:3497: pūjayā pūjayitvā evamāhuḥ - asya kulaputra pañcatapastapyata ebhyo 'gnikūṭebhyastathārūpā prabhā niścaranti,
K09bsu016_u:3498: yayā prabhayā avīciparyantān sarvanirayānavabhāsya sarvanairayikasattvaduḥkhāni pratiprasrabdhāni /
K09bsu016_u:3500: te vayamasyopari cittāni prasādayitvā praṇīteṣu kāmāvacaradevanikāyeṣūpapannāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:3501: ye vayamasya kṛtajñatayā darśanenāvitṛptāḥ sarvakāmaratimutsṛjya asya sakāśamupasaṃkramāmaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:3505: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ
K09bsu016_u:3506: imamevaṃ rūpaṃ dharmanayaṃ śrutvā jayoṣmāyanate brāhmaṇe bhūtakalyāṇamitrāsaṃjñāmutpādya
K09bsu016_u:3507: jayoṣmāyatanasya brāhmaṇasya pādayoḥ praṇipatya evamāha - atyayamatyayato deśayāmyārya
K09bsu016_u:3509: atha khalu jayoṣmāyatano brāhmaṇaḥ sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ gāthayādhyabhāṣata -
K09bsu016_u:3511: na kāṅkṣaye gurubhya ekadhā sthapitva mānasam /
K09bsu016_u:3512: tato 'sya sarva artha bhonti te 'pi ca pradakṣiṇāḥ
K09bsu016_u:3514: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakastaṃ kṣuradhārācitaṃ parvataprapātamārgamabhiruhya tatra mahāgniskandhe prāpatat /
K09bsu016_u:3515: tena prapatatā supratiṣṭhito nāma bodhisattvasamādhiḥ pratilabdhaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:3516: tena cāgnisparśanena praśamasukhābhijño nāma bodhisattvasamādhiḥ pratilabdhaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:3524: vātamaṇḍalīkalpānāṃ sarvajagadarthaprayuktānāmavivartyavīryāṇāmapratyudāvartyasaṃnāhānāṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum?
K09bsu016_u:3530: tāmupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:3532: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako jayoṣmāyatanasya brāhmaṇasya pādau śirasābhivandya
K09bsu016_u:3536: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ kalyāṇamitrācintyagocaraniryātaḥ udārādhimuktiviśuddho
K09bsu016_u:3544: nagaraṃ tenopasaṃkramya maitrāyaṇīṃ kanyāmanveṣamāṇaḥ parimārgamāṇo 'śrauṣīt - eṣā
K09bsu016_u:3545: maitrāyaṇī kanyā rājñaḥ siṃhaketorduhitā pañcakanyāśataparivārā vairocanagarbhaprāsādatalābhirūḍhā
K09bsu016_u:3546: uragasāracandanapāde suvarṇasūtrajālaścyote divyacīvaraprajñapte bhadrāsane upaviṣṭā dharmaṃ deśayati /
K09bsu016_u:3547: śrutvā ca punaḥ siṃhavijṛmbhitaṃ nagaraṃ praviśya yena rājñaḥ siṃhaketorgṛhaṃ tenopasaṃkramya rājño bahirdvāraśālāyāṃ pratyasthāt maitrāyaṇyāḥ kanyāyā darśanakāmaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:3551: dṛṣṭvā ca paripṛcchati - kva yūyaṃ gacchatha kulaputrāḥ,
K09bsu016_u:3561: / sa tasyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya anekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā ārye anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam
K09bsu016_u:3562: na ca jānāmi - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:3564: śrutaṃ ca me āryā bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /
K09bsu016_u:3565: tadvadatu me āryā kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:3574: tadyathāpi nāma udakasarasi svacche 'nāvile viprasanne gaganaṃ candrādityaṃ jyotirgaṇapratimaṇḍitaṃ saṃdṛśyate pratibhāsayogena,
K09bsu016_u:3577: so 'nuvilokya tadbuddhadarśanavyūhanimittaṃ saṃdhārayan prāñjalībhūto maitryāyaṇyāḥ kanyāyā vacanaṃ saṃprekṣate sma /
K09bsu016_u:3578: sā provāca - ahaṃ kulaputra samantavyūhasya prajñāpāramitāmukhaparivartasya lābhinī /
K09bsu016_u:3579: eṣa ca me samantavyūhaḥ prajñāpāramitāmukhaparivartaḥ ṣaṭtriṃśadgaṅgānadīvālikāsamānāṃ tathāgatanāmantikātparyanviṣṭaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:3580: te ca me tathāgatā nānāmukhapraveśairetaṃ samantavyūhaṃ prajñāpāramitāmukhaparivartamavatārayāmāsuḥ /
K09bsu016_u:3583: āha - ka etasya ārye samantavyūhasya prajñāpāramitāmukhaparivartasya viṣayaḥ?
K09bsu016_u:3585: upanidhyāyantyā anusarantyā vyavacārayantyā anuvicintayantyā ākārayantyā ādhārayantyā
K09bsu016_u:3586: vyūhayantyā abhinirharantyāḥ samalaṃkurvantyāḥ pravicinvantyāḥ samantamukhā nāma dhāraṇī ājāyate,
K09bsu016_u:3588: āmukhībhavanti abhipatanti parivartante - yaduta buddhakṣetramukhaṃ buddhamukhaṃ
K09bsu016_u:3625: yathāśayavijñaptinidarśanānāṃ sarvakālacakravaśavartināṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum //
K09bsu016_u:3629: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:3631: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako maitrāyaṇyāḥ kanyāyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya maitrāyaṇīṃ
K09bsu016_u:3632: kanyāmanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ punaravalokya maitrāyaṇyāḥ kanyāyāḥ
K09bsu016_u:3636: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako gambhīraṃ bodhisattvajñānavicāramanuvicintayan,
K09bsu016_u:3648: anupūrveṇa yena trinayano janapadastenopasaṃkramya sudarśanaṃ bhikṣuṃ mārgayamāṇo
K09bsu016_u:3652: vanaṣaṇḍe caṃkramyamāṇaṃ daharaṃ taruṇamabhirūpaṃ prāsādikaṃ darśanīyamabhinīlapradakṣiṇāvartakeśaṃ
K09bsu016_u:3667: tasya khalu punaḥ sudarśanasya bhikṣoścaṃkramyamāṇasyābhimukhadigāvṛtā digdevatā diṅbhaṇḍalamāvartayanti /
K09bsu016_u:3678: sadāvibodhanamaṇḍalā divasadevatā digrocanamaṇiratnadhvajagṛhītā gaganatale tiṣṭhanti ālokasaṃjananārthāya //
K09bsu016_u:3679: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako yena sudarśano bhikṣustenopasaṃkramya sudarśanasya
K09bsu016_u:3680: bhikṣoḥ kramatalābhyāṃ nipatya sudarśanasya bhikṣoḥ kramatalaṃ paricumbya parilikhya
K09bsu016_u:3681: purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - ahamārya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthito
K09bsu016_u:3683: śrutaṃ ca me āryo bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadāti,
K09bsu016_u:3685: tadvadatu me āryaḥ - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:3687: sa āha - ahaṃ kulaputra daharo jātyā,
K09bsu016_u:3689: tena me kulaputra ekajanmanā aṣṭatriṃśadgaṅgānadīvālukāsamānāṃ tathāgatānāmantike brahmacaryaṃ cīrṇam /
K09bsu016_u:3704: kvacinme tathāgate yāvadanabhilāpyānabhilāpyān kalpān brahmacaryaṃ cīrṇamanayaiva kalpasaṃkhyayā /
K09bsu016_u:3714: sarveṣāṃ ca me teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ pūrvapraṇidhānāni svabuddhakṣetrapariśuddhaye 'bhinirhṛtāni praṇidhimaṇḍalasamādhyabhinirhārabalena /
K09bsu016_u:3715: sarveṣāṃ ca me teṣāṃ pūrvabodhisattvacaryā svacaryāpariśuddhaye 'bhinirhṛtā sarvacaryāvatārasamādhipratilambhabalena /
K09bsu016_u:3716: sarveṣāṃ ca me teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ pāramitāviśuddhirabhinirhṛtā samantabhadracaryāniryāṇabalena
K09bsu016_u:3717: / api tu khalu punarme kulaputra evaṃ caṃkramyamāṇasya sarvadiksrotomukhānyāvartante suvilokitajñānamukhatayā /
K09bsu016_u:3742: idamihaiva dakṣiṇāpathe śramaṇamaṇḍale janapade sumukhaṃ nāma nagaram /
K09bsu016_u:3744: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:3746: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako bodhisattvavikramapratipadviśuddhiparamaḥ bodhisattvabalālokāvabhāsitacitto
K09bsu016_u:3752: sudarśanasya bhikṣoḥ pādau śirasābhivandya sudarśanaṃ bhikṣumanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ
K09bsu016_u:3756: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakastāṃ sudarśanasya bhikṣoranuśāsanīmanumantrayan,
K09bsu016_u:3759: prabhāṣamāṇaḥ pratibhāvayan udīrayan darśayan anuvicintayan abhyavacaran,
K09bsu016_u:3761: taddharmanayamanuvicārayan avabhārayan samavasaran āvartayan saṃbhindan pradarśayan
K09bsu016_u:3763: janapade sumukhaṃ nagaraṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ indriyeśvaraṃ dārakaṃ parimārgamāṇaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:3764: tasyoparyantarikṣe gatā devanāgayakṣagandharvā ārocayanti - eṣa kulaputra indriyeśvaro dārako nadīsaṃbhedābhyāśe daśadārakasahasraparivṛtaḥ pāṃśukrīḍayā krīḍatīti //
K09bsu016_u:3765: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako yena sumukhaṃ nagaraṃ nadīsaṃbhedābhyāśastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:3766: so 'drākṣīt indriyeśvaraṃ dārakaṃ daśadārakasahasraparivṛtaṃ pāṃśukrīḍayā krīḍantam /
K09bsu016_u:3767: dṛṣṭvā ca punaryenendriyeśvaro dārakastenopasaṃkramya indriyeśvarasya dārakasya pādau
K09bsu016_u:3769: dārakasya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā ārya,
K09bsu016_u:3771: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyam śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:3773: śrutaṃ ca me āryo bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /
K09bsu016_u:3774: tadvadatu me āryaḥ - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:3776: āha - ahaṃ kulaputra mañjuśriyā kumārabhūtena lipisaṃkhyāmudrāgaṇanānayaṃ śikṣayatā sarvaśilpābhijñāvabhāsajñānamukhamavatāritaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:3787: niveśayāmi pratiṣṭhāpayāmi śikṣayāmi śīlayāmi dṛḍhīkaromi sārikaromi saṃtarāmi saṃbhāvayāmi
K09bsu016_u:3788: saṃvartayāmi unnāmayāmi vivardhayāmi nimittīkaromi koṭīkaromi viśodhayāmi vimalīkaromi
K09bsu016_u:3913: sa taṃ bālikārāśiṃ gaṇayaṃstulayan prasiñcan saṃkhyāmakārṣīt - iyantīmāni vālikāphalakāni,
K09bsu016_u:3915: sa taṃ vālikārāśiṃ gaṇanāsaṃketanirdeśena nirdiśya evamāha - eṣa kulaputra gaṇanāyogo lokadhātuparaṃparayā supravartate bodhisattvānām /
K09bsu016_u:3916: anena gaṇanānayena bodhisattvāḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi lokadhātuprasarān gaṇayanti /
K09bsu016_u:3917: evaṃ dakṣiṇāyāṃ paścimāyāmuttarayāmuttarapūrvāyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇāyāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ paścimottarāyāmadha ūrdhvāyāṃ diśi /
K09bsu016_u:3919: eṣa kulaputra gaṇanānayo daśasu dikṣu lokadhātunāmaparaṃparānirdeśeṣu pravartate bodhisattvānām /
K09bsu016_u:3920: anena gaṇanānayena bodhisattvā daśasu dikṣu lokadhātunāmaparaṃparāṃ gaṇayanti /
K09bsu016_u:3922: evaṃ daśasu dikṣu kalpanāmaparaṃparānirdeśeṣu buddhanāmaparaṃparānirdeśeṣu dharmanāmaparaṃparānirdeśeṣu sattvanāmaparaṃparānirdeśeṣu karmanāmaparaṃparānirdeśeṣu
K09bsu016_u:3923: eṣa eva gaṇanānayo yāvaddaśasu dikṣu sarvanāmaparaṃparānirdeśeṣu pravartate bodhisattvānām /
K09bsu016_u:3926: anena gaṇanānayena bodhisattvā daśasu dikṣu sarvanāmaparaṃparāṃ gaṇayanti /
K09bsu016_u:3929: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ sarvajagatsaṃkhyānupraviṣṭānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sarvadharmavidhisaṃkhyānupraviṣṭānāṃ
K09bsu016_u:3947: tāmupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:3949: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ kalyāṇamitravacanaṃ śrutvā saṃharṣitatanuruho
K09bsu016_u:3954: indriyeśvaraṃ dārakamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ punaravalokya indriyeśvarasya
K09bsu016_u:3958: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ kalyāṇamitrānuśāsanīmeghaṃ saṃpratīcchan,
K09bsu016_u:3971: tridaśagaṇaparivṛtaḥ śakra iva asurendragaṇapramardanaḥ anupūrveṇa yena samudrapratiṣṭhānaṃ nagaraṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ prabhūtāmupāsikāṃ parimārgamāṇaḥ
K09bsu016_u:3972: tasya mahājanakāya upadarśayati - eṣā kulaputra prabhūtopāsikā madhye nagarasya svagṛhe tiṣṭhatīti //
K09bsu016_u:3973: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako yena prabhūtāyā upāsikāyā niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkramya prāñjalībhūto dvāraśālāyāṃ pratyasthāt /
K09bsu016_u:3974: sa paśyati prabhūtāyā upasikāyāḥ tadgṛhaṃ vipulavistīrṇaṃ ratnaprākāraparikṣiptaṃ caturdikṣu vibhaktadvāramasaṃkhyeyāparimāṇaratnavyūhamacintyapuṇyavipākābhinirvṛttam
K09bsu016_u:3976: navāṃ daharāṃ taruṇīṃ prathamayauvanasamudgatāmabhirūpāṃ prāsādikāṃ darśaniyāṃ paramaśubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā
K09bsu016_u:3983: ye ca sattvāḥ prabhūtāmupāsikāṃ paśyanti devā vā manuṣyā vā,
K09bsu016_u:3985: tasmiṃśca gṛhe daśāsanakoṭīsahasrāṇi prajñaptāni divyamānuṣyasamatikrāntāni bodhisattvakarmavipākapariniṣpannāni /
K09bsu016_u:3986: na ca tasmin gṛhe paśyatyannapānanicayaṃ vā vastrābharaṇaparibhoganicayaṃ vā anyatraikapiṭharikāyāḥ purastānnikṣiptāyāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:3987: daśa cāsyāḥ strīsahasrāṇi purataḥ sthitānyapaśyadapsarovarṇāni apsarorūpāṇi apsaraḥkalpāni
K09bsu016_u:3990: tāḥ tasyāḥ striyaḥ kiṃkarā vacanapratikāriṇyaḥ purata upatiṣṭhanti upavicaranti saṃprekṣante upanidhyāyanti abhivandante ālokayanti avanamanti praṇamanti namasyanti /
K09bsu016_u:3991: tāsāṃ ca gātrebhyo yo gandhaḥ pravāti,
K09bsu016_u:3995: te sarve 'vyāpannacittā bhavanti avairacittā avihiṃsācittā īrṣyāmātsaryavigatacittā
K09bsu016_u:3996: amāyāśāṭhyacittā anunītā apratihatacittā anavalīnānunnatacittāḥ samacittā maitracittā
K09bsu016_u:4002: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ prabhūtāyā upāsikāyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya prabhūtāmupāsikāmanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya purataḥ prāñjalīsthitvā evamāha - mayā ārye,
K09bsu016_u:4004: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:4006: śrutaṃ ca me āryā bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /
K09bsu016_u:4007: tadvadatu me āryā - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:4009: āha - ahaṃ kulaputra akṣayavyūhapuṇyakoṣasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya lābhinī /
K09bsu016_u:4012: ato 'haṃ kulaputra ekapiṭharikāyāḥ sattvaśatamapi saṃtarpayāmi yathābhiprāyairbhojanaiḥ,
K09bsu016_u:4051: na niṣṭhāṃ na paryantaṃ na pariniṣṭhāṃ gacchati /
K09bsu016_u:4052: sacet kulaputra daśadiksarvalokadhātuparyāpannāḥ sarvasattvā madantikamupasaṃkrameyurnānādhimuktā nānābhiprāyāḥ,
K09bsu016_u:4055: yathā nānābhojanaiḥ evaṃ nānāpānavidhibhiḥ nānārasāgraiḥ nānāśayanairnānāvasraiḥ
K09bsu016_u:4058: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputra ye kecit pūrvasyāṃ diśi (Gv 107)
K09bsu016_u:4072: pūrvasyāṃ diśi yāvadanabhilāpyānabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu lokadhātuṣu śrāvakapratyekabuddhā antimadehadhāriṇaḥ śrāvakapratyekabodhiphalamanuprāpnuvanti,
K09bsu016_u:4075: evaṃ dakṣiṇāyāṃ paścimāyāmuttarāyāmuttarapūrvasyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇāyāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ paścimottarāyāṃ adha ūrdhvāyāṃ diśi //
K09bsu016_u:4077: pūrvasyāṃ diśi ekasmin lokadhātau ekajātipratibaddhā bodhisattvāḥ,
K09bsu016_u:4078: sarve te mamāhāraṃ paribhujya bodhimaṇḍe niṣadya sasainyaṃ māraṃ parājitya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante /
K09bsu016_u:4082: lokadhātuśatasahasre lokadhātukoṭyāṃ lokadhātukoṭīśate lokadhātukoṭīsahasre lokadhātukoṭīśatasahasre lokadhātukoṭīniyutaśatasahasre,
K09bsu016_u:4085: ye kecit kulaputra pūrvasyāṃ diśi yāvadanabhilāpyānabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu lokadhātuṣvekajātipratibaddhā bodhisattvāḥ,
K09bsu016_u:4086: sarve te mamāhāraṃ paribhujya bodhimaṇḍe niṣadya sasainyaṃ māraṃ parājitya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /
K09bsu016_u:4088: evaṃ dakṣiṇāyāṃ paścimāyāmuttarāmuttarapūrvāyāṃ pūrvadakṣiṇāyāṃ dakṣiṇapaścimāyāṃ paścimottarāyāmadho diśi,
K09bsu016_u:4091: sarve te mamāhāraṃ paribhujya bodhimaṇḍe niṣadya sasainyaṃ māraṃ parājitya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante /
K09bsu016_u:4093: evaṃ ye lokadhātuśate lokadhātusahasre lokadhātuśatasahasre lokadhātukoṭyāṃ lokadhātukoṭīśate
K09bsu016_u:4099: sarve te mamāhāraṃ paribhujya bodhimaṇḍe niṣadya sasainyaṃ māraṃ parājitya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante //
K09bsu016_u:4100: paśyasi tvaṃ kulaputra imāni daśastrīsahasrāṇi mama parivāram?
K09bsu016_u:4102: āha - etatpramukhāni kulaputra strīṇāṃ daśāsaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrāṇi mama sabhāgacaritāni
K09bsu016_u:4119: etāni kulaputra daśastrīsahasrāṇi ekakṣaṇena daśa diśaḥ spharanti,
K09bsu016_u:4120: yadutaikajātipratibaddhān bodhisattvān bhojanena pratipādanatāyai asyā eva piṭharikāyā bhojanamādāya /
K09bsu016_u:4121: daśa diśaḥ spharanti asyā eva piṭharikāyā bhojanamādāya /
K09bsu016_u:4122: daśa diśaḥ spharanti caramabhavikān sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhayānikān piṇḍapātena pratipādanatāyai /
K09bsu016_u:4124: sā ahaṃ kulaputra asyā eva piṭharikāyā devān devabhojanena saṃtarpayāmi /
K09bsu016_u:4136: atha tāvadeva aparimāṇāḥ sattvāḥ pūrveṇa gṛhadvāreṇa praviśanti sma yaduta prabhūtayopāsikayā pūrvapraṇidhānanimantritāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:4137: evaṃ dakṣiṇena paścimeṇottareṇa gṛhadvāreṇa aparimāṇāḥ sattvāḥ praviśanti sma yaduta prabhūtayopāsikayā pūrvapraṇidhānanimantritāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:4153: nāgān yakṣān gandharvānasurān garuḍān kinnarān mahoragān manuṣyānamanuṣyān tattadeva bhojanena saṃtarpayati yāvadāttamanaskān karoti /
K09bsu016_u:4160: na niṣṭhāṃ na paryantaṃ na pariniṣṭhāṃ gacchati //
K09bsu016_u:4162: atha khalu prabhūtopāsikā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakamevamāha - etamahaṃ kulaputra akṣayavyūhapuṇyakośaṃ bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ jānāmi /
K09bsu016_u:4169: mahāpuṇyapradīpānāṃ sarvajagaddāridryāndhakāravidhamanatayā caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum //
K09bsu016_u:4173: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:4175: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ prabhūtāyā upāsikāyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya prabhūtāmupāsikāmanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ
K09bsu016_u:4176: pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ punaravalokya prabhūtāyā upāsikāyā darśanāvitṛpto 'ntikātprakrāntaḥ // 14 //
K09bsu016_u:4179: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako 'kṣayavyūhapuṇyakośavimokṣāvabhāsapratilabdhaḥ taṃ puṇyasāgaramanuvicintayan,
K09bsu016_u:4191: anupūrveṇa yena mahāsaṃbhavaṃ nagaraṃ tenopasaṃkramya vidvāṃsaṃ gṛhapatiṃ parimārgati,
K09bsu016_u:4210: vivardhamānena daśatathāgatabalāvabhāsena vidvāṃsaṃ gṛhapatiṃ parigaveṣamāṇo adrākṣīnmadhye
K09bsu016_u:4220: dṛṣṭvā ca sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako yena vidvān gṛhapatistenopajagāma /
K09bsu016_u:4221: upetya viduṣo gṛhapateḥ pādau śirasābhivandya vidvāṃsaṃ gṛhapatimanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ
K09bsu016_u:4222: pradakṣiṇīkṛtya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - ahaṃ ārya sarvasattvānāmarthāya
K09bsu016_u:4223: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ saṃprasthito yaduta sarvasattvaduḥkhavyupaśamāya sarvasattvātyantasukhapratiṣṭhāpanāya
K09bsu016_u:4229: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam, (Gv 111)
K09bsu016_u:4231: śrutaṃ ca me āryo bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /
K09bsu016_u:4232: tadvadatu me āryaḥ - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:4233: kathaṃ śikṣamāṇā bodhisattvāḥ pratiśaraṇabhūtā bhavanti sarvasattvānām //
K09bsu016_u:4234: evamukte vidvān gṛhapatiḥ sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakamevamāha - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
K09bsu016_u:4237: ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ parimārgayamāṇā na tṛpyante kalyāṇamitradarśanena /
K09bsu016_u:4249: āha - sarva ete kulaputra mayā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:4260: evaṃ hi kulaputra bodhisattvāstrātāro bhavanti sarvasattvānām /
K09bsu016_u:4301: atha tāvadeva aparimāṇāḥ sattvā viduṣā gṛhapatinā pūrvapraṇidhānābhinimantritāḥ saṃnipatitāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:4302: nānādigbhyo nānājanapadapradeśebhyo nānānagarebhyo nānānigamebhyo nānāpaṭṭanebhyo nānākarvaṭebhyo nānāsattvajātibhyo (Gv 112)
K09bsu016_u:4304: nānāyatanaviśuddhā nānāhārārthino nānāhārābhilāṣiṇo nānāśayā śucyannapānakāmā māṃsārthino
K09bsu016_u:4307: evaṃ sarvagativicāreṣu nānābhojanapānārthina upasaṃkrāntāḥ yaduta bodhisattvānubhāvena asaṅgatyāgadundubhinirghoṣeṇa bodhisattvapraṇidhinimantritāḥ
K09bsu016_u:4308: tamupasaṃkramya vidvāṃsaṃ gṛhapatiṃ yācante 'valokayanti nirīkṣante vijñāpayanti //
K09bsu016_u:4309: atha khalu vidvān gṛhapatistān yācanakān saṃnipatitān viditvā muhūrtamanuvicintya gaganatalamavalokayati sma /
K09bsu016_u:4310: tasya tato gaganatalādvividhā bhojanapānavidhayo nānārasā nānāvarṇā nānāgandhā avalambya hastatale pratyatiṣṭhan /
K09bsu016_u:4311: sa tānyādāya tān yathāsaṃnipatitān yācanakān nānādhimuktān yathābhipretairbhojanapānavidhibhiḥ
K09bsu016_u:4312: sarvopakaraṇaviśaiṣaiḥ saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati saṃtoṣayati saṃpraharṣayati saṃpramodayati pariprīṇayati,
K09bsu016_u:4314: uttare vai nānāmiṣeṇa saṃtarpya tebhyo dharmaṃ deśayet /
K09bsu016_u:4325: so 'nnārthina upasaṃkrāntān gaganatalānnānānnavidhīn gṛhītvā saṃtarpya tebhya āyurvarṇabalamukhapratibhānaṃ saṃpaśyan pratilābhāya dharmaṃ deśayet
K09bsu016_u:4327: saṃtarpya tebhyaḥ saṃsāratṛṣṇārativinivartanatāyai buddhadharmaratitṛṣṇāsaṃjananatāyai dharmaṃ deśayet /
K09bsu016_u:4330: sa yānārthino nānādiksrotobhyāgatānnānāvidhayānadānaiḥ saṃgṛhya tebhyo mahāyānādhirohaṇatāyai dharmaṃ deśayet /
K09bsu016_u:4331: sa nānādigāgatān vastrārthina upasaṃkrāntān viditvā muhūrtaṃ vicintya gaganatalamullokayati sma /
K09bsu016_u:4334: sa taistān yācanakān pratipādya tebhyo 'nuttaratathāgatahrayapatrāpyasuvarṇavarṇacchavitāpratilābhaviśuddhaye dharmaṃ deśayet /
K09bsu016_u:4335: pratyekameva sarvopakaraṇavidhibhiryathāgatān yācanakān pratipādya tebhyo yathārhaṃ dharmaṃ deśayet //
K09bsu016_u:4337: atha khalu vidvān gṛhapatiḥ sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya tamacintyaṃ bodhisattvavimokṣaviṣayamupadarśya evamāha - etamahaṃ kulaputra manaḥkośasaṃbhavavimokṣaṃ jānāmi /
K09bsu016_u:4338: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ pariṣkāravaśitāprāptānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ ratnapāṇinā pratilabdhānāṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum,
K09bsu016_u:4340: ye te sarvalokadhātūnanavaśeṣaṃ pāṇinā saṃchādya buddhapūjāvidhānatāyai sarvatathāgataparṣanmaṇḍaleṣu nānāvarṇaratnameghān pravarṣanti /
K09bsu016_u:4344: sarvatathāgataparṣanmaṇḍaleṣu sarvasattvabhavaneṣu yaduta sarvabuddhapūjopasthānatāyai sarvasattvadhātuparipākavinayāya ca //
K09bsu016_u:4348: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:4350: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto
K09bsu016_u:4359: kalyāṇamitrābhirādhanānuvartanacitto viduṣo gṛhapateḥ pādau śirasābhivandya vidvāṃsaṃ
K09bsu016_u:4360: gṛhapatimanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ punaravalokya viduṣo gṛhapaterantikātprakrāntaḥ // 15 //
K09bsu016_u:4363: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ tatpuṇyatoyaṃ saṃbhāvayan,
K09bsu016_u:4373: anupūrveṇa yena siṃhapotaṃ nagaraṃ tenopasaṃkramya ratnacūḍaṃ dharmaśreṣṭhinaṃ parimārgamāṇo 'drākṣīdantarāpaṇamadhyagatam /
K09bsu016_u:4374: tasya pādau śirasābhivandya pradakṣiṇīkṛtya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā ārya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
K09bsu016_u:4375: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:4379: atha khalu ratnacūḍo dharmaśreṣṭhī sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ pāṇau gṛhītvā yena svaṃ niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkramya tadgṛhamupadarśya evamāha - prekṣasva kulaputra mama niveśanam /
K09bsu016_u:4380: so 'nuvilokayan adrākṣīttadgṛhaṃ śuddhaṃ prabhāsvaraṃ jāmbūnadasuvarṇamayaṃ vipulamudviddhaṃ
K09bsu016_u:4393: ca samādhivyutthānaṃ ca samādhivyavacāraṃ ca jñānālokaṃ ca abhinirhārayatāṃ saṃnipātamadrākṣīt /
K09bsu016_u:4397: bodhisattvānāṃ saṃnipātamadrākṣīt imāni prajñāpāramitāmukhāni saṃgāyatām - yaduta
K09bsu016_u:4413: itīmāni prajñāpāramitāmukhāni pramukhaṃ kṛtvā paripūrṇāni daśa prajñāpāramitāsaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrāṇi,
K09bsu016_u:4425: kutra te kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni yasya tava iyamīdṛśī vipākasaṃpat?
K09bsu016_u:4426: sa āha - smarāmi kulaputra atīte 'dhvani buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ kalpānāṃ
K09bsu016_u:4429: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
K09bsu016_u:4430: sa khalu punastathāgato jñānavairocanapramukhena śrāvakakoṭīśatena jñānasūryatejaḥpramukhena
K09bsu016_u:4433: tasya me tathāgatasya nagarapraviṣṭasyāntarāpaṇamadhyagatasya tūryanādanirnāditaṃ kāritam /
K09bsu016_u:4434: ekā ca gandhagulikā nidhūpitā tasya bhagavataḥ sabodhisattvaśrāvakasaṃghasya pūjākarmaṇe /
K09bsu016_u:4435: tayā ca gandhagulikayā nidhūpitayā saptāhaṃ sarvajambudvīpo 'nantavarṇaiḥ sarvasattvakāyasadṛśairdhūpapaṭalameghaiḥ saṃchanno 'bhūt /
K09bsu016_u:4436: tebhyaśca dhūpapaṭalameghebhya evaṃrūpaḥ śabdo niścarati sma - aciantyastathāgatatryadhvavipulena skandhena samanvāgataḥ,
K09bsu016_u:4440: tebhyo dhūpapaṭalameghebhyo buddhādhiṣṭhānena ayamevaṃrūpaḥ śabdo niścacāra /
K09bsu016_u:4441: tacca me kulaputra tathāgatādhiṣṭhānaṃ saṃdarśanaprātihāryakuśalamūlaṃ triṣu sthāneṣu pariṇāmitam /
K09bsu016_u:4446: kiṃ mayā śakyamacintyāpramāṇaguṇaratnākarāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum,
K09bsu016_u:4458: tatra samantamukhe nagare samantanetro nāma gāndhikaḥ śreṣṭhī prativasati /
K09bsu016_u:4459: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:4461: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako ratnacūḍasya dharmaśreṣṭhinaḥ pādau śirasābhivandya
K09bsu016_u:4471: anupūrveṇa yena vetramūlako nāma janapadastenopasaṃkramya samantamukhaṃ nagaraṃ parimārgan
K09bsu016_u:4476: madhye vetramūlasya janapadasya daśānāṃ paṭṭanasahasrāṇāṃ nigamaṃ supariniṣṭhitaṃ dṛḍhaprākāramudviddhamaṣṭacatvaropaśobhitam /
K09bsu016_u:4478: dṛṣṭvā ca yena samantanetro gāndhikastenopasaṃkramya samantanetrasya gāndhikasya pādau śirasābhivandya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā
K09bsu016_u:4480: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:4484: ahaṃ kulaputra sarvasattvānāṃ vyādhīn prajānāmi vātasamutthānapi,
K09bsu016_u:4494: teṣāṃ ca sarvavyādhīnāṃ praśamaṃ prajānāmiyaduta snehanaṃ prajānāmi,
K09bsu016_u:4495: vamanaṃ virecanamāsthāpanaṃ raktāvasecanaṃ nāsākarma karṣupariṇāhaṃ pariṣvedanamanulepanaṃ
K09bsu016_u:4496: viṣapratighātaṃ bhūtagrahapratiṣedhaṃ bṛṃhaṇaṃ snapanaṃ saṃvāsanaṃ saṃvardhanaṃ varṇapariśodhanaṃ
K09bsu016_u:4501: vyādhipraśāntāṃśca susnātānuliptagātrān kṛtvā yathārhābharaṇavibhūṣitāṅgān yathārhavastrasaṃchāditaśarīrān vividhabhojanarasāgraiḥ saṃtarpya aparimitadhanasamṛddhān karomi /
K09bsu016_u:4502: uttare caiṣāṃ rāgaprahāṇāya dharmaṃ deśayāmi aśubhopasaṃhāreṇa /
K09bsu016_u:4524: evaṃ caitān dharmadānena saṃgṛhya anantadhanaratnopacayopastabdhān kṛtvā visarjayāmi /
K09bsu016_u:4525: api tu khalu punarahaṃ kulaputra sarvagandhadhūpavāsanānulepanayuktīḥ prajānāmi yaduta atulagandharājapramukhāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:4530: api tu khalu punarahaṃ kulaputra sarvasattvasaṃtoṣaṇasamantamukhabuddhadarśanapūjopasthānagandhabimbaṃ prajānāmi //
K09bsu016_u:4548: yeṣāṃ sahadarśanena ca sarvasattvānāṃ sarvakleśāḥ praśamanti,
K09bsu016_u:4550: yeṣāṃ sahadarśanena sattvā avakāśaṃ labhante buddhadharmeṣu,
K09bsu016_u:4552: yeṣāṃ sahadarśanena sattvā vigatabhayā bhavanti sarvasaṃsāragatibhyaḥ,
K09bsu016_u:4553: yeṣāṃ sahadarśanena sattvā abhayaprāptā bhavanti sarvajñatādigupanayatayā,
K09bsu016_u:4554: yeṣāṃ sahadarśanena sattvā na pratipatanti jarāmaraṇaśvabhraprapāteṣu,
K09bsu016_u:4555: yeṣāṃ sahadarśanena sattvā nirvṛtisukhaṃ pratilabhante dharmadhātusamatāsthānena //
K09bsu016_u:4559: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:4561: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ samantanetrasya gāndhikaśreṣṭhinaḥ pādau śirasābhivandya
K09bsu016_u:4562: samantanetraṃ gāndhikaṃ śreṣṭhinamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ punaravalokya
K09bsu016_u:4569: kalyāṇamitrārakṣito 'smi na bhūyo vinivartiṣyāmi anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherityanuvicintayan pratyalabhata cittaprītim /
K09bsu016_u:4570: cittaprasādaṃ cittaprāmodyaṃ cittatuṣṭiṃ cittapraharṣaḥ cittanandīṃ cittavyupaśamaṃ
K09bsu016_u:4571: cittavipulatāṃ cittālaṃkāratāṃ cittāsaṅgatāṃ cittānāvaraṇatāṃ cittaviviktatāṃ cittasamavasaraṇatāṃ
K09bsu016_u:4574: so 'nupūrveṇa janapadena janapadaṃ grāmeṇa grāmaṃ deśena deśaṃ parimārgan yena tāladhvajaṃ nagaraṃ tenopasaṃkramya paripṛcchati sma - kutrānalo rājeti /
K09bsu016_u:4575: tamanyo janakāya etadavocat - eṣa kulaputra analo rājā arthakaraṇe siṃhāsanopaviṣṭo rājakāryaṃ karoti /
K09bsu016_u:4592: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako yena analo rājā tenopajagāma /
K09bsu016_u:4599: niṣaṇṇaṃ navaṃ daharaṃ taruṇamabhirūpaṃ prāsādikaṃ darśanīyamabhinīlapradakṣiṇāvartakeśaṃ
K09bsu016_u:4614: daśa cāsya kāraṇāpurūṣasahasrāṇi saṃnipatitāni purata upasthāpitāni narakapālasadṛśāni
K09bsu016_u:4619: tatra bahūni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi corāṇāṃ parasvāpahāriṇā parasattvabhogavipralopināṃ
K09bsu016_u:4621: kilbiṣakāriṇāṃ garadāyakānāṃ ḍāmarikānāṃ manuṣyaghātakānāṃ paradārasevināṃ mithyāpratipannānāṃ
K09bsu016_u:4625: sa tatra rājño 'nalasyājñayā keṣāṃciddhastapādacchedaṃ keṣāṃcit karṇanāsācchedaṃ
K09bsu016_u:4628: evamanekavidhāstīvrāḥ kharāḥ kaṭukā amanāpāḥ prāṇahāriṇīḥ kāraṇāḥ kāryamāṇā apaśyat /
K09bsu016_u:4631: tatra ca aṅgapratyaṅgaśirovikalāni mṛtakalevaraśatasahasrāṇi vṛkaśṛgālāśvakākagṛdhraśyenakurarabhairavākīrṇāni bhakṣyamāṇāni apaśyat /
K09bsu016_u:4632: kānicinnīlāni ca nīlavarṇāni vipūyakāni vyādhmātakāni vipaṭumakāni paramavikṛtabībhatsānyapaśyat /
K09bsu016_u:4633: teṣāṃ ca vadhyānāṃ hanyamānānāṃ vividhāḥ kāraṇāḥ kāryamāṇānāṃ ghoramārtasvaraṃ krandatāṃ
K09bsu016_u:4634: mahāntaṃ nirnādanirghoṣamaśrauṣīt mahāsaṃvegodvegasaṃjananaṃ tadyathā saṃghāte mahānarake //
K09bsu016_u:4635: tasya tadatidārūṇabhairavakaraṃ paramavaiśasaṃ dṛṣṭvaivametadabhavat - ahaṃ ca sarvasattvahitasukhahetoranuttarāṃ
K09bsu016_u:4639: ayaṃ ca analo rājā kuśaladharmaparihīṇo mahāsāvadyakarmakārī praduṣṭamanaḥsaṃkalpaḥ
K09bsu016_u:4644: vipulakarūṇāsaṃbhūtacetasa upari gaganatale devatā ityevamārocayāmāsuḥ na smarasi kulaputra jayoṣmāyatanasyarṣeḥ kalyāṇamitrānuśāsanīmiti?
K09bsu016_u:4648: samyak samena kalyāṇamitrāṇi praṇayanti na viṣameṇa /
K09bsu016_u:4662: atha sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako devatāvacanamupaśrutya yena analo rājā tenopajagāma /
K09bsu016_u:4663: upetya analasya rājñaḥ pādau śirasābhivandya analaṃ rājānamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā ārya,
K09bsu016_u:4665: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:4667: śrutaṃ ca me āryo bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /
K09bsu016_u:4668: tadvadatu me āryaḥ kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:4670: atha khalvanalo rājā rājakāryāṇi kṛtvā utthāya siṃhāsanāt sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ dakṣiṇena pāṇinā gṛhītvā tāladhvajaṃ rājadhānīṃ prāviśat /
K09bsu016_u:4671: so 'nupūrveṇa svaṃ gṛhamanupraviśya sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakamantaḥpuraṃ praveśya bhadrāsane niṣadya evamāha - vyavalokayasva kulaputra imaṃ mama gṛhaparibhogamiti /
K09bsu016_u:4676: daśa cāsya strīkoṭīparivāramadrākṣīt abhirūpāṇāṃ prāsādikānāṃ darśanīyānāṃ paramaśubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā
K09bsu016_u:4679: atha khalvanalo rājā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakamevamāha - tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra,
K09bsu016_u:4686: so 'vocat - ahaṃ kulaputra māyāgatasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya lābhī /
K09bsu016_u:4688: madviṣayavāsinaḥ sattvā yadbhūyasā prāṇātipātino 'dattādāyinaḥ kāmamithyācāriṇo mṛṣāvādinaḥ
K09bsu016_u:4691: te na śakyante 'nyathā pāpacaryāyā nivārayituṃ vinivartayitumanuśāsitum /
K09bsu016_u:4692: so 'haṃ kulaputra eṣāṃ sattvānāṃ damanāya paripācanāya vinayena hite saṃniyojanārthaṃ mahākaruṇāṃ puraskṛtya nirmitairvadhyaghātakairnirmitān vadhyapuruṣān ghātayāmi /
K09bsu016_u:4695: tacca dṛṣṭvā ete madvijitavāsinaḥ sattvā labhante saṃvegam,
K09bsu016_u:4702: kṛtvā atyantaniṣṭhe yogakṣeme sarvaduḥkhopacchede sarvajñatāsukhe pratiṣṭhāpayāmi /
K09bsu016_u:4703: nāhaṃ kulaputra kasyacit sattvasya viheṭhaṃ karomi kāyena vācā manasā va /
K09bsu016_u:4705: ahaṃ kulaputra tiryagyonigatasya saṃmūḍhasya antaśaḥ kuntapipīlikasya ekacittotpādenāpi duḥkhoparodhaṃ neccheyam,
K09bsu016_u:4719: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:4721: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ analasya rājñaḥ pādau śirasābhivandya analaṃ rājānamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ
K09bsu016_u:4722: pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ punaravalokya analasya rājño 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ // 18 //
K09bsu016_u:4739: tasya mahājanakāya upadarśayati - etatkulaputra suprabhaṃ mahānagaraṃ yatra mahāprabho rājā prativasati //
K09bsu016_u:4740: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako yena suprabhaṃ mahānagaraṃ tenopasaṃkramyādrākṣīt suprabhaṃ mahānagaram /
K09bsu016_u:4741: dṛṣṭvā ca punastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāta evamanucintayāmāsa - kutra kalyāṇamitraḥ prativasati?
K09bsu016_u:4744: acintyān bodhisattvaguṇagocarān acintyāṃ bodhisattvavṛṣabhitām acintyāṃ bodhisattvasamādhivihāritām
K09bsu016_u:4746: evaṃ cintāmanasikāraprayukto yena suprabhaṃ mahānagaraṃ tenopajagāma /
K09bsu016_u:4747: upetya suprabhaṃ mahānagaramavalokayāmāsa vicitradarśanīyaṃ saptānāṃ ratnānāṃ suvarṇasya rūpasya vaiḍūryasya sphaṭikasya lohitamukteraśmagarbhasya musāragalvasya ca,
K09bsu016_u:4758: tasya ca mahānagarasya daśayojanāntarāṇyaṣṭau dvārāṇi vicitrāṇi darśanīyāni saptānāṃ ratnānām /
K09bsu016_u:4759: tacca mahānagaraṃ vipulaṃ vistīrṇaṃ nānāṣṭāṅgasuvibhaktaṃ nīlavaiḍūryamayyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpitam /
K09bsu016_u:4777: tasya ca suprabhasya mahānagarasya madhye rājño mahāprabhasya gṛhaṃ māpitamabhūt /
K09bsu016_u:4785: citro darśanīyo 'saṃkhyeyamaṇiratnācintyavyūhavirājito rājñā mahāprabheṇa saddharmagañjaḥ sthāpitaḥ //
K09bsu016_u:4786: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako ratnaparikhāsvananunītacitto ratnaprākāreṣvavismayamāno
K09bsu016_u:4791: upetya samantādanuvilokayan adrākṣīnmahāprabhaṃ rājānaṃ madhye nagaraśṛṅgāṭakasya caityagṛhasya nātidūre (Gv 126)
K09bsu016_u:4820: anekāni ca gośatasahasrāṇi suvarṇaśṛṅgakhurāṇi kaṃsadohāni daridrāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃgrahāya sthāpitānyapaśyat /
K09bsu016_u:4821: anekāni ca kanyākoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi abhirūpāṇi prāsādikāni darśanīyāni sarvābharaṇavibhūṣitāni
K09bsu016_u:4829: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako mahāprabhasya rājñaḥ sarvaśarīreṇa praṇipatya mahāprabhaṃ
K09bsu016_u:4830: rājānamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha -
K09bsu016_u:4832: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:4834: śrutaṃ ca me āryo bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /
K09bsu016_u:4835: tadvadatu me āryaḥ - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:4837: āha - ahaṃ kulaputra mahāmaitrīdhvajāṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ pariśodhayāmi,
K09bsu016_u:4839: eṣā ca me kulaputra mahāmaitrīdhvajā bodhisattvacaryā anekeṣāṃ buddhaśatānāmanekeṣāṃ buddhasahasrāṇāmanekeṣāṃ buddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ yāvadanabhilāpyānabhilāpyānāṃ (Gv 127)
K09bsu016_u:4840: buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmantikāt paripṛṣṭā paripraśnīkṛtā viśodhitā vyūhitā vilokitā vicāritā anugaveṣitā paryanviṣṭā vicitritā vipulīkṛtā /
K09bsu016_u:4841: so 'haṃ kulaputra asyāṃ mahāmaitrīdhvajāyāṃ bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ sthitvā dharmeṇa rājyamanuśāsāmi /
K09bsu016_u:4851: maitracittatāyāṃ mahāmaitryādhipatye maitrībale hitacittatāyāṃ sukhacittatāyāṃ dayācittatāyāmanugrahacittatāyāṃ
K09bsu016_u:4864: evamāhaṃ kulaputra maitrīdhvajāyāṃ bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ sthitvā dharmeṇa lokamanuśāsāmi /
K09bsu016_u:4865: na khalu kulaputra madvijitavāsinaḥ sattvā mamāntikādbhayaṃ trāsaṃ chambhitatvaṃ romaharṣaṇaṃ vā nirgacchanti /
K09bsu016_u:4866: ye ca kulaputra daridrāḥ sattvā vividhopakaraṇavikalā māmupasaṃkrāmanti annārthino vā pānārthino vā vastrārthino vā yāvat sarvārthino vā,
K09bsu016_u:4867: tānahaṃ pūrvaparicitāneva vivṛtān rājakośān gṛhṇīdhvamityapyanujānāmi yasyārthe yūyaṃ
K09bsu016_u:4868: pāpakaṃ karma ārabhetha prāṇivadhaṃ vā adattādānaṃ vā kāmamithyācāraṃ vā mṛṣāvādaṃ
K09bsu016_u:4869: vā paiśunyaṃ vā pāruṣyaṃ vā saṃbhinnapralāpaṃ vā abhidhyāṃ vā vyāpādaṃ vā mithyādṛṣṭiṃ
K09bsu016_u:4871: ataḥ tasmāt suprabhānmahānagarānnagaradvārebhyo vīthirathyāmukhacatvaraśṛṅgāṭakebhyo yo yenārthī sa taṃ gṛhṇātu,
K09bsu016_u:4873: ye khalu punaḥ kulaputra suprabhamahānagarābhyantaranivāsinaḥ sattvāḥ,
K09bsu016_u:4876: yaduta keṣāṃcit parīttaṃ keṣāṃcidvipulaṃ keṣācinmṛttikātalaṃ keṣācidvaiḍūryamaṇiratnasaṃstṛtatalaṃ
K09bsu016_u:4881: bahirnagaranivāsināmapi śuddhāśayānāṃ kṛtakuśalamūlānāṃ paryupāsitabahubuddhotpādānāṃ sarvajñatābhimukhānāṃ sarvajñatāpratiśaraṇānāṃ ratnamayamābhāsamāgacchati
K09bsu016_u:4882: ye mayā pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ caratā caturbhiḥ saṃgrahavastubhiḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ,
K09bsu016_u:4884: (Gv 128) yadā ca kulaputra madvijatavāsinaḥ sattvā deśapradeśeṣu grāmanagaranigamarāṣṭrarājadhānīṣu
K09bsu016_u:4886: tadāhaṃ teṣāmanugrahāya mahāmaitrīpūrvaṃgamaṃ lokendriyāvartaṃ nāma bodhisattvasamādhiṃ
K09bsu016_u:4887: samāpadye / samanantarasamāpannasya ca me kulaputra imaṃ samādhim,
K09bsu016_u:4888: atha teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tāni bhayāni te upasargāḥ tāni vairāṇi te vigrahavivādāḥ te
K09bsu016_u:4889: cittasaṃkṣobhāḥ tāni vihiṃsācittāni praśamanti vyupaśamanti nivartante nirudhyante
K09bsu016_u:4893: atha khalu mahāprabho rājā tasyāṃ velāyāṃ mahāmaitrīpūrvaṃgamaṃ lokendriyāvartaṃ bodhisattvasamādhiṃ samāpannaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:4894: samanantarasamāpannasya ca rājño mahāprabhasya imaṃ mahāmaitrīpūrvaṅgamaṃ lokendriyāvartaṃ bodhisattvasamādhim,
K09bsu016_u:4895: atha tāvadeva suprabhaṃ mahānagaraṃ sadeśapradeśaṃ sagrāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīparivāraṃ ṣaḍvikāraṃ prakampitam /
K09bsu016_u:4896: tasya pracalataste 'pi ratnaprākārā ratnaprāsādā ratnagarbhāṇi ratnagṛhāṇi,
K09bsu016_u:4897: ratnabhavanāni ratnavimānāni ratnakūṭāgārāṇi ratnaniryūhā ratnaharmyāṇi ratnagavākṣāḥ
K09bsu016_u:4898: ratnavedikāḥ ratnatoraṇāni ratnārdhacandrā ratnasiṃhapañcarāṇi ratnakhoṭakāni ratnabimbāni
K09bsu016_u:4899: ratnavitānāni ratnasūtrakiṅkiṇījālāni ratnaghaṇṭāḥ ratnadhvajāḥ ratnapatākāḥ ratnatālāḥ
K09bsu016_u:4901: te ca saṃghadṛmānā valgu manojñaṃ śravaṇīyaṃ śabdamanuravanto yena rājā mahāprabhaḥ,
K09bsu016_u:4905: sarve te prītiprāmodyaparisphuṭacetaso yena mahāprabho rājā tenābhimukhāḥ sarvaśarīreṇa praṇamanti sma /
K09bsu016_u:4907: te 'pi sarve prahlāditakāyacittāḥ prītiprāmodyajātāḥ yena rājā mahāprabhastenābhimukhāḥ praṇemuḥ /
K09bsu016_u:4909: te 'pi sarve anyonyamaitracittā hitacittā yena rājā mahāprabhastenābhipraṇatāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:4910: yāni ca parvataśikharāṇi tadanye cāpyunnatāḥ pṛthivīpradeśāḥ,
K09bsu016_u:4912: ye ca puṣpavṛkṣāḥ phalavṛkṣāḥ patravṛkṣā bījagrāmabhūtagrāmaśasyatṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatayo vā,
K09bsu016_u:4913: te 'pi sarve yena mahāprabho rājā tenābhinatāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:4915: tānyapi sarvāṇi yena rājā mahāprabhastenābhimukhaṃ vegaṃ prāmuñcan //
K09bsu016_u:4945: atulyaṃ ca kāyikacaitasikamudāraṃ sukhaṃ pratyanubhavanti sma /
K09bsu016_u:4950: atulyaṃ ca kāyikacaitasikamudāraṃ sukhaṃ pratyanubhavanti sma /
K09bsu016_u:4954: evaṃ sarvasyāṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau yāvaddaśasu dikṣu daśalokadhātukoṭīniyutaśatasahasreṣu
K09bsu016_u:4958: atha khalu mahāprabho rājā tasmātsamādhervyūtthāya sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat - etamahaṃ kulaputra,
K09bsu016_u:4960: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāmaitryapramāṇacchatrāṇāṃ sarvalokadhātusukhāśayaspharaṇatayā,
K09bsu016_u:4968: mahāmārutasadṛśānāṃ sarvajagatsamādhisamāpattibhavanasarvajñatāmahāpuraparisaṃsthāpanatayā caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum,
K09bsu016_u:4980: tāmupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:4982: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako mahāprabhasya rājñaḥ pādau śirasābhivandya mahāprabhaṃ
K09bsu016_u:4983: rājānamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ punaravalokya mahāprabhasya rājño
K09bsu016_u:4987: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ suprabhānmahānagarānniṣkramya muhūrtaṃ mārgamanusṛtya mahāprabhasya rājño 'nuśāsanīmanuvicintayan,
K09bsu016_u:4998: cittaprītiprasādavegaṃ cittapraharṣaṃ cittotplavaṃ cittanandīṃ cittānāvilatāṃ cittaprabhāsvaratāṃ
K09bsu016_u:5017: tasyaivaṃ rudataḥ krandataḥ paridevamānasya gagatalagatā devagaṇāḥ sadānubaddhāśca
K09bsu016_u:5026: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakastataḥ samādhijñānālokād vyutthāya anupūrveṇa yena sthirā rājadhānī tenopasaṃkramya acalāmupāsikāṃ parimārgati parigaveṣate /
K09bsu016_u:5027: tasya (Gv 132) mahājanakāya upadarśayati - eṣā kulaputra acalopāsikā svaniveśane mātāpitṛsabhāginī kumārabhūtā svajñātigaṇaparivṛtā mahato janakāyasya dharmaṃ deśayati //
K09bsu016_u:5028: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako mahāprītiprasādaprāmodyaparisphuṭacetā yena acalāyā upāsikāyā niveśanaṃ tenopajagāma /
K09bsu016_u:5029: upetya acalāyā upāsikāyā niveśanadvāre sthito 'paśyat sarvaṃ taṃ niveśanaṃ suvarṇavarṇayā ābhayā sphuṭamavabhāsitaṃ kāyacittaprahlādinyā /
K09bsu016_u:5030: samanantaraspṛṣṭasya ca sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya tayā prabhayā,
K09bsu016_u:5036: tathārūpaṃ ca gandhamajighrat yo na devānāṃ na devakanyānāṃ na nāgānāṃ na nāgakanyānāṃ
K09bsu016_u:5037: na yakṣāṇāṃ na yakṣakanyānāṃ na gandharvāṇāṃ na gandharvakanyānāṃ nāsurāṇāṃ nāsurakanyānāṃ
K09bsu016_u:5038: na garuḍānāṃ na garūḍakanyānāṃ na kinnarāṇāṃ na kinnarakanyānāṃ na mahoragāṇāṃ na
K09bsu016_u:5040: na sā strī daśadiśi loke saṃvidyate,
K09bsu016_u:5043: na sa varṇāvabhāso 'sti daśadiśi loke sthāpayitvā tathāgatavarṇāvabhāsam,
K09bsu016_u:5047: nāsti tadātmabhāvārohapariṇāhasaṃsthānaṃ daśadiśi loke sthāpayitvā tathāgatātmabhāvārohapariṇāhasaṃsthānam,
K09bsu016_u:5051: nāsti sa prabhāvyūho daśadiśi loke sthāpayitvā tathāgataprabhāvyūham,
K09bsu016_u:5055: nāsti sa gandho daśadiśi loke devabhavaneṣu vā nāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragamanuṣyāmanuṣyabhavaneṣu vā yastasyā mukhakośavisṛtagandhena
K09bsu016_u:5057: nāsti sa bhavanavyūhaparibhogo daśadiśi loke sthāpayitvā tathāgataparibhogam,
K09bsu016_u:5061: nāsti sā parivārasaṃpat daśadiśi loke sthāpayitvā tathāgataparivārasaṃpadam,
K09bsu016_u:5065: na sa sattvaḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyate daśadiśi
K09bsu016_u:5067: na sa sattvaḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyate daśadiśi loke yaḥ acalāyā upāsikāyāḥ sahadarśanena kleśo na vyupaśamaṃ gacchet /
K09bsu016_u:5068: tadyathāpi nāma daśa śatasahasravaśavartino mahābrahmāṇaḥ kāmāvacarāḥ kleśānna samudācaranti,
K09bsu016_u:5069: evameva sahadarśanena acalāyā upāsikāyāḥ sattvānāṃ kleśā na samudācaranti /
K09bsu016_u:5070: (Gv 133) na sa sattvaḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyate daśadiśi loke yo acalāyā upāsikāyāḥ sahadarśanena tṛptimāpadyeta sthāpayitvā prajñātṛptān //
K09bsu016_u:5071: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ kṛtāñjalipuṭo 'calāyā upāsikāyā acintyāṃ kāyādhipateyatām,
K09bsu016_u:5073: acintyaṃ ca sarvakṣititalanagaramahāparvatāpratihataṃ raśmijālavyūhaṃ dṛṣṭvā acintyaṃ
K09bsu016_u:5074: sattvārthakaraṇaṃ ca sarvaromakūpavisṛtaṃ gandhamāghrāya aparyantāṃ ca parivārasaṃpadamavalokya
K09bsu016_u:5077: śīlaṃ sadā yadamalaṃ parirakṣitaṃ te kṣāntiryataḥ suvipulā paribhāvitā ca /
K09bsu016_u:5078: vīryaṃ ca vajramiva yaddṛḍhamāsthitaṃ te tenodgatā jagati bhāsyacalendrakalpā // 1 //
K09bsu016_u:5079: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako 'calāmupāsikāmanayā gāthayā abhiṣṭutya evamāhamayā ārye anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
K09bsu016_u:5080: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:5082: śrutaṃ ca me āryā bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /
K09bsu016_u:5083: tadvadatu me āryā - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:5085: atha khalvacalopāsikā snigdhayā bodhisattvavācā manojñayā premaṇīyayā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ pratisaṃmodya evamāha - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
K09bsu016_u:5094: āha - ka etasya ārye duryodhanajñānagarbhasya bodhisattvavimokṣamukhasya viṣayaḥ,
K09bsu016_u:5099: buddhānubhāvena kalyāṇamitraparigraheṇa ca adhimokṣye avatariṣyāmi vijñāsyāmi vicārayiṣyāmi anusariṣyāmi nidhyāsyāmi upanidhyāsyāmi pratyavekṣiṣye
K09bsu016_u:5104: atha khalu acalopāsikā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakamevamāhabhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra,
K09bsu016_u:5105: atīte 'dhvani vimalaprabhe kalpe pralambabāhurnāma tathāgato loke udapādi /
K09bsu016_u:5108: tayā me rātryāṃ praśāntāyāṃ pihiteṣu rājapuradvāreṣu,
K09bsu016_u:5113: śayanatalagatayā gaganatalagatāṃ jyotirgaṇavatīṃ rajanīṃ prekṣantyā uparyantarikṣe
K09bsu016_u:5116: tasya ca tathāgatasya sarvaromavivarebhyastathārūpo gandhaḥ pravāti,
K09bsu016_u:5119: pralambabāhuṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ namaskṛtvā mūrdhnā namasya avalokayamānā
K09bsu016_u:5123: tasyā mama kulaputra etadabhavat - kīdṛśaṃ karma kṛtvā iyamīdṛśī kāyasaṃpat pratilabhyate?
K09bsu016_u:5133: atha khalu kulaputra sa bhagavān pralambabāhustathāgato mamādhyāṃśayaṃ viditvā evamāha - duryodhanacittaṃ te dārike utpādayitavyaṃ sarvakleśanirghātāya
K09bsu016_u:5145: sāhaṃ kulaputra tasya bhagavataḥ pralambabāhostathāgasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikādimāni
K09bsu016_u:5152: nābhijānāmi kulaputra tata upādāya etena cittotpādena jambudvīpaḥ paramāṇurajaḥsamaiḥ kalpairapi kāmān paribhoktum,
K09bsu016_u:5154: nābhijānāmi kulaputra tata upādāya ekapratighacittamutpādayituṃ svabāndhaveṣu,
K09bsu016_u:5163: nābhijānāmi tata upādāya sarvatathāgatadharmameghān saṃpratīcchamānā ekadharmapadavyañjanamapi manasā vismartum,
K09bsu016_u:5166: nābhijānāmi tata upādāya tāvato dharmasāgarān pibantī ekapadamapyanidhyātamavilokitam,
K09bsu016_u:5168: nābhijānāmi tata upādāya tāvatāṃ dharmanayasāgarāṇāmekadharmanayadvāramapi yatra mayā na samādhirabhinirhṛtaḥ,
K09bsu016_u:5170: nābhijānāmi tata upādāya tāvatāṃ tathāgatānāṃ dharmacakraṃ saṃdhārayamāṇā yathāsaṃdhāritādekapadavyañjanamapyanusraṣṭam,
K09bsu016_u:5172: nābhijānāmi tata upādāya tāvatāṃ buddhadarśanasamudrāṇāmekapraṇidhānamapi yanmayā na sarvasattvasāgaraviśuddhaye 'bhinirhṛtam,
K09bsu016_u:5177: nābhijānāmi tata upādāya ekasattvamapi cakṣuravabhāsamāgataṃ yo mayānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau na samādāpitaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:5179: nābhijānāmi kulaputra tata upādāya jambudvīpaparamāṇurajaḥsamaiḥ kalpairekapadavyañjane
K09bsu016_u:5180: 'pi saṃśayamutpādayituṃ dvayasaṃjñāṃ vā vikalpasaṃjñāṃ vā nānātvasaṃjñāṃ vā agrahasaṃjñāṃ
K09bsu016_u:5181: vā hīnapraṇītasaṃjñāṃ vā anunayapratighasaṃjñāṃ vā utpādayitum //
K09bsu016_u:5182: sāhaṃ kulaputra tataḥ paścādavirahitā abhūvaṃ buddhotpādaiḥ /
K09bsu016_u:5197: etaṃ ca me kulaputra duryodhanajñānagarbhaṃ bodhisattvavimokṣasukham,
K09bsu016_u:5209: ca daśa samādhimukhaśatasahasrāṇi vyavalokayati anuvicārayati anusarati nidhyapayati /
K09bsu016_u:5211: apaśyat sudhanaḥ śreiṣṭhidārako daśasu dikṣu daśabuddhakṣetrānabhilāpyaparamāṇurajaḥsamān lokadhātūn ṣaḍvikāraṃ prakampamānān,
K09bsu016_u:5213: ekaikasmiṃśca lokadhātau koṭīśate cāturmahādvīpakānāṃ lokadhātūnāṃ koṭīśataṃ tathāgatānāmapaśyat /
K09bsu016_u:5218: ekaisya ca tathāgatasya sarvadharmacakrodyotanaṃ sarvasattvaśrotravijñapanaṃ svaramaṇḍalamaśrauṣīt //
K09bsu016_u:5219: atha khalvacalopāsikā tataḥ samādhervyutthāya sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakamevamāha - dṛṣṭaṃ te kulaputra,
K09bsu016_u:5227: kiṃ mayā śakyamacintyāprameyaguṇasamanvāgatānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum?
K09bsu016_u:5229: ye te mahāgaruḍendrā iva sattvasāgaramavagāhante paripakvabodhisattvoddharaṇatāyai /
K09bsu016_u:5230: ye te vaṇija iva sarvajñatāratnadvīpe 'nuvicaranti daśabalajñānaratnābhikāṅkṣiṇaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:5231: ye te balavatkaivartā iva saṃsārasāgare 'nuvicaranti ruciradharmacakramaṇḍalajālahastāḥ tṛṣṇodbhavasattvaparipācanābhyuddharaṇatāyai /
K09bsu016_u:5232: ye te 'surendrā iva tribhuvanapuraṃ spharitvā vicaranti kleśāsurasaṃkṣobhodvṛttasaṃśamanatāyai /
K09bsu016_u:5233: ye te dinakaramaṇḍalamiva dharmadhātugaganatale samudāgacchanti sattvatṛṣṇāsalilakleśapaṅkocchoṣaṇatāyai /
K09bsu016_u:5237: ye te cakravartina iva loke vicaranti catuḥsaṃgrahavastupariṣkāropakaraṇasarvajagatsaṃgrahaṇatāyai /
K09bsu016_u:5239: ihaiva dakṣiṇāpathe 'mitatosale janapade tosalaṃ nāma nagaram /
K09bsu016_u:5241: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:5243: atha khalu sughanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako 'calāyā upāsikāyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya acalāmupāsikāmanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ
K09bsu016_u:5244: pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ punaravalokya acalāyā upāsikāyā antikātprakrāntaḥ // 20 //
K09bsu016_u:5247: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako 'calāmupāsikāmāmukhīkṛtya acalāyā upāsikāyā anuśāsanīmanusmaran,
K09bsu016_u:5248: yadacalayopāsikayā darśitaṃ śrāvitaṃ deśitaṃ saṃvarṇitaṃ yojitaṃ vibhaktaṃ prabhāvitaṃ visṛtaṃ tatsaṃbhāvayan,
K09bsu016_u:5250: anuvicintayan avataran bhāvayan nigamayan nidhyāyan avabhāsayan samīkurvan anupūrveṇa
K09bsu016_u:5251: deśena deśaṃ janapadena janapadamanucaṃkraman anuvicaran yenāmitatosalo janapadastenopajagāma /
K09bsu016_u:5252: upetya tosalaṃ nagaraṃ parimārgan parigaveṣamāṇo 'nupūrveṇa tosalaṃ nagaramanuprāptaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:5253: sūryāstaṃgamanakāle sa tosalaṃ nagaramanupraviśya madhye nagaraśṛṅgāṭakasya sthitvā
K09bsu016_u:5254: vīthīmukhena vīthīmukhaṃ catvareṇa catvaraṃ rathyayā rathyāṃ sarvagāminaṃ parivrājakaṃ
K09bsu016_u:5255: parigaveṣamāṇo vyavacārayan adrākṣīdrātryāṃ praśāntāyāṃ tosalasya nagarasyottare
K09bsu016_u:5258: tasya tamavabhāsaṃ dṛṣṭvā udāraprītivegasaṃjātasya etadabhavat - asaṃśayamahamatra parvataśikhare kalyāṇamitraṃ drakṣyāmīti /
K09bsu016_u:5260: tenopetya sulabhaṃ parvatamabhiruhya yena tanmahāvabhāsaṃ parvataśikharaṃ tenopasaṃkrāmannadrākṣīddūrata
K09bsu016_u:5261: eva sarvagāminaṃ parivrājakaṃ mahābrahmātirekavarṇaṃ śriyā dedīpyamānaṃ daśabhirbrahmasahasraiḥ
K09bsu016_u:5263: sa tasya pādau śirasābhivandya tamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā ārya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
K09bsu016_u:5264: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:5266: śrutaṃ ca me āryo bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /
K09bsu016_u:5267: tadvadatu me āryaḥ - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:5271: ahaṃ kulaputra sarvagāmī sarvatrānugatāyāṃ bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ sthitaḥ samantamukhavyavacāraṇālokena
K09bsu016_u:5282: yaduta keṣāṃcitsattvānāṃ vividhalaukikaśilpaśikṣaṇatayā arthaṃ karomi sarvaśilpajñānabhedavatīdhāraṇyālokena /
K09bsu016_u:5283: (Gv 138) keṣāṃcit sattvānāṃ catuḥsaṃgrahavastuprayogeṇa arthaṃ karomi yaduta sarvajñajñānopanayanāya /
K09bsu016_u:5284: keṣāṃcit sattvānāṃ pāramitāsaṃvarṇanatayā arthaṃ karomi yaduta sarvajñatāpariṇāmajñānanayālokasaṃjananatayā /
K09bsu016_u:5285: keṣāṃcit sattvānāṃ bodhicittasaṃvarṇanatayā arthaṃ karomi yaduta bodhibījāvipraṇāśopastambhasaṃjananatayā /
K09bsu016_u:5286: keṣāṃcit sattvānāṃ sarvākārabodhisattvacaryāsaṃvarṇanatayā arthaṃ karomi yaduta sarvabuddhakṣetrapariśodhanasarvasattvaparipākapraṇidhisaṃjananatāyai
K09bsu016_u:5288: keṣāṃcit sattvānāṃ mahāprītisaṃjananatayā arthaṃ karomi yaduta sarvatathāgatāvaropitadakṣiṇāniyatasarvajñatāphalaparyavasāne 'bhyudīraṇatayā
K09bsu016_u:5289: keṣāṃcit sattvānāṃ sarvatathāgataguṇavarṇasaṃprakāśanatayā arthaṃ karomi yaduta buddhaguṇaśarīrābhilāṣasarvajñatāpraṇidhisaṃjananatāyai /
K09bsu016_u:5290: keṣāṃcit sattvānāṃ buddhamāhātmyasūcanayā arthaṃ karomi yaduta avivartyānābhogāpratiprasrabdhabuddhakāryānuṣṭhānasaktabuddhakāyapratilambhābhilāṣasaṃjananatāyai
K09bsu016_u:5291: keṣāṃcit sattvānāṃ buddhādhipateyatāsaṃdarśanatayā arthaṃ karomi yaduta anabhibhūtabuddhātmabhāvasaṃpatpratilābhābhilāṣasaṃjananatāyai /
K09bsu016_u:5293: iha nagare tosale sarvarathyāsu sarvacatvareṣu sarvaśṛṅgāṭakeṣu sarvavīthīmukheṣu
K09bsu016_u:5294: sarvagṛheṣu sarvaśreṇiṣu sarvakuleṣu sarvakulaparivarteṣu yathāsaṃnipatitānāṃ strīpuruṣadārakadārikāṇāṃ
K09bsu016_u:5295: yathāśayānāṃ yathāprayogāṇāṃ yathādhipateyānāṃ yathāvyavacārāṇāṃ tatsabhāgāni ātmabhāvārohapariṇāhasaṃsthānāni
K09bsu016_u:5297: na ca te sattvā avabudhyante kenedaṃ deśitam,
K09bsu016_u:5300: ye 'pīme kulaputra jambudvīpe ṣaṇṇavatiyo pāṣaṇḍā vividhadṛṣṭigatābhiniviṣṭāḥ,
K09bsu016_u:5302: yathā ca kulaputra ahamiha tosale nagare sattvānāmarthaṃ karomi,
K09bsu016_u:5306: evaṃ sāhasre dvisāhasre trisāhasre mahāsāhasre lokadhātau,
K09bsu016_u:5311: sarvasattvadikṣu sarvasattvavidikṣu sarvasattvavidhiṣu yathāśayādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāmarthaṃ karomi /
K09bsu016_u:5315: etāmahaṃ kulaputra sarvagāminīṃ sarvatrānugatāṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ prajānāmi /
K09bsu016_u:5320: sarvajagatkuśalādhānābhimukhānāṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum //
K09bsu016_u:5324: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:5326: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ sarvagāminaḥ parivrājakasya pādau śirasābhivandya
K09bsu016_u:5331: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako 'napekṣaḥ kāye jīvite ca,
K09bsu016_u:5345: tāṃśca anyāṃśca sarvabodhisattvaguṇān saṃpaśyan anupūrveṇa yena pṛthurāṣṭraṃ janapadastenopasaṃkramya utpalabhūtiṃ gāndhikaśreṣṭhinaṃ parimārgan parigaveṣamāṇo 'drākṣīt /
K09bsu016_u:5347: upetya utpalabhūtergāndhikaśreṣṭhinaḥ pādau sirasābhivandya utpalabhūtiṃ gāndhikaśreṣṭhinamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ
K09bsu016_u:5348: pradakṣiṇīkṛtya utpalabhūtergāndhikaśreṣṭhinaḥ purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha
K09bsu016_u:5355: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:5382: parihārato 'pi prayogato 'pi paribhogato 'pi viṣayato 'pi prabhāvato 'pi dharmato
K09bsu016_u:5384: asti kulaputra manuṣyaloke nāgasaṃkṣobhasaṃbhavahastigarbho nāma gandhaḥ,
K09bsu016_u:5385: yasya tilamātrā gulikā sakalaṃ pṛthurāṣṭraṃ janapadaṃ mahāgandhaghanābhrajālasaṃchannaṃ kṛtvā saptāhaṃ sūkṣmagandhodakadhārāvarṣamabhipravarṣati
K09bsu016_u:5386: tatra yeṣāṃ sattvānāṃ śarīre vā cīvare vā gandhodakadhārā nipatanti,
K09bsu016_u:5390: ye 'pi sattvāsteṣāṃ gandhameghajālānāṃ mārutasamīritānāmantarbhavanagatā gandhaṃ jighranti,
K09bsu016_u:5393: na caiṣāṃ śarīre vyādhirutpadyate dhātusaṃkṣobhajo vā aparaparikramiko vā /
K09bsu016_u:5395: na samudācarati bhayaṃ vā trāsaṃ vā cchambhitattvaṃ vā manaḥsaṃkṣobho vā vyāpādo vā /
K09bsu016_u:5396: sarve ca te sattvā anyonyaṃ maitracittā bhavanti harṣaprītisaṃjātāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:5397: teṣāmahaṃ kulaputra harṣaprītisaṃjātānāmāśayaviśuddhimārabhya tathā dharmaṃ deśayāmi,
K09bsu016_u:5399: asti kulaputra malayaparvatasaṃbhavaṃ gośīrṣaṃ nāma candanam,
K09bsu016_u:5401: asti kulaputra sāgarakacchasaṃbhavo aparājito nāma gandhaḥ,
K09bsu016_u:5402: yenānuliptāyā bheryāḥ śaṅkhasya vā nirghoṣeṇa sarvaparacakraṃ parājayaṃ gacchati /
K09bsu016_u:5403: asti kulaputra anavataptahṛdatīrasaṃbhavaṃ padmagarbhaṃ nāma kālāgaru,
K09bsu016_u:5404: yasya tilamātrā gulikā sakalaṃ jambudvīpaṃ gandhena spharati /
K09bsu016_u:5407: asti kulaputra himavatparvatarājasaṃbhavā aruṇavatī nāma gandhajātiḥ,
K09bsu016_u:5411: asti kulaputra rākṣasalokasaṃbhavā sāgaragarbhā nāma gandhajātiḥ,
