K09bsu016_u:5413: yayā dhūpitamātrayā caturaṅgo balakāyo rājñaścakravartino gaganatale pratiṣṭhate /
K09bsu016_u:5419: teṣāmupasaṃkrāntānāṃ suyāmo devarājo dhārmīṃ kathāṃ kathayati /
K09bsu016_u:5420: asti kulaputra tuṣitabhavane sindhuvāritā nāma gandhajātiḥ,
K09bsu016_u:5421: yā dharmāsananiṣaṇṇasya ekajātipratibaddhasya bodhisattvasya purato dhūpitā mahāgandhameghena
K09bsu016_u:5423: asti kulaputra sunirmitadevarājabhavane manoharā nāma gandhajātiḥ,
K09bsu016_u:5426: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ nirāmagandhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sarvakāmoccalitānāṃ kleśamārapāśavipramuktānāṃ
K09bsu016_u:5428: sarvālayaniketāniśritānāṃ sarvabhavālayaniketacāriṇāṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum,
K09bsu016_u:5436: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:5438: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidāraka utpalabhūtergāndhikaśreṣṭhinaḥ pādau śirasābhivandya
K09bsu016_u:5443: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ kūṭāgāranagarābhimukhaṃ mārgaṃ pratipadyamāno 'nuvicaran,
K09bsu016_u:5444: mārganimnatāṃ mārgonnatatāṃ mārgasamatāṃ mārgaviṣamatāṃ mārgasarajaskatāṃ mārgavirajaskatāṃ
K09bsu016_u:5446: evaṃ cittamutpādayāmāsa - idaṃ khalu me tasya kalyāṇamitrasyopasaṃkramaṇaṃ bodhisattvamārgapratipattihetubhūtaṃ
K09bsu016_u:5456: sa evaṃ cintāmanasikāraprayukto durāsadasamudācāro 'nupūrveṇa yena kūṭāgāraṃ nagaraṃ
K09bsu016_u:5457: tenopasaṃkramya vairaṃ dāśaṃ parimārgan parigaveṣamāṇo 'drākṣīnmahānagaramukhe sāgarāvatāratīre
K09bsu016_u:5458: vairaṃ dāśaṃ vaṇikūśatasahasrairanekaiśca prāṇiśatasahasrairvicitrāṃ kathāṃ śrotukāmaiḥ
K09bsu016_u:5462: upetya vairasya dāśasya pādau śirasābhivandya vairaṃ dāśamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ
K09bsu016_u:5463: pradakṣiṇīkṛtya vairasya dāśasya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāhamayā ārya anuttarāyāṃ
K09bsu016_u:5465: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:5467: śrutaṃ ca me āryo bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /
K09bsu016_u:5468: tadvadatu me āryaḥ - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:5478: mahāsāgaratīrakūṭāgāre mahānagare prativasāmi mahākaruṇādhvajāṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ pariśodhayan /
K09bsu016_u:5479: so 'haṃ kulaputra jambudvīpe daridrān sattvānavalokya eṣāmarthāya tathā tapastapyāmi,
K09bsu016_u:5495: evaṃ cintāmanasikāraprayukto 'haṃ kulaputra iha sāgaratīrakūṭāgāranagare pravicarāmi /
K09bsu016_u:5503: mārutasaṃgrahaṇaṃ mārutotpādanaṃ yānāvartanaṃ yānaparivartanaṃ yānasaṃsthāpanaṃ yānasaṃpreṣaṇaṃ prajānāmi /
K09bsu016_u:5504: so 'haṃ kulaputra evaṃjñānasamanvāgataḥ satataṃ sattvārthakāryaprayukto vaṇiggaṇaṃ
K09bsu016_u:5505: dṛḍhena yānena kṣemeṇa śivenābhayena yathāpraharṣaṃ pramodayan dhārmyā kathayā yathābhiprāyeṇa
K09bsu016_u:5508: na ca mama kulaputra kadācit kiṃcid yānapātraṃ vipannapūrvam /
K09bsu016_u:5510: ye ca sattvā mama dharmadeśanāṃ śṛṇvanti,
K09bsu016_u:5522: etasya ahaṃ kulaputra mahākarūṇādhvajasya amoghadarśanaśravaṇaṃ saṃvāsānusmṛtirnāma nadīnirghoṣasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya lābhī /
K09bsu016_u:5523: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sarvasaṃsārasāgaravicāriṇāṃ sarvakleśāsāgarānupaliptānāṃ
K09bsu016_u:5532: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:5534: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako vairasya dāśasya pādau śirasābhivandya vairaṃ dāśamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ
K09bsu016_u:5535: pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ punaravalokya aśrumukho rudan kalyāṇamitradarśanābhilāṣāvitṛpto
K09bsu016_u:5545: yena nandihāraṃ nagaraṃ tenopasaṃkramya jayottamaṃ śreṣṭhinaṃ parimārgan parigaveṣamāṇo
K09bsu016_u:5547: vividhāni nagarakāryāṇi pariniṣṭhāpayantaṃ tadāgamya ca dhārmīṃ kathāṃ kathayantam,
K09bsu016_u:5563: bodhisattvaprajñābalasaṃdarśanatayā bodhisattvasmṛtibalaviśuddhyuttāraṇatāyai dharmaṃ deśayamānaṃ yaduta bodhicittotpādābhirocanāya //
K09bsu016_u:5565: pādayoḥ praṇipatya suciramabhināmya dharmagauravapratilabdhenāśayena evaṃ vācamudīrayāmāsasudhano 'smi,
K09bsu016_u:5568: tadvadatu me āryo yathāhaṃ bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣeyam /
K09bsu016_u:5579: atha khalu jayottamaḥ śreṣṭhī sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakamevamāha - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
K09bsu016_u:5585: sarvamārabhavaneṣu sarvakāmādhātuṣu devanikāyāntargateṣu sarvadevabhavaneṣu sarvanāgalokeṣu sarvanāgabhavaneṣu,
K09bsu016_u:5609: adattādānāt kāmamithyācārāt mṛṣāvādāt paiśunyāt pārūṣyāt saṃbhinnapralāpādabhidhyāyā vyāpādāt mithyādṛṣṭeḥ sattvānnivārayāmi /
K09bsu016_u:5619: sarvabuddhadharmārocanatāyai yāvadbrahmaloke 'pi sarvarūpadhātukān devānabhibhūya dharmaṃ deśayāmi /
K09bsu016_u:5621: tathā daśasu dikṣu daśānabhilāpyabuddhakṣetrakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu lokadhātuṣu dharmaṃ deśayāmi /
K09bsu016_u:5646: sarvatathāgatādvayākalpācintyaśarīraparamāṇāṃ sarvatryadhvānusṛtajñānakāyānāṃ gaganatalavipulāpramāṇagocaraviṣayāṇāṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum //
K09bsu016_u:5648: ihaiva dakṣiṇāpathe śroṇāparānteṣu janapadeṣu kaliṅgavanaṃ nāma nagaram /
K09bsu016_u:5650: tāmupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:5652: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako jayottamasya śreṣṭhinaḥ pādau śirasābhivandya jayottamaṃ
K09bsu016_u:5657: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako 'nupūrveṇa yena śroṇāparānte janapade kaliṅgavanaṃ nāma nagaram,
K09bsu016_u:5659: upetya siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ nāma bhikṣuṇīṃ paryeṣamāṇaḥ pratisattvaṃ paripṛcchan yato yataḥ paryaṭati,
K09bsu016_u:5660: tena tenaiva anekāni kumāraśatāni anekāni kumārikāśatāni rathyācatvaraśṛṅgāṭakebhyaḥ saṃbhūya anubadhnanti sma /
K09bsu016_u:5661: anekāni ca puruṣaśatāni anekāni ca strīśatānyarocayāmāsuḥ - eṣā kulaputra siṃhavijṛmbhitā
K09bsu016_u:5662: bhikṣuṇī ihaiva kaliṅgavane nagare jayaprabhānupradatte sūryaprabhe mahodyāne prativasati
K09bsu016_u:5664: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako yena tatsūryaprabhaṃ mahodyānaṃ tenopasaṃkramya
K09bsu016_u:5665: samantādanuvicaran anuvilokayan adrākṣīttasmin mahodyāne candrodgatān nāma vṛkṣān
K09bsu016_u:5681: sarveṣu ca teṣu nānāratnavṛkṣamūleṣu vicitramanojñarūpāṇi ratnasiṃhāsanāni prajñaptāni acintyānekavividharatnavyūhāni,
K09bsu016_u:5709: mahābrahmavihāramasaṃkhyeyalokadhātvadhiṣṭhānākāśakośavipulāpramāṇāvakāśaṃ tatsūryaprabhaṃ mahodyānamapaśyat siṃhavijṛmbhitāyā bhikṣuṇyā mahatā acintyarddhiprabhāvabalādhānena //
K09bsu016_u:5710: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ imānevamapramāṇācintyaguṇasamuditān mahodyānavyūhān
K09bsu016_u:5716: sarveṣu ca teṣu nānāratnavṛkṣamūlagateṣu mahāsiṃhāsaneṣu siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ
K09bsu016_u:5718: śāntamanasaṃ suguptāṃ jitendriyāṃ nāgamiva sudāntāṃ hradamiva acchānāvilaviprasannacittāṃ
K09bsu016_u:5733: siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ samantatalabhedaṃ nāma svaramaṇḍalaviśuddhiṃ saṃprakāśayamānāmapaśyat /
K09bsu016_u:5738: saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ sarvadharmaśubhavyūhaṃ nāma dharmamukhaṃ
K09bsu016_u:5741: saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ svacittakośāvartaṃ nāma dharmamukhaṃ saṃprakāśayamānāmapaśyat /
K09bsu016_u:5742: kvacidāsanaparivāre suyāmadevarājapramukhānāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ sadevakanyāparivārāṇāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīmanantavyūhaṃ nāma dharmamukhaṃ saṃprakāśayamānāmapaśyat /
K09bsu016_u:5744: saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīmudvegamukhaṃ nāma dharmamukhaṃ saṃprakāśayamānāmapaśyat /
K09bsu016_u:5746: nāgarājñāṃ sanāgakanyānāṃ nāgakumāraparivārāṇāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ
K09bsu016_u:5749: saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ jagatparitrāṇakośaṃ nāma dharmamukhaṃ saṃprakāśayamānāmapaśyat /
K09bsu016_u:5751: saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīmakṣayapraharṣaṇaṃ nāma dharmamukhaṃ saṃprakāśayamānāmapaśyat /
K09bsu016_u:5753: saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ dharmadhātujñānayavegavyūhaṃ nāma dharmamukhaṃ
K09bsu016_u:5755: kvacidāsanaparivāre mahāvegadhārigaruḍendrapramukhānāṃ garuḍendrāṇāṃ sagaruḍakanyāgarūḍakumāraparivārāṇāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ
K09bsu016_u:5758: saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ buddhacaryāvabhāsaṃ nāma dharmamukhaṃ saṃprakāśayamānāmapaśyat /
K09bsu016_u:5760: saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ buddhaprītisaṃbhavaṃ nāma dharmamukhaṃ saṃprakāśayamānāmapaśyat /
K09bsu016_u:5762: saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ jñānaviśeṣagamanaṃ nāma dharmamukhaṃ saṃprakāśayamānāmapaśyat /
K09bsu016_u:5764: saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ kṛpāsaṃbhavaṃ nāma dharmamukhaṃ saṃprakāśayamānāmapaśyat /
K09bsu016_u:5765: kvacidāsanaparivāre śrāvakayānādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ jñānaviśeṣaprabhāvaṃ nāma dharmamukhaṃ saṃprakāśayamānāpaśyat
K09bsu016_u:5766: kvacidāsanaparivāre pratyekabuddhayānādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīmudārabuddhaguṇāvabhāsaṃ nāma dharmamukhaṃ saṃprakāśayamānāmapaśyat /
K09bsu016_u:5767: kvacidāsanaparivāre mahāyānādhimuktānāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ samantamukhaṃ nāma samādhijñānālokamukhaṃ saṃprakāśayamānāmapaśyat
K09bsu016_u:5768: kvacidāsanaparivāre prathamacittotpādikānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ sarvabuddhapraṇidhikūṭaṃ nāma samādhimukhaṃ saṃprakāśayamānāmapaśyat /
K09bsu016_u:5769: kvacidāsanaparivāre dvitīyabhūmipratiṣṭhitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ virajomaṇḍalaṃ nāma samādhimukhaṃ saṃprakāśayamānāmapaśyat
K09bsu016_u:5770: kvacidāsanaparivāre tṛtīyabhūmipratiṣṭhitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ praśāntavyūhaṃ nāma samādhimukhaṃ saṃprakāśayamānāmapaśyat
K09bsu016_u:5771: kvacidāsanaparivāre caturthībhūmipratiṣṭhitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ sarvajñatāvegaviṣayasaṃbhavaṃ nāma samādhimukhaṃ saṃprakāśayamānāmapaśyat /
K09bsu016_u:5772: kvacidāsanaparivāre pañcamībhūmipratiṣṭhitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ cittalatākusumagarbhaṃ nāma samādhimukhaṃ saṃprakāśayamānamapaśyat /
K09bsu016_u:5774: ṣaṣṭhībhūmipratiṣṭhitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ vairocanagarbhaṃ nāma samādhimukhaṃ saṃprakāśayamānāmapaśyat
K09bsu016_u:5775: kvacidāsanaparivāre saptamībhūmipratiṣṭhitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ samantabhūmyalaṃkāraṃ nāma samādhimukhaṃ saṃprakāśayamānāmapaśyat /
K09bsu016_u:5778: kvacidāsanaparivāre navamībhūmipratiṣṭhitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīmanilambhabalanilayavyūhaṃ nāma dharmamukhaṃ saṃprakāśayamānāmapaśyat /
K09bsu016_u:5779: kvacidāsanaparivāre daśamībhūmipratiṣṭhitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ saṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīmanāvaraṇamaṇḍalaṃ nāma samādhimukhaṃ saṃprakāśayamānāmapaśyat
K09bsu016_u:5780: kvacidāsanaparivāre saṃniṣaṇṇasya vajrapāṇiparṣanmaṇḍalasya siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ jñānavajranārāyaṇavyūhaṃ nāma dharmamukhaṃ saṃprakāśayamānāmapaśyat
K09bsu016_u:5781: iti hi yāvatyaḥ sarvopapattyāyatanasaṃbhedeṣu sattvaprajñaptayaḥ sattvagatayaḥ,
K09bsu016_u:5782: tāsu ye sattvāḥ paripakvā vainayikā bhājanībhūtāḥ,
K09bsu016_u:5783: teṣāṃ tasmin mahodyāne samavasṛtya pratyekamāsanaparivārasaṃniṣaṇṇānāṃ nānāśayānāṃ nānādhimuktānāṃ niyatāśayānāṃ ghanarasaśraddhānāṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīṃ (Gv 152)
K09bsu016_u:5791: ye ca tatsūryaprabhaṃ mahodyānaṃ bodhisattvāstadanye vā sattvāḥ praviśanti siṃhavijṛmbhitāyā bhikṣuṇyā darśanāya dharmaśravaṇāya,
K09bsu016_u:5793: bhikṣuṇyāḥ prathamaṃ kuśalamūladharmasamudāneṣu niyojitā yāvadanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheravivartyāḥ kṛtāḥ //
K09bsu016_u:5794: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ siṃhavijṛmbhitāyā bhikṣuṇyā imāmevaṃrūpāmudyānasaṃpadaṃ
K09bsu016_u:5796: sarasvatīvyūhasaṃpadaṃ dṛṣṭvā acintyaṃ ca dharmanayaṃ śrutvā vipuladharmameghābhiṣyanditacittaḥ
K09bsu016_u:5799: atha siṃhavijṛmbhitāyā bhikṣuṇyāḥ sarvaṃ tanmahodyānaṃ saparṣanmaṇḍalavyūhamudāreṇāvabhāsena sphuṭamavabhāsitam /
K09bsu016_u:5800: anekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtvā evaṃ saṃjānāti - pradakṣiṇīkurvaṃśca samantādabhimukhaṃ siṃhavijṛmbhitāṃ bhikṣuṇīmadrākṣīt /
K09bsu016_u:5801: sa purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā ārye,
K09bsu016_u:5803: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:5805: śrutaṃ ca me āryā bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /
K09bsu016_u:5806: tadvadatu me āryā - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:5808: sā avocat - ahaṃ kulaputra sarvamanyanāsamuddhātitasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya lābhinī /
K09bsu016_u:5809: āha - ka etasya ārye sarvamanyanāsamuddhātitasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya viṣayaḥ?
K09bsu016_u:5811: āha - ka etasya ārye jñānālokasya viṣayaḥ?
K09bsu016_u:5812: āha - etanmama kulaputra jñānālokamukhamāyūhatyā niryūhatyāḥ sarvadharmopapanno nāma samādhirājāyate,
K09bsu016_u:5813: yasya samādheḥ sahapratilābhena manomayaiḥ kāyaiḥ sarvāsu daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣvekajātipratibaddhānāṃ
K09bsu016_u:5828: ye ca sattvā mamedaṃ buddhapūjopasthānakarma prajānanti,
K09bsu016_u:5829: te sarve niyatā bhavanti anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
K09bsu016_u:5844: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ bodhisattvānāmanantamadhyadharmadhātvavatīrṇānāṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum,
K09bsu016_u:5845: ye te sarvadharmamanyanāvihāriṇaśca ekaparyaṅkena ca sarvadharmadhātuṃ spharanti /
K09bsu016_u:5854: ihaiva dakṣiṇāpathe durge janapade ratnavyūhaṃ nāma nagaram /
K09bsu016_u:5856: tāmupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:5858: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ siṃhavijṛmbhitāyā bhikṣuṇyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya
K09bsu016_u:5873: taṃ sarvabodhisattvakarmasmṛtyupādānārambhanistīraṇapraṇidhiṃ paripūrayan anupūrveṇa yena durge janapade ratnavyūhaṃ nagaraṃ tenopasaṃkrānto vasumitrāṃ bhāgavatīṃ parimārgan /
K09bsu016_u:5874: tatra ye puruṣā vasumitrāyā bhāgavatyā guṇānabhijñā jñānagocarāvidhijñāśca,
K09bsu016_u:5875: teṣāmetadabhavat - kimasya evaṃ śāntadāntendriyasya evaṃ saṃprajānasya evamabhrāntasya
K09bsu016_u:5889: ye punarvasumitrāyā bhāgavatyā guṇaviśeṣābhijñā jñānagocarapratyakṣā vā,
K09bsu016_u:5897: eṣā kulaputra vasumitrā bhāgavatī nagaraśṛṅgāṭakasyottareṇa svagṛhe tiṣṭhati //
K09bsu016_u:5898: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidāraka idaṃ vacanamupaśrutya tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto yena vasumitrāyā bhāgavatyā niveśanam,
K09bsu016_u:5899: tenopasaṃkramya tadgṛhamadrākṣīdvipulaṃ ca vistīrṇaṃ ca daśaratnaprākāraparikṣiptaṃ daśaratnatālapaṅktiparivṛttam /
K09bsu016_u:5910: sa tatrāpaśyadvasumitrāṃ bhāgavatīmabhirūpāṃ prāsādikāṃ darśanīyāṃ paramayā śubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā
K09bsu016_u:5918: tayā ca sarvaṃ tadgṛhaṃ sarvaratnabhavanavimānavyūhaṃ svaśarīraniryātayā premaṇīyayā
K09bsu016_u:5920: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako vasumitrāyā bhāgavatyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā ārye,
K09bsu016_u:5922: na ca jānāmi - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:5924: śrutaṃ ca me āryā bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /
K09bsu016_u:5925: tadvadatu me āryā - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:5927: sā avocat - mayā kulaputra virāga koṭīgato nāma bodhisattvavimokṣaḥ pratilabdhaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:5931: teṣāmahaṃ kulaputra sarveṣāṃ rāgavirāgatāyai dharmaṃ deśayāmi /
K09bsu016_u:5932: te ca taṃ dharmaṃ śrutvā rāgavirāgatāmanuprāpnuvanti,
K09bsu016_u:5958: atīte 'dhvani atyuccagāmī nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loke udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān /
K09bsu016_u:5959: tasya kulaputra atyuccagāminastathāgatasya sattvānāmanukampārthaṃ sumukhāṃ nāma rājadhānīṃ praviśataḥ indrakīlamākrāmataḥ sarvaṃ tannagaraṃ prākampata /
K09bsu016_u:5960: vipulavistīrṇaṃ ca anekaratnamayaṃ saṃsthitamabhūt anekaratnaprabhāvyūhaṃ vividharatnapuṣpābhikīrṇaṃ nānādivyatūryapramuktanirghoṣam /
K09bsu016_u:5962: ahaṃ ca kulaputra tena samayena sumatirnāma śreṣṭhibhāryā abhūvam /
K09bsu016_u:5963: tato me buddhaprātihāryasaṃcoditayā svāminā sārdhaṃ pradhāvitvā tasya tathāgatasya vīthīmukhamupasaṃkrāntasya udāraprasādajātayā ekā ratnakākaṇiḥ pratipāditā /
K09bsu016_u:5971: tatra veṣṭhilo nāma gṛhapatiścandanapīṭhaṃ tathāgatacaityaṃ pūjayati /
K09bsu016_u:5972: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:5974: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako vasumitrāyā bhāgavatyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya vasumitrāṃ
K09bsu016_u:5979: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako yena śubhapāraṃgame nagare veṣṭhilasya gṛhapaterniveśanaṃ tenopajagāma /
K09bsu016_u:5980: upetya veṣṭhilasya gṛhapateḥ pādau śirasābhivandya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā ārya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam
K09bsu016_u:5981: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:5983: śrutaṃ ca me āryo bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /
K09bsu016_u:5984: tadvadatu me āryaḥ - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:5986: so 'vocat - āhaṃ kulaputra aparyādattakoṭīgatasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya lābhī /
K09bsu016_u:5987: na mama kulaputra saṃtānāttathāgataḥ parinirvṛto na parinirvāti na parinirvāsyati sarvalokadhātuṣu atyantaparinirvāṇena anyatra vainayikasattvavaśamupādāya
K09bsu016_u:5989: tacca me caityadvāramuddhāṭayato 'kṣayabuddhavaṃśavyūho nāma bodhisattvasamādhiḥ pratilabdhaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:5990: etaṃ cāhaṃ kulaputra samādhiṃ cittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe samāpadye /
K09bsu016_u:5993: āha - etaṃ mama kulaputra samādhiṃ samāpannasya asmin lokadhātuvaṃśe buddhaparaṃparayā
K09bsu016_u:5996: buddhadarśanānusaṃdhau buddhaparaṃparānupacchedena cittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe buddhaśataṃ paśyāmi /
K09bsu016_u:5999: evaṃ buddhakoṭīṃ buddhakoṭīśataṃ buddhakoṭīsahasraṃ buddhakoṭīśatasahasraṃ buddhakoṭyayutaṃ buddhakoṭīniyutaṃ buddhakoṭīkaṅkaraṃ buddhakoṭībimbaram
K09bsu016_u:6036: yathā ceha lokadhātuvaṃśe pūrvāntāparāntaparyāpannānāṃ buddhaparaṃparāṃ paśyāmi,
K09bsu016_u:6038: tathā daśasu dikṣu anabhilāpyānabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu atītānāgateṣu lokadhātuvaṃśeṣu sarvatathāgataparaṃparāmavatarāmi /
K09bsu016_u:6043: ca daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu vairocanapramukhānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ paraṃparāmavatarāmi /
K09bsu016_u:6058: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ tryadhvaikakṣaṇajñānapratilabdhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ kṣaṇakoṭīsamādhivyūhavihāriṇāṃ
K09bsu016_u:6066: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:6069: gaccho hi sūdhana śirījalarājamadhye girirājapotalaki śobhani śūrabhāge /
K09bsu016_u:6071: tasmiṃśca parvatavare viharāti dhīro avalokiteśvaru vidū jagato hitāya /
K09bsu016_u:6072: taṃ gaccha pṛccha sudhanā guṇa nāyakānāṃ deśiṣyate vipulaśobhi nayapraveśam // 2 //
K09bsu016_u:6073: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako veṣṭhilasya gṛhapateḥ pādau śirasābhivandya veṣṭhilaṃ gṛhapatimanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ
K09bsu016_u:6077: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako veṣṭhilasya gṛhapateranuśāsanīmanuvicintayan,
K09bsu016_u:6086: tadacintyaṃ tathāgatakarmābhimukhīkurvan anupūrveṇa yena potalakaḥ parvatastenopasaṃkramya
K09bsu016_u:6087: potalakaṃ parvatamabhiruhya avalokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvaṃ parimārgan parigaveṣamāṇo
K09bsu016_u:6091: deśayamānaṃ sarvajagatsaṃgrahaviṣayaṃ mahāmaitrīmahākarūṇāmukhodyotaṃ nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ saṃprakāśayantam /
K09bsu016_u:6092: dṛṣṭvā ca punastuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ praharṣitavikasitānimiṣanayanaḥ
K09bsu016_u:6099: atha khalu avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvaḥ sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ dūrata eva āgacchantamavalokya āmantrayāmāsa - ehi /
K09bsu016_u:6108: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako yena avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvastenopasaṃkramya
K09bsu016_u:6109: avalokiteśvara bodhisattvasya pādau śirasābhivandya avalokiteśvaraṃ bodhisattvamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ (Gv 160)
K09bsu016_u:6110: pradakṣiṇīkṛtya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā ārya,
K09bsu016_u:6112: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:6114: śrutaṃ ca me āryo bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /
K09bsu016_u:6115: tadvadatu me āryaḥ - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:6119: pāṇiṃ sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya mūrdhni pratiṣṭhāpya evamāha - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
K09bsu016_u:6121: ahaṃ kulaputra mahākaruṇāmukhāvilambaṃ nāma bodhisattvacaryāmukhaṃ prajānāmi /
K09bsu016_u:6123: so 'haṃ kulaputra mahākaruṇāmukhāvilambabodhisattvacaryāmukhe pratiṣṭhitaḥ sarvatathāgatānāṃ ca pādamulānna vicalāmi,
K09bsu016_u:6132: tena mayā kulaputra idaṃ mahākaruṇāmukhāvilambaṃ bodhisattvacaryāmukhaṃ pariśodhayatā sarvajagatpratiśaraṇapraṇidhirutpāditaḥ,
K09bsu016_u:6146: anenopāyena sattvān sarvabhayebhyaḥ parimocya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya avivartyān karomi buddhadharmapratilābhāya /
K09bsu016_u:6149: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ samantabhadrāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sarvabuddhapraṇidhānamaṇḍalaviśuddhānāṃ
K09bsu016_u:6156: kṛtvā pradakṣiṇu stavitva ca gauraveṇa prakānta dakṣiṇapathaṃ sudhanaḥ sudāntaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:6158: vajrāmaye giritaṭe maṇiratnacitre siṃhāsane padumagarbhi niṣaṇṇa dhīro /
K09bsu016_u:6160: dṛṣṭvopajāta atulā sudhanasya prīti upagamya vandati kramau guṇasāgarasya /
K09bsu016_u:6161: ovāca dehi mama ārya kṛpāṃ janitvā śikṣāṃ tu ahu labhe ima bhadracaryām // 3 //
K09bsu016_u:6162: bāhuṃ praṇamya vimalaṃ śatapuṇyacitraṃ prabhameghajāla vipulaṃ śubha muñcamānaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:6163: mūrdhni sthihitva sudhanasya viśuddhasattvo avalokiteśvaru vidū vacanaṃ bhaṇāti // 4 //
K09bsu016_u:6164: ekaṃ vimokṣamukha jānami buddhaputra sarvajināna karuṇāghanajñānagarbham /
K09bsu016_u:6165: saṃbhūta sarvajagatrāyaṇasaṃgrahāya sarvatra vartati mamāpyatha ātmaprema // 5 //
K09bsu016_u:6166: trāyāmi sarvajanatāṃ vyasanairanekaiḥ ye gāḍhabandhanagatāriṣu hastaprāptāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:6167: gātreṣu viddha tatha cārakasaṃniruddhā mucyanti bandhanagatā mama nāma śrutvā // 6 //
K09bsu016_u:6169: utsṛṣṭaḥ vadhya nṛpatīna kṛtāparādhāḥ kṣiptā iṣu na ca kramanti śarīri teṣām /
K09bsu016_u:6170: chidyanti śastra parivartati tīkṣṇa dhārā ye nāmadheyu mama tatra anusmaranti // 7 //
K09bsu016_u:6171: rājāna madhyagata ye ca vivādaprāptā vijinanti sarvaripavo 'tha śubhe labhante /
K09bsu016_u:6172: vardhanti sarva yaśa mitrakule dhanāni bhontī adharṣiya smaritvana mahya nāma // 8 //
K09bsu016_u:6174: gacchanti nirbhaya jinitvana sarvaśatrūn ye nāmadheyu mama kecidanusmaranti // 9 //
K09bsu016_u:6175: kṣiptā manāgiritaṭītu praduṣṭacittairaṅgārakarṣu jvalitā api co vadhārtham /
K09bsu016_u:6176: padmāṅkurā jalanidhi jvalanā bhavanti ye nāmadheyu mama kecidanusmaranti // 10 //
K09bsu016_u:6177: prakṣipta sāgarajale na marenti tatra nadyāṃ na cohyati na dahyati cāgnimadhye /
K09bsu016_u:6178: sarve anartha na bhavantyapi cārthasiddhiḥ nāmaṃ mamā anusmaritva muhūrtakaṃ pi // 11 //
K09bsu016_u:6179: haḍidaṇḍabandhanigaḍāśca tathā kudaṇḍā avamānanā tatha vimānana ṭhambhanāśca /
K09bsu016_u:6180: ākrośatāḍanavibhartsanatarjanāśca mama nāmadheyu smaramāṇa labhanti mokṣam // 12 //
K09bsu016_u:6181: ye vairiṇo vivarachidragaveṣiṇaśca nityapraduṣṭamana ye ca avarṇavādī /
K09bsu016_u:6182: sahadarśanena tada maitramanā bhavanti bheṣyanti varṇi śruta mahya smaritva nāma // 13 //
K09bsu016_u:6183: vetālamantratha kakhorda sadā prayuktā ghātārtha teṣa ripavaḥ stimitā bhavanti /
K09bsu016_u:6185: teṣa śarīri na kramanti viṣā aśeṣā ye nāmadheṣu mama kecidanusmaranti // 14 //
K09bsu016_u:6187: ojoharairbhayakaraiḥ supināntare 'pi śāmyanti sarvi mama nāma anusmaritvā // 15 //
K09bsu016_u:6189: na dhanakṣayo nāpi upaiti daridrabhāvaṃ nāmaṃ mamā anusaritva muhūrtakaṃ pi // 16 //
K09bsu016_u:6190: na ca gacchati cyuta ito narakaṃ avīciṃ na tiraścayoni na ca preta na cākṣaṇāni /
K09bsu016_u:6191: deve manuṣya upapadyati śuddhasattvo yo nāmadheyu mama kecidanusmaranti // 17 //
K09bsu016_u:6192: na ca andhakāṇabadhirā na pi carcigātrā na ca raudra khañjā atha cāṭaka prekṣaṇīyā /
K09bsu016_u:6193: sarvendriyairavikalā bahukalpakoṭyo bhontī narā mama smaritvana nāmadheyam // 18 //
K09bsu016_u:6194: avalokiteti mama te sugatiṃ vajranti yo puṣpamuṣṭi mama okirate śarīre /
K09bsu016_u:6195: dhūpāṃśca dhūpayati yaśca dadāti chatraṃ vistārikai puja karoti prasannacitto
K09bsu016_u:6196: mama buddhakṣetri sa ca bheṣyati dakṣiṇīyaḥ // 19 //
K09bsu016_u:6197: upapadyate itu cyavitvana śuddhasattvo buddhāna saṃmukha daśaddiśi lokadhātau /
K09bsu016_u:6198: buddhāṃśca paśyati śṛṇoti ca teṣa dharmaṃ ye nāmadheyu mama kecidanusmaranti // 20 //
K09bsu016_u:6199: ete tathānya kṣayituṃ nimituṃ na śakyā yāvaccupāyi ahu sattva vinemi loke /
K09bsu016_u:6200: eko vimokṣa mama bhāvitu buddhaputra nāhaṃ guṇān guṇadharāṇa vijāni sarvān // 21 //
K09bsu016_u:6202: aṣṭāpadākṛtu daśaddiśi lokadhātau kalyāṇamitra samupāsita sūdhanena /
K09bsu016_u:6203: na ca tṛptu dharma śruṇamāṇu jinaurasānāṃ kasmānna prīti bhavati śruṇamāna dharmam // 22 //
K09bsu016_u:6204: tena khalu punaḥ samayena ananyagāmī nāma bodhisattvaḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi gaganatalenāgatya sahāyā lokadhātoścakravālaśikhare pratyaṣṭhāt /
K09bsu016_u:6205: samantarapratiṣṭhāpitau ca ananyagāminā bodhisattvena sahāyā lokadhātoścakravālaśikhare pādau,
K09bsu016_u:6208: tathārūpā ca ananyagāminā bodhisattvena kāyāt prabhā pramuktā,
K09bsu016_u:6219: tasmiṃśca potalake parvate 'valokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasyāntikamupasaṃkrāntaḥ saṃdṛśyate sma //
K09bsu016_u:6220: atha khalu avalokiteśvaro bodhisattvaḥ sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat - paśyasi tvaṃ kulaputra ananyagāminaṃ bodhisattvamiha parṣanmaṇḍale
K09bsu016_u:6222: āha - etaṃ kulaputra ananyagāminaṃ bodhisattvamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:6224: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako 'valokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya pādau śirasābhivandya
K09bsu016_u:6229: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako 'valokiteśvarasya bodhisattvasya jñānagāthālabdhacitto
K09bsu016_u:6231: bodhisattvastenopasaṃkramya ananyagāmino bodhisattvasya pādau śirasābhivandya purataḥ
K09bsu016_u:6232: prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā ārya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
K09bsu016_u:6233: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:6235: śrutaṃ ca me āryo bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /
K09bsu016_u:6236: tadvadatu me āryaḥ - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:6238: so 'vocat - ahaṃ kulaputra samantamukhanirjavanasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya lābhī /
K09bsu016_u:6239: āha - katamasya tvayā ārya tathāgatasya pādamūlādeṣa samantamukhanirjavano nāma bodhisattvavimokṣaḥ pratilabdhaḥ?
K09bsu016_u:6242: āha - durvijñeyametatkulaputra sthānaṃ sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikayā prajayā - yaduta bodhisattvaparākramī bodhisattvavīryānivartyatā bodhisattvavīryasaṃhāryatā /
K09bsu016_u:6244: prajñācakṣuvirahitaiḥ śrotuṃ vā saṃdhārayituṃ vā adhimoktuṃ vā avatarituṃ vā /
K09bsu016_u:6247: so 'vocat - ahaṃ kulaputra pūrvasyāṃ diśi śrīgarbhavatyā lokadhātorāgacchāmi samantaśrīsaṃbhavasya tathāgatasya buddhakṣetrāt /
K09bsu016_u:6248: tasya me kulaputra samantaśrīsaṃbhavasya tathāgatasya pādamūlādeṣa samantamukhanirjavano nāma bodhisattvavimokṣaḥ pratilabdhaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:6249: tataśca me kulaputra śrīgarbhavatyā lokadhātoruccalitasya anabhilāpyānabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāḥ kalpāḥ kṣīṇāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:6252: sarvāṇi ca tāni buddhakṣetrāṇi avirahitāni tathāgataiḥ /
K09bsu016_u:6254: anuttarayā manomayyā anabhisaṃskāradharmadhātumudrāmudritayā tathāgatānujñātayā sarvabodhisattvapraharṣasaṃjananyā tathāgataṃ pūjayāmi /
K09bsu016_u:6257: sarveṣāṃ ca teṣāmindriyacakraṃ parijñāya yathāśayādhimuktito rūpakāyaṃ saṃdarśayāmi /
K09bsu016_u:6264: evaṃ dakṣiṇāyāḥ paścimāyāḥ uttarāyā uttarapūrvāyāḥ pūrvadakṣiṇāyā dakṣiṇapaścimāyāḥ
K09bsu016_u:6276: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha kathaṃ - bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:6278: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako 'nanyagāmino bodhisattvasya pādau śirasābhivandya
K09bsu016_u:6286: pratipadyamānaḥ samādhibhūmiṃ vicārayamāṇo dhāraṇībhūmau pratiṣṭhamānaḥ praṇidhānabhūmimavataran
K09bsu016_u:6289: tasya mahājanakāya ārocayāmāsa - eṣa kulaputra mahādevo nagaraśṛṅgāṭake devāgāre audārikeṇātmabhāvena sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
K09bsu016_u:6290: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako yena mahādevastenopasaṃkramya mahādevasya pādau
K09bsu016_u:6291: śirasābhivandya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā ārya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
K09bsu016_u:6292: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:6294: śrutaṃ ca me āryo bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /
K09bsu016_u:6295: tadvadatu me āryaḥ - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:6297: atha khalu mahādevo devaścaturdiśaṃ caturaḥ pāṇīn prasārya caturbhyo mahāsamudrebhyaḥ
K09bsu016_u:6298: paramaśīghrajavena vāryānīya svamukhaṃ prakṣālya sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ suvarṇapuṣpairabhyavakīrya
K09bsu016_u:6307: tasya mama kulaputra evaṃ bhavati - durdṛṣṭighātanaṃ nāmadheyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ yena nirmalacittānāṃ svakāyapratibhāsaṃ darśayati /
K09bsu016_u:6312: āha - ka etasya ārya meghajālasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya viṣayaḥ?
K09bsu016_u:6313: atha khalu mahādevoḥ devaḥ sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya purato mahāparvatamātraṃ suvarṇarāśimupadarśya
K09bsu016_u:6314: rūpyarāśiṃ vaiḍūryarāśiṃ sphaṭikarāśiṃ musāragalvarāśiṃ aśmagarbharāśiṃ jyotirasamaṇiratnarāśiṃ
K09bsu016_u:6318: cintārājamaṇiratnarāśiṃ sarvapuṣpāṇi sarvagandhān sarvadhūpān sarvamālyāni sarvavilepanāni
K09bsu016_u:6319: sarvacūrṇāni sarvavastrāṇi sarvacchatrāṇi sarvadhvajān sarvapatākāḥ sarvatūryāṇi
K09bsu016_u:6321: (Gv 168) asaṃkhyeyāni ca kanyākoṭīśatasahasrāṇyupadarśya sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat - itaṃ kulaputra gṛhītvā dānāni dehi,
K09bsu016_u:6324: sattvān dānena saṃgrahavastunā saṃgṛhya tyāgapāramitāyāṃ niyojaya,
K09bsu016_u:6328: evamaparimāṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ dānacetanāniruddhānāṃ tyāgavāsitāṃ saṃtatiṃ karomi /
K09bsu016_u:6329: buddhadharmasaṃgheṣu bodhisattvakalyāṇamitreṣu ca kuśalamūlānyavaropayitvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpayāmi /
K09bsu016_u:6330: api tu khalu punarahaṃ kulaputra kāmaratipramattānāṃ sattvānāṃ viṣayaparibhogaparigṛddhānāṃ tān viṣayānaśubhānadhitiṣṭhāmi /
K09bsu016_u:6331: krodhāviṣṭānāṃ mānamadadarpagarvitānāṃ vigrahavainayikānāṃ raudrarākṣasavikṛtabhayānantaśarīrān māṃsarudhirabhakṣānātmabhāvānupadarśya taṃ sarvaṃ stambhasaṃrambhamupadarśayāmi /
K09bsu016_u:6333: evaṃ taistairupāyaiḥ sarvākuśalacaryābhyo vinivartya sarvakuśaladharmapratipattau saṃniyojayāmi /
K09bsu016_u:6339: vajrakalpānāṃ dṛḍhātmasaṃjñāśailanirdāraṇānāṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum //
K09bsu016_u:6341: iyamihaiva jambudvīpe magadhaviṣaye bodhimaṇḍe sthāvarā nāma pṛthvīdevatā prativasati /
K09bsu016_u:6342: tāmupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:6344: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako mahādevasya pādau śirasābhivandya mahādevaṃ devamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ
K09bsu016_u:6348: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako 'nupūrveṇa yena magadhaviṣaye bodhimaṇḍe sthāvarā pṛthvīdevatā tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:6349: daśapṛthivīdevatāśatasahasrāṇi anyonyamevaṃ vācamudīrayāmāsuḥ - ayaṃ sa āgacchati,
K09bsu016_u:6357: atha tāni sthāvarāpramukhāni daśapṛthivīdevatāśatasahasrāṇi mahāpṛthivīcālaṃ kṛtvā
K09bsu016_u:6373: atha sthāvarā pṛthivīdevatā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakamevamāha - svāgataṃ te kulaputra /
K09bsu016_u:6374: ayaṃ sa pṛthivīpradeśo yatra te sthitvā kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni yatrāhaṃ pratyakṣā /
K09bsu016_u:6376: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ sthāvarāyāḥ pṛthivīdevatāyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya
K09bsu016_u:6379: atha khalu sthāvarā pṛthivīdevatā pādatalābhyāṃ mahāpṛthivīṃ parāhatya asaṃkhyeyamaṇiratnanidhānakoṭīśatasahasrapratimaṇḍitāmupadarśya
K09bsu016_u:6386: api tvahaṃ kulaputra jñānaduryodhanagarbhasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya lābhinī /
K09bsu016_u:6387: sā ahametena bodhisattvavimokṣeṇa samanvāgatā dīpaṃkaratathāgatamupādāya bodhisattvasya nityānubaddhā satatamārakṣāpratipannā /
K09bsu016_u:6388: tataḥ prabhṛti ahaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvasya cittacaritaṃ vyavacārayāmi,
K09bsu016_u:6397: sarvasattvaparipācanavinayajñānanayaṃ sarvabuddhavikurvitasaṃdarśananayaṃ ca anugacchāmi saṃdhārayāmi saṃpratīcchāmi //
K09bsu016_u:6398: eṣa ca me kulaputra jñānaduryodhanagarbho bodhisattvavimokṣaḥ sumeruparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ
K09bsu016_u:6399: kalpānāṃ pareṇa paratareṇa candradhvajāyāṃ lokadhātau sunetrasya tathāgatasyāntikātpratilabdhaḥ
K09bsu016_u:6401: sā ahaṃ kulaputra imaṃ jñānaduryodhanagarbhaṃ bodhisattvavimokṣamāyūhantī niryūhantī saṃvardhayantī vipulīkurvāṇā avirahitābhūvaṃ tathāgatadarśanena yāvad bhadrakalpāt /
K09bsu016_u:6402: atra ca mayā anabhilāpyānabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā ārāgitāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:6403: sarveṣā ca me teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ bodhimaṇḍopasaṃkramaṇavikurvitaṃ dṛṣṭam /
K09bsu016_u:6404: sarveṣāṃ ca ahaṃ teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ kuśalamūleṣu sākṣībhūtā /
K09bsu016_u:6406: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ sarvatathāgatānubaddhānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sarvabuddhakathānudhāriṇāṃ
K09bsu016_u:6411: idamihaiva jambudvīpe magadhaviṣaye kapilavastu nāma nagaram /
K09bsu016_u:6413: tāmupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:6415: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ sthāvarāyāḥ pṛthivīdevatāyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya
K09bsu016_u:6420: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako yena kapilavastu mahānagaraṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ tāṃ sthāvarāyāḥ pṛthivīdevatāyā anuśāsanīmanusmaran,
K09bsu016_u:6430: sa kapilavastumahānagaraṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya pūrveṇa nagaradvāreṇa praviśya madhye nagaraśṛṅgāṭakasya asthāt /
K09bsu016_u:6431: acirāstamite sūrye sarvabodhisattvānuśāsanīṣu pradakṣiṇagrāhī vāsantyā rātridevatāyā
K09bsu016_u:6441: yāvantaśca tayā vipule sattvadhātau akṣaṇāpāyadurgativinipātebhyaḥ sattvāḥ parimocitāḥ,
K09bsu016_u:6456: sa tān nānopāyasaṃprayuktān dharmanayasāgarān dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ
K09bsu016_u:6457: pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto vāsantyā rātridevatāyāḥ sarvaśarīreṇa praṇipatya utthāya
K09bsu016_u:6459: purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā khalu devate anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
K09bsu016_u:6460: (Gv 172) so 'haṃ kalyāṇamitrādhiṣṭhānān sarvabuddhaguṇān saṃpaśyan kalyāṇamitrāśritamātmānaṃ karomi /
K09bsu016_u:6461: darśaya me devate sarvajñatāmārgaṃ yatra pratiṣṭhito bodhisattvo niryāti daśabalabhūmau //
K09bsu016_u:6462: evamukte vāsantī rātridevatā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakamevamāha - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
K09bsu016_u:6463: yastvamevaṃ kalyāṇamitrāveśāviṣṭaḥ kalyāṇamitravacanāni śuśrūṣuḥ kalyāṇamitrānuśāsanyāṃ pratipadyase /
K09bsu016_u:6464: niyamena tvaṃ kalyāṇamitrānuśāsanīṃ pratipadyamānaḥ āsannībhaviṣyasyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
K09bsu016_u:6476: evaṃ cittamanasikāraprayuktā khalu punarahaṃ kulaputra anena sarvasattvatamovikiraṇadharmāvabhāsajagadvinayamukhena bodhisattvavimokṣeṇa samanvāgatā
K09bsu016_u:6477: ye sattvā andhakāratamisrāyāṃ rātrau parikrānteṣu manuṣyeṣu bhūtasaṃghānucaritāyāṃ
K09bsu016_u:6481: sthalagatā vā parvatagatā vā aṭavīkāntāragatā vā vanāntaragatā vā deśāntaragatā vā
K09bsu016_u:6482: grāmāntaragatā vā digantaragatā vā vidigantaragatā vā mārgāntaragatā vā mahāsāgaragatā
K09bsu016_u:6493: teṣāmahaṃ kulaputra sattvānāṃ nānopāyamukhairlayanabhūtā bhavāmi - yaduta sāgaragatānāṃ
K09bsu016_u:6498: kinnararājarūpeṇa mahoragarāgarājarūpeṇa sāgaradevatārūpeṇa kaivartarūpeṇa pratiśaraṇabhūtā bhavāmi /
K09bsu016_u:6499: tacca kuśalamūlamevaṃ pariṇāmayāmi - sarvasattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇabhūtā bhaveyaṃ sarvaduḥkhaskandhavinivartanatāyai /
K09bsu016_u:6506: evaṃ ca cittamutpādayāmi - anena kuśalamūlena sarvasattvānāṃ trāṇaṃ bhaveyaṃ sarvakleśāndhakāravidhamanatāyai /
K09bsu016_u:6507: parvataprapātagatānāṃ sattvānāṃ maraṇabhayabhītānāṃ jīvitapratilambhāya yaśaskāmatāvaśagatānāṃ kīrtiśabdadhvajakāmānāṃ bhogārthikānāṃ
K09bsu016_u:6513: giriguhādarivivaragatānāṃ vividhaduḥkhopadrutānāṃ timirāndhakāravinivartanatāyai samapṛthivītalābhinirhāreṇa śaraṇabhūtā bhavāmi /
K09bsu016_u:6514: evaṃ ca cittamutpādayāmi - yathā ahameṣāṃ parvatagatānāṃ sattvānāmārakṣāṃ karomi,
K09bsu016_u:6520: evaṃ ca cittamutpādayāmi - anena kuśalamūlena vividhadṛṣṭigahanagatān sattvāṃstṛṣṇājālasaṃsaktān vicitrasaṃsāraduḥkhabhayopadrutān sarvaduḥkhebhyaḥ parimocayeyam /
K09bsu016_u:6522: mārgaṃ saṃdarśya etānabhayakṣeme pratiṣṭhāpya evaṃ cittamutpādayāmi - anena kuśalamūlena
K09bsu016_u:6527: anena kuśalamūlena sarvasattvān skandhālayābhiniveśāduccālya anālayasarvajñajñāne pratiṣṭhāpayeyam /
K09bsu016_u:6530: saṃgṛhya samyak prīṇayitvā anikete dharme pratiṣṭhāpya
K09bsu016_u:6531: evaṃ cittamutpādayāmi - anena kuśalamūlena sarvasattvān svāyatanagrāmasaṃniśritān saṃsāragativiṣayagocarāduccālya sarvajñatāgocare pratiṣṭhāpayeyam
K09bsu016_u:6533: ye ca kulaputra andhakāratamisrāyāṃ rātrāvekaikaśaḥ pūrvādidigvidikṣu sarvadiksaṃmūḍhā bhavanti,
K09bsu016_u:6537: teṣāmahaṃ digmārgadeśasaṃmūḍhānāṃ nānāvidhairupāyairavabhāsaṃ kṛtvā niṣkramitukāmānāṃ dvāraṃ saṃdarśayāmi /
K09bsu016_u:6543: samaviṣamān pṛthivīpradeśān vividhāni ca rūpagatāni saṃdarśayāmi /
K09bsu016_u:6546: priyaviprayogotkaṇṭhitānāṃ mātāpitṛputradāramitrāmātyajñātisālohitān vividhāni ca manāpāni rūpagatāni saṃdarśayāmi /
K09bsu016_u:6547: evaṃ ca cittamutpādayāmi - yathāhameṣāṃ sattvānāmandhakāratamisrāyāṃ rātrau timiropahatanetrāṇāṃ diksaṃmūḍhānāmālokaṃ karomi,
K09bsu016_u:6559: sattvānāṃ mahāprajñālokena avidyāndhakāraṃ vidhūya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpya
K09bsu016_u:6564: glānānāmapyahaṃ kulaputra sattvānāṃ dīrghavyādhiparikhinnānāṃ durbalaśarīrāṇāṃ jīrṇānāṃ
K09bsu016_u:6565: vṛddhānāṃ jarābhibhūtānāmanāthānāṃ kṛpaṇānāṃ ca daridrāṇāṃ vilayagatānāṃ videśaprāptānāṃ
K09bsu016_u:6568: sāhaṃ kulaputra glānānāṃ sattvānāṃ sarvopāyairvyādhyapanayanāya pratipadyāmi /
K09bsu016_u:6578: evaṃ ca cittamutpādayāmi - yathāhameṣāṃ sattvānāṃ vividhabhayopadravaparitrāṇe pratiśaraṇaṃ bhavāmi,
K09bsu016_u:6593: laukikāyāṃ ca samyagdṛṣṭau pratiṣṭhāpya divyamānuṣikāyāṃ saṃpattau saṃniyojayāmi /
K09bsu016_u:6595: evamahaṃ sarvasattvānārye lokottare pāramitāmārge pratiṣṭhāpya sarvajñatāyāmavaivartyān kṛtvā samantabhadreṇa mahāpraṇidhānena sarvajñatāyāmupanayeyam
K09bsu016_u:6597: atha khalu vāsantī rātridevatā tasyāṃ velāyāmetameva sarvasattvatamovikiraṇadharmāvabhāsajagadvinayamukhaṃ
K09bsu016_u:6598: bodhisattvavimokṣadiśaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśayamānā buddhādhiṣṭhānena daśa diśo
K09bsu016_u:6601: kālamavekṣya jagatsukhanetā eṣa vimokṣanayo mama śāntaḥ // 1 //
K09bsu016_u:6602: maitri mamā vipulā suviśuddhā kalpa ananta subhāvita pūrve /
K09bsu016_u:6603: apāya pharitva prabhāsami lokaṃ eta nayottara sudhana sudhīrā // 2 //
K09bsu016_u:6604: karuṇasamudra mamāmita loke saṃbhavu yatra triyadhvajinānām /
K09bsu016_u:6606: yena jagasya dukhaṃ praśamemī eta nayottara sudhana sudhīrā // 3 //
K09bsu016_u:6607: lokasukhānyabhinirharamāṇā saṃskṛta ārya sukhāni ca yāni /
K09bsu016_u:6608: prīti udagra pramodami tena otara eta nayaṃ jinaputra // 4 //
K09bsu016_u:6610: buddhabalaṃ pariśodhayamānā otara eta nayaṃ jinaputra // 5 //
K09bsu016_u:6611: cakṣu mamā vipulaṃ pariśuddhaṃ yena daśaddiśi paśyami kṣetrā /
K09bsu016_u:6612: teṣu ca kṣetrataleṣu svayaṃbhūn paśyami bodhidrumendraniṣaṇṇān // 6 //
K09bsu016_u:6615: teṣu ca kṣetrapatheṣu ya sattvāḥ sarvacyutīupapattimukheṣu /
K09bsu016_u:6616: paśyami te gatisāgari bālāḥ saṃsaramāṇa svakarmanubhonti // 8 //
K09bsu016_u:6617: srotasamudra mamātiviśuddho yatra samosari śabda aśeṣāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:6618: sarvajagasya ya mantrasamudrā sarva śruṇitva dharemi smṛtīye // 9 //
K09bsu016_u:6620: yo hi pravartati cakru jinānāṃ taṃ ca śruṇitva dharemi smṛtīye // 10 //
K09bsu016_u:6624: jihva mamā vipula suprabhūtā tāmratanū ratanābha viśuddhā /
K09bsu016_u:6625: yāya jñapemi yathāśaya sattvān otara eta nayaṃ jinaputra // 12 //
K09bsu016_u:6629: tatra samosari sarvanarendrān no ca vikalpana vidyati mahyam // 14 //
K09bsu016_u:6630: kṣetrataleṣu acintiya sattvāḥ teṣa prajānami cittasamudrān /
K09bsu016_u:6631: indriyaāśaya jānami teṣāṃ no ca vikalpana vidyati mahyam // 15 //
K09bsu016_u:6632: ṛddhi mamo vipulā susamāptā kampayi kṣetra acintiyāya /
K09bsu016_u:6633: kāyaprabhāya prabhāvatu yeno sarva sudurdama sattva damemi // 16 //
K09bsu016_u:6634: puṇya mamo vipulaṃ pariśuddhaṃ akṣayakoṣa samantaviyūham /
K09bsu016_u:6635: yena pravartayi pūja jinānāṃ bhoti ca sarvajagatyupajīvyam // 17 //
K09bsu016_u:6636: prajña mamo vipulā suviśuddhā yāya prajānami dharmasamudrān /
K09bsu016_u:6637: saṃśaya chindami sarvajanānāṃ otara eta nayaṃ jinaputra // 18 //
K09bsu016_u:6639: buddhasamudra ahaṃ avatīrṇā sarvi triyadhvi nayottaramānā /
K09bsu016_u:6640: teṣu ca otaramī praṇidhānaṃ eṣa nayo atulaḥ susamāptaḥ // 19 //
K09bsu016_u:6641: sarvaraje ahu kṣetrasamudrān paśyami caiva triyadhvapraveśān /
K09bsu016_u:6642: tatra ca paśyami buddhasamudrā teṣa samantatalaṃ nayabhūmim // 20 //
K09bsu016_u:6643: paśya virocana bodhivibuddhaṃ sarvadiśāsu spharitvana kṣetrā /
K09bsu016_u:6645: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako vāsantīṃ rātridevatāmetadavocat - kiyacciraṃ saṃprasthitāsi devate anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
K09bsu016_u:6648: evamukte vāsantī rātridevatā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakamevamāha - bhūtapūrvaṃ jinaputra
K09bsu016_u:6649: atīte 'dhvani sumeruparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ kalpānāṃ pareṇa praśāntaprabho nāma kalpo
K09bsu016_u:6652: tasyāṃ khalu punarlokadhātau ratnacandrapradīpaprabhā nāma madhyamā cāturdvīpikā /
K09bsu016_u:6654: tatra rājadhānyāṃ sudharmatīrtho nāma rājābhūt dhārmiko dharmarājā cakravartī caturdvīpeśvaraḥ saptaratnasamanvāgataḥ /
K09bsu016_u:6655: sa tāmakaṇṭakāṃ mahāpṛthivīṃ sasāgaragiriparyantāṃ dharmeṇābhinirjitya adhyāvasati sma //
K09bsu016_u:6656: tasya sudharmatīrthasya rājño dharmamaticandrā nāma bhāryābhūt /
K09bsu016_u:6657: sā rātryāḥ pūrve yāme madanamattā ratikrīḍāpariśrāntā madhyame yāme 'ntaḥpuramadhyagatā prasuptā /
K09bsu016_u:6658: atha tasyāḥ padmaprabhāyā rājadhānyāḥ pūrveṇa śamathaśrīsaṃbhave mahāvanaṣaṇḍe sarvadharmanigarjitarājo
K09bsu016_u:6661: tenāsau sarvo ratnaśrīsaṃbhavo lokadhāturanekavarṇayā udārayā prabhayā sphuṭāvabhāsito 'bhūt /
K09bsu016_u:6662: tasyāṃ ca padmaprabhayāṃ rājadhānyāṃ suviśuddhacandrābhā nāma rātridevatā abhūt /
K09bsu016_u:6663: sā tāṃ dharmamaticandrāṃ rājabhāryāmupasaṃkramya ābharaṇasaṃghaṭṭanaśabdena prabodhya
K09bsu016_u:6664: evamāha - yatkhalu rājapatni jānīyāḥ - śamathaśrīsaṃbhave mahāvanaṣaṇḍe sarvadharmanigarjitarājo
K09bsu016_u:6666: sā tasyā rājabhāryāyāḥ purato vistareṇa buddhaguṇavarṇaṃ buddhavikurvitaṃ samantabhadrabodhisattvacaryāpraṇidhānaṃ ca saṃprakāśayāmāsa /
K09bsu016_u:6667: (Gv 179) sā khalu punaḥ kulaputra rājabhāryā tathāgataprabhāvabhāsitādhyāśayenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃprasthitā /
K09bsu016_u:6669: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena dharmamaticandrā nāma rājabhāryā abhūt?
K09bsu016_u:6671: ahaṃ sā tena kālena tena samayena dharmamaticandrā nāma rājabhāryā abhūvam //
K09bsu016_u:6672: sā ahaṃ kulaputra tenābhilāṣikeṇa cittotpādena tena ca tathāgatāvaropitena kuśalamūlena sumeruparamāṇurajaḥsamaiḥ kalpairna jātu durgatiṣūpapannā
K09bsu016_u:6673: na narake, na tiryagyonau preteṣu vā,
K09bsu016_u:6677: sadā ahaṃ deveṣu devamāhātmyaṃ pratilabhya manuṣyeṣu ca manuṣyamāhātmyaṃ na jātu kalyāṇamitravirahitā abhūvaṃ yaduta buddhabodhisattvaiḥ /
K09bsu016_u:6679: sā khalvahaṃ kulaputra buddhānubuddheṣu kuśalamūlānyavaropayamāṇā sumeruparamāṇurajaḥsamān kalpān sukhena śamena kṣemeṇa mārgeṇa āgatā /
K09bsu016_u:6682: kalpasahasrāṇāṃ prathamastena kālena aśokavirajo nāma kalpo 'bhūt rajovimalatejaḥśrīnāmni lokadhātau /
K09bsu016_u:6683: sa khalu punaḥ kulaputra rajovimalatejaḥśrīrlokadhātuḥ kliṣṭaviśuddho 'bhūt pañcabuddhotpādaśataprabhavaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:6684: teṣāṃ khalu punaḥ pañcānāṃ buddhaśatānāṃ prathamaḥ sumerudhvajāyatanaśāntanetraśrīrnāma
K09bsu016_u:6685: tathāgato loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ
K09bsu016_u:6687: ahaṃ ca prajñāvabhāsaśrīrnāma śreṣṭhidārikā abhūvaṃ vighuṣṭakīrteḥ śreṣṭhino duhitā abhirūpā prāsādikā darśanīyā paramayā śubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatā /
K09bsu016_u:6688: sā ca suviśuddhacandrābhā rātridevatā praṇidhānavaśena virajovatyāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāṃ lokadhātau vicitradhvajāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ viśuddhanetrābhā nāma rātridevatā abhūt /
K09bsu016_u:6689: tayā me rātryāṃ praśāntāyāṃ śayitayormātāpitrostadgṛhaṃ kampayitvā udāreṇāvabhāsena
K09bsu016_u:6690: svarūpaṃ saṃdarśya buddhaguṇavarṇaṃ bhāṣitvā sa tathāgataḥ prathamasaptāhābhisaṃbuddho
K09bsu016_u:6692: sā ahaṃ sārdhaṃ mātāpitṛbhyāṃ mahatā ca jñātisaṃghena tāṃ suviśuddhacandrābhāṃ rātridevatāṃ puraskṛtya tasya tathāgatasyāntikamupasaṃkrāntā
K09bsu016_u:6693: tato mayā tasya tathāgatasya udārāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā sahadarśanena jagadvinayabuddhadarśanaprabhavo nāma samādhiḥ pratilabdhaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:6695: yasya pratilambhānmayā te sumeruparamāṇurajaḥsamāḥ kalpā anusmṛtāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:6697: tayā me tasya tathāgatasyāntikāddharmadeśanāṃ śrutvā eṣa sarvasattvatamovikiraṇadharmāvabhāsajagadvinayamukho nāma bodhisattvavimokṣaḥ pratilabdhaḥ,
K09bsu016_u:6702: ye ca teṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvā upapannāḥ,
K09bsu016_u:6708: sa ca me vimokṣaḥ praticittakṣaṇaṃ vivardhate /
K09bsu016_u:6709: tadvimokṣacittānantareṇa cittena lokadhātuśataparamāṇurajaḥsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi kāyena spharāmi /
K09bsu016_u:6710: tadanantareṇa cittena lokadhātusahasraparamāṇurajaḥsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi kāyena spharāmi /
K09bsu016_u:6711: tadanantareṇa cittena lokadhātuśatasahasraparamāṇurajaḥsamāni buddhakṣetrāṇi kāyena spharāmi /
K09bsu016_u:6716: yā ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dharmadeśanā,
K09bsu016_u:6739: iyamihaiva magadhaviṣaye bodhimaṇḍe samantagambhīraśrīvimalaprabhā nāma rātridevatā prativasati,
K09bsu016_u:6742: tāmupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:6744: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako vāsantīṃ rātridevatāmābhigārthābhirabhyaṣṭauṣīt -
K09bsu016_u:6746: paśyami kāyu tavādya viśuddhaṃ lakṣaṇacitritu meru yathaiva /
K09bsu016_u:6749: yatra samosari loka aśeṣaḥ saṃbhavate 'tha vibhoti asaṅgam // 23 //
K09bsu016_u:6751: romamukheṣu ca paśyami tubhyaṃ tārakasaṃgha sajyotiṣacandrān // 24 //
K09bsu016_u:6752: cittu tavā vipulaṃ suviśuddhaṃ yena sphuṭaṃ gaganaṃ va diśāsu /
K09bsu016_u:6753: yatra samosari sarvanarendrā jñānamakalpamalaṃ varu tubhyam // 25 //
K09bsu016_u:6754: kṣetrarajopama megha vicitrā niścariṣū tava romamukheṣu /
K09bsu016_u:6755: te ca pharanti daśaddiśi buddhān sarvaviyūha pravarṣayamāṇāḥ // 26 //
K09bsu016_u:6756: sarvajagopama kāya anantā niścariṣū tava romamukheṣu /
K09bsu016_u:6757: te ca daśaddiśi loku pharitvā nānaupāya viśodhayi sattvān // 27 //
K09bsu016_u:6759: ye tvaya śodhita sattvagatīṣu teṣa yathāśayasaṃbhuta sarvān // 28 //
K09bsu016_u:6760: lābha sulabdha sujīvitu teṣāṃ ye tava nāma śṛṇonti udagrāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:6762: ye 'tha ca darśanameṣi narāṇāṃ bodhipathābhimukhāśca bhavanti // 29 //
K09bsu016_u:6763: kalpa acintiya vāsu apāye darśanahetu tavotsahitavyaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:6764: yatti śraveṇa praharṣitacittā darśanamātra śamesi ca kleśān // 30 //
K09bsu016_u:6766: varṇa bhaṇettava romamukhasya varṇakṣayo 'sya bhavenna kadācit // 31 //
K09bsu016_u:6767: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako vāsantīṃ rātridevatāmābhirgāthābhirabhiṣṭutya vāsantyā
K09bsu016_u:6769: pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ punaravalokya avitṛpta eva kalyāṇamitraparyupāsanena vāsantyā
K09bsu016_u:6773: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako vāsantyā rātridevatāyāḥ prathamasthānabodhisattvacittamaṇḍalapariśuddhimanugacchan,
K09bsu016_u:6786: samantagambhīraśrīvimalaprabhāyā rātridevatāyāḥ purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā ārya devate,
K09bsu016_u:6788: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvo bodhisattvacaryābhūmau carati,
K09bsu016_u:6793: daśabhiḥ kulaputra dharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvāḥ pariniṣpannā bhavanti bodhisattvacaryāyām /
K09bsu016_u:6805: ebhiḥ kulaputra daśabhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvāḥ pariniṣpannā bhavanti bodhisattvacaryāyām //
K09bsu016_u:6806: ahaṃ khalu kulaputra śāntadhyānasukhasamantavikramasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya lābhinī /
K09bsu016_u:6807: tasyā mama kulaputra tryadhvaprāptāḥ sarvatathāgatāścakṣuṣa ābhāsamāgacchanti /
K09bsu016_u:6839: sā khalu punarahaṃ kulaputra evaṃ sarvatathāgatānavataramāṇā etaṃ śāntadhyānasukhasamantavikramaṃ bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ tathāgatadhyānamaṇḍalāvabhāsena
K09bsu016_u:6840: pravistarāmi avatarāmi anugacchāmi samīkaromi abhinirharāmi samatalīkaromi praveśayāmi
K09bsu016_u:6841: vivardhayāmi nidhyāyāmi upanidhyāyāmi ākārayāmi gocarīkaromi dṛḍhīkaromi avabhāsayāmi
K09bsu016_u:6851: sā khalu punarahaṃ kulaputra etaṃ vimokṣaṃ bhāvayamānā nānopāyaiḥ sattvān paripācayāmi yaduta rātryāṃ praśāntāyāṃ ratipramattānāṃ sattvānāmaśubhasaṃjñāṃ saṃjanayāmi /
K09bsu016_u:6854: te ca sattvāstaccittaṃ paribhāvayantaḥ sarvakāmaratiṣvanabhiratā dharmārāmaratiṃ pravārayamāṇā agārādanāgārikaṃ niṣkrāmanti /
K09bsu016_u:6870: (Gv 185) anutpannānāṃ pāpakānāmakuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāmanutpādāya utpannānāṃ ca pāpakānāṃ saṃkalpānāmantardhānāya pratyayamupasaṃharāmi /
K09bsu016_u:6884: iyamihaiva mamānantaraṃ vairocanabodhimaṇḍe pradakṣiṇena pramuditanayanajagadvirocanā nāma rātridevatā prativasati /
K09bsu016_u:6885: tāmupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvakarmasu prayoktavyam //
K09bsu016_u:6886: atha khalu samantagambhīraśrīvimalaprabhā rātridevatā tasyāṃ velāyāmetameva śāntadhyānasukhasamantavikramaṃ
K09bsu016_u:6887: bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśayamānā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata -
K09bsu016_u:6889: teṣu cakṣu vipulaṃ viśudhyate yena otariṣu buddhasāgarān // 1 //
K09bsu016_u:6890: paśyahī jinaśarīru nirmalaṃ lakṣaṇehi samalaṃkṛtaṃ śubham /
K09bsu016_u:6891: tacca paśyahi jine vikurvitaṃ dharmadhātupharaṇaṃ pratikṣaṇam // 2 //
K09bsu016_u:6893: dharmadhātu vipulaṃ spharitvanā cakru vartayi jage yathāśayam // 3 //
K09bsu016_u:6895: buddhiyā jinu svabhāvadharmatāṃ niḥśarīra supraśānta advayām /
K09bsu016_u:6896: rūpakāyu śubhalakṣaṇaiścitaṃ darśayī jagu pharitva śeṣataḥ // 4 //
K09bsu016_u:6897: buddhakāyu vipulo acintiyo dharmadhātu phari yenaśeṣato /
K09bsu016_u:6898: so ca dṛśyati samantataḥ samaṃ sarva darśayi samantato jinān // 5 //
K09bsu016_u:6902: te spharitva jaga sarvaśeṣato kleśatāpa śamayanti prāṇinām // 7 //
K09bsu016_u:6904: dharmadhātu vipulaṃ spharitvanā durgatīdukha śamenti prāṇinām // 8 //
K09bsu016_u:6906: dharmavarṣa vipula pravarṣaṇo bodhiāśayu janeti prāṇinām // 9 //
K09bsu016_u:6907: saṃgṛhīta anena pūrvato kalpasāgara caritva cārikām /
K09bsu016_u:6911: anyamanya adhimuktigocaraste na śakyamapi sarvi jānitum // 11 //
K09bsu016_u:6913: tadvimokṣanaya ye acintiyāste na śakyamapi sarvi jānitum // 12 //
K09bsu016_u:6914: eṣa devata mamā anantaraṃ lokanāthabhimukhā pramodate /
K09bsu016_u:6915: jyotirarcinayaneti nāmato eta pṛccha katha bodhicārikām // 13 //
K09bsu016_u:6916: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ samantagambhīraśrīvimalaprabhāyā rātridevatāyāḥ
K09bsu016_u:6928: atha khalu pramuditanayanajagadvirocanā rātridevatā sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya bhūyasyā
K09bsu016_u:6939: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ sarvajñatāsaṃbhāravīryaparākrameṇa kalyāṇamitropasaṃkramaṇena,
K09bsu016_u:6948: sarvadharmadhātunayārambaṇānuccalitena sakaladharmadhātuspharaṇena kalyāṇamitropasaṃkramaṇena yena pramuditanayanajagadvirocanā rātridevatā tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ //
K09bsu016_u:6949: so 'paśyat pramuditanayanajagadvirocanāṃ rātridevatāṃ bhagavataḥ parṣanmaṇḍale puṣpagarbhasiṃhāsananiṣaṇṇāṃ
K09bsu016_u:6961: sarvasattvān spharitvā abhimukhaṃ sarvavratasamādānākampyatāṃ saṃdarśayamānān sattvadhātusamaṃ
K09bsu016_u:6979: visaṃsthitadurvarṇāśrayaśarīratāṃ vyāvartayamānān sarvasattvānāmanuttarāṃ tathāgatavarṇaviśuddhiṃ saṃvarṇayamānān sattvān paripācayamānānapaśyat
K09bsu016_u:6988: sarvaromavivarebhyaśca nānāvarṇasaṃsthānān vividhātmabhāvanirmāṇameghānniścaritvā nānopāyaiḥ sattvānāṃ prītiṃ saṃjanayamānān,
K09bsu016_u:7047: sarvaromavivarebhyaśca ekaikasmādromavivarāt sarvajagaccittasamān kāyanirmāṇameghānniścaritvā sarvasattvābhimukhasthitānaparyantaṃ sarvajñatāsaṃbhārabalaṃ
K09bsu016_u:7072: cittaṃ prasādayamānān prāmodyamutpādayamānān harṣaṃ saṃjanayamānān daurmanasyaṃ vinivartayamānān cittaṃ viśodhayamānān cittakalyatāmāvartayamānān,
K09bsu016_u:7074: yathā ca pāramitācaryāsaṃdarśanena loke sattvān paripākaṃ vrajato 'paśyat,
K09bsu016_u:7075: tathā sarvabodhisattvadharmanigarjanena ye ca pramuditanayanajagadvirocanāyā rātridevatāyāḥ prathamacittotpādasaṃbhārāḥ (Gv 192)
K09bsu016_u:7087: yāḥ sarvavīryapāramitācaryāḥ ye dhyānapāramitāsaṃbhārāḥ dhyānapāramitābhiyogāḥ dhyānapāramitāpariniṣpattiviśuddhicaryāḥ,
K09bsu016_u:7162: evaṃ yāvadvajrapāṇisādṛśātmabhāvameghaniścaritān daśa diśaḥ spharitvā dharmadhātunayaprasareṣu sarvasattvasaṃmukhībhāvasthitān sattvān paripācayamānānapaśyat
K09bsu016_u:7180: tāni asyāḥ sarvaromavivarebhyo nirmāṇakāyameghānniścaritvā sattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayamānānapaśyat /
K09bsu016_u:7181: saṃprakāśayamānān dyotayamānān saṃdarśayamānān udīrayamānān pravibhajamānān pravistaramānān gaṇayato nirdiśyamānān vijñāpayamānān upasaṃharamāṇānapaśyat
K09bsu016_u:7204: keṣāṃcit sarvasattvakāyanānārutaiḥ pramuditanayanajagadvirocanāyā rātridevatāyā vimokṣaviṣayaṃ sattvānāṃ prabhāvayamānānapaśyat /
K09bsu016_u:7208: tasyā ekaikena nirmāṇarūpameghena praticittakṣaṇamanabhilāpyānabhilāpyāni daśadiśi loke buddhakṣetrāṇi viśodhyamānānapaśyat /
K09bsu016_u:7214: praticittakṣaṇamanantamadhyān sattvasamudrān daśabhūmāvāvartamānān sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ paśyati sma,
K09bsu016_u:7215: śṛṇoti vyavacārayati avacarati pratividhyati nidhyāyati anugacchati anusarati anupraviśati
K09bsu016_u:7223: daśadiśi loki anupūrvaṃ rūpa yathāśayaṃ jagu pharitvā // 1 //
K09bsu016_u:7225: ṛddhyā anekavidha kāyaiśvarya vidarśatva jagu vinesi // 2 //
K09bsu016_u:7228: na ca skandhaāyatanadhātau niśrayu tubhya vidyati kadācit /
K09bsu016_u:7232: na ca tubhya iñjana kadācinmanyana syandanā na ca prapañcā /
K09bsu016_u:7241: sattvānāmāśayavaśā tvaṃ devata rūpu darśayasi loke // 10 //
K09bsu016_u:7243: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ pramuditanayanajagadvirocanāṃ rātridevatāmābhiḥ
K09bsu016_u:7244: sārūpyābhirgāthābhirabhiṣṭutya etadavocat - kiyacciraṃ saṃsthitāsi devate anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
K09bsu016_u:7245: kiyaccirapratilabdhaścāyaṃ tvayā devate samantabhadraprītivipulavimalavegadhvajo bodhisattvavimokṣa iti //
K09bsu016_u:7246: atha khalu pramuditanayanajagadvirocanā rātridevatā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata -
K09bsu016_u:7256: jambudhvajaṃ sakalu sarva spharati prabhāya so gaganacārī // 15 //
K09bsu016_u:7258: koṭī amātya paripūrṇā paṇḍita dakṣa viddha medhāvī // 16 //
K09bsu016_u:7260: tāḥ sniogdhacitta hitacittā maitramanā upasthihiṣu rājñaḥ // 17 //
K09bsu016_u:7262: catvāra dvīpa susamṛddhā dharmabalena āvasati sarvān // 18 //
K09bsu016_u:7265: astaṃ gate dinakararaśmi svapiti nṛpe saputraparivāraiḥ /
K09bsu016_u:7267: rātrimadhyamaki yāme buddha utpannu bhū śirisamudraḥ /
K09bsu016_u:7268: tasmin vikurvita anantā darśi jino daśaddiśi pharitvā // 21 //
K09bsu016_u:7270: nānāvikurvitaśarīrān yehi pharī diśo daśa aśeṣāḥ // 22 //
K09bsu016_u:7272: pṛthivī prakampita saśailā ghoṣa nigarji te jina utpanno /
K09bsu016_u:7273: devāsurā manujanāgāḥ sarvi praharṣi te jina utpannaḥ // 23 //
K09bsu016_u:7275: te co daśaddiśi pharitvā loki yathāśaye bhaṇiṣu dharmam // 24 //
K09bsu016_u:7276: tāṃśco vikurvita anantān supini jino nidarśi mama sarvān /
K09bsu016_u:7277: gambhīra garjita śruṇitvā prīti mamā abhūṣi supinānte // 25 //
K09bsu016_u:7278: daśa rātridevatasahasrā upari mama sthitā nabhatalasmin /
K09bsu016_u:7279: varṇānudīryanta jinasya divyarutena māṃ bhaṇi prabodhya // 26 //
K09bsu016_u:7280: uttiṣṭha devamatibhārye eṣa jinopapanna tava rājye /
K09bsu016_u:7281: kalpāna sāgaraśatebhi durlabha saṃpaśyan sukhi viśuddho // 27 //
K09bsu016_u:7282: ahu prītisaṃbhuta vibuddhā paśyami ābha nirmala viśuddhām /
K09bsu016_u:7285: abhyudgato yatha sumeru dakṣiṇavāmato jina samantāt // 29 //
K09bsu016_u:7287: praṇidhiśca me kṛtu udāro buddhavikurvitaṃ vipula dṛṣṭvā // 30 //
K09bsu016_u:7288: pratibodhitaḥ sa maya rājā istrigaṇaśca yo 'sya parivāram /
K09bsu016_u:7289: buddhaprabhā vipula dṛṣṭvā sarvi abhūṣi prīṇitaśarīrāḥ // 31 //
K09bsu016_u:7292: pūjā kṛtā mayi jinasyo varṣasahasra viṃśati anūnā /
K09bsu016_u:7293: niryātitā ratana sapto pṛthivī sasāgarā ca sugatasya // 33 //
K09bsu016_u:7296: sā rātridevata hitārthaṃ bodhayi māṃ tadā karuṇajātā /
K09bsu016_u:7297: tasyāṃ mama spṛha utpannā īdṛśa bhūtva bodhayi pramattān // 35 //
K09bsu016_u:7300: daśa buddhakoṭinayutāni ye mama pūjitā janiya śraddhām /
K09bsu016_u:7305: jina pañcamaḥ kusumagarbhaḥ ṣaṣṭhu jino asaṅgamaticandraḥ /
K09bsu016_u:7309: etān daśa pramukha kṛtvā sarvi ta pūjitā naravarendrā /
K09bsu016_u:7310: na ca tāva labdha maya cakṣuryeni mamottari nayasamudram // 41 //
K09bsu016_u:7312: kalpaśca devaśirināmā tatra utpanna buddha śatapañca // 42 //
K09bsu016_u:7317: etān daśa pramukha kṛtvā sarvi ta pūjitā maya narendrāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:7320: atra lokadhātu suvicitraḥ kalpa tadāsi brahmaprabhanāmā // 46 //
K09bsu016_u:7321: tasmin jinā aparimāṇāḥ te maya pūjitāḥ saparivārāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:7322: sarveṣa teṣa sugatānāṃ dharma śruto mi gauravi janitvā // 47 //
K09bsu016_u:7327: etān daśa pramukha kṛtvā sarvi ta pūjitā maya narendrā /
K09bsu016_u:7328: na ca meṣa dharmata vibuddhā yenima otari jinasamudrān // 50 //
K09bsu016_u:7330: kṣetrā sa buddhamati nāmnā tatra abhūcca somaśirikalpaḥ // 51 //
K09bsu016_u:7338: etān daśa pramukha kṛtvā pūjita te mayā sugata sarve /
K09bsu016_u:7339: na tu tāva labdha maya jñānaṃ saddharmasamudra yenavatareyam // 55 //
K09bsu016_u:7346: jinu pañcamaḥ karuṇatejā ṣaṣṭha abhū jino vratasamudraḥ /
K09bsu016_u:7349: etān daśa pramukha kṛtvā sarvi ta pūjitā maya narendrā // 60 //
K09bsu016_u:7350: na ca meṣa dharmata vibuddhā gaganasamā svabhāvapariśuddhā /
K09bsu016_u:7355: te nāyakā bhaṇiya dharmā so maya dhārita smṛtibalena // 63 //
K09bsu016_u:7361: te sarvi pūjita narendrā mārgu na caiṣa śodhitu asaṅgaḥ // 66 //
K09bsu016_u:7365: sārocayaśca tada kalpastatra utpanna buddha śatapañca /
K09bsu016_u:7366: te sarvi satkṛta svayaṃbhū eta vimokṣa samabhilaṣatyā // 68 //
K09bsu016_u:7370: etān daśa pramukha kṛtvā sarvi ti pūjitā maya narendrāḥ // 70 //
K09bsu016_u:7371: mārgu viśodhitu jinānāṃ yatra samosarī jina aśeṣā /
K09bsu016_u:7372: na ca tāva labdha maya kṣāntiryā imamotare nayu jinānām // 71 //
K09bsu016_u:7376: te sarvi pūjitā maya narendrā mārgu viśodhito jinavarāṇām // 73 //
K09bsu016_u:7379: dharmadhvajo 'tha vacanaśrīḥ paścimu teṣu jñānamati buddhaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:7380: etān daśa pramukha kṛtvā pūjita te mayā suranarendrāḥ // 75 //
K09bsu016_u:7386: teṣāṃ ca paścimaku āsīt siṃhavinardito vidupradīpaḥ // 78 //
K09bsu016_u:7387: etān daśa pramukha kṛtvā pūjita te mayā sugatacandrā /
K09bsu016_u:7388: na ca tāva labdha maya kṣāntiryā imamotare nayasamudram // 79 //
K09bsu016_u:7401: sūtraṃ nigarjasu narendraḥ śrutva mi dhāritaṃ smṛtibalena // 85 //
K09bsu016_u:7404: jātaṃ hi me karuṇagarbhā maitrinayaṃ samantaprabhamegham /
K09bsu016_u:7420: api cāpyahaṃ sugataputra carya samantabhadra avakrāntā /
K09bsu016_u:7422: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena viśāṃpatirnāma rājābhūccakravartī buddhavaṃśānupacchedāya sthitaḥ?
K09bsu016_u:7423: na khalu punaste kulaputra evaṃ draṣṭavyam /
K09bsu016_u:7424: mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūtaḥ tena kālena tena samayena viśāṃpatirnāma rājā abhūccakravartī buddhavaṃśānupacchedāya pratipannaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:7427: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena bhadramatirnāma cakravartibhāryā abhūt strīratnam?
K09bsu016_u:7429: ahaṃ sā tena kālena tena samayena bhadramatirnāma (Gv 202)
K09bsu016_u:7431: sāhaṃ tayā rātridevatayā pratibodhyaṃ buddhadarśane samādāpitā /
K09bsu016_u:7432: iyaccirotpāditaṃ me kulaputra anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittam /
K09bsu016_u:7433: sāhaṃ tena cittotpādena buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān kalpān na jātu durgativinipāteṣu upapannā /
K09bsu016_u:7436: yāvanme bhagavato ratnaśrīpradīpaguṇaketostathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya sahadarśanādayaṃ samantabhadraprītivipulavimalavegadhvajo bodhisattvavimokṣaḥ
K09bsu016_u:7449: ekaikasya ca tathāgatasya vimaladharmacakrasaṃpratyeṣaṇasaṃdhāraṇakuśalānāṃ sarvatryadhvatathāgatavikurvitanayasāgarāvataraṇakuśalānāṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum //
K09bsu016_u:7451: iyamihaiva tathāgataparṣanmaṇḍalasamanantaraṃ samantasattvatrāṇojaḥśrī nāma rātridevatā prativasati /
K09bsu016_u:7454: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ pramuditanayanajagadvirocanāyā rātridevatāyāḥ
K09bsu016_u:7460: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakoḥ tat pramuditanayanajagadvirocanāyā rātridevatāyāḥ samantabhadraprītivipulavimalavegadhvajaṃ bodhisattvavimokṣamadhimucyamāno
K09bsu016_u:7461: adhigacchan praviśan prasaran spharamāṇo 'nugacchan anusaran pratilabhamāno bhāvayan
K09bsu016_u:7472: sa sarvalokamavabhāsya sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya mūrdhni nipatya sarvaśarīramanuspharati sma /
K09bsu016_u:7474: atha tāvadeva atyantavirajomaṇḍalaṃ nāma samādhiṃ pratyalabhata,
K09bsu016_u:7476: rātridevatāyā mārgāntare yatpṛthivīmaṇḍalaṃ tatra yāvanti tejaḥparamāṇurajāṃsi vā
K09bsu016_u:7477: apsu paramāṇurajāṃsi vā pṛthivīparamāṇurajāṃsi vā vajraparamāṇurajāṃsi vā vividhamahāmaṇiratnarajaḥparamāṇurajāṃsi
K09bsu016_u:7478: vā puṣpagandhacūrṇaparamāṇurajāṃsi vā ratnavyūhaparamāṇurajāṃsi vā sarvārambaṇaparamāṇurajāṃsi vā,
K09bsu016_u:7479: teṣu sarveṣu paramāṇurajaḥsu ekaikasmin paramāṇurajasi buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān lokadhātūn saṃvartamānān vivartamānāṃścāpaśyat /
K09bsu016_u:7505: teṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvagatiṣu sarvasattvopapattiṣu samantasattvatrāṇojaḥśriyaṃ rātridevatāṃ prativineyasattvasarvasattvābhimukhāmapaśyat
K09bsu016_u:7533: yaduta aṇḍajānāṃ sattvānāṃ jarāyujānāṃ saṃsvedajānāmupapādukānāṃ rūpiṇāmarūpiṇāṃ saṃjñināṃ naivasaṃjñināṃ nāsaṃjñināṃ sarvasattvaparitrāṇapraṇidhānabalābhinirhṛtatvāt,
K09bsu016_u:7543: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ samantasattvatrāṇojaḥśriyo rātridevatāyā idamacintyaṃ
K09bsu016_u:7547: atha khalu samantasattvatrāṇojaḥśrī rātrīdevatā tāṃ bodhisattvarūpalakṣaṇaviśuddhisaṃpadamantardhāpya rātridevatārūpeṇa sarvavikurvitāni pravartayamānā adhyatiṣṭhat /
K09bsu016_u:7548: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ samantasattvatrāṇojaśriyo rātridevatāyāḥ purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K09bsu016_u:7549: dṛṣṭo mayā vipulakāyu tavā varalakṣaṇo ratanaābharaṇa /
K09bsu016_u:7554: raśmīmukhe rucirapadmasthitāḥ tava nirmitā jagi sameti duḥkham // 3 //
K09bsu016_u:7556: puṣpā pravarṣanta samantamukhaṃ spharati dharmadhātugata sarvajinān // 4 //
K09bsu016_u:7559: tava sūryameghapaṭalā vipulā sada niścaranti vadanādvimalāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:7561: tava candrajyotiṣaprabhā vimalā nayanebhi megha sada niścariṣu /
K09bsu016_u:7562: te co daśaddiśi spharitva jagaṃ dyotanti loki timiropahatā // 7 //
K09bsu016_u:7565: tava kāyu dṛśyati hi dikprasaraiḥ sarvajagābhimukha prītikaraḥ /
K09bsu016_u:7568: yada preṣitastava sakāśamahaṃ samupasthito guṇa vicintayatā /
K09bsu016_u:7569: tada raśmimaṇḍala śubhā vimalā bhrumukhāntarātu tava niścariṣu // 10 //
K09bsu016_u:7570: obhāsayan diśa samudraśatānāloka loki vipulāṃ janiya /
K09bsu016_u:7571: nānāvikurvita vidarśya bahūnastaṃgatā mama śarīri tadā // 11 //
K09bsu016_u:7572: yada raśmiṇḍala mamā nipatī tada saukhyamadbhutamudāramabhūt /
K09bsu016_u:7573: okrānta dhāraṇi samādhiśatā paśyāmi dikṣu ca jinānamitā // 12 //
K09bsu016_u:7574: kramavikrame yada dharā kramataḥ paramāṇusaṃkhyanayu jñātu mayā /
K09bsu016_u:7576: rajasi sthitā pṛthaganekavidhā nekāntakliṣṭa bahu kṣetraśatā /
K09bsu016_u:7578: saṃkliṣṭaśuddha puna kṣetra bahūn alpaṃ sukhaṃ vipula yatra duḥkha /
K09bsu016_u:7579: samudenti yeṣu jina kāruṇika jinaśrāvakā api pratyekajināḥ // 15 //
K09bsu016_u:7581: naranārimaṇḍita sudarśanīyāḥ jinavaṃśu yatra sthihatī ruciraḥ // 16 //
K09bsu016_u:7582: kṣetrasamudra vipula vimalā rajasi sthitā samatalānugatā /
K09bsu016_u:7583: vairocane caritā hi purā pariśodhitā vipulakalpaśataiḥ // 17 //
K09bsu016_u:7585: bodhi vibuddhyayu vikurvayato cakraṃ pravartyaṃ vinayanti jagat // 18 //
K09bsu016_u:7586: paśyāmi tvāmanugatāmapi tāṃ vairocanasya viṣaye vipule /
K09bsu016_u:7587: pūjā sahasranayutaiḥ amitaiḥ sarvān jinān samabhipūjayantī // 19 //
K09bsu016_u:7588: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ imā gāthā bhāṣitvā samantasattvatrāṇojaḥśriyaṃ rātridevatāmetadavocat - āścaryaṃ devate,
K09bsu016_u:7592: kathaṃ ca pratipadyamāno bodhisattvaḥ imaṃ bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ pariśodhayati?
K09bsu016_u:7593: āha - durabhisaṃbhavaṃ kulaputra etatsthānaṃ sadevakena lokena saśrāvakapratyekabuddhena /
K09bsu016_u:7603: bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra atīte 'dhvani buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ kalpānāṃ pareṇa
K09bsu016_u:7613: tasyāḥ khalu punarvairocanaśriyo lokadhātoḥ pūrveṇa cakravālānusaṃdhau ratnakusumapradīpadhvajā
K09bsu016_u:7623: ekaikasyāṃ ca nadyantarikāyāṃ daśa nagarakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi saṃsthitānyabhūvan /
K09bsu016_u:7626: tasyāṃ khalu punaścāturdvīpikāyāṃ jambudvīpasya madhye ratnakusumapradīpā nāma madhyamā rājadhānyabhūt,
K09bsu016_u:7627: ṛddhā ca sphītā ca kṣemā ca subhikṣā ca ākīrṇabahujanadevamanuṣyā ca daśakuśalakarmapathasamāttānāṃ sattvānāmālayaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:7628: tasyāṃ khalu punā ratnakusumapradīpāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ vairocanaratnapadmagarbhaśrīcūḍo
K09bsu016_u:7629: nāma rāja abhūta cakravartī caturdvīpeśvaraḥ aupapādukaḥ padmagarbhe dvātriṃśanmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇasamalaṃkṛtaśarīro
K09bsu016_u:7631: pūrṇaṃ cāsya sahasramabhūt putrāṇāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānāṃ sarvākārasuparipūrṇavarāṅgānām /
K09bsu016_u:7637: tasya khalu vairocanaratnapadmagarbhaśrīcūḍasya rājñaścakravartinaḥ saṃpūrṇaśrīvakrā nāma bhāryā abhūt strīratnam,
K09bsu016_u:7639: abhinīlakeśī abhinīlanetrā suvarṇavarṇacchavirbrahmasvarā satatapramuktaprabhāśarīrā samantādyojanasahasramanekavarṇayā divyagandhaprabhayā spharati sma /
K09bsu016_u:7642: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra rājñaścakravartino darśanena na kaścit tṛpyati,
K09bsu016_u:7643: evameva tasyāḥ padmabhadrābhirāminetraśriyaścakravartiduhiturna kaściddarśanena tṛptimāpadyate sthāpayitvā prajñātṛptān /
K09bsu016_u:7644: tena ca kālena tena samayena amitāyuṣaḥ sattvā abhūvan na niyatāyuṣaḥ,
K09bsu016_u:7646: tena ca kālena sattvānāṃ saṃsthānanānātvamapi prajñāyate sma /
K09bsu016_u:7650: tatra ye sattvāḥ suvarṇā abhūvannudārādhimuktikāḥ saṃpūrṇagātrā abhirūpā darśanīyāḥ,
K09bsu016_u:7651: ta evaṃ vācamabhāṣanta - ahaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa suvarṇatarastvatsakāśāditi /
K09bsu016_u:7654: te tena anyonyāvamānanāsamuditena akuśalamūlena āyuḥpramāṇādapi parihīyante sma,
K09bsu016_u:7661: tasya khalu bodhimaṇḍasya purato ratnakusumavidyuddharmanigarjitameghaghoṣaṃ nāma gandhodakasaro 'bhūddaśaratnadrumakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraparivāram
K09bsu016_u:7662: sarve ca te ratnavṛkṣā bodhivṛkṣasaṃsthānā abhūvan /
K09bsu016_u:7663: tasya khalu punā ratnakusumavidyuddharmanigarjitameghaghoṣasya mahāgandhodakasarasaḥ sarvamaṇiratnasuvibhaktanicitāni kūlānyabhūvan,
K09bsu016_u:7669: tatra mahāpadme samantajñānārciśrīguṇaketudhvajo nāma tathāgataḥ prādurbabhūva teṣāṃ sumeruparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ prathamakalpikaḥ,
K09bsu016_u:7671: so 'nekavarṣasahasrāṇi dharmaśravaṇena sattvān paripācya daśavarṣasahasraṃ raśmyavabhāsavikurvitena paripācayāmāsa tatra daśabhirvarṣasahasraiḥ sa tathāgataḥ prādurbhaviṣyatīti /
K09bsu016_u:7673: yayā raśmyā te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ saṃjānanti sma - daśabhirvarṣasahasraistathāgata utpatsyata iti,
K09bsu016_u:7676: yayā raśmyā te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ sarvarūpāṇi sūkṣmāṇyapaśyan - aṣṭābhirvarṣasahasraiḥ sa tathāgata utpatsyata iti /
K09bsu016_u:7677: yattata eva mahābodhivṛkṣāt sarvasattvakarmavipākanirghoṣā nāma raśmirniścacāra,
K09bsu016_u:7678: yayā raśmyā te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ svakasvakān karmasamudrānavataranti sma,
K09bsu016_u:7679: karmasmṛtijñānaṃ ca pratyalabhanta - saptabhirvarṣasahasraiḥ sa tathāgata utpatsyata iti /
K09bsu016_u:7680: yattata eva mahābodhivṛkṣāt sarvakuśalamūlasaṃbhavanirghoṣā nāma raśmirniścacāra,
K09bsu016_u:7681: yayā raśmyā te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ paripūrṇā avikalasarvendriyāḥ saṃtiṣṭhante sma - ṣaḍbhirvarṣasahasraiḥ sa tathāgata utpatsyata iti /
K09bsu016_u:7683: yayā te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ udārātiśayatayā vikurvanti sma - pañcabhirvarṣasahasraiḥ sa tathāgata utpatsyata iti /
K09bsu016_u:7685: yayā te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ sarvākārāṃ buddhakṣetrapariśuddhimadrākṣuḥ caturbhirvarṣasahasraiḥ sa tathāgata utpatsyata iti /
K09bsu016_u:7686: yattata eva mahābodhivṛkṣāt sarvatathāgataviṣayāsaṃbhedapradīpā nāma raśmirniścacāra,
K09bsu016_u:7687: yayā te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ tasya tathāgatasya sarvatrānugatavikurvitamavataranti sma - tribhirvarṣasahasraiḥ sa tathāgata utpatsyata iti /
K09bsu016_u:7689: yayā te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ tathāgatamabhimukhamadhimucyāpaśyan - dvābhyāṃ varṣasahasrābhyāṃ sa tathāgata utpasyata iti /
K09bsu016_u:7690: yattata eva mahābodhivṛkṣāt tryadhvajñānavidyutpradīpā nāma raśmirniścacāra satathāgatapūrvayoganirghoṣā nāma,
K09bsu016_u:7691: yayā te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ tasya tathāgatasya pūrvayogasamudrānavakalpayāmāsuravataranti
K09bsu016_u:7692: sma - varṣasahasreṇa sa tathāgata utpatsyata iti /
K09bsu016_u:7694: yayā te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ samantacakṣuṣkatāṃ pratyalabhanta sarvatathāgatavikurvitabuddhakṣetrasarvasattvadarśanatāyai - varṣaśatena sa tathāgata utpatsyata iti /
K09bsu016_u:7696: yayā te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ tathāgatotpādasaṃjñāṃ pratyalabhanta - saptāhena sa tathāgata utpatsyata iti /
K09bsu016_u:7698: yayā te sattvāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ buddhadarśanamahāprītivegasaṃjātā abhūvan /
K09bsu016_u:7699: iti hi kulaputra ebhirevaṃrūpairapramāṇaiḥ raśmiparipācananayairdaśavarṣasahasrāṇi sattvān paripācya saptame divase pūrṇe (Gv 210)
K09bsu016_u:7700: sarvaṃ taṃ lokadhātumapramāṇaiḥ saṃkampananayaiḥ saṃkampya ekāntapariśuddhāmadhyatiṣṭhat yāvaddaśasu dikṣu sarvatathāgatānāṃ buddhakṣetrapariśuddhiḥ
K09bsu016_u:7701: tāmapi sarvāṃ praticittakṣaṇaṃ tatra buddhakṣetranānāvidhācintyavyūhān saṃdarśayāmāsa /
K09bsu016_u:7702: atha paścime saptāhe ye tatra lokadhātau sattvā buddhadarśanaparipakvāḥ,
K09bsu016_u:7704: atha khalu tasmin lokadhātau sarvacakravālebhya sarvasumerubhyaḥ sarvaparvatebhyaḥ
K09bsu016_u:7716: teṣāṃ ca mahāratnarājapadmaparivārāṇāṃ mahāratnapadmānāṃ kesarakarṇikāsu daśabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāni mahāmaṇiratnagarbhāṇi siṃhāsanāni prādurabhūvan /
K09bsu016_u:7717: teṣu ca maṇiratnagarbheṣvāsaneṣu daśabuddhakṣetraśatasahasraparamāṇurajaḥsamā bodhisattvāḥ paryaṅkaniṣaṇṇāḥ prādurbabhūvuḥ //
K09bsu016_u:7718: samanantarābhisaṃbuddhasya tasya bhagavataḥ samantajñānaratnārciśrīguṇaketurājñaḥ tathāgatasya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim,
K09bsu016_u:7719: atha tāvadeva daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātutathāgatā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya yathāśayānāṃ sattvānāmabhimukhaṃ dharmacakraṃ pravartayāmāsuḥ
K09bsu016_u:7720: tena tato lokadhātoraprameyāḥ sattvāḥ sarvadurgativinipātebhyo vinivartitāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:7739: evaṃ tasya tathāgatasya acintyena buddhavṛṣabhitāvikurvitena dharmacakraṃ pravartayataḥ
K09bsu016_u:7740: praticittakṣaṇamanantāprameyāḥ sattvā dvitīyāyāṃ tṛtīyāyāṃ caturthyāṃ pañcabhyāṃ
K09bsu016_u:7745: evaṃ tasya tathāgatasya acintyena buddhavṛṣabhitāvikurvitena dharmacakraṃ pravartayataḥ praticittakṣaṇamanantamadhyasattvadhāturvinayamagamat
K09bsu016_u:7746: tasmiṃśca lokadhātau sarvasattvā yathāśayāstasya tathāgatasya nānātmabhāvopāyakauśalyapramuktāṃ dharmadeśanāmājānanti sma //
K09bsu016_u:7747: tasyāṃ khalu punā ratnakusumapradīpāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ rūpavarṇaviṣayaparibhogamadamattānāṃ
K09bsu016_u:7752: yā ca rājñaścakravartino vairocanaratnapadmagarbhaśrīcūḍasya svaśarīraniryātā prabhā,
K09bsu016_u:7758: sā ca sarvā na prajñāyate sma /
K09bsu016_u:7759: tadyathāpi nāma āditye udite vigate 'ndhakāre na candragrahanakṣatrajyotiṣāṃ nāgnerna maṇīnāṃ prabhā prajñāyate sma,
K09bsu016_u:7760: evameva samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya prabhayābhibhūtāḥ tatra jambudvīpe sarvaprabhā na prajñāyate sma /
K09bsu016_u:7761: tadyathāpi nāma jāmbūnadakanakabimbasya purato maṣivigraho na śobhate na bhāsate na tapati na virocate,
K09bsu016_u:7762: evameva samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya purataḥ teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ rūpakāyā na śobhante,
K09bsu016_u:7766: teṣāmetadabhavat - ko 'nvayaṃ bhaviṣyati devo vā brahmā vā,
K09bsu016_u:7769: na tapāmo na virocāmahe kāyena vā prabhayā vā śubhayā vā varṇena vā tejasā vā?
K09bsu016_u:7771: atha khalu samantabhadro bodhisattvaḥ tasyā ratnakusumapradīpāyā rājadhānyā madhye
K09bsu016_u:7773: taṃ vairocanaratnapadmagarbhaśrīcūḍaṃ rājānaṃ cakravartinametadavocat - yat khalu
K09bsu016_u:7774: mahārāja jānīyāḥ - tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka utpannaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:7777: bodhisattvasya rūpakāyaṃ dṛṣṭvā prabhāvikurvitamābharaṇanirghoṣaṃ ca śrutvā mahāprītiprāmodyavegajātā
K09bsu016_u:7778: tasyāṃ velāyāmevaṃ cittamutpādayāmāsa - yanme kiṃcidupacitakuśalamūlaṃ tenāhamīdṛśaṃ
K09bsu016_u:7784: yathā anenāndhakārāyāṃ rātrau sattvānāmavabhāsaṃ saṃjanayya buddhotpādaḥ saṃprakāśitaḥ,
K09bsu016_u:7788: atha khalu kulaputra vairocanaratnapadmagarbhaśrīcūḍaścakravartī sādha caturaṅgena balakāyena,
K09bsu016_u:7793: mahatā rājānubhāvena tasyā ratnakusumapradīpāyā rājadhānyā uccālya yojanamūrdhvaṃ
K09bsu016_u:7794: vihāyasyabhyudgamya sarvaṃ jambudvīpaṃ sarvāvatīṃ cāturdvīpikalokadhātuṃ mahāvabhāsena
K09bsu016_u:7833: śirasābhivandya taṃ bhagavantamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tasya bhagavataḥ
K09bsu016_u:7838: atha tānyābharaṇāni tasya bhagavataḥ upari mūrdhasaṃdhau mahāmaṇiratnābharaṇacchatraṃ
K09bsu016_u:7842: tasya madhye dharmadhātuprabhavasarvaratnamaṇiśākhāpralambaṃ nāma mahābodhivṛkṣamadrākṣīt anantamadhyavyūhanirdeśaṃ pradakṣiṇanānāvyūhasaṃdarśanam
K09bsu016_u:7855: tāsu ca lokadhātuṣvekaikasmin lokadhātau buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān lokadhātūnadrākṣīt /
K09bsu016_u:7876: dṛṣṭvā ca bhūyasyā mātrayā mahāprītiprasādavegān pratyalabhata //
K09bsu016_u:7879: tasyāstaṃ sūtrāntaṃ śrutvā daśa samādhimukhaśatasahasrāṇyavakrāntāni mṛdūni sukhasaṃsparśanāni /
K09bsu016_u:7880: tadyathāpi nāma taddivasāvakrāntasya garbhasya mātuḥ kukṣau vijñānam,
K09bsu016_u:7897: sā sūkṣmasamāhitacittā aniñjanacittā praharṣitacittā samāśvāsitacittā anābhāsacittā
K09bsu016_u:7901: abhinnacittā anunnatacittā anavanatacittā akhinnacittā anivartyacittā asaṃsīdanacittā
K09bsu016_u:7907: daśabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamaiḥ praṇidhānasamudraiḥ sarvatathāgatānāṃ pūrvapraṇidhānaṃ svabuddhakṣetrapariśuddhaye 'bhinirharati sma,
K09bsu016_u:7914: sa bhagavān samantajñānaratnārciśrīguṇaketurājastathāgataḥ pūrvakuśalamūlāni saṃcodayati udyotayati saṃdarśayati vivṛṇoti vibhajati saṃprakāśayati sārīkaroti avipraṇāśatāyai,
K09bsu016_u:7918: bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra atīte 'dhvani tataḥ pareṇa daśame kalpe maṇisūryacandravidyotitaprabhāyāṃ
K09bsu016_u:7924: sā tena kuśalamūlena avinipātadharmiṇī sadā devendrakuleṣu manuṣyendrakuleṣu copapannā,
K09bsu016_u:7925: sarvatra cābhirūpābhūt prāsādikā darśanīyā paramaśubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgatā /
K09bsu016_u:7927: tenaiva ca kalyāṇamitreṇa tasyāṃ tasyāṃ jātau paripācitā saṃcoditā smāritā /
K09bsu016_u:7928: etarhi ca punastayā samantabhadro bodhisattva ārāgito 'tyantāvirāgaṇatayā //
K09bsu016_u:7929: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena vairocanaratnapadmagarbhaśrīprabhācūḍo nāma rājacakravartī?
K09bsu016_u:7930: na khalu punaste kulaputra evaṃ draṣṭavyam /
K09bsu016_u:7931: maitreyaḥ sa bodhisattvaḥ tena kālena tena samayena vairocanaratnapadmagarbhaśrīprabhācūḍo nāma rājābhūccakravartī /
K09bsu016_u:7932: syātkhalu punaste kulaputra evam - anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena saṃpūrṇaśrīvakrā nāma rājabhāryābhūt?
K09bsu016_u:7936: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena samantajñānārciḥpadmabhadrābhirāmanetraśrīcandrā nāma rājaduhitā abhūt?
K09bsu016_u:7938: ahaṃ sā tena kālena tena samayena samantajñānārciḥpadmabhadrābhirāmanetraśrīcandrā nāma rājaduhitā abhūvam /
K09bsu016_u:7939: yanme dārikābhūtayā indradhvajaketostathāgatasya pravacane pralugnastathāgatavigrahaḥ padmodgataḥ pratisaṃskāritaḥ,
K09bsu016_u:7941: yadā cāsmi samantabhadreṇa bodhisattvena anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau samādāpitā,
K09bsu016_u:7942: sa me kulaputra prathamacittotpādo bodhāya abhūt /
K09bsu016_u:7943: yadā ca sa me bhagavān samantajñānārciḥśrīguṇaketurājaḥ tathāgata upasaṃkramya ābharaṇairavakīrṇaḥ,
K09bsu016_u:7944: tathāgatavikurvitaprātihāryaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā dharmaśca me tasya bhagavato 'ntikācchrutaḥ,
K09bsu016_u:7946: sarve ca te sumeruparamāṇurajaḥsamāstathāgatā ārāgitā abhirādhitāḥ, (Gv 216)
K09bsu016_u:7951: teṣu ca me tathāgateṣu tīvraṃ gauravaṃ pratilabdhaṃ yathārūpeṇa gauraveṇa ekacittakṣaṇe
K09bsu016_u:7952: tān sarvāṃstathāgatāṃstāni bodhisattvaparṣanmaṇḍalāni tāni ca sarvāṇi buddhakṣetrāṇi paśyāmi //
K09bsu016_u:7953: tasyāṃ ca vairocanaśriyāṃ lokadhātau saṃvṛttāyāṃ tatra ca virajomaṇḍale kalpe nirgate 'nantare maṇicakravicitrapratimaṇḍitavyūhā nāma lokadhāturmahāprabhaśca nāma kalpo 'bhūt /
K09bsu016_u:7956: tasmiṃśca khalu mahāprabhe kalpe mahākaruṇameghadhvajo nāma tathāgataḥ prāthamakalpiko 'bhūt /
K09bsu016_u:7960: tena ca me sarvabuddhotpādasaṃbhavo nāma sūtrāntaḥ saṃprakāśito daśabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamasūtrāntaparivāraḥ /
K09bsu016_u:7964: tena ca me tryadhvāvabhāsagarbho nāma sūtrāntaḥ saṃprakāśito jambudvīpaparamāṇurajaḥsamasūtrāntaparivāraḥ /
K09bsu016_u:7966: tasyānantaraṃ sarvadharmasamudrābhyudgatavegarājo nāma tathāgato loka udapādi /
K09bsu016_u:7968: tena ca me sarvadharmadhātutalajñānabhedo nāma sūtrāntaḥ saṃprakāśitaḥ pañcasūtrāntaśataparivāraḥ /
K09bsu016_u:7972: tena ca me prītisāgaravivardhanavego nāma sūtrāntaḥ saṃprakāśito daśasūtrāntakoṭīśatasahasraparivāraḥ /
K09bsu016_u:7975: sa ca me sāgaradevatābhūtayā ratnapadmameghavarṣairupasaṃkramya pūjitaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:7976: tena ca me dharmadhātusāgaranayaprabho nāma sūtrāntaḥ saṃprakāśito daśabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamasūtrāntaparivāraḥ /
K09bsu016_u:7980: sa me pañcābhijñaṛṣibhūtayā maharddhivikurvitena ṣaṣṭiṛṣisahasraparivṛtayā upasaṃkramaya gandhapuṣpaśikharameghānabhipravarṣantyā pūjitaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:7981: tena ca me anālayadharmapradīpo nāma sūtrāntaḥ saṃprakāśitaḥ ṣaṣṭisūtrāntasahasraparivāraḥ /
K09bsu016_u:7984: ahaṃ ca samatārthasaṃbhavā nāma pṛthivīdevatā abhuvam /
K09bsu016_u:7985: sā ahamaprameyapṛthivīdevatāparivārā sarvaratnadrumakośebhyo ratnapuṣpameghavarṣāṇyutsṛjamānā sarvaratnahārameghān pravarṣamāṇā upasaṃkrāntā tasya tathāgatasya pūjākarmaṇe /
K09bsu016_u:7986: tena ca me sarvatathāgatasaṃbhavajñānākaragarbho nāma sūtrāntaḥ saṃprakāśito 'prameyasūtrāntaparivāraḥ /
K09bsu016_u:7987: sa ca me śrutvā dhārito na vipraṇāśitaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:7988: teṣāṃ khalu kulaputra pañcānāṃ buddhaśatānāṃ sarvapaścimo dharmadhātugaganapūrṇaratnaśikharaśrīpradīpo nāma tathāgato loka udapādi /
K09bsu016_u:7989: ahaṃ ca tena kālena abhirāmaśrīvakrā nāma (Gv 217)
K09bsu016_u:7991: sā ahaṃ tasya tathāgatasya nagarapraveśasamaye nāṭake pravṛtte buddhānubhāvena ūrdhvaṃ gaganatale sthitvā gāthāsahasreṇa taṃ tathāgatamabhiṣṭuvantī upasaṃkrāntā /
K09bsu016_u:7992: tena ca me dharmadhātuvidyotitavyūhaṃ nāma raśmimūrṇakośādutsṛjya sarvakāyo 'vabhāsitaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:7993: tayā ca me raśmyā samanantaraspṛṣṭayā dharmadhātunayāvartagarbho nāma vimokṣaḥ pratilabdhaḥ //
K09bsu016_u:7994: iti hi kulaputra etān pramukhān kṛtvā yāni tatra maṇicakravicitrapratimaṇḍitavyūhāyāṃ lokadhātau mahāprabhe kalpe pañca buddhaśatānyutpannāni,
K09bsu016_u:7996: pūjā ca me teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ kṛtā /
K09bsu016_u:8000: ekaikasya ca me tathāgatasyāntikamupasaṃkrāmantyā aparimāṇānāṃ sattvānāmarthaḥ kṛto buddhadharmasaṃvarṇanatayā /
K09bsu016_u:8001: ekaikasya ca me tathāgatasya antikāt tryadhvajñānagarbhadharmadhātuvipulo nāma dharmadhātuśarīrasāgaraḥ
K09bsu016_u:8004: sarveṣāṃ ca me teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ sahadarśanāt sarvajñatāvidyudavabhāsā āśaye 'vakrāntā apratilabdhapūrvā adṛṣṭapūrvāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:8008: atha khalu samantasattvatrāṇojaḥśrī rātridevatā tasyāṃ velāyāṃ tameva sarvalokābhimukhajagadvinayanidarśanaṃ
K09bsu016_u:8009: bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā pradarśayamānā buddhādhiṣṭhānena sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ
K09bsu016_u:8011: śṛṇu sūdhanā vacanametu mamā gambhīra durdṛśa durāvagaham /
K09bsu016_u:8013: yatha saṃbhuta prathama cittu mamā bodhāya buddhaguṇaprārthanayā /
K09bsu016_u:8014: yatha bodhivimokṣu ayu labdhu maṃyā etaṃ śṛṇohi pravibhāganayam // 31 //
K09bsu016_u:8017: kalpo abhū virajamaṇḍalu yo acchinnu yatra jinavaṃśu abhūt /
K09bsu016_u:8020: dharmadhvajaḥ śirisumeru jino guṇakeśarīśvaru caturtha jinaḥ // 34 //
K09bsu016_u:8022: jinabhāskaraḥ śaśimukho bhagavānete daśa prathama atra naye // 35 //
K09bsu016_u:8026: padmodgato navamu kāruṇiko jinu dharmadhātukusumo daśamaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:8027: buddhosamudra paridīpayato eṣā daśā dvitiya atra naye // 37 //
