K09bsu016_u:8030: vikrāntadevagati nāma jino tatha dharmadhātupadumo daśamaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:8031: evaṃ nayaṃ vipula darśayato tṛtiyā daśā bhavati atra naye // 39 //
K09bsu016_u:8037: varalakṣaṇaḥ śiri babhūva jino bratamaṇḍalaśca svaśarīraprabhaḥ // 42 //
K09bsu016_u:8039: aparājitavratadhvajo bhagavān drumaparvato daśamu teṣa jinaḥ // 43 //
K09bsu016_u:8049: abhyudgatābhu abhu tatra jinastadanantaraṃ samaśarīru jinaḥ // 48 //
K09bsu016_u:8065: ete jinā pramukha tatra abhūdupapadyi ye jina pradīpakarāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:8068: te sarvi pūjita mayā sugatā etaṃ vimokṣanayamotariyā // 57 //
K09bsu016_u:8069: kalpānananta ahu cīrṇa purā etaṃ vimokṣanayu bhāvayatī /
K09bsu016_u:8070: tvamapi śruṇitva pratipadya laghu pratilapsyase nayamimaṃ nacirāt // 58 //
K09bsu016_u:8078: tāmupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:8080: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ samantasattvatrāṇojaḥśriyo rātridevatāyāḥ pādau
K09bsu016_u:8082: punaḥ punaravalokyaṃ samantasattvatrāṇojaḥśriyo rātridevatāyā antikāt prakrāntaḥ // 35 //
K09bsu016_u:8085: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ samantasattvatrāṇojaḥśriyo rātridevatāyāstaṃ sarvalokābhimukhajagadvinayanidarśanaṃ
K09bsu016_u:8087: spharan prasaran vaśīkurvan avabhāsayamānaḥ samavasaran yena praśāntarutasāgaravatī
K09bsu016_u:8088: rātridevatā tenopasaṃkramya praśāntarutasāgaravatyā rātridevatāyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya
K09bsu016_u:8090: rātridevatāyāḥ purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - ahamārye devate anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:8092: bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ pratipadyamāno bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ pratiṣṭhitaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ niryātumicchāmi /
K09bsu016_u:8093: tadvadasva me ārye devate kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:8095: atha khalu praśāntarutasāgaravatī rātridevatā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
K09bsu016_u:8148: janapadapradeśagatānāṃ sattvānāṃ śrāvakapratyekabodhimārgasamatikramāya tathāgatabhūmipratiṣṭhāpanatāyai dharmaṃ deśayāmi /
K09bsu016_u:8164: evamahaṃ kulaputra sarvasattvān dharmadānena saṃgṛhya sarvaduḥkhadurgatipathebhyo
K09bsu016_u:8166: sarvajñatāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayamānā vividhairupāyamukhaiḥ paripācayamānā mahāprītivegasamudrāvabhāsapratilabdhā modāmi,

K09bsu016_u:8185: punaraparaṃ kulaputra bhagavato vairocanasya kāyādekaikasmādromavivarādanantamadhyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān mahāraśmisamudrān niścaramāṇān,

K09bsu016_u:8218: punaraparaṃ kulaputra bhagavato vairocanasya kāyaṃ vyavalokayamānā praticittakṣaṇamekaikasmādromavivarādanabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamānasurendrakāyameghānniścaramāṇān

K09bsu016_u:8221: punaraparaṃ kulaputra bhagavato vairocanasya kāyaṃ vyavalokayamānā praticittakṣaṇamekaikasmādromavivarādanabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān

K09bsu016_u:8225: punaraparaṃ kulaputra bhagavato vairocanasya kāyaṃ vyavalokayamānā praticittakṣaṇamekaikasmādromakūpādanabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān
K09bsu016_u:8227: sattvānāṃ dharmadhātugatānāṃ sattvānāmabhimukhaṃ sthitvā dharmaṃ deśayamānān dṛṣṭvā

K09bsu016_u:8235: sarvadharmadhātugatānāṃ sattvānāmabhimukhaṃ sthitvā dharmāṃ deśayamānān dṛṣṭvā udārān
K09bsu016_u:8237: punaraparaṃ kulaputra bhagavato vairocanasya kāyaṃ vyavalokayamānā praticittakṣaṇamekaikasmādromavivarādanabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān
K09bsu016_u:8240: deśayamānān dṛṣṭvā udārān dharmadhātuvipulāṃścittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe sarvajñatāsahagatān
K09bsu016_u:8252: api tu anantamadhyaḥ khalveṣa vimokṣo dharmadhātunayasamudrāvatāraṇatvāt /
K09bsu016_u:8282: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ praśāntarutasāgaravatīṃ rātridevatāmetadavocat - kathaṃ pratipadyamānasya devate bodhisattvasya ayamevaṃrūpo vimokṣaḥ saṃpadyate?
K09bsu016_u:8283: āha - daśeme kulaputra bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsaṃbhārā mahāvitānadharmā mahāvisphārā mahādyutayo mahāvabhāsā mahāprabhāvabhāsā mahābhāgā mahāvibhāgā mahāsaṃbhavā mahāvibhavāḥ,
K09bsu016_u:8297: ime kulaputra daśa bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsaṃbhārāṃ mahāvitānadharmāḥ,
K09bsu016_u:8299: viśudhyati saṃbhavati saṃvardhate samudeti prādurbhavati saṃvartate sārībhavati vipulībhavati pariniṣpadyate saṃtiṣṭhate //
K09bsu016_u:8300: sudhana āha - kiyacciraṃ saṃprasthitāsi devate anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
K09bsu016_u:8301: sā avocat - asti kulaputra asya kusumatalagarbhavyūhālaṃkārasya lokadhātusamudrasya
K09bsu016_u:8305: tasya madhye kanakavimalaprabhāvyūho nāma lokadhātuḥ sarvaratnameghavicitra adholokadhātau
K09bsu016_u:8311: ahaṃ ca tena kālena tena samayena tasmin bodhivṛkṣe puṇyapradīpasaṃpatketuprabhā nāma bodhimaṇḍadevatā abhūvam /
K09bsu016_u:8312: tayā me tasya tathāgatasya abhisaṃbodhivikurvitaṃ dṛṣṭvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
K09bsu016_u:8313: tasya ca me tathāgatasya sahadarśanena tathāgataguṇasamudrāvabhāso nāma samādhiḥ pratilabdhaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:8314: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva lokadhātau samantasaṃpūrṇaśrīgarbhāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ tatraiva bodhimaṇḍe dharmadrumaparvatatejo nāma tathāgato 'bhisaṃbuddhaḥ
K09bsu016_u:8315: ahaṃ ca tataścyutvā tatraiva bodhimaṇḍe jñānaśrīpuṇyaprabhā nāma rātridevatā abhūvam /
K09bsu016_u:8316: tayā me tasya bhagavato dharmadrumaparvatatejastathāgatasya dharmacakrapravartanavikurvitaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvajagatsaṃdarśanasamatāvabhāsaviṣayo nāma samādhiḥ pratilabdhaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:8317: tasyānantaraṃ tatraiva bodhimaṇḍe sarvadharmasāgaranirghoṣarājo nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:8318: tasya me sahadarśanena sarvadharmabhūmisaṃvardhanasthāno nāma samādhiḥ pratilabdhaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:8319: tasyānantaraṃ tatraiva bodhimaṇḍe ratnaraśmipradīpadhvajarājo nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ,
K09bsu016_u:8320: tasya me sahadarśanena samantavṛkṣaprabhamegho nāma samādhiḥ pratilabdhaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:8321: tasyānantaraṃ tatraiva bodhimaṇḍe guṇasumeruprabhatejo nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:8322: tasya me sahadarśanena buddhasamudrāvabhāso nāma samādhiḥ pratilabdhaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:8323: tasyānantaraṃ tatraiva bodhimaṇḍe dharmameghanirghoṣarājo nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:8324: tasya me sahadarśanena dharmasāgarapradīpo nāma samādhiḥ pratilabdhaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:8325: tasyānantaraṃ tatraiva bodhimaṇḍe jñānolkāvabhāsarājo nāma tathāgata ārāgito devakanyābhūtayā /
K09bsu016_u:8326: tasya me sahadarśanena sarvasattvaduḥkhapraśamanapratibhāsapradīpo nāma samādhiḥ pratilabdhaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:8329: tasya me sahadarśanena tryadhvatathāgatasaṃprasthānāvabhāsagarbho nāma samādhiḥ pratilabdhaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:8330: tasyānantaraṃ tatraiva bodhimaṇḍe dharmapradīpavikramajñānasiṃho nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:8333: tasyānantaraṃ tatraiva bodhimaṇḍe jñānabalaparvatatejo nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:8334: tasya me sahadarśanena tryadhvasarvasattvacaryendriyaprabhāso nāma samādhiḥ pratilabdhaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:8335: iti hi kulaputra tasmin samaye mayā kanakavimalaprabhe lokadhātau tasmin samantāvabhāsadhvajakalpe daśabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāḥ tathāgatā ārāgitāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:8340: sarve ca me tathāgatāḥ pūjitā yathāsaṃprāptaiḥ pūjāpariṣkāraiḥ /
K09bsu016_u:8342: sarveṣāṃ ca me teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ dharmadeśanā śrutā //
K09bsu016_u:8343: sā ahaṃ tataścyutvā tasminneva lokadhātau buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān kalpān bodhisattvacaryāṃ
K09bsu016_u:8344: caritvā tataścyutvā iha kusumatalagarbhavyūhālaṃkāre lokadhātusamudre asmin sahālokadhātāvupapannā /
K09bsu016_u:8346: tasya ca me sahadarśanena sarvāndhakāravirajapratibhāso nāma samādhiḥ pratilabdhaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:8348: tasya ca me sahadarśanena sarvakṣetrasāgarāvabhāsānugataspharaṇo nāma samādhiḥ pratilabdhaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:8350: tasya ca me sahadarśanena sarvasattvamantrasamudranigarjanasvaranirghoṣo nāma samādhiḥ pratilabdhaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:8352: tadbodhimaṇḍe tathāgatābhisaṃbodhivikurvitamukhasamudrān praticittakṣaṇe saṃdarśayamānān dṛṣṭvā mayā eṣa vipulaprītivegasaṃbhavacittakṣaṇavyūho bodhisattvavimokṣaḥ pratilabdhaḥ,
K09bsu016_u:8355: teṣu ca sarvadharmadhātunayasamudrāntargateṣu sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu yāni sarvaparamāṇurajāṃsi,
K09bsu016_u:8357: teṣu ca sarvakṣetreṣvekaikasmin buddhakṣetre bhagavantaṃ vairocanaṃ bodhimaṇḍavaragataṃ
K09bsu016_u:8360: teṣāṃ ca sarvatathāgatānāmekaikasya ca tathāgatasya pādamūlagatamātmānaṃ saṃjāne /
K09bsu016_u:8361: ye ca teṣu lokadhātuṣu te tathāgatā bodhimaṇḍagatā dharmaṃ deśayanti,
K09bsu016_u:8363: ye ca teṣāṃ sarvatathāgatānāṃ nirmāṇasamudrāḥ sarvaromavivarebhyo niścarya dharmameghasamudrān nigarjamānān nānāvikurvitāni saṃdarśayamānān (Gv 228)
K09bsu016_u:8369: sarvārthapadavyañjanodgrahavegavikramayā dhāraṇyā udgṛhṇāmi sarvadharmamaṇḍalaviśuddhigarbhānugamayā prajñayā pariśodhayāmi /
K09bsu016_u:8418: (Gv 229) teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānāṃ praticittakṣaṇaṃ prathamacittotpādamādāya yāvatsaddharmāntardhānaṃ sarvamavatarāmi //
K09bsu016_u:8419: yatpunarevaṃ vadasi - kiyaccirapratilabdhastvayāyaṃ vipulaprītivegasaṃbhavacittakṣaṇavyūho bodhisattvavimokṣa iti /
K09bsu016_u:8420: yanmayā vibuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ buddhakalpānāṃ pareṇa kanakavimalaprabhāyāṃ lokadhātau puṇyapradīpasaṃpatsamantaketuprabhā bodhivṛkṣadevatā
K09bsu016_u:8421: tayā avaivartyadharmadhātunirghoṣasya tathāgatasya dharmadeśanāṃ śrutvā anuttarāyāṃ
K09bsu016_u:8422: samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya tān vibuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān kalpān bodhisattvacaryāṃ
K09bsu016_u:8423: caritvā iha sahāyāṃ lokadhātāvupapadya krakucchandapramukhāḥ śākyamuniparyavasānā
K09bsu016_u:8429: adyāpi hi kulaputra sā kanakavimalaprabhā lokadhātustiṣṭhati acchinnabuddhavaṃśaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:8430: tasmāttarhi kulaputra iha naye mahatā bodhisattvavikrameṇa prayoktavyam //
K09bsu016_u:8431: atha khalu praśāntarutasāgaravatī rātridevatā tasyāṃ velāyāmetameva vipulaprītivegasaṃbhavacittakṣaṇavyūhaṃ
K09bsu016_u:8432: bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā pradarśayamānā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata -
K09bsu016_u:8433: śṛṇu sūdhanā vacanametu mamā yathayaṃ vimokṣa pratilabdhu śubham /
K09bsu016_u:8434: śrutvā ca prītibalu saṃjaniyā etaṃ vimokṣanayamotarahi // 1 //
K09bsu016_u:8435: bahu kalpasāgara purā caritā cittāśayaṃ svaku viśodhayati /
K09bsu016_u:8437: śrutvā triyadhvaparamā sugatānadhimukti teṣu vipulāṃ janiya /
K09bsu016_u:8438: sarvaiḥ sukhaiḥ saparivāra mayā te upasthitāḥ sabahukalpaśatān // 3 //
K09bsu016_u:8439: dṛṣṭvā mayā purimakāḥ sugatāḥ saṃpūjitā janahitāya caran /
K09bsu016_u:8440: dharmaśca me nirupamo 'yu śrutaḥ prītibalaṃ vipulaṃ saṃjaniyā // 4 //
K09bsu016_u:8442: mātā pitā gurujanaḥ satataṃ maya satkṛtā hitasukhena tadā /
K09bsu016_u:8444: jīrṇāturā dhanavihīna narā vikalendriyā dukhi anātha bahū /
K09bsu016_u:8445: te me sukhe sthapiya maitramanā sudhanā sanātha kṛta jātiśatān // 6 //
K09bsu016_u:8448: kleśapratāpita sadā tribhave karmaiḥ prabhāvita tathā aśubhaiḥ /
K09bsu016_u:8451: jātījarāmaraṇarogabhayā loke mayā śamita te nikhilā // 9 //
K09bsu016_u:8459: iyamihaiva bodhimaṇḍe bhagavato vairocanasya parṣanmaṇḍale sarvanagararakṣāsaṃbhavatejaḥśrīrnāma rātridevatā /
K09bsu016_u:8460: tāmupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:8463: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ praśāntarutasāgaravatīṃ rātridevatāmābhiḥ sārūpyābhirgāthābhiradhyabhāṣata -
K09bsu016_u:8465: paśyāmi te āsanu saṃniṣaṇṇā anantamadhyena samucchrayeṇa // 11 //
K09bsu016_u:8467: na hīnasattvairviparītadarśibhiḥ śakyastava jñātumayaṃ hi gocaraḥ // 12 //
K09bsu016_u:8468: jñātuṃ na lokena sahadevakena tvadvarṇarūpasya nimitta śakyam /
K09bsu016_u:8469: kalpānanantān samudīkṣatāpi tathā hi te rūpamanantadarśanam // 13 //
K09bsu016_u:8470: skandhālayāduccalitāsi devi pratiṣṭhitā nāyataneṣu ca tvam /
K09bsu016_u:8471: lokavyatītā ca vitīrṇakāṅkṣā saṃdṛśyase loki vikurvamāṇā // 14 //
K09bsu016_u:8474: kāyo hi te dharmaśarīragarbhaḥ cittaṃ ca te jñānamayaṃ asaṅgam /
K09bsu016_u:8476: cittādanantaṃ samudeti karma vicitritaḥ karmaṇa sarvalokaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:8477: cittasvabhāvaṃ ca jagadviditvā jagatsamān darśayasi svakāyān // 17 //
K09bsu016_u:8479: svapnopamaṃ lokamimaṃ viditvā buddhāṃśca sarvān pratibhāsakalpān /
K09bsu016_u:8481: tryadhvasthitasyāpi janasya devi pratikṣaṇaṃ darśayasi svakāyam /
K09bsu016_u:8482: dvayapravṛttirna ca te 'sti citte dharmaṃ vadasyeva ca sarvadikṣu // 19 //
K09bsu016_u:8485: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ praśāntarutasāgaravatīṃ rātridevatāmābhirgāthābhirabhiṣṭutya
K09bsu016_u:8490: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakastaṃ vipulaprītivegasaṃbhavacittakṣaṇavyūhaṃ bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ
K09bsu016_u:8504: kāyena sarvasattvābhimukhena kāyena sarvajagadanuliptena kāyena sarvajagatsamaśarīreṇa
K09bsu016_u:8505: kāyena sarvajagadabhyudgatena kāyena sarvajagatparipākavinayākūlena kāyena samantadiṅnigarjanena
K09bsu016_u:8506: kāyena sarvajagadasaṃkrāntena kāyena sarvāvaraṇātyantasamuddhāṭitena kāyena tathāgatasvabhāvena
K09bsu016_u:8508: dṛṣṭvā ca tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ sarvanagararakṣāsaṃbhavatejaḥśriyo
K09bsu016_u:8511: sthitvā evamāha - ahaṃ khalu devate anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:8512: tadvadasva me devate kathaṃ bodhisattvo bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ carannupakārībhūto bhavati sattvānām /
K09bsu016_u:8516: evamukte sarvanagararakṣāsaṃbhavatejaḥśrī rātridevatā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
K09bsu016_u:8522: sā khalu punarahaṃ kulaputra anena vimokṣeṇa samanvāgatā asaṅgamahādharmabhāṇakapaṭṭabaddhādhyālambanaprayogā
K09bsu016_u:8535: sā khalu punarahaṃ kulaputra evaṃrūpaṃ sarvasattvavijñāpanaṃ dharmālokamukhaṃ pariśodhayamānā
K09bsu016_u:8549: ebhirahaṃ kulaputra daśabhirākāraiḥ sarvadharmadhātuṃ vyavalokayāmi anugacchāmi prasarāmi sarvakuśalamūlasaṃbhāropacayāya buddhamāhātmyāvataraṇatāyai acintyabuddhaviṣayānugamāya //
K09bsu016_u:8550: punaraparaṃ kulaputra ahamevaṃ tathāgatamāhātmyānugatairmanasikārairdaśabhirdhāraṇīmaṇḍalaparivartasahasraiḥ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayāmi /
K09bsu016_u:8562: etāni ca kulaputra daśa dhāraṇīmaṇḍalāni pramukhaṃ kṛtvā daśabhirdhāraṇīmaṇḍalaparivartasahasraiḥ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayāmi //
K09bsu016_u:8563: punaraparaṃ kulaputra śrutamayyā prajñayā sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayāmi,
K09bsu016_u:8564: cintāmayyā bhāvanāmayyā prajñayā sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayāmi /
K09bsu016_u:8584: etatpramukhairahaṃ kulaputra anabhilāpyairdeśanānayābhinirhāraiḥ sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayāmi /
K09bsu016_u:8589: ekaikena ca vimokṣaviṣayabhāvanānayena praticittakṣaṇaṃ sarvadharmadhātuṃ spharāmi //
K09bsu016_u:8590: sudhana āha - āścaryaṃ devate yāvadgambhīra eṣa bodhisattvavimokṣaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:8598: tasyāṃ khalu kulaputra lokadhātau vimalaprabho nāma kalpo 'bhūt sumeruparamāṇurajaḥsamatathāgataprabhavaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:8599: tasyāṃ ca dharmārcinagarameghāyāṃ lokadhātau madhyamā vicitradhvajā nāma cāturdvīpikābhūt /
K09bsu016_u:8601: tasyā rājadhānyā nātidūre dharmarājabhavanapratibhāso nāma bodhimaṇḍo 'bhūt /
K09bsu016_u:8602: tatra bodhimaṇḍe sarvadharmasāgaranirghoṣaprabharājo nāma tathāgata udapādi teṣāṃ sumeruparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ prathamakalpikaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:8603: tena ca samayena vimalavakrabhānuprabho nāma rājā abhūt cakravartī /
K09bsu016_u:8604: tena tasya bhagavataḥ sarvadharmasāgaranirghoṣaprabharājñastathāgatasyāntikāt sarvadharmasāgaro nāma sūtrānta udgṛhītaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:8607: (Gv 236) śāsanāntardhānakāle ca sahasradhā bhinne śāsane daśanayaśatabhinnāyāṃ dharmadeśanāyāmanantarakalpakaṣāye
K09bsu016_u:8611: utkāsaḥ kṛto 'bhūt - aho bateyamanekakalpasamudānītā mahādharmolkā antardhāsyatīti
K09bsu016_u:8613: sa ūrdhvaṃ gaganatale saptatālamātramabhyudgamya anantavarṇānarcimeghānniścārya nānāvarṇān
K09bsu016_u:8614: mahāraśmijālavyūhān kāyādutsṛjya anekavarṇayā prabhayā loke kleśatāpaṃ śamayitvā
K09bsu016_u:8617: tena ca samayena dharmacakranirmāṇaprabhā nāma bhikṣuṇyabhūt tasyaiva vimalacakrabhānuprabhasya cakravartino duhitā bhikṣuṇīśatasahasraparivārā
K09bsu016_u:8618: sā taṃ saṃvegaśabdaṃ śrutvā tacca mahāprātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā saparivārā bodhāya cittamutpādayāmāsa /
K09bsu016_u:8621: sarvatathāgatadharmacakranirmāṇaprabhaṃ ca nāma dhāraṇī sarvadharmasāgaranayapraveśāṃ ca nāma prajñāpāramitāṃ pratyalabhata /
K09bsu016_u:8622: dharmacakranirmāṇaprabhā ca bhikṣuṇī sarvatathāgataśāsanasaṃbhavāvabhāsapradīpaṃ ca nāma samādhim,
K09bsu016_u:8623: etaṃ ca manojñarutagambhīravikurvitapraveśaṃ ca bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ sūkṣmamṛdukaṃ pratyalabhata,
K09bsu016_u:8625: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena vimalavaktrabhānuprabho
K09bsu016_u:8630: na khalu punaste kulaputra evaṃ draṣṭavyam /
K09bsu016_u:8631: samantabhadro bodhisattvaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena vimalavaktrabhānuprabho nāma rājā abhūccakravartī /
K09bsu016_u:8632: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena vimalavaktrabhānuprabhasya
K09bsu016_u:8635: ahaṃ sā tena kālena tena samayena dharmacakranirmāṇaprabhā nāma bhikṣuṇyabhūvam?
K09bsu016_u:8639: sarvatathāgatadharmacakravajraprabhāyāṃ dhāraṇyāṃ sarvadharmasāgaranayapraveśāyāṃ ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpitam //
K09bsu016_u:8640: tasya ca mayā tathāgatasyānantaraṃ vimaladharmaparvatajñānaśikharābho nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:8744: iti hi kulaputra etadbuddhaśataṃ pramukhaṃ kṛtvā tasmin vimalābhe kalpe sumeruparamāṇurajaḥsamāstathāgatā utpannā abhūvan /
K09bsu016_u:8745: teṣāṃ punaḥ kulaputra sumeruparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ sarvapaścimo dharmadhātunagarābhajñānapradīparājo nāma tathāgato 'bhūt /
K09bsu016_u:8746: te khalu mayā kulaputra sumeruparamāṇurajaḥsamāstathāgatāḥ sarvadharmasāgaranirghoṣaprabharājapūrvaṃgamā dharmadhātunagarābhajñānapradīparājapaścimāḥ sarve pūjitāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:8749: sarveṣāṃ ca teṣāmahaṃ tathāgatānāṃ śāsane pravrajitā /
K09bsu016_u:8750: sarveṣāṃ ca me teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ śāsanaṃ saṃdhāritam /
K09bsu016_u:8751: sarveṣāṃ ca mayā teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmantikādeṣa manojñarutagambhīravikurvitapraveśo bodhisattvavimokṣo vividhaiḥ pratilābhanayaiḥ pratilabdhaḥ
K09bsu016_u:8752: sarveṣāṃ ca mayā teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmantikādanantamadhyāḥ sattvasāgarāḥ paripācitāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:8754: sarve te mayā tathāgatāḥ dharmapratipattyā pūjitāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:8755: sā khalu punarahaṃ kulaputra tata upādāya saṃsārarātrigateṣu sattveṣu ajñānanidrāprasupteṣu jāgarmi,
K09bsu016_u:8758: etamahaṃ kulaputra manojñarutagambhīravikurvitapraveśaṃ bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ lokasaṃbhinnapralāpavinivartanamadvayabhaṇitāviniyojanaṃ satyapratiṣṭhāpanaparyavasānaṃ jānāmi /
K09bsu016_u:8765: anuttaro bodhisattvakarmasamārambhaprayogo vā bodhisattvasūkṣmajñānānugamo vā bodhisattvadharmanidhānakośavibhaktavṛṣabhitā bodhisattvakarmasāṃkathyasiṃhāsanākramaṇaṃ vā jñātum /
K09bsu016_u:8769: iyamihaiva bhagavato vairocanasya pādamūle sarvavṛkṣapraphullanasukhasaṃvāsā nāma rātridevatā saṃnipatitā,
K09bsu016_u:8771: tāmupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvāḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣante,
K09bsu016_u:8772: kathaṃ ca pratipadyamānāḥ sarvasattvān sarvajñatāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayanti //
K09bsu016_u:8774: atha khalu sarvanagararakṣāsaṃbhavatejaḥśrī rātridevatā tasyāṃ velāyāmetameva manojñarutagambhīravikurvitapraveśaṃ
K09bsu016_u:8775: bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśayamānā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata -
K09bsu016_u:8779: saṃvardhanāmapi samanta asaṅgavegam avagāha maitriṣu triyadhvanayaṣpatheṣu // 2 //
K09bsu016_u:8780: iti buddhakṣetraparivartarajaḥsamānāṃ kalpānamādigatamāsa purā hi kṣetram /
K09bsu016_u:8781: dharmārcimeghanagaraḥ śirilokadhātu kalpo babhūva vimalābha mahāprabhaśca // 3 //
K09bsu016_u:8782: tatraiva kalpi jinavaṃśi anūpachinne buddhāḥ sumeruparamāṇusamā upannāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:8783: dharmasamudraprabhagarjitarāja buddhaḥ purvaṃgamaḥ prathamakalpika āsi teṣām // 4 //
K09bsu016_u:8784: jinu dharmameghanagarābhapradīparājo yaḥ sarvapaścimu abhūtsugatāna teṣām /
K09bsu016_u:8785: te sarvi pūjita mayā upasaṃkramitvā dharmaśca teṣa mi śruto janayitva prītim // 5 //
K09bsu016_u:8786: dṛṣṭo mayā prathamu kāñcanavarṇaraśmiḥ dharmaḥ samudraprabhagarjitaghoṣarājaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:8787: dvātriṃśallakṣaṇavicitritu merukalpo dṛṣṭvā ca me matirabhūtsugato bhaveyam // 6 //
K09bsu016_u:8788: sahadarśanena mama tasya tathāgatasya prādurbabhūva balavajjinacittamādyam /
K09bsu016_u:8790: yena triyadhvagata sarvi sphuṭāḥ samantāt buddhāśca tatsutasamudravṛtā aśeṣāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:8792: kṣetrārṇavā api samudra sarve āsan kṛpāmṛtamahodadhi saṃbhaveta // 8 //
K09bsu016_u:8793: kāyena sarvi spharaṇārthamaśeṣa kṣetrā kāyaṃ yathāśayajagadvinidarśanāya /
K09bsu016_u:8794: kṣetrāṇyaśeṣamavabhāsanakampanāya pākāya caiva jagatāṃ janitaṃ mano me // 9 //
K09bsu016_u:8795: dvitīye yajjinasya upasaṃkramaṇe 'pi dṛṣṭāḥ kṣetrārṇaveṣu daśasu sthita ye jinendrāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:8796: kṣetrāḥ samudraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu kṣetrārṇaveṣu jina paścimake mi dṛṣṭāḥ // 10 //
K09bsu016_u:8797: sarvāntakṣetraparivartarajaḥsameṣu kalpeṣu ye jina upanna jagatpradīpāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:8798: te sarvi pūjita mayā upasaṃkramitvā evaṃ vimokṣanayasāgaru śodhayeyam // 11 //
K09bsu016_u:8799: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako manojñarutagambhīravikurvitapraveśaṃ bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ
K09bsu016_u:8803: prajñā hi te vipula dharmasamudracārī cīrṇā ca me bhavasamudra anantamadhyān /
K09bsu016_u:8804: dīrghāyu nirjvara sujñānaśarīragarbhe tvaṃ devi rocasi imāṃ pariṣāmupetya // 12 //
K09bsu016_u:8806: ārambaṇāni tulayasyapi cāvikalpā cittakṣaṇena api tāni acintiyāni // 13 //
K09bsu016_u:8808: buddhyā vimokṣa sugabhīra vigāhamānā sarvān vinesi paripācayase 'prameyān // 14 //
K09bsu016_u:8813: tvaṃ dharmadhātugata sarvi spharitva sattvān dharmaṃ prakāśya bhaya sarvi śamesi loke // 16 //
K09bsu016_u:8815: sarvatra jinabalaṃ pratipadyamānā saṃpaśyase jinavikurvita sarvakṣetraiḥ // 17 //
K09bsu016_u:8816: cittaṃ durāsadu tavā gaganaprakāśaṃ sarve kileśamali nirmalamādiśuddham /
K09bsu016_u:8817: yasmin samosari triyadhvaga sarvakṣetrā buddhāśca sātmajagaṇāḥ saha sarvasattvaiḥ // 18 //
K09bsu016_u:8819: kalpārṇavānapi sanāmasamudrasaṃkhyān saṃjñodadhīn jagatāṃ vidarśayasi kṣaṇena // 19 //
K09bsu016_u:8820: diśatāsu yāvata tu sattvacyutopapādā ye rūpiṇāmapi ca saṃjñiasaṃjñināṃ ca /
K09bsu016_u:8821: vyavahārasatyanaya otaramāṇā teṣāṃ mārgaṃ vidarśya varabodhipathe praṇesi // 20 //
K09bsu016_u:8823: tvaṃ dharmakāyapariśuddha asaṅgacittā rūpaṃ vidarśayami loki yathāśayānām // 21 //
K09bsu016_u:8824: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ sarvanagararakṣāsaṃbhavatejaḥśriyaṃ rātridevatāmābhiḥ
K09bsu016_u:8831: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako manojñarutagambhīravikurvitapraveśaṃ bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ
K09bsu016_u:8832: bhūyasyā mātrayā prabhāvayamānaḥ saṃbhāvayamāno vipulīkurvan yena sarvavṛkṣapraphullanasukhasaṃvāsā
K09bsu016_u:8834: so 'paśyat sarvavṛkṣapraphullanasukhasaṃvāsāṃ rātridevatāṃ ratnadrumāṅkuragarbhe siṃhāsane sarvagandharatnadrumaśākhe kūṭāgāre saṃniṣaṇṇāṃ daśarātridevatāsahasraparivārām
K09bsu016_u:8835: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ sarvavṛkṣapraphullanasukhasaṃvāsāyā rātridevatāyāḥ
K09bsu016_u:8836: pādau śirasābhivandya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā ārye devate anuttarāyāṃ
K09bsu016_u:8838: na ca jānāmi - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ caritavyam,
K09bsu016_u:8843: kathaṃ caritvā kathaṃ śikṣitvā niryānti sarvajñatāyām //
K09bsu016_u:8845: - mama kulaputra anubhāvena sahe lokadhātau ādityāstaṃgamanakāle padmāni praphullāni sugandhībhavanti /
K09bsu016_u:8847: pathotpathagatāḥ sattvā rātristhāne cetanābahulāḥ sarvajagatpālanābhimukhā bhavanti /
K09bsu016_u:8854: api tu khalu punarahaṃ kulaputra naranārīgaṇānāṃ daharāṇāṃ taruṇānāṃ yauvanamadamattānāṃ
K09bsu016_u:8866: āvaraṇavaśagatān sattvān karmakleśaprapīḍitān puṇyajñānabalaparihīṇān bodhisattvabalapāramitāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayāmi /
K09bsu016_u:8868: api tu khalu punarahaṃ kulaputra vipulaprītisaṃbhavasaṃtuṣṭyavabhāsasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya lābhinī /
K09bsu016_u:8869: sudhana āha - ka etasya devate vipulaprītisaṃbhavatuṣṭyavabhāsasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya (Gv 244)
K09bsu016_u:8876: tathāgatagotraśuklakarmamaṇḍalaprabhayā hi kulaputra sattvānāṃ sukhāni saṃbhavanti /
K09bsu016_u:8878: tathā hi kulaputra ahametaṃ vipulaprītisaṃbhavasaṃtuṣṭyavabhāsaṃ bodhisattvavimokṣamavatarantī
K09bsu016_u:8918: evaṃ hi kulaputra bhagavān vairocanastathāgataḥ pūrvabodhisattvacaryāṃ caran puṇyajñānasaṃbhāravirahite
K09bsu016_u:8922: pratyanubhavati mahākaruṇāṃ saṃjanayya vipulān pāramitācaryāmeghānabhinirhṛtya kuśalamūladṛḍhapratiṣṭhānaṃ
K09bsu016_u:8933: sarvatathāgatavikurvitamukheṣu cainānavatārya atyantamupadhiśeṣasukhasaṃgraheṇa saṃgṛhya tathāgatamāhātmyābhimukhān kṛtvā bodhisattvasaṃgrahajñāne pratiṣṭhāpayāmāsa //
K09bsu016_u:8934: sudhana āha - kiyacciraṃ saṃprasthitāsi devate anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
K09bsu016_u:8935: āha - durabhisaṃbhavaṃ kulaputra etatsthānaṃ durvijñeya duradhimocaṃ duravataraṃ duḥpravyāhāraṃ duradhigamam /
K09bsu016_u:8950: atha ca punastathāgatādhiṣṭhānena nirdekṣyāmi ājāneyānāṃ sattvānāmāśayasamyagviśuddhaye,
K09bsu016_u:8953: atha khalu sarvavṛkṣapraphullanasukhasaṃvāsā rātridevatā tasyāṃ velāyāmetamevārthaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśayamānā tryadhvaprāptatathāgataviṣayaṃ vyavalokya imā gāthā abhāṣata -
K09bsu016_u:8954: gambhīru bauddho viṣayo anantā yaṃ pṛcchasi tvaṃ khalu buddhaputra /
K09bsu016_u:8955: acintiyakṣetrarajopamānaiḥ kalpairna śakyaṃ sa hi sarva vaktum // 1 //
K09bsu016_u:8956: na lubdhasattvairna ca duṣṭacittaiḥ śakyaṃ na mohāndhatamovṛtaiśca /
K09bsu016_u:8957: na mrakṣamānopahatāśayaiśca vijānituṃ śānta jināna dharmatā // 2 //
K09bsu016_u:8959: na kleśakarmāvaraṇāvṛtaiśca śakyo hyayaṃ jānitu buddhagocara // 3 //
K09bsu016_u:8961: na dṛṣṭisaṃjñāviparītacittaiḥ śakyā iyaṃ jānitu buddhabhūmiḥ // 4 //
K09bsu016_u:8962: durjñeya śānto viṣayo jinānāṃ svabhāvato nirmalanirvikalpaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:8964: saṃsārasaktaina bhavāśritaiśca śakyaṃ samājñātumayaṃ hi dharmaḥ // 5 //
K09bsu016_u:8968: munerbalārambaṇacittameghāḥ kṣāntiṃ labhante ta idaṃ niśāmya // 7 //
K09bsu016_u:8972: aśeṣasattvānugatā ca maitrī naye jinānāṃ ta ihāvatīrṇāḥ // 9 //
K09bsu016_u:8973: anāgrahā ye khalu hṛṣṭacittāḥ sarvāstidānābhiratāḥ sadaiva /
K09bsu016_u:8985: gatiṃ gatā ye jinadharmadhātau prajñāpradīpāna nayeṣa teṣām // 15 //
K09bsu016_u:8993: vibuddhya bodhiṃ vinayanta sarvān asaṅganetrāna nayeṣa teṣām // 19 //
K09bsu016_u:8995: dharmārthiko dharmagaveṣyakhinnaḥ śrutvā ca taṃ dhārayituṃ samarthaḥ // 20 //
K09bsu016_u:8999: bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra atīte 'dhvani lokadhātusamudraparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ kalpānāṃ pareṇa parataraṃ maṇikanakaparvataśikharavairocano nāma lokadhātusamudro 'bhūt /
K09bsu016_u:9000: tasmin khalu punaḥ kulaputra maṇikanakaparvataśikharavairocanalokadhātusamudre jñānaparvatadharmadhātudikpratapanatejorājo nāma tathāgato 'bhūt
K09bsu016_u:9002: pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā sa maṇikanakaparvataśikharavairocano lokadhātusamudraḥ pariśodhitaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9010: ekaikasmiṃśca sūtrānte lokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsamā bodhisattvavyākaraṇanirdeśāḥ anantamadhyasattvavinayanirdeśā nānāyānanayaiḥ pravartitā nānāvikurvitaprātihāryavinayatāḥ
K09bsu016_u:9011: tasmin khalu punarmaṇikanakaparvataśikharavairocane lokadhātusamudre samantadigabhimukhadvāradhvajavyūho nāma madhyamo lokadhātuvaṃśo 'bhūt
K09bsu016_u:9012: tasmin khalu punaḥ kulaputra samantadigabhimukhadvāradhvajavyūhe madhyame lokadhātuvaṃśe sarvaratnavarṇasamantaprabhāsaśrīrnāma lokadhāturabhūt
K09bsu016_u:9016: teṣāṃ ca sumeruparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ cāturdvīpakānāṃ sarvaratnaśikharadhvajo nāma madhyamaścāturdvīpako 'bhūt /
K09bsu016_u:9017: tasmin khalu punaḥ sarvaratnaśikharadhvaje cāturdvīpake lokadhātau aprameyayojanaśatasahasrāyāmavistārāścatvāro dvīpā abhūvan /
K09bsu016_u:9019: tasmiṃśca khalu punaḥ cāturdvīpake jambudvīpakasya madhye ratnasālavyūhameghapradīpā nāma rājadhānyabhūddaśanagarasahasraparivārā /
K09bsu016_u:9020: tasmin khalu punarjambudvīpe daśa varṣasahasrāṇi manuṣyāṇāmāyuṣpramāṇamabhūt /
K09bsu016_u:9021: tasyāṃ khalu punā ratnasālavyūhameghapradīpāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣo nāma rājābhūccakravartī /
K09bsu016_u:9024: sapta putraśatānyabhūvan sarveṣāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ sudarśanānāṃ mahātejasāṃ mahābalānām /
K09bsu016_u:9025: tasya khalu punaḥ sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣasya rājñaḥ sarvo jambudvīpa ekacchatro 'bhūnnihataparacakrapratyarthikaḥ //
K09bsu016_u:9027: tena ca samayena lokadhātāvantarakalpakṣaye pratyupasthite pañcasu kaṣāyeṣu loke
K09bsu016_u:9030: te daśākuśalakarmapathasamādānahetoḥ parīttāyuṣo 'bhūvan alpabhogā virūpā vivarṇā
K09bsu016_u:9034: teṣāmadharmarāgaraktānāṃ viṣamalobhābhibhūtānāṃ mithyādharmaparigatānāṃ na devaḥ kāle vāridhārā udasṛjat yena pṛthivyāṃ bījagrāmāḥ sasyagrāmā viroheyuḥ //
K09bsu016_u:9035: tena khalu punaḥ sattvāḥ śuṣkeṣu tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanodyānadrumeṣu nānāvyādhispṛṣṭā digvidiśo vidhāvanti sma aparāyaṇāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9036: te samāgamya sarva eva yena ratnasālavyūhameghapradīparājadhānī tenopasaṃkramya tāṃ samantādanuparivārya kecidūrdhvabāhavaḥ,
K09bsu016_u:9053: ye ca tasyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ strīpuruṣadārakadārikāḥ kṣutpipāsāprapīḍitā nirābharaṇagātrā nagnanirvasanā duṣṭavivarṇā rūkṣaparuṣagātrā duḥkhitā durmanaso 'nāttamanaskāḥ,
K09bsu016_u:9059: aśrauṣīdrājā sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣaḥ tasya mahataḥ samantādyācanakasamūhasya taṃ mahāntamārtasvaramutkrośanaśabdam /
K09bsu016_u:9061: sa mahākaruṇānayacetanānidhyapticitto muhūrtamekāgratāmanubhūya daśa mahākaruṇopasaṃhitāni vacanapadānyudīrayāmāsa /
K09bsu016_u:9064: kadā tadbhaviṣyati yadvayaṃ saṃsāramahāprapātaprapatitānāṃ sattvānāṃ layanabhūtā bhaviṣyāmaḥ tathāgatalayanabhūmipratiṣṭhāpanatayā /
K09bsu016_u:9068: aho bata aśaraṇāḥ sattvā loke jarāmaraṇabhayāviṣṭāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9069: katā tadbhaviṣyati yadvayamaśaraṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ śaraṇabhūtā bhaviṣyāmaḥ sarvasaṃsārabhayavinivartanatayā /
K09bsu016_u:9071: katā tadbhaviṣyati yadvayaṃ vividhalokabhayopadrutānāmaparāyaṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ parāyaṇaṃ bhaviṣyāmo 'tyantayogakṣeme sarvajñatāmārge pratiṣṭhāpanatayā
K09bsu016_u:9075: kadā tadbhaviṣyati yadvayaṃ mahājñānālokakarā bhaviṣyāmaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ vitimirajñānamukhasaṃdarśanatayā /
K09bsu016_u:9079: kadā tadbhaviṣyati yadvayaṃ nāyakabhūtā bhaviṣyāmaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ karmasamudranayāvataraṇatayā /
K09bsu016_u:9081: kadā tadbhaviṣyati yadvayaṃ vināyakabhūtā bhaviṣyāmaḥ sarvasattvānāṃ sarvākāraparipākavinayatathāgatādhiṣṭhānakālānatikramaṇena /
K09bsu016_u:9084: sa imāni daśa mahākaruṇopasaṃhitāni vacanapadānyudīrya tasyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇamakārṣīt /
K09bsu016_u:9087: tena sarvajambudvīpe sarvarājadhānīṣu sarvagrāmanagaranigamajanapadapattaneṣu sarvopakaraṇakośā vivṛtāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9095: sa teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ yathābhilaṣitasarvābhiprāyaparipūraṇārthaṃ teṣu gṛheṣu pratyekamātmabhāvasadṛśamupādāya kāyamabhinirmāya sthāpayāmāsa /
K09bsu016_u:9097: yathārhavividhopakaraṇapūrṇāni ca nānāratnavicitrabhājanānyupasthāpayāmāsa - yaduta vajramaṇibhājanāni nānāgandhamaṇiratnaparipūrṇāni,
K09bsu016_u:9100: vividhāṃśca rathān rājārhān sarvaratnābharaṇaparibhogāṃśca sarvāsanavidhīṃśca nānāratnavicitrān vividhavitānavitatān (Gv 252)
K09bsu016_u:9107: yastasyā ratnasālavyūhameghapradīpāyā rājadhānyāḥ pūrveṇa maṇiśikharatejonāmno nagaradvārasya
K09bsu016_u:9127: yatra sa rājā sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣaḥ saṃniṣaṇṇo 'bhūt abhirūpaḥ
K09bsu016_u:9141: sa khalu rājā sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣo ratnavālavyajanaiḥ saṃvījyamānaḥ śakradevendrātirekeṇa tejasā jvālayannupaśobhate sma
K09bsu016_u:9142: tasya samanantaraniṣaṇṇasya tasmin siṃhāsane sarvo janakāyo 'bhimukhaḥ prāñjaliḥ sthito 'bhūttameva rājānaṃ namasyan //
K09bsu016_u:9149: tamekaṃ mahāpuṇyasumerumullokayamāneṣu ayamevaiko mahājñānapuruṣa iti niścitacetaneṣu,
K09bsu016_u:9151: bodhisattvapraṇidhicetanānipatiteṣu bodhisattvapraṇidhicetanānirmiteṣu taṃ mahāntaṃ yācanakasaṃnipātaṃ dṛṣṭvā teṣāṃ yācanakānāmantike 'bhūccittaprema cittaprītiḥ cittaprasādaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9155: sa khalu punaḥ sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣo rājā teṣāṃ yācanakānāṃ sahadarśanena
K09bsu016_u:9168: aṭavīkāntāravipranaṣṭasya taddarśanakāmasya teṣāṃ samavadhānena mahatī prītiradhyavasānamutpadyate taddarśanāvitṛptatayā,
K09bsu016_u:9169: evameva kulaputra rājñaḥ sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣasya teṣāṃ yācanakānāṃ sahadarśanena mahāprītivegāḥ saṃjātāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9188: sa tān sarvayācanakān yathāgatān yathāsaṃprāptān yathākālasaṃnipatitān yathādigdeśasthitān
K09bsu016_u:9189: yathāvastuyācanakān yathārucīn yathābhiprāyān yathābhikāṅkṣiṇo yathābhilāṣiṇo yathāvastuparyeṣakān
K09bsu016_u:9193: pānaṃ pānārthikebhyo vastraṃ vastrārthikebhyaḥ puṣpāṇi puṣpārthikebhyaḥ prādāt /
K09bsu016_u:9197: sarvakośānapi vivṛtya vibhajya arthikebhyaḥ prādāt yasya yenārthaḥ sa taṃ gṛhṇātu iti /
K09bsu016_u:9200: sa tān sarvayācanakān sarvāstiparityāgatayā sarvasattveṣu samapratipannaḥ sarvavastuparityāgairabhicchādayāmāsa //
K09bsu016_u:9201: tena khalu punaḥ samayena ratnaprabhā nāma śreṣṭhidārikā ṣaṣṭikanyāparivārā tasminneva mahāyajñavāṭe saṃnipatitābhūt,
K09bsu016_u:9205: paramasaṃprajanyacāriṇī gambhīraceṣṭā meghāsaṃpannā dharmāṇāṃ grahaṇacāraṇapratibodhiṣu pūrvasukṛtakuśalamūlā dharmābhiṣyanditaprasannasaṃtānā (Gv 255)
K09bsu016_u:9207: sā khalu ratnaprabhā śreṣṭhidārikā sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣasya rājño mahāsiṃhāsanasya pradakṣiṇena nātidūre sthitābhūt prāñjalistaṃ rājānaṃ namasyantī,
K09bsu016_u:9209: ekāntasthitā caivaṃ cittamutpādayāmāsa - sulabdhā me lābhā,
K09bsu016_u:9215: tāni tasya siṃhāsanavedikāmadhye adhaḥ pṛthivīmaṇḍale pratiṣṭhitānyabhūvan /
K09bsu016_u:9216: sā tānyābharaṇāni pravikīrya evaṃ praṇidhimutpādayāmāsa - yathaiṣa rājā sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣo 'nāthānāṃ sattvānāmandhakāraprāptānāṃ
K09bsu016_u:9228: tāmevaṃcittamanasikāraprayuktāmājñāya rājā sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣo 'valokya evamāha - gṛhāṇa dārike,
K09bsu016_u:9230: ahaṃ khalu dārike sarvāstiparityāgī sarvasattvasaṃtarpaṇāya pratipannaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9231: sā khalu samanvāhṛtā tena rājñā sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣeṇeti bhūyasyā mātrayā prasādaṃ pratyalabhata /
K09bsu016_u:9232: sā prasannacittā udāravipulakuśalamūlavegasaṃjātā rājānaṃ sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣaṃ tasyāṃ velāyāmābhirgāthābhiradhyabhāṣata
K09bsu016_u:9233: pūrve iyaṃ sālaviyūhameghā anopapanne tvayi rājasiṃha /
K09bsu016_u:9234: nirābhiramyā hatateja āsīt pretālayo vā yatha bhīṣaṇīyā // 22 //
K09bsu016_u:9236: mṛṣāmabhāṣan paruṣāṃ ca vācaṃ piśunāmabaddhāṃ giramapyavocan // 23 //
K09bsu016_u:9242: avarṣi deve ca vinaṣṭabījāḥ sasyā na rohanti na caiva vṛkṣāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9244: nadyo viśuṣkā abhavannaśeṣā udyāna sarve aṭavīprakāśāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9246: yadā hi te yācakasaṃdhisaṃbhute saṃtarpitā yācanakāstu sarve /
K09bsu016_u:9247: utpadya meghena tadā caturdiśaṃ saṃtarpitā nimnasthalā ca sarve // 28 //
K09bsu016_u:9248: bhūyo na corā na bhaṭā na dhūrtā na hanyate kaścana cāpi vadhyate /
K09bsu016_u:9249: na cāpyanāthā maraṇaṃ vrajanti nātho bhavān sarvajagatyanāthe // 29 //
K09bsu016_u:9251: khādanti māṃsāni parasparaṃ ye te tvatpradānairbhuta maitracittāḥ // 30 //
K09bsu016_u:9252: ekaḥ śatānto hi sahasrasaṃkhyāṅganā tadā cīvarasaṃvṛtābhūt /
K09bsu016_u:9253: saṃchādya kāyaṃ tṛṇaparṇacīvaraiḥ pretāḥ kṣudhārtā iva te 'viśaṃstadā // 31 //
K09bsu016_u:9255: dṛśyanti nāryastu narāśca paṇḍitā jāto yadā tvaṃ jagato 'sya nāthaḥ // 32 //
K09bsu016_u:9258: svalaṃkṛtāstvadya mahārhavastrāḥ krīḍanti devā iva nandanasthāḥ // 33 //
K09bsu016_u:9259: kāmeṣu mithyāviṣamapravṛttā adharmarāgeṇa narā hi raktāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9260: nāryaḥ kumāryaḥ svaparābhiguptā viṣaṃ śayanti sma purā prasajya // 34 //
K09bsu016_u:9263: mṛṣāṃ ca rūkṣāṃ piśunāmabaddhāṃ purā giraṃ śāṭhyavaśādavocan /
K09bsu016_u:9264: caturvidhāṃ vācamimāṃ prahāya dharmaṃ carantyadya kudṛṣṭimuktāḥ // 36 //
K09bsu016_u:9266: sabrahmaghoṣāḥ kalaviṅkaghoṣā rutasya tubhyaṃ padavīṃ spṛśanti // 37 //
K09bsu016_u:9267: chatraṃ hi te tiṣṭhati mūrdhasaṃdhau ratnaiścitaṃ kāñcanajālachatram /
K09bsu016_u:9271: ye śrutva sattvāḥ śamayanti kleśān aśeṣadikkṣetraparaṃparāsu /
K09bsu016_u:9275: tavānubhāvena ca dikṣvaśeṣaṃ saddharmacakrāṇi ravanti ghaṇṭāḥ // 41 //
K09bsu016_u:9278: śrutvā ca te ghaṇṭarutāṃ nṛdevāḥ svakasvakāṃ karmanidhānakośān /
K09bsu016_u:9279: vivarjya pāpaṃ śubhamācaranti sarve pratiṣṭhanti ca buddhabodhau // 43 //
K09bsu016_u:9280: jyotiḥprabhaste nṛpatiḥ pitābhūt padmaprabhā tanmahiṣī ca mātā /
K09bsu016_u:9281: abhyutsade pañcakaṣāyakāle ka dharmarājyaṃ pratilabdhavān saḥ // 44 //
K09bsu016_u:9286: vavarṣa devo na yadā bahūni varṣāṇyadharme balavatyapūrṇe /
K09bsu016_u:9287: jalaṃ tadā puṣkiriṇīṣvaśeṣā drumāḥ sapatracchavayaśca śuṣkāḥ // 47 //
K09bsu016_u:9289: niḥsaṃśayā yāni nirīkṣya sattvāstrātā hi naḥ saṃbhavitetyavocan // 48 //
K09bsu016_u:9298: bījāni yāvanti ca bhūtadhātryāṃ sarvāṇyarohanta jalāplutāni // 52 //
K09bsu016_u:9300: nimnonnatāścaiva mahīpradeśāḥ sarve samā eva tadā babhūvuḥ // 53 //
K09bsu016_u:9308: aninditā puṣkiriṇī surabhyā yā madhyamā gandhajalābhipūrṇā /
K09bsu016_u:9310: saptabhyabhūdyā rajanī jalasya samudbhavāṃ tatra sameva rātre /
K09bsu016_u:9311: punaḥ saśailā savimānamālā cacāla sarvā dharaṇī tathaiva // 58 //
K09bsu016_u:9319: devyai dadau vācamuvāca caivaṃ sutastavāyaṃ bhava tuṣṭacittā // 62 //
K09bsu016_u:9325: prabhā śarīrāttava niścaritvā prabhāsayāmāsa mahīṃ samantāt /
K09bsu016_u:9326: tamondhakāraṃ jagatāṃ ca hatvā vyādhīnaśeṣān śamayāṃbabhūva // 65 //
K09bsu016_u:9329: alābhaninde ayaśo 'tha duḥkhaṃ yā ītayo vyādhirupadravāśca /
K09bsu016_u:9330: śamaṃ samāsādya hitaṃ jagāma loke pramodastu samudbabhūva // 67 //
K09bsu016_u:9337: atha khalu ratnaprabhā śreṣṭhidārikā sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣaṃ rājānamābhirgāthābhirabhiṣṭutya
K09bsu016_u:9338: saṃvarṇya saṃpraśasya anekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya praṇipatya ekānte prāñjaliḥ
K09bsu016_u:9340: atha khalu rājā sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣo ratnaprabhāṃ śreṣṭhidārikāmavalokya evamāha - sādhu sādhu dārike,
K09bsu016_u:9346: avatārituṃ tathāgataguṇā vā kalpayituṃ sarvaguṇajñānaviśeṣābhijñā vā anuprāptum /
K09bsu016_u:9350: udārasattvābhijñatayā jambudvīpe 'mogho 'smākaṃ sattvasaṃgrahavikramo yeṣāṃ no vijite tvamevaṃrūpajñānasamanvāgatā utpannā /
K09bsu016_u:9352: jyotiḥprabhamaṇiratnavicitraṃ ca anarghaṃ vastraratnaṃ svena pāṇinā ādāya ratnaprabhāyāḥ
K09bsu016_u:9354: tatparivārasya ca sarvāsāṃ dārikāṇāṃ pratyekaṃ nānāvastraratnāni prādāt,
K09bsu016_u:9355: evaṃ cāvocat - pratigṛhāṇa dārike tvamida vastraratnam,
K09bsu016_u:9357: atha khalu ratnaprabhā śreṣṭhidārikā saparivārā ubhābhyāṃ jānubhyāṃ dharaṇitale praṇipatya
K09bsu016_u:9358: tadvastraratnaṃ pāṇibhyāṃ parigṛhya mūrdhni kṛtvā pratyavasṛtya tadvastraratnaṃ prāvṛtavatī /
K09bsu016_u:9359: tatparivārāśca sarvā dārikāḥ pratyekaṃ svāni vastraratnāni prāvṛtavatyaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9360: sā tadvastraratnaṃ prāvṛtya rājānaṃ sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣaṃ pradakṣiṇamakarot sārdhaṃ svena dārikāparivāreṇa /
K09bsu016_u:9361: tāsāṃ sarvāsāṃ teṣu vastraratneṣu sarvanakṣatrajyotirbimbāni vidyotamānānyadarśan /
K09bsu016_u:9362: tāṃ janakāyo dṛṣṭvā evamāha - śobhanastavāyaṃ dārike kanyāparivāraḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9363: rātridevateva jyotirgaṇapratimaṇḍitā tvamābhiḥ parivṛtā atīva bhrājase //
K09bsu016_u:9364: atha khalu sarvavṛkṣapraphullanasukhasaṃvāsā rātridevatā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat
K09bsu016_u:9365: - tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena rājābhūt sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣo nāma?
K09bsu016_u:9367: ayaṃ sa bhagavān vairocanastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhastena kālena tena samayena rājā abhūt sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣo nāma
K09bsu016_u:9368: syātkhalu punaste kulaputra - anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena padmaprabhā nāma devyabhūdrājño jyotiṣprabhasya bhāryā sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣasya rājño mātā?
K09bsu016_u:9370: iyaṃ sā māyādevī tena kālena padmaprabhā nāma rājabhāryā abhūt,
K09bsu016_u:9371: yayā sa upapādukaḥ kumāraḥ utsaṅge pratigṛhītaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9372: syātkhalu punaste kulaputra evaṃ - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena jyotiṣprabho nāma rājā abhūtsarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣasya rājñaḥ pitā?
K09bsu016_u:9374: śuddhodanaḥ sa rājā tena kālena jyotiṣprabho nāma rājā abhūt /
K09bsu016_u:9375: syātkhalu punaste kulaputra evam - anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena ratnaprabhā nāma śreṣṭhidārikā abhūt /
K09bsu016_u:9377: ahaṃ sā tena kālena tena samayena ratnaprabhā nāma śreṣṭhidārikā abhūvam /
K09bsu016_u:9378: syātkhalu punaste kulaputra evam - anye tena kālena tena samayena sattvā abhūvan,
K09bsu016_u:9379: ye tatra jambudvīpe upapannāḥ rājñā sarvadharmanirnādacchatramaṇḍalanirghoṣeṇa caturbhiḥ saṃgrahavastubhiḥ saṃgṛhītāḥ?
K09bsu016_u:9381: ime te bodhisattvāḥ sarve ihaiva bhagavataḥ parṣanmaṇḍalasamavasṛtā ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau avaivartyāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ
K09bsu016_u:9383: kecid dvitīyāyāṃ kecitṛtīyāyāṃ keciccaturthyāṃ bhūmau kecitpañcamyāṃ kecitṣaṭhyāṃ kecitsaptamyāṃ kecidaṣṭabhyāṃ kecinnavamyāṃ keciddaśamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9386: atha khalu sarvavṛkṣapraphullanasukhasaṃvāsā rātridevatā tasyāṃ velāyāmetameva vipulaprītisaṃbhavanidhānasaṃtuṣṭyavabhāsaṃ
K09bsu016_u:9387: bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃdarśayamānā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata -
K09bsu016_u:9388: cakṣurmamā jinasutā vipulaṃ yeno vilokayami sarvadiśaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9389: kṣetrodadhīn bahuvidhān vipulān sattvārṇavānapi ca saṃsarataḥ // 71 //
K09bsu016_u:9399: sattvān gatiṣvapi ca saṃsarato buddhān vikurvitagaṇaiśca saha // 76 //
K09bsu016_u:9400: tacca smarāmi khalu lokavidāṃ teṣāṃ yathā prathamakaḥ praṇidhiḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9406: yā nirvṛtīparimāṇaguṇā dharmasthiterapi ca yo niyamaḥ // 79 //
K09bsu016_u:9407: ye yānasāgaranayā vimalā ye caiva sattvavinayā vipulāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9410: mama bhāvito vipula kalpaśatānyetaṃ tvamapyavatarāśu nayam // 81 //
K09bsu016_u:9418: iyamihaiva bodhimaṇḍe sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhā nāma rātridevatā bhagavataḥ sakāśamupasaṃkrāntā /
K09bsu016_u:9419: tāmupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau sattvāḥ paripācayitavyāḥ,
K09bsu016_u:9423: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ sarvavṛkṣapraphullanasukhasaṃvāsāyā rātridevatāyāḥ
K09bsu016_u:9429: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako yena sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhā rātridevatā tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9442: sa tāṃ dṛṣṭvā mūrdhnā praṇamya buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān darśananayānanusmaramāṇo 'ntaradharaṇitale praṇipatya suciramatināmayāmāsa //
K09bsu016_u:9443: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ tasmāddharaṇitalādutthāya prāñjalībhūtaḥ sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhāyā
K09bsu016_u:9444: rātridevatāyāḥ kāyaṃ nirīkṣamāṇo daśa saṃjñāviśuddhīḥ pratilabhate sma,
K09bsu016_u:9458: yāsāṃ pratilābhāt sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhāyā rātridevatāyā buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamā bodhisattvasabhāgatāḥ pratyalabhata /
K09bsu016_u:9544: iti hi sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ prasannacittaḥ sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhāṃ
K09bsu016_u:9545: rātridevatāmavalokayan āsāṃ daśānāṃ saṃjñāviśuddhīnāṃ pratilābhādetatpramukhān buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān
K09bsu016_u:9547: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhāyā rātridevatāyā
K09bsu016_u:9550: ekāṃsaṃ cīvaraṃ prāvṛtya yena sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhā rātridevatā,
K09bsu016_u:9551: tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K09bsu016_u:9552: yathā svacitte vaśitā mamāsti chandaśca bodhau sudṛḍho 'nivartyaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9553: tvadīyacitte 'pi hi me tathaiva svataiva devyadya dṛḍhopajātā // 1 //
K09bsu016_u:9556: cittaṃ guṇaughaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaṃ me pṛthagvidhaiḥ sattvahitapravṛttaiḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9558: nidarśitā te khalu sarvadharmān niṣpattirārye madanugrahāya /
K09bsu016_u:9565: puṇyārṇavā me gaganapramāṇāḥ pratikṣaṇaṃ cetasi codbhavanti // 7 //
K09bsu016_u:9568: saṃvardhitaḥ sarvaguṇaiḥ śubhaiśca sarvajñapaṭṭaṃ nacireṇa lapsye // 8 //
K09bsu016_u:9571: sarve yato 'rthāḥ prabhavanti cāsmāt siddhaśca kalyāṇaguṇairupetaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9573: ācāryabhūtā mi guṇāprameye sarvajñadharmeṣu mama praṇetrī /
K09bsu016_u:9574: na kalpakoṭīnayutairasaṃkhyaiḥ śakyaṃ mayā te pratikartumārye // 11 //
K09bsu016_u:9575: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ imā gāthā bhāṣitvā sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhāṃ
K09bsu016_u:9577: vadasva me devate - ko nāmāyaṃ vimokṣaḥ?
K09bsu016_u:9580: evamukte sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhā rātridevatā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat - sarvasattvaparipākasaṃcodanakuśalasaṃbhavo nāma kulaputra ayaṃ vimokṣaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9581: ahaṃ kulaputra anena vimokṣeṇa samanvāgatā sarvadharmasvabhāvavasamatāmanubuddhya
K09bsu016_u:9582: sarvadharmaprakṛtimavatīrya anālayaṃ dharmaṃ niśritya sarvalokoccālitā suvibhaktarūpatāṃ
K09bsu016_u:9583: dharmāṇāmavatīrya avisabhāgavarṇā avaivartavarṇā avikalpavarṇā anīlavarṇā apītavarṇā
K09bsu016_u:9585: avisabhāgā anānātvā avaimātryā avikalpā anīlā apītā alohitā anavadātavarṇā,
K09bsu016_u:9632: ca tathāgatasya anantamadhyāni vikurvitāni saṃdarśayamānā pūrvakāṇi kuśalamūlāni saṃcodayāmi /
K09bsu016_u:9636: praticittakṣaṇaṃ ca anantamadhyaṃ sattvadhātumanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau avivartyabhūmau pratiṣṭhāpayāmi //
K09bsu016_u:9637: yatpunaḥ kulaputra evaṃ vadasi - kiyaccirasaṃprasthitāsi devate anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau?
K09bsu016_u:9641: na tatra saṃsāradīrghatā vā saṃsārahrasvatā vā prabhāvyate prajñāyate /
K09bsu016_u:9642: kalpasaṃkliṣṭatā vā kalpaviśuddhatā vā kalpaparīttatā vā kalpamahadgatatā vā kalpabahutvaṃ vā kalpanānātvaṃ vā kalpanānākaraṇaṃ vā kalpavimātratā vā prabhāvyate prajñāyate vā /
K09bsu016_u:9644: prakṛtisvabhāvapariśuddhaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvānāṃ jñānamaṇḍalaṃ sarvasaṃjñājālanirmuktaṃ sarvāvaraṇaparvatasamatikrāntamāśaye udeti /
K09bsu016_u:9646: tadyathā kulaputra sūryamaṇḍale rātriṃdivaṃ saṃkhyā na vidyate,
K09bsu016_u:9649: udāgate ca sūryamaṇḍale divasaḥ prajñāyate prabhāvyate /
K09bsu016_u:9650: evameva kulaputra avikalpe bodhisattvajñānamaṇḍale sarvakalpavikalpaparikalpā na saṃvidyante /
K09bsu016_u:9652: atha ca punarbodhisattvāśayoditā vikalpajñānamaṇḍalaprabhena sarvasattvaparipākakālavaśena kalpasaṃvāsasaṃsārasaṃjñāgatagaṇanāsaṃkhyā prabhāvyate
K09bsu016_u:9654: tadyathā kulaputra sūryamaṇḍalaṃ gaganatalagataṃ sarvaratnaparvateṣu sarvaratnadrumeṣu
K09bsu016_u:9672: na cāsya kalpe dīrghasaṃjñā bhavati na hrasvasaṃjñā /
K09bsu016_u:9678: tadyathā kulaputra mahānadyādiṣu yānapātraṃ satatasamitaṃ sattvasaṃtāraṇāya prayuktamapratiprasrabdhaṃ bhavati,
K09bsu016_u:9679: yāvajjīvaṃ na cāsya apārime tīre 'bhiniveśo bhavati na pārime,
K09bsu016_u:9681: evameva kulaputra bodhisattvo mahāpāramitāyānapātrabalena saṃsāranadīsrotasaḥ sarvasattvasaṃtāraṇāya pratipanno bhavati /
K09bsu016_u:9682: na cāsya apārime tīre utrtrāso bhavati,
K09bsu016_u:9684: atha ca punaḥ satatasamitaṃ sattvasaṃtāraṇāya pratipanno bhavati /
K09bsu016_u:9690: evameva kulaputra bodhisattva āśayajñānagaganatalamaṇḍalaṃ mahāpraṇidhānavātamaṇḍalīparivṛtaṃ sarvadurgatiprapātebhyaḥ sattvān saṃdhārayamāṇaḥ na parikhidyate,
K09bsu016_u:9695: tadyathā kulaputra māyāgatanivṛttasya puruṣasya sarvāṅgapratyaṅgaparipūrṇasya daśa śarīrasthā dharmā na saṃvidyante /
K09bsu016_u:9701: jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaṃ vā pīḍā vā na saṃvidyate /
K09bsu016_u:9706: yaduta saṃsārābhilāṣo vā saṃsārabhavagatyupapattinirvedo vā viṣayaratyanunayo vā
K09bsu016_u:9707: pratighātacittatā vā upabhoktukāmatā vā sarvakleśaparitāpo vā duḥkhavedanānubhāvo
K09bsu016_u:9708: vā viṣayagatyupapattibhayaṃ vā bhavābhilāṣo vā abhiniveśo vā /
K09bsu016_u:9709: api tu khalu kulaputra nirdekṣyāmi buddhānubhāvena anāgatānāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ vipulabodhisattvapraṇidhānabalavivardhanatāyai //
K09bsu016_u:9710: bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra atīte 'dhvani lokadhātusamudraparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ pareṇa paratareṇa yadāsīt - tena kālena tena samayena ratnaprabhā nāma lokadhātuḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9711: tasyāṃ khalu punaḥ kulaputra ratnaprabhāyāṃ lokadhātau suprabho nāma kalpo 'bhūt /
K09bsu016_u:9712: tasmin khalu punaḥ suprabhe kalpe daśa buddhasahasrāṇyupapadyante sma /
K09bsu016_u:9713: teṣāṃ khalu kulaputra daśānāṃ buddhasahasrāṇāṃ prāthamakalpiko dharmacakranirghoṣagaganapradīparājo
K09bsu016_u:9714: nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ
K09bsu016_u:9717: sa khalu punaḥ kulaputra tathāgato madhye (Gv 273)
K09bsu016_u:9719: tasyāḥ khalu punā rativyūhāyā rājadhānyāḥ pūrveṇa suprabhaṃ nāma vanaṣaṇḍamabhūt /
K09bsu016_u:9720: tasmin khalu punaḥ suprabhe vanaṣaṇḍe ratnakusumamegho nāma bodhimaṇḍo 'bhūt /
K09bsu016_u:9721: tasmin khalu ratnakusumameghe bodhimaṇḍe vairocanamaṇipadmagarbhasiṃhāsanaṃ prādurabhūt,
K09bsu016_u:9722: yatra sa bhagavān dharmacakranirghoṣagaganameghapradīrājastathāgato niṣadya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9723: tena ca samayena manuṣyāṇāṃ daśa varṣasahasrāṇi āyuḥ pramāṇamabhūt /
K09bsu016_u:9724: atha prāṇātipātiṣu sarveṣu loke prādurbhūteṣu adattādāyiṣu kāmamithyācāriṣu mṛṣāvādiṣu paiśunikeṣu pāruṣikeṣu saṃbhinnapralāpiṣu abhidhyāluṣu vyāpannacitteṣu mithyādṛṣṭiṣu,
K09bsu016_u:9725: evaṃ daśasvakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu vipulībhūteṣu supratiṣṭhiteṣu sa bhagavān dharmacakranirghoṣagaganameghapradīparājastathāgataḥ
K09bsu016_u:9726: paripūrṇaṃ varṣasahasraṃ bodhimaṇḍagato bodhisattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayāmāsa lokendrāṇāṃ
K09bsu016_u:9727: ca pūrvajinakṛtādhikārāṇāṃ jambudvīpakānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ kuśalamūlaparipācanāya //
K09bsu016_u:9728: tena ca samayena tasyāṃ rativyūhāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ jayaprabho nāma rājā abhūt /
K09bsu016_u:9729: tena adattādāyināṃ puruṣāṇāṃ caurāṇāṃ kilbiṣakāriṇāṃ prāṇātipātināṃ kāmamithyācāriṇāṃ
K09bsu016_u:9730: mṛṣāvādināṃ paiśunikānāṃ pāruṣikāṇāṃ saṃbhinnapralāpināṃ abhidhyālūnāṃ vyāpannacittānāṃ
K09bsu016_u:9734: rājñaḥ khalu punaḥ jayaprabhasya vijitāvī nāma putro 'bhūdabhirūpaḥ prāsādiko darśanīyaḥ paramaśubhavarṇapuṣkalatayā samanvāgato 'ṣṭaviṃśatibhirmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇairupetaḥ
K09bsu016_u:9735: atha sa sarasvatisaṃgītiprāsādābhirūḍho mahāstrīgaṇaparivāraparivṛtaḥ teṣāṃ cārakāvaruddhānāṃ sattvānāṃ vividhagāḍhabandhanabaddhānāṃ bhairavamutkrośaśabdamaśrauṣīt
K09bsu016_u:9736: śrutvā ca punarudvignaḥ saṃvignacitto mahākaruṇāsaṃjātaḥ tasmātprāsādādavatīrya taccārake
K09bsu016_u:9740: keśābhicchāditakāyān urunigaḍabandhanabaddhān vividhāḥ kāraṇāḥ kāryamāṇān duḥkhavedanāmanubhavamānānanekavidhān
K09bsu016_u:9742: sa tān dṛṣṭvā mahatkāruṇyamutpādya udārakaruṇāśayasaṃjātaḥ parahitādhāno 'dbhutacetāścārakagahanagatān sattvān samāśvāsayāmāsa bandhanavipramokṣāya
K09bsu016_u:9743: sa teṣāṃ sattvānāmabhayaṃ datvā yena rājā jayaprabhastenopasaṃkramya evamāhayatkhalu devo jānīyāt - mayā bandhanāgārabandhanagatānāṃ sattvānāṃ kāruṇyādabhayaṃ dattam /
K09bsu016_u:9745: atha jayaprabheṇa rājñā sarvāṇi pañcāmātyaśatāni saṃnipātya paripṛṣṭāniyuṣmākaṃ kathaṃ bhavati?
K09bsu016_u:9746: ta āhuḥ - ete rājakośavilopino rājño vadhāya parākrāntāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9749: vadha evaiṣāṃ daṇḍo bandhanagatānāṃ vā maraṇam /
K09bsu016_u:9753: atha khalu sa vijitāvī rājaputro mahākaruṇāparipīḍitastānamātyān provācatathāstu yathā yūyaṃ vadatha /
K09bsu016_u:9765: atha khalu vijitāvī rājakumārastān sarvān bandhanagatān sattvāṃstasmādbandhanāgārātparimocayati sma ātmaparityāgena sarvaparivāreṇa sarvadhanaskandhena
K09bsu016_u:9766: sa tān parimocya yatteṣāṃ sattvānāṃ duḥkhopadhānaṃ tadutsṛjya na vinivartayate sma /
K09bsu016_u:9767: atha tāni pañcāmātyaśatānyūrdhvabāhūni utkrośamānāni jayaprabhaṃ rājānamupasaṃkramya evamāhuḥ - yatkhalu devo jānīyāt - vijitāvinaḥ kumārasya cchandenāyaṃ rājakośo vilupyate /
K09bsu016_u:9769: yadi devo vijitāvino rājakumārasya nigrahaṇaṃ ca kariṣyati,
K09bsu016_u:9771: atha khalu jayaprabho rājā kupito vijitāvinaṃ rājakumāraṃ saha tairaparādhibhiḥ puruṣairvadhāyotsṛṣṭavān /
K09bsu016_u:9772: tasya mātā janetrī tacchrutvā udvignā strīsahasraparivṛtā pramuktakeśī nirābharaṇagātrī
K09bsu016_u:9773: svamukhaṃ vyālupya urastāḍayantī pāṃśvavakīrṇaśiraskā krandamānā ārtasvaraṃ rudantī
K09bsu016_u:9774: rājānamupasaṃkramya saparivārā caraṇayornipatya evaṃ vijñāpayāmāsa - pramuñca deva
K09bsu016_u:9777: atha rājā vijitāvinaṃ kumāraṃ saṃmukhaṃ sthāpayitvā evamāhaṃ - utsṛja kumāra etānaparādhino manuṣyān /
K09bsu016_u:9780: sa vadhamabhyupagatavānasaṃlīnena cittena asaṃkucitena sarvajñatārambaṇaprayuktena parahitapariṇatena mahākaruṇāpūrvaṃgamena /
K09bsu016_u:9781: tasya janetryā rājā jayaprabho 'rdhamāsaṃ yācito darśanāya-ardhamāsaṃ kumāro dānaṃ dadātu yasya yenārthaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9784: atha tasyā rativyūhāyā rājadhānyā uttareṇa pūrvayajñavāṭaprakṛtaṃ sūryaprabhaṃ nāma mahodyānam /
K09bsu016_u:9785: tatra kumāro 'bhiniṣkramya yasya yenārthaḥ tasya tatprādāt /
K09bsu016_u:9786: tena nirargalaṃ yajñaṃ yajatā ardhamāsaṃ vividhā dānavidhayo dattāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9796: adrākṣīt sa mahājanakāyo vijitāvī ca rājakumārastaṃ bhagavantaṃ dharmacakranirghoṣagaganameghapradīparājaṃ
K09bsu016_u:9797: tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ dūrata evāgacchantaṃ prāsādikaṃ darśanīyaṃ śāntendriyaṃ
K09bsu016_u:9798: śāntamānasaṃ guptaṃ jitendriyaṃ nāgamiva sudāntaṃ hradamivācchaṃ viprasannamanāvilaṃ
K09bsu016_u:9799: mahatā buddhavikurvitaprātihāryeṇa mahatyā buddhavṛṣabhitayā virocayamānaṃ buddhādhipateyenābhibhavantaṃ
K09bsu016_u:9806: atha khalu vijitāvī rājakumāraḥ sa ca mahān janakāyastaṃ bhagavantaṃ dharmacakranirghoṣagaganameghapradīparājaṃ
K09bsu016_u:9807: tathāgataṃ dūrādeva pratyudgamya prasannacittaḥ sarvaśarīreṇa praṇipatya pādau śirasābhivandya
K09bsu016_u:9808: anekavidhayā pūjayā saṃpūjya evaṃ vācamabhāṣata - ehi bhagavan, ehi sugata /
K09bsu016_u:9811: atha khalu vijitāvī rājakumārastasya bhagavato 'grāsanamupadarśayan evamāha - niṣīdatu bhagavān /
K09bsu016_u:9816: tasya sahadarśanena tasyāṃ parṣadi sarveṣāṃ sattvānāṃ sarvavyādhayaḥ praśāntāḥ,
K09bsu016_u:9818: atha khalu bhagavān dharmacakranirghoṣagaganameghapradīparājastathāgatastān sattvān bhājanabhūtān viditvā anupūrveṇa kathāmakārṣīt /
K09bsu016_u:9821: atha tāvadeva tataḥ parṣado 'śītīnāṃ prāṇiniyutānāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurutpannam /
K09bsu016_u:9825: evaṃ tasya bhagavato mahābuddhavikurvitena dharmacakraṃ pravartayamānasya daśasu dikṣu buddhakṣetraśatasahasraparamāṇurajaḥsamāḥ sattvā mahāyāne vinayamagaman /
K09bsu016_u:9828: vijitāvī ca rājakumāra imaṃ sarvasattvaparipākayathāśayasaṃcodanakuśalamūlasaṃbhavaṃ bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ pratyalabhata //
K09bsu016_u:9829: syātkhalu punaste kulaputra - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena vijitāvī rājakumāro 'bhūt,
K09bsu016_u:9830: yena tatsvakāyajīvitaṃ parityajya sarvadhanaskandhaparivāraṃ parityajya sarvamānuṣyakaṃ ca jīvalokasukhaṃ parityajya te bandhanagatāḥ sattvāḥ tasmādbandhanāt parimokṣitāḥ?
K09bsu016_u:9833: tasya ca tathāgatasya sahadarśanenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam?
K09bsu016_u:9835: na khalu punaste kulaputra evaṃ draṣṭavyam /
K09bsu016_u:9836: ahaṃ sa tena kālena tena samayena vijitāvī nāma rājakumāro 'bhūvam /
K09bsu016_u:9845: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyāni tāni tena samayena pañcāmātyaśatānyabhūvan,
K09bsu016_u:9846: yaiḥ sa rājā jayaprabho vitathaṃ vijñāpya mama vadhāyodyojitaḥ?
K09bsu016_u:9848: imāni tāni pañca puruṣaśatāni yāni devadattena bhagavato vadhāyodyojitāni /
K09bsu016_u:9849: tāni ca bhagavatā vinīya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vyākṛtāni - bhaviṣyatyanāgate
K09bsu016_u:9850: 'dhvani sumeruparamāṇurajaḥsamaiḥ kalpaiḥ ekasmin suprabhanāmadheye kalpe pañca buddhaśatāni
K09bsu016_u:9857: yeṣāṃ prāthamakalpiko mahākāruṇiko nāma tathāgato ratnaprabhāyāṃ lokadhātāvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate /
K09bsu016_u:9858: tasyāmeva lokadhātau dvitīyaḥ sarvajagaddhitapraṇidhānacandro nāma tathāgata utpatsyate /
K09bsu016_u:9863: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anye te tena kālena tena samayena aparādhinaḥ puruṣā rājakilbiṣakāriṇo
K09bsu016_u:9864: 'bhūvan ye te mayā vadhyaghātavaśagatāḥ svakāyajīvitaṃ parityajya tato bandhanāt parimokṣitāḥ?
K09bsu016_u:9867: tadanyāni ca daśaḥ bodhisattvāsaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrāṇi yairbhagavato 'nantabalavighuṣṭanirnāditaśrīsaṃbhavamatestathāgatasya darśanena anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam,
K09bsu016_u:9870: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena jayaprabho nāma rājā abhūt?
K09bsu016_u:9872: satyakaḥ sa mahāvādī tena kālena tena samayena jayaprabho nāma rājā abhūt /
K09bsu016_u:9873: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena rājaparivāro 'bhūdantaḥpurastryāgāradauvārikapārṣadyā vā anuyātrikā vā?
K09bsu016_u:9878: tāni ca sarvāṇi bhagavatā vyākṛtānyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
K09bsu016_u:9880: sa khalu punaḥ kulaputra vijitāvī rājakumāro mātāpitṛbhyāmanujñātastān bandhanagatān
K09bsu016_u:9881: sattvān parimocya sphītāṃ vasumatīṃ dhanakanakaratnasamṛddhāmapahāya putradāraṃ cotsṛjya
K09bsu016_u:9896: sa evaṃ dharmasamanvāgataḥ praticittakṣaṇe daśasu dikṣu daśabuddhakṣetrasahasrāṇyākrāmati sma /
K09bsu016_u:9897: ekaikasyāṃ ca lokadhātau cittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe daśa buddhasahasrāṇi pūrvāntāparāntato 'nusmarati sma /
K09bsu016_u:9898: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānāṃ daśa buddhanirmāṇasamudrasahasrāṇi daśadikprasṛtānyavataranti sma /
K09bsu016_u:9901: upapadyamānān hīnān praṇītān sugatān durgatān suvarṇān durvarṇān yathākāmopagatān /
K09bsu016_u:9903: cittaparivartān cittacaritāni cintānantaryatāmāśayanānātvamindriyasāgarānapi prayogaprasarānapi karmāvasānamapi paripākavinayakālamapi avatarati sma //
K09bsu016_u:9904: sa khalu punaḥ kulaputra vijitāvī rājakumārastataścyutvā tatraiva jambudvīpe rativyūhāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ tasminneva rājakule upapadya cakravartirājyaiścaryaṃ pratyalabhata /
K09bsu016_u:9905: tena cakravartirājabhūtena tasya bhagavato dharmacakranirghoṣagaganameghapradīparājasya tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasyānantaraṃ dharmagaganābhyudgataśrīrājo nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9906: tasyānantaraṃ tatraiva bodhimaṇḍe śakrabhūtena devendragarbho nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9907: tasyānantaraṃ tatraiva lokadhātau suyāmadevarājabhūtena dharaṇīśrīparvatatejo nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9908: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva lokadhātau saṃtuṣitadevarājabhūtena dharmacakraprabhanirghoṣarājo nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9909: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva lokadhātau sunirmitadevarājabhūtena gaganakāntarājo nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9911: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva lokadhātāvasurendrabhūtena sarvadharmanigarjitarājo nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9912: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva lokadhātau brahmendrabhūtena dharmacakranirmāṇasamantapratibhāsanirghoṣo nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9913: iti hi kulaputra etāṃstathāgatān pramukhān kṛtvā tasyāmeva ratnaprabhāyāṃ lokadhātau tasminneva suprabhe kalpe daśa buddhasahasrāṇyudapadyanta
K09bsu016_u:9914: sarve ca te tathāgatā vijitāvinā rājakumāreṇārāgitāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9915: tasya khalu punaḥ kulaputra suprabhasya mahākalpasyānantaraṃ suraśmirnāma kalpo 'bhūt /
K09bsu016_u:9917: ahaṃ ca tasmin kalpe mahāmatirnāma rājā abhūvam /
K09bsu016_u:9918: tena me rājabhūtena lakṣaṇaśrīparvato nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9919: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva kalpe gṛhapatibhūtena saṃvṛtaskandho nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9920: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva kalpe amātyabhūtena vimalavatso nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9921: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva kalpe 'surendrabhūtena veśadhārī nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9922: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva kalpe vṛkṣadevatābhūtena lakṣaṇasumerurnāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9923: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva kalpe sārthavāhabhūtena vimalabāhurnāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9924: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva kalpe nagaradevatābhūten siṃhavikrāntagāmī nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9925: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva kalpe vaiśravaṇabhūtena devendracūḍo nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9926: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva kalpe gandharvarājabhūtena dharmodgatakīrtināma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9927: tasyānantaraṃ tasminneva kalpe kumbhāṇḍendrabhūtena avabhāsamakuṭī nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ //
K09bsu016_u:9928: iti hi kulaputra mayaitān daśa tathāgatān pramukhān kṛtvā tatra suraśmikalpe ṣaṣṭirbuddhakoṭya ārāgitāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9929: nānopapattikāyikayā sarve ca me tathāgatāḥ pūjitāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9930: ekaikaṃ (Gv 279) ca tathāgatamupasaṃkrāmantyā anantamadhyaḥ sattvadhāturanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paripācitaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9936: yathā ca tatra suraśmikalpe tathāgatā ārāgitāḥ,
K09bsu016_u:9938: ye 'pi tadanyebhyo lokadhātubhya āgatya tathāgatā dharmaṃ deśayamāsuḥ,
K09bsu016_u:9941: sarve ca mayā te tathāgatā ārāgitā abhirādhitāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9942: teṣāṃ ca me buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śāsanaṃ saṃdhāritam /
K09bsu016_u:9943: sarveṣāṃ ca me teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmantikādeṣa sarvasattvaparipākayathāśayasaṃcodanakuśalamūlasaṃbhavo bodhisattvavimokṣaḥ pratilabdho nānāpratilābhanayanānāvimokṣanayamukhaiḥ
K09bsu016_u:9944: atha khalu sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhā rātridevatā tasyāṃ velāyāmetaṃ vimokṣanayaṃ paridīpayantī saṃdarśayamānā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata -
K09bsu016_u:9945: acintyametaṃ paramaṃ vimokṣaṃ māṃ pṛcchasi tvaṃ khalu yatprapītaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9948: sarvānatikramya babhūva ramyā ratnaprabhā yā khalu lokadhātuḥ // 13 //
K09bsu016_u:9950: ārāgitāste khalu me munīndrā vimokṣametaṃ paribhāvayantyā // 14 //
K09bsu016_u:9956: vadhāya sṛṣṭāni nṛpeṇa tena tadā sahasrāṇyaparādhināṃ hi /
K09bsu016_u:9957: dṛṣṭvā kumāraḥ kṛpayā parītastān vipramokṣāya nṛpaṃ yayāce // 17 //
K09bsu016_u:9958: śrutvā nṛpo 'mātyagaṇaṃ tadānīmāhūya teṣāṃ nikhilaṃ tadāha /
K09bsu016_u:9959: te procurenaṃ praṇipatya sarve tvaddhātanāyaiṣa nṛpa prayogaḥ // 18 //
K09bsu016_u:9962: śrutvā vadhotsṛṣṭamathāsya mātā sāntaḥpurārtā nṛpatiṃ yayāce /
K09bsu016_u:9963: muñcārdhamāsaṃ nṛpate kumāraṃ dātuṃ pradānānyakhilāni loke // 20 //
K09bsu016_u:9964: dattābhyanujñaśca nṛpeṇa tena prādātsa dānāni yathocitāni /
K09bsu016_u:9966: pāṣaṇḍināṃ yasya yadīpsitaṃ tat tasmai dadāti sma vadhāya sajjaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9967: muktārtanādātha vinirjagāma sā rājadhānyā janatā samagrā // 22 //
K09bsu016_u:9969: pakvāni jñātvā jagadindriyāṇi taṃ yajñavāṭaṃ kṛpayā jagāma // 23 //
K09bsu016_u:9973: anantamadhyāṃ janatāṃ vinīya sa vyākaroti sma tadāgrabodhau /
K09bsu016_u:9975: ārāgya buddhaṃ vipulaṃ ca tasmai vidhāya pūjāṃ mudito babhāṣe /
K09bsu016_u:9976: dvīpo bhaveyaṃ jagatāṃ vinetā trāṇaṃ śaraṇyaśca parāyaṇaṃ ca // 26 //
K09bsu016_u:9977: sa prāvrajattasya muneḥ samīpe saṃbodhimārgaṃ parimārgamāṇaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9978: dharmasvabhāvaṃ suparīkṣamāṇo yatra sthitaḥ kalpaśatāni cīrṇaḥ // 27 //
K09bsu016_u:9980: saṃbodhimārgaṃ paribhāvayitvā labhate tadānīṃ sa vimokṣametam // 28 //
K09bsu016_u:9981: ye tatra kalpe sugatā babhūvurārāgya tānapyakhilān prasannaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9982: pūjāṃ ca teṣāmakarodudārāṃ saṃdhārayāmāsa ca dharmacakram // 29 //
K09bsu016_u:9985: ahaṃ sa āsaṃ vijitāvināmā dṛṣṭvā narāṃścārakabandhanasthān /
K09bsu016_u:9986: tadvipramokṣāya visṛjya dehaṃ labdho mamāyaṃ hi tadā vimokṣaḥ // 31 //
K09bsu016_u:9990: dṛṣṭāśca me kecana ye munīndrāḥ prāptaśca yaṃ me nikhileṣvavāptaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9994: kṣetrāṇi sarvāṇyapi sarvadikṣu spharanti kāyena asajjamānāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:9997: vidarśayantyeva ca te jineṣu svakāyameghān pratibimbabhūtāḥ // 36 //
K09bsu016_u:9999: vyūhānaśeṣānabhivarṣamāṇāḥ pūjāṃ prakurvanti ca te jinānām // 37 //
K09bsu016_u:10002: sarvāsvaśeṣāsu ca dikṣu yānti cakṣuṣpathe te jinamaṇḍaleṣu /
K09bsu016_u:10012: yatra pratiṣṭhāya caranti caryāṃ kṣetreṣu sarveṣvaparāntakalpān // 43 //
K09bsu016_u:10018: acchambhi te varṇamahāsamudrān vimokṣametaṃ pratilabhya śāntam // 46 //
K09bsu016_u:10020: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ sarvalokagatisamatikrāntānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sarvalokopapattipratibhāsaprāptānāṃ (Gv 284)
K09bsu016_u:10024: sarvavākpathanayasāgarānuprasṛtabuddhīnāṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇasamudrān vā avatartuṃ
K09bsu016_u:10025: jñānavikramo parijñātuṃ cintāvasthānaṃ vā prajñātuṃ samādhivaśitā vādhigantuṃ vimokṣavikurvitaṃ vā samājñātum //
K09bsu016_u:10027: iyamihaiva jambudvīpe lumbinīvane sutejomaṇḍalaratiśrīrnāma lumbinīvanadevatā prativasati /
K09bsu016_u:10028: tāmupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvā jātā bhavanti tathāgatakule?
K09bsu016_u:10030: kathamaparāntakoṭīgatān kalpān bodhisattvasaṃcārikāṃ caranto na parikhidyante?
K09bsu016_u:10031: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhāyā rātridevatāyāḥ
K09bsu016_u:10037: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ sarvajagadrakṣāpraṇidhānavīryaprabhāyā rātridevatāyāstāmanuśāsanīmanusmaran
K09bsu016_u:10040: upetya lumbinīvanaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya sutejomaṇḍalaratiśriyaṃ lumbinīvanadevatāṃ parigaveṣamāṇo
K09bsu016_u:10043: puraskṛtāṃ dharmaṃ deśayamānāṃ sarvabodhisattvajanmasamudranirdeśaṃ nāma sūtrāntaṃ
K09bsu016_u:10046: upetya sutejomaṇḍalaratiśrīlumbinīvanadevatāyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - mayā devate anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
K09bsu016_u:10047: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvā jātā bhavanti tathāgatakule,
K09bsu016_u:10050: - daśemāni kulaputra bodhisattvajanmāni yaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvā jātā bhavanti tathāgatakuleṣu /
K09bsu016_u:10052: na vitiṣṭhante na viṣīdanti na vivartante na pratiprasrabhyante na parikhidyante na saṃsīdanti na muhyanti nāvalīyante na paritrasyanti na praṇaśyanti
K09bsu016_u:10075: iha kulaputra bodhisattvaḥ ādita eva buddhopasthānāya prapūjyate sarvabuddhān bhagavataḥ
K09bsu016_u:10076: satkurvan gurukurvan mānayan pūjayan upatiṣṭhan ārāgayan avirāgayan tathāgatadarśanāvitṛpto
K09bsu016_u:10080: idaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvānāṃ sarvabuddhapūjopasthānapraṇidhiprayogagarbhaṃ nāma prathamaṃ bodhisattvajanma sarvajñatāsaṃbhārakuśalamūlasaṃbhavasamārjanatāyai saṃvartate //
K09bsu016_u:10094: idaṃ kulaputra bodhicittāṅgapariniṣpattisaṃbhavagarbhaṃ nāma dvitīyaṃ bodhisattvajanma //
K09bsu016_u:10095: tatra kulaputra katamadbodhisattvānāṃ dharmanayanidhyaptiprayoganetryabhimukhasaṃbhavagarbhaṃ nāma tṛtīyaṃ bodhisattvajanma?
K09bsu016_u:10102: tatra kulaputra katamadbodhisattvānāṃ tryadhvalokādhyāśayaviśuddhigarbhaṃ nāma caturthaṃ bodhisattvajanma?
K09bsu016_u:10114: idaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvānāṃ tryadhvalokādhyāśayaviśuddhigarbhaṃ nāma caturthaṃ bodhisattvajanma //
K09bsu016_u:10116: tatra kulaputra katamadbodhisattvānāṃ samantāvabhāsaprabhāgarbhaṃ nāma pañcamaṃ bodhisattvajanma?
K09bsu016_u:10117: iha kulaputra bodhisattvaḥ prayogasaṃpanno bhavati sarvajagatparipākavinayapratipannaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:10127: idaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvānāṃ samantāvabhāsaprabhāgarbhaṃ nāma pañcamaṃ bodhisattvajanma //
K09bsu016_u:10128: tatra kulaputra katamadbodhisattvānāṃ sarvatathāgatakulagotrasaṃbhavagarbhaṃ nāma ṣaṣṭhaṃ bodhisattvajanma?
K09bsu016_u:10129: iha kulaputra bodhisattvo jāto bhavati tathāgatakule 'nujāto bhavati,
K09bsu016_u:10138: idaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvānāṃ sarvatathāgatakulagotrasaṃbhavagarbhaṃ nāma ṣaṣṭhaṃ bodhisattvajanma //
K09bsu016_u:10139: tatra kulaputra katamadbodhisattvānāṃ tathāgatabalāvabhāsālokālaṃkāragarbhaṃ nāma saptamaṃ bodhisattvajanma?
K09bsu016_u:10140: iha kulaputra bodhisattvo buddhabalapraveśāvabhāse na nivartate buddhakṣetragamaneṣu /
K09bsu016_u:10149: idaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvānāṃ tathāgatabalāvabhāsālokālaṃkāragarbhaṃ nāma saptamaṃ bodhisattvajanma //
K09bsu016_u:10151: iha kulaputra bodhisattvaḥ kumārabhūta eva bodhisattvavyavasthānavyavasthito bhavati,
K09bsu016_u:10153: ekaikatra jñānanayamukhe 'prameyāḥ kalpāḥ kṣayaṃ vrajeyuraprameyaṃ bodhisattvagocaraṃ nirdiśataḥ /
K09bsu016_u:10160: aprameyāṃ ca dharmatāṃ parīttāṃ mahadgatāṃ vā pratividhyati /
K09bsu016_u:10165: tatra kulaputra katamadbodhisattvānāṃ dharmadhātunirmāṇavyūhagarbhaṃ nāma bodhisattvajanma?
K09bsu016_u:10166: iha kulaputra bodhisattvaḥ sarvatra cittakṣaṇe nānāvyūhāni buddhakṣetrāṇi adhitiṣṭhati /
K09bsu016_u:10178: idaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvānāṃ dharmadhātunirmāṇavyūhagarbhaṃ nāma navamaṃ bodhisattvajanma //
K09bsu016_u:10179: tatra kulaputra katamadbodhisattvānāṃ tathāgatabhūmyākramaṇavegagarbhaṃ nāma daśamaṃ bodhisattvajanma?
K09bsu016_u:10180: iha kulaputra bodhisattvo vivikto bhavati sarvatryadhvatathāgataikībhāvaviṣaye /
K09bsu016_u:10186: sarvakalpasaṃvartavivartakalpānāṃ ca pūrvāntāparāntapratyuatpannānāṃ sanāmnāṃ sopadeśānāmānantaryaṃ prajānāti /
K09bsu016_u:10189: idaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvānāṃ tathāgatabhūmyākramaṇavegagarbhaṃ nāma daśamaṃ bodhisattvajanma //
K09bsu016_u:10190: imāni kulaputra bodhisattvānāṃ daśa bodhisattvajanmāni yeṣu bodhisattvā jāyante upapadyante samarjayanti saṃvardhayanti pratipūrayanti saṃbhavanti parisaṃbhavanti pariniṣpadyante /
K09bsu016_u:10201: atha khalu sutejomaṇḍalaratiśrīrlumbinīvanadevatā tasyāṃ velāyāmetameva bodhisattvajanmārthamabhidyotayantī
K09bsu016_u:10202: buddhādhiṣṭhānena daśa diśo vyavalokya sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata -
K09bsu016_u:10203: adhyāśayena vimalena anāvilena paśyanti ye jina na jātu bhavanti tṛptāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:10204: sarvān jināna aparāntaviyūhameghān praṇidhyenti te prathamajanmasthitāḥ sumedhāḥ // 1 //
K09bsu016_u:10205: sarvatriyadhvagamaśeṣa spharitva lokaṃ kṣetrāṇi sarva tatha dharma tathaiva buddhān /
K09bsu016_u:10207: ye dharmamegha pibamāna na jātu tṛptāḥ nidhyaptimānasa triyadhvaasaṅgakāyāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:10208: ākāśadhātuvimalā samacittakāyāḥ janmaṃ tṛtīyamidamapratimaṃ hi teṣām // 3 //
K09bsu016_u:10210: sarvajñatānayasamudra viśāhamānāḥ teṣāṃ caturthamiha janma nararṣabhāṇām // 4 //
K09bsu016_u:10211: ye maitrayā daśasu dikṣu jagatspharitvā abhinirharantyamalapāramitāsamudrān /
K09bsu016_u:10212: paripācayanti jagu dharmaprabhābhiranta imu janmu pañcamu mahāpuruṣāṇa teṣām // 5 //
K09bsu016_u:10214: ye dharmadhātunayasāgaramotaranti ṣaṣṭhaṃ idaṃ vipula janma vidūna teṣām // 6 //
K09bsu016_u:10215: ye dharmakāya pariśuddha asaṅgacittāḥ kṣetrāṇyaśeṣatu spharitva svakaiḥ śarīraiḥ /
K09bsu016_u:10219: sarvaṃ samādhinayasāgara otaranti janmāṣṭamaṃ matamidaṃ tathatāśrayāṇām // 8 //
K09bsu016_u:10221: bauddhā vikurvitaviyūha vidarśayanti teṣāmidaṃ navamu janma mahāśayānām // 9 //
K09bsu016_u:10222: ye te yathābala jināna tathā praviṣṭāḥ sarvajñatāvipulavegavivardhamānāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:10224: ebhiḥ kulaputra bodhisattvo daśabhirjanmabhistathāgatakule jāta evamālokakaro bhavati sarvasattvānām /
K09bsu016_u:10225: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputra ahamaprameyakalpasarvārambaṇabodhisattvajanmavikurvitasaṃdarśanasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya lābhinī /
K09bsu016_u:10226: āha - ka etasya devate aprameyakalpasarvārambaṇabodhisattvajanmavikurvitasaṃdarśanasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya viṣayaḥ?
K09bsu016_u:10228: sā khalvahaṃ kulaputra bhagavato vairocanasya vipulaṃ janmasamudramavatarāmi /
K09bsu016_u:10229: yaduta asyāṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau bodhisattvajanma avataramāṇā bhāgavatyāṃ
K09bsu016_u:10246: (Gv 291) punaḥ sarvasminniha lumbinīvane sarvavṛkṣeṣu mahāmaṇiratnakośā abhinirvṛttāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:10248: punaḥ sarvasminniha lumbinīvane sarvanalinīṣu sarvāṇi jalajaratnapuṣpāṇi śuṅgībhūtāni dharaṇitalādabhyudgamya vārisamudgatāni samavāsthiṣanta
K09bsu016_u:10250: punaryāvanta iha lokadhātau kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāśca devaputrā nāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragā lokendrajagadindrā vā,
K09bsu016_u:10251: te 'pyasmin lumbinīvane sarve kṛtāñjalipuṭāḥ sthitā abhūvan /
K09bsu016_u:10253: punaryāvanta iha cāturdvīpikāyāṃ lokadhātau devakanyā vā nāgakanyā vā yakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragakanyā vā,
K09bsu016_u:10254: tāḥ sarvāḥ pramuditamānasāḥ sarvapūjāvidhiparigṛhītahastāḥ plakṣaśākhābhimukhāḥ praṇatakāyāḥ sthitā abhūvan /
K09bsu016_u:10256: punardaśabhyo digbhyaḥ sarvatathāgatānāṃ nābhimaṇḍalebhyo niścaramāṇā bodhisattvajanmavikurvitapradīpā
K09bsu016_u:10257: nāma raśmayo niścaritvā sarvamidaṃ lumbinīvanamavabhāsya tiṣṭhanti sma /
K09bsu016_u:10258: teṣu ca sarvaraśmimukhamaṇḍaleṣu teṣāṃ sarvatathāgatānāṃ janmavikurvitāni pratibhāsaprāptāni saṃdṛśyante sma /
K09bsu016_u:10259: saṃprasavavikurvitāḥ sarvabodhisattvaguṇāśca buddhasvarasaṃprayuktāstebhyo raśmimukhamaṇḍalebhyo niścaramāṇāḥ śrūyante sma /
K09bsu016_u:10261: imāni daśa pūrvanimittāni prādurbhūtāni bodhisattvajanmakālasamaye pratyupasthite,
K09bsu016_u:10262: yeṣāṃ prādurbhāvādvitarkamabhavat sarvalokendrāṇāṃ bodhisattvo janiṣyata iti /
K09bsu016_u:10263: sā khalu punarahaṃ kulaputra eṣāṃ daśānāṃ pūrvanimittānāṃ darśanādacintyaṃ prītivegaṃ pratilabhe //
K09bsu016_u:10264: punaraparaṃ kulaputra māyādevyāḥ kapilavastuno mahānagarānniṣkramantyā iha lumbinīvane daśa mahāvabhāsapūrvanimittāni prādurabhūvan,
K09bsu016_u:10288: tatra kulaputra māyāyā devyāḥ plakṣadrumanilayagatāyāḥ saṃnipatitānāṃ sarvalokendrāṇāṃ
K09bsu016_u:10290: sarveṣāṃ ca rūpāvacarāṇāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ nirāmagandhānāṃ sarveṣāṃ ca devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragāṇāṃ
K09bsu016_u:10293: asyāṃ ca trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau yāḥ prabhāḥ,
K09bsu016_u:10296: anāvṛtā apravyāhṛtā asaṅgāḥ sarvadiśaḥ spharitvā sarvāṇi nairayikāṇi duḥkhāni sarvāṇi
K09bsu016_u:10297: tairyagyonikāni duḥkhāni sarvāṇi ca yāmalaukikāni duḥkhāni sarvabhavagatiparyāpannānāṃ
K09bsu016_u:10298: ca sattvānāṃ sarvaduḥkhāni saṃkleśāṃśca praśamayitvā tiṣṭhanti bhāsante tapanti virocante sma /
K09bsu016_u:10299: idaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvasya lumbinīvane prathamaṃ janmavikurvitam //
K09bsu016_u:10300: punaraparaṃ kulaputra yasmin samaye māyāyā devyāḥ kukṣau sarvāvatīyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrā lokadhāturantargatā pratibhāsaprāptā saṃdṛśyate
K09bsu016_u:10301: tasyāṃ ca trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau koṭīśatacāturdvīpikānāṃ lokadhātūnāṃ
K09bsu016_u:10302: sarve jambudvīpeṣu nānānāmadheyāsu rājadhānīṣu nānānāmadheyeṣu vanaṣaṇḍeṣu nānāvṛkṣamūleṣu
K09bsu016_u:10303: māyādevī upagatā evameva saṃdṛśyate sma sarvalokendraparivṛtā bodhisattvajanmapratyupasthānā
K09bsu016_u:10305: idaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvasya lumbinīvane dvitīyaṃ janmavikurvitam //
K09bsu016_u:10306: punaraparaṃ kulaputra māyāyā devyāḥ sarvaromavivarebhya ekaikasmādromamukhādyāvanto bhagavatā pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā tathāgatā ārāgitāḥ satkṛtā gurukṛtā mānitā pūjitāḥ,
K09bsu016_u:10309: sa sarvastebhyo romavivarebhyo buddhasvarāṅgasaṃprayukto nikhilena śrūyate sma /
K09bsu016_u:10310: tadyathāpi nāma vārirāśe rajasi kanakaparamāṇurajasi vā ādarśamaṇḍale vā svacche
K09bsu016_u:10312: evameva kulaputra māyāyā devyāḥ sarvaromamukhamaṇḍaleṣu pūrvatathāgatavikurvitāni saṃdṛśyante sma sarvadharmadeśanānirghoṣāṇi /
K09bsu016_u:10313: idaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvasya lumbinīvane tṛtīyaṃ janmavikurvitam //
K09bsu016_u:10314: punaraparaṃ kulaputra māyāyā devyāḥ sarvakāyātsarvaromamukhamaṇḍalebhya ekaikasmādromavivarādyāvatsu
K09bsu016_u:10315: sarvakṣetreṣu yāvatsu lokadhātusamudreṣu yāvatsu lokadhātuvaṃśeṣu yāvatsu lokadhātusaṃjñāgateṣu
K09bsu016_u:10317: yatpratiṣṭhāneṣu kṣetreṣu yatsaṃsthāneṣu yadvyūheṣu yaccharīreṣu yatparvatālaṃkāreṣu
K09bsu016_u:10324: te sarve buddhakṣetraprasarā māyāyā devyāḥ sarvaromamukhebhyaḥ saṃdṛśyante sma /
K09bsu016_u:10328: sarveṣu ca teṣu tāsu tāsūpapattiṣu māyādevī bodhisattvasya jananī babhūva /
K09bsu016_u:10329: sarve ca te bodhisattvakāyā māyāyā devyā romavivareṣu vikurvitapratibhāsaprāptāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma /
K09bsu016_u:10330: idaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvasya lumbinīvane caturthaṃ janmavikurvitam //
K09bsu016_u:10331: punaraparaṃ kulaputra yāvadbhiḥ kāyairbhagavān pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacārikāmacarat yadvarṇairyatsaṃsthānairyadākārairyatparibhogairyatsukhaduḥkhapratisaṃvedībhiryajjātiparivartaiḥ,
K09bsu016_u:10332: te sarve māyāyā devyāḥ kāye sarvaromamukheṣu pratibhāsaprāptāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma /
K09bsu016_u:10333: idaṃ kulaputra lumbinīvane bodhisattvasya pañcamaṃ janmavikurvitam //
K09bsu016_u:10334: punaraparaṃ kulaputra yāvanto bhagavatā pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacārikāṃ caratā duṣkaraparityāgāḥ parityaktāḥ,
K09bsu016_u:10335: hastapādaparityāgā vā karṇanāsāparityāgā vā jihvādaṃṣṭrāparityāgā vā nayanottamāṅgaparityāgā
K09bsu016_u:10336: vā māṃsaśoṇitaparityāgā vā asthimajjāparityāgā vā vakṣohṛdayaparityāgā vā chavicarmaparityāgā
K09bsu016_u:10337: vā bāhyādhyātmikavastuparityāgā vā putraduhitṛbhāryāparityāgā vā ātmabhāvaparityāgā
K09bsu016_u:10340: vā śayyāsanaparityāgā vā gṛhavimānaparityāgā vā sarvopabhogaparityāgā vā,
K09bsu016_u:10341: te ca dāyakabodhisattvavigrahakāyai rūpaiḥ parityajanti sma /
K09bsu016_u:10342: te ca pratigrāhakāyai rūpaiḥ pratigṛhṇanti sma /
K09bsu016_u:10346: sarve te māyāyā devyāḥ sarvaromavivarebhyaḥ pratibhāsaprāptāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma /
K09bsu016_u:10347: idaṃ kulaputra lumbinīvane bodhisattvasya ṣaṣṭhaṃ janmavikurvitam //
K09bsu016_u:10348: punaraparaṃ kulaputra ....................... lumbinīvanaṣaṇḍe samavasṛtā abhijātajagadvijñānā prādurabhavat /
K09bsu016_u:10349: idaṃ kulaputra lumbinīvane bodhisattvasya saptamaṃ janmavikurvitam //
K09bsu016_u:10352: yaduta sarvamaṇirājakūṭāgāraparibhogā vā maṇirājavimānaparibhogā vā maṇirājajālaparibhogā
K09bsu016_u:10353: vā maṇirājavigrahaparibhogā vā maṇirājabimbaparibhogā vā maṇirājavyūhā vā sarvābharaṇaparibhogā
K09bsu016_u:10355: te sarve māyāyā devyāḥ kukṣeranyonyāsaṃbhinnā niścaritvā iha lumbinīvane samantavyūhāḥ samavāsthiṣanta /
K09bsu016_u:10358: punaraparaṃ kulaputra māyāyā devyāḥ kukṣeḥ prathamataraṃ daśabuddhakṣetrānabhilāpyakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraparamāṇurajaḥsamā
K09bsu016_u:10361: sadṛśaparivārāḥ sadṛśavyūhā niścaranti sma bhagavato varṇasamudrānudīrayamāṇāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:10362: idaṃ kulaputra lumbinīvane bodhisattvasya navamaṃ janmavikurvitam //
K09bsu016_u:10363: punaraparaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvasya janmakālasamaye pravṛtte māyāyā devyāḥ purastādadho
K09bsu016_u:10372: idaṃ kulaputra lumbinīvane bodhisattvasya daśamaṃ janmavikurvitam //
K09bsu016_u:10373: imāni kulaputra lumbinīvane bodhisattvasya daśa janmavikurvitāni prādurabhūvan /
K09bsu016_u:10374: tataḥ paścādbodhisattvo 'cintyāpramāṇaprabhāsecanakadarśano māyāyā devyāḥ kukṣerabhyudgataḥ sūryamaṇḍalamiva gaganatalāt,
K09bsu016_u:10378: ityevaṃ bodhisattvo māyāyā devyāḥ kukṣerabhiniṣkramaṇaṃ saṃdarśayāmāsa māyāgatarūpavijñaptisaṃdarśanadharmatayā anāgatadharmatayā anutpādānirodhalokavijñaptisaṃdarśanadharmatayā
K09bsu016_u:10379: ityevamahaṃ kulaputra bhagavato vairocanasya janmavikurvitasamudrānavatarāmi iha lumbinīvane viharamāṇā /
K09bsu016_u:10380: yathā cāhaṃ kulaputra syāṃ bhāgavatyāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāṃ bhagavato vairocanasya janmavikurvitasamudrānavatarāmi,
K09bsu016_u:10381: tathā sarvāvatyāṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau sarvacāturdvīpikāsu koṭīśatajambudvīpānāṃ sarvatra bhagavato vairocanasya janmavikurvitānyavatarāmi
K09bsu016_u:10382: yathā cāhaṃ kulaputra asyāṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasrāyāṃ lokadhātau sarvacāturdvīpikāsu koṭīśatajambudvīpānāṃ bhagavato vairocanasya koṭīśataṃ janmavikurvitānāmavatarāmi,
K09bsu016_u:10386: tadanantareṇa cittena buddhakṣetrasahasraparamāṇurajontargateṣu buddhakṣetreṣu ekaikatra buddhatatsamānyeva bodhisattvajanmavikurvitānyavatarāmi
K09bsu016_u:10390: sarvaparamāṇurajaḥsu ekaikasmin paramāṇurajasi buddhakṣetraparaṃparāṇāṃ na ca paryantamupaimi sarvakṣetreṣvekaikasmin buddhakṣetre buddhasattvajanmaparaṃparāṇām
K09bsu016_u:10392: tathā daśasu dikṣu anantamadhyāsu lokadhātuṣu sarvaparamāṇurajaḥsu praticittakṣaṇamekaikena
K09bsu016_u:10397: āha - bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra atīte 'dhvani buddhakṣetrakoṭīparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ kalpānāṃ
K09bsu016_u:10398: pareṇa parataramīśvaraguṇāparājitadhvajo nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka
K09bsu016_u:10399: udapādi vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ
K09bsu016_u:10400: buddho bhagavān samantaratnāyāṃ lokadhātau samāpadyate kalpe 'śītibuddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraprabhave /
K09bsu016_u:10401: tasyāṃ khalu kulaputra samantaratnāyāṃ lokadhātau vicitravyūhaprabhā nāma madhyamā cāturdvīpikābhūt /
K09bsu016_u:10402: tasyāṃ khalu cāturdvīpikāyāṃ madhye jambudvīpasya meruviśuddhavyūhadhvajā nāma rājadhānyabhūt /
K09bsu016_u:10403: tasyāṃ khalu rājadhānyāṃ ratnārcinetraprabho nāma rājā abhūt /
K09bsu016_u:10404: rājñaḥ khalu kulaputra ratnārcinetraprabhasya rājñaḥ suharṣitaprabheśvarā nāma bhāryābhūt /
K09bsu016_u:10405: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra asyāṃ bhāgavatyāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāmiha jambudvīpe māyādevī bhagavato vairocanasya janetrī,
K09bsu016_u:10406: evameva kulaputra tena kālena tena samayena tasyāṃ vicitravyūhaprabhāyāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāṃ
K09bsu016_u:10407: jambudvīpe suharṣitaprabheśvarā nāma tasya bhagavata īśvaraguṇāparājitadhvajasya
K09bsu016_u:10409: yathā teṣāmaśītibuddhakoṭīniyutānāṃ pūrvaṃgamasya prāthamakalpikasya bhagavata īśvaraguṇāparājitadhvajasya tathāgatasya mātā abhūt /
K09bsu016_u:10410: sā khalu kulaputra suharṣitaprabheśvarā devī bodhisattvasya janmakālasamaye viṃśatyā strīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ suvarṇapuṣpābhamaṇḍalaṃ nāma mahodyānaṃ niryayau,
K09bsu016_u:10411: yatra tamīśvaraguṇāparājitadhvajaṃ kumāraṃ janayāmāsa acintyena bodhisattvavikurvitena /
K09bsu016_u:10412: tena khalu punaḥ samayena suvarṇapuṣpābhamaṇḍalasya nāma mahodyānasya madhye śubharatnavicitrakūṭaṃ nāma kūṭāgāramabhūt /
