K09bsu016_u:10413: tasmin kūṭāgāre sarvakāmaṃdadavṛkṣaśākhāmadhyālambatayā suharṣitaprabheśvarāyā devyāḥ sa bhagavānīśvaraguṇāparājitadhvajastathāgato janitaḥ
K09bsu016_u:10414: tena khalu samayena tasya bhagavato janmakāle vimalasaṃbhavaprabhā nāma dhātrī pratyupasthitābhūt /
K09bsu016_u:10417: pūjābhirabhipūjya tasyā vimalasaṃbhavaprabhāyā dhātryā aṅke prāyacchan /
K09bsu016_u:10418: parigṛhītamātre ca tasmin bodhisattve tayā dhātryā ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyāmaṃse ca,
K09bsu016_u:10419: tatkṣaṇameva sā dhātrī mahāprītiprāmodyavegapratilabdhā samantacakṣurviṣayaṃ nāma bodhisattvasamādhiṃ pratyalabhata,
K09bsu016_u:10423: bodhisattvavimokṣo 'vakrāntaḥ susūkṣmaḥ tadyathāpi nāma taddivasāvakrānte mātuḥ kukṣau garbhavijñānam,
K09bsu016_u:10425: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena vimalasaṃbhavaprabhā nāma bodhisattvadhātryabhūt?
K09bsu016_u:10427: ahaṃ sā tena kālena tena samayena vimalasaṃbhavaprabhā nāma bodhisattvadhātryabhūvam /
K09bsu016_u:10428: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyāni tena kālena tena samayena viṃśatistrīniyutaśatasahasrāṇyabhūvan?
K09bsu016_u:10432: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena supraharṣitaprabheśvarā nāma devyabhūdīśvaraguṇāparājitadhvajasya kumārasya janetrī?
K09bsu016_u:10434: iyaṃ sā māyādevī tena kālena tena samayena supraharṣitaprabheśvarā nāma devyabhūt /
K09bsu016_u:10435: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena ratnārcinetraprabho nāma rājā abhūt /
K09bsu016_u:10437: ayaṃ sa rājā śuddhodanaḥ tena kālena tena samayen ratnārcinetraprabho nāma rājā abhūt /
K09bsu016_u:10438: sā khalvahaṃ kulaputra tata upādāya sarvacittakṣaṇeṣvavirahitā abhūvaṃ bhagavato
K09bsu016_u:10440: yathā cāhaṃ kulaputra asyāṃ sahāyāṃ lokadhātau bhagavato vairocanasya mahāpraṇidhānasamudrasāgarasaṃbhavānāṃ
K09bsu016_u:10445: tathā daśasu dikṣu anantamadhyānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ sarvacittakṣaṇeṣu bodhisattvajanmavikurvitasāgarānavatarāmi /
K09bsu016_u:10454: paridīpayamānā buddhādhiṣṭhānena daśa diśo vyavalokya tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K09bsu016_u:10455: buddhaputra śṛṇu mahya bhāṣitaṃ yasmi pṛcchasi janitva gauravam /
K09bsu016_u:10459: kalpa ādiriva ananta nāyako yatrāśītinayutā jinānabhūt // 2 //
K09bsu016_u:10461: jānamāna maya draṣṭu nāyakaḥ svarṇapuṣpaprabhave vanottame // 3 //
K09bsu016_u:10462: nāmato vimalasaṃbhavaprabhā tasya āsi ahu dhātri paṇḍitā /
K09bsu016_u:10463: lokapāla mama aṃsi taṃ sthapī jātamātra kanakottamaprabham // 4 //
K09bsu016_u:10464: aṃsi taṃ grahiya agrapudgalaṃ mūrdhnimasya na prabhomi prekṣitum /
K09bsu016_u:10465: * * * * taṃ acintiyaṃ prekṣamāṇa na ca antu paśyami // 5 //
K09bsu016_u:10466: lakṣaṇebhi pratimaṇḍitaṃ śubhaṃ kāyamasya vimalaṃ sudarśanam /
K09bsu016_u:10467: dṛṣṭa me ratanabimbasādṛśaṃ prītivega atulā vivardhitāḥ // 6 //
K09bsu016_u:10468: cintayitva guṇa tasya me 'mitān puṇyasāgara ameya vardhitāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:10469: dṛṣṭva tasya ca vikurvitodadhīn bodhicittavipulaṃ mi saṃbhutam // 7 //
K09bsu016_u:10475: śrutva dharmamatha tasya tāyino labdhimaṃ varavimokṣamaṇḍalam /
K09bsu016_u:10477: yeṣu yāntakupapanna nāyakā te aśeṣa mayi sarvi pūjitāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:10478: śāsanaṃ ca maya teṣu dhāritaṃ śodhanā imu vimokṣasāgaram // 11 //
K09bsu016_u:10481: buddhakṣetri raja yāvato iho tān rajāgraprasarābdhi paśyatī /
K09bsu016_u:10482: ekameki raji kṣetrasāgarān pūrva śodhita jinena paśyatī // 13 //
K09bsu016_u:10483: teṣu kṣetraprasareṣu nāyakān jāyato vanavareṣu paśyami /
K09bsu016_u:10485: paśyami kvaci ca kṣetri nāyakān prārthayanta varabodhimuttamām /
K09bsu016_u:10492: janma yātuka jināna paśyami prekṣamāṇa raji kṣetrasāgarān /
K09bsu016_u:10493: janmi janmi bahukāyakoṭibhiḥ pūji teṣa karuṇāmupāgami // 18 //
K09bsu016_u:10495: teṣu sarvajagadāmukhā ahaṃ dharmamegha vipulān pravarṣami // 19 //
K09bsu016_u:10497: kalpakoṭinayutairacintiyairyaṃ na śakya ayu sarva darśitum // 20 //
K09bsu016_u:10499: kiṃ mayā śakyaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ cittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe sarvakalpaprasthānagarbhasaṃbhūtacittānāṃ
K09bsu016_u:10506: iyamihaiva kapilavastuni mahānagare gopā nāma śākyakanyā prativasati /
K09bsu016_u:10507: tāmupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvaparipākāya saṃsāre saṃsaritavyam //
K09bsu016_u:10508: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ sutejomaṇḍalaratiśriyo lumbinīvanadevatāyāḥ pādau
K09bsu016_u:10510: pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ punaravalokya sutejomaṇḍalaratiśriyo lumbinīvanadevatāyā antikātprakrāntaḥ // 40 //
K09bsu016_u:10513: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ sutejomaṇḍalaratiśriyo lumbinīvanadevatāyā antikādapakramya
K09bsu016_u:10515: bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ bhāvayan avataran vipulīkurvan anutiṣṭhan uttāpayan parijayan
K09bsu016_u:10516: paricintayan pravicinvan anupūrveṇa yena dharmadhātupratibhāsaprabho bodhisattvasaṃgītiprāsādastenopasaṃkrāmat /
K09bsu016_u:10518: sārdhaṃ pratyudgamya sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakamevamāha - svāgataṃ te mahāpuruṣa mahāprajñājñānavikrāmin
K09bsu016_u:10524: nacireṇa tvamanuttaratathāgatakāyavākcittālaṃkāraviśuddhiṃ pratilabdho lakṣaṇānuvyañjanapratimaṇḍitena kāyena daśabalajñānālokālaṃkṛtena cittena lokaṃ vicariṣyasi /
K09bsu016_u:10529: tathā hi tvaṃ kalyāṇamitropasaṃkramaṇadarśanaparyupāsanānuśāsanīḥ saṃpratīcchaṃstadguṇapratinayeṣu prayujyamāno na parikhidyase,
K09bsu016_u:10532: na ca te kaścidantarāyo vā āvaraṇaṃ vā nivaraṇaṃ vā prasahate,
K09bsu016_u:10534: tena acirādeva tvaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ prītikaro bhaviṣyasi //
K09bsu016_u:10535: evamukte sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako 'śokaśriyaṃ bodhisattvasaṃgītiprāsādadevatāmetadavocat - tathāstu devate yathā vadasi /
K09bsu016_u:10536: ahaṃ khalu devate sarvasattvakleśasaṃtāpavyupaśamena paramāṃ prītiṃ vindāmi /
K09bsu016_u:10537: sarvasattvaviṣayakarmavipākavinivartanena sarvasattvasukhasaṃbhavena sarvasattvānavadyakarmapratipattyā paramāṃ prītiṃ vindāmi /
K09bsu016_u:10538: yadā ca devate sattvā vividhaviṣayakarmakleśaprayogākṣiptacittā durgatiṣu prapatanti sugatiṣu vā,
K09bsu016_u:10541: tadyathāpi nāma devate puruṣasyaikāntatṛṣṇācaritasya ekaputrako bhavet priyo manāpaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:10542: sa tasyāṅgapratyaṅgeṣu cchidyamāneṣu ekāntatṛṣṇācaritatvāt paramadurmanāḥ syādanāttamanaskaḥ,
K09bsu016_u:10543: evameva devate bodhisattvo bodhisattvacārikāṃ caran sattvān karmakleśavaśena tisṛṣu durgatiṣu patitān dṛṣṭvā durmanā bhavati paramadurmanāḥ
K09bsu016_u:10544: yasmin vā punaḥ samaye sattvāḥ kāyavāṅbhanaḥsucaritasamādanahetoḥ kāyasya bhedātsugatau svargaloke deveṣūpapadyante,
K09bsu016_u:10546: paramasukhī tasmin samaye bodhisattvo bhavati sumanā āttamanaskaḥ pramuditaḥ (Gv 301)
K09bsu016_u:10548: na khalu punardevate bodhisattvā ātmārthāya sarvajñatāmabhiprārthayante /
K09bsu016_u:10549: na vicitrasaṃsāraratisukhaprabhavanārthaṃ na kāmadhātuparyāpannaṃ vividharativyūhaprārthanayā saṃjñācittadṛṣṭiviparyāsavaśena na saṃyojanabandhanānuśayaparyavasthānavaśagatāḥ
K09bsu016_u:10554: api tu khalu punardevate bodhisattvā bhavasamudragatānāmaparimitaduḥkhaprapīḍitānāṃ sattvānāmantike mahākaruṇāṃ saṃjanayitvā sarvajagatsaṃgrahamahāpraṇidhimabhinirharanti
K09bsu016_u:10555: te mahākaruṇāpraṇidhyabhinirhārabalavegena sattvaparipākavinayaprayuktāḥ saṃsāre bodhisattvacaryāṃ carantaḥ saṃdṛśyante /
K09bsu016_u:10558: te bodhisattvacaryāṃ carantaḥ saṃkliṣṭāni kṣetrāṇi saṃpaśyantaḥ sarvabuddhakṣetrapariśodhanapraṇidhimabhinirharanti
K09bsu016_u:10562: vikalāyatanānapariśuddhacetasaḥ sarvān saṃpaśyamānāḥ sarvasattvacittacaritāni pariśodhayamānā bodhisattvacaryāṃ caranto na parikhidyante /
K09bsu016_u:10563: evaṃ hi devate bodhisattvā anantamadhyāṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caranto 'parikhinnacittāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:10564: evaṃ caranto 'laṃkārabhūtā bhavanti sadevakasya lokasya devamanuṣyasaṃpattisaṃjananatayā /
K09bsu016_u:10586: evaṃ khalu devate pratipadyamānā bodhisattvāḥ priyā bhavanti sarvasattvānām //
K09bsu016_u:10587: atha khalu aśokaśrīrbodhisattvasaṃgītiprāsādadevatā sārdhaṃ tairdaśabhiḥ gṛhadevatāsahasraiḥ
K09bsu016_u:10599: na niśrayaste loke 'sminna niketo na saṃstavaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:10611: atha khalvaśokaśrīrbodhisattvasaṃgītiprāsādadevatā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakamābhirgāthābhirabhiṣṭutya gacchantaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubadhnāti sma dharmakāmatayā
K09bsu016_u:10612: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako dharmadhātupratibhāsaprabhabodhisattvasaṃgītiprāsādamupasaṃkramya anupraviśya samantādanuvilokayāmāsa gopāyāḥ śākyakanyāyā darśanakāmaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:10615: caturaśītyā sahasraiḥ parivṛtāṃ sarvāsāṃ pārthivakulasaṃbhavānāṃ pūrvabodhisattvacaryāsabhāgakuśalamūlānāṃ
K09bsu016_u:10625: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako yena gopā śākyakanyā tenopasaṃkramya gopāyāḥ śākyakanyāyāḥ
K09bsu016_u:10626: kramatalayoḥ sarvaśarīreṇa praṇipatya utthāya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha -
K09bsu016_u:10628: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvāḥ saṃsāre saṃsaranti,
K09bsu016_u:10649: evamukte gopā śākyakanyā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
K09bsu016_u:10650: yastvaṃ bodhisattvānāmimāmevaṃrūpāṃ caryāṃ dharmatāṃ paripraṣṭavyāṃ manyase,
K09bsu016_u:10653: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru,
K09bsu016_u:10655: daśabhiḥ kulaputra dharmaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvā imāmevaṃrūpāmindrajālatalopamāṃ samantajñānaprabhāṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ paripūrayanti /
K09bsu016_u:10661: ebhiḥ kulaputra daśabhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgatā imāmevaṃrūpāmindrajālatalopamāṃ samantajñānaprabhāṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ paripūrayanti //
K09bsu016_u:10662: tatra kulaputra avivartyavīryā bodhisattvā etān dharmān pratilabhya akṣayākārābhinirhāreṇa bhāvayanto bahulīkurvantaḥ kalyāṇamitrāṇyārāgya daśabhirākārairabhirādhayanti
K09bsu016_u:10669: atha khalu gopā śākyakanyā etamevārthanayaṃ saṃdarśayamānā buddhādhiṣṭhānena daśa diśo vyavalokya tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K09bsu016_u:10672: adhimukti yeṣa vipulā gaganaprakāśā yasyāṃ samosarati sarvatriyadhvalokaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:10673: kṣetrāśca sattva tatha dharma tathaiva buddhāsteṣāmiyaṃ cariya jñānaprabhaṃkarāṇām // 12 //
K09bsu016_u:10674: yeṣāśayo gaganakalpa anantamadhyaḥ saṃkleśanirmalatayā paramaṃ viśuddhaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:10677: te puṇyasāgaraśarīraviśuddhagarbhā loke caranti na ca lokamalena liptāḥ // 14 //
K09bsu016_u:10678: sarvasvarāṅgarutaghoṣanayairjinānāṃ ye dharmagarjita śṛṇonta na yāni tṛptim /
K09bsu016_u:10680: ye te daśaddiśi tathāgata aprameyān sarvatra cittakṣaṇi otari anyamanyān /
K09bsu016_u:10682: paśyanti ye pariṣado vipulā jinānāṃ teṣāṃ samādhinayasāgaramotaranti /
K09bsu016_u:10688: ye te mahākaruṇamaṇḍalajñānasūryā dṛṣṭvā jagadvyasanaprāptamudenti dhīrāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:10689: dharmābhayā jagati moha vidhūya teṣāmiyaṃ cari divākarasādṛśānām // 19 //
K09bsu016_u:10690: dṛṣṭvā prajāṃ bhavagatau parivartamānāṃ saṃsārasrotapravilomasthitāḥ sumedhāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:10692: te 'tra śikṣita nayehi anantamadhyān kāyān yathāśaya jagatyupadarśayitvā /
K09bsu016_u:10693: pratibhāsabimbasadṛśairapi taiḥ svakāyaiḥ paripācayanti janatāṃ bhavasāgareṣu // 21 //
K09bsu016_u:10694: maitrīnayaiḥ suvipulairjanatāṃ spharitvā nānādhimuktiṣu janeṣu cariṃ vidarśya /
K09bsu016_u:10695: dharmaṃ yathāśaya jagatyabhivarṣamāṇā bodhāya sattvanayutān vinayanti dhīrāḥ // 22 //
K09bsu016_u:10696: atha khalu gopā śākyakanyā imā gāthā bhāṣitvā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat -
K09bsu016_u:10698: sudhana āha - ka etasya ārye sarvabodhisattvasamādhisāgaranayavyavalokanaviṣayasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya viṣayaḥ?
K09bsu016_u:10699: āha - etamahaṃ kulaputra bodhisattvavimokṣaṃ samāpannā iha lokadhātāvanabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān kalpānavatarāmi /
K09bsu016_u:10709: akuśalamapi nairyāṇikamapi anairyāṇikamapi niyatamapi aniyatamapi mithyātvaniyatamapi
K09bsu016_u:10711: akuśalamūlaparigṛhītamapi kuśalākuśalaparigṛhītamapi samudānītakuśalamūlamapi asamudānītapāpadharmamapi eṣāṃ karmasamādānaṃ prajānāmi //
K09bsu016_u:10712: teṣu ca anabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu kalpeṣu ye buddhā bhagavantaṃ utpannāḥ,
K09bsu016_u:10714: teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prathamacittotpādasamudrānapi prajānāmi /
K09bsu016_u:10721: teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sattvaparipākavinayasamudrānapi prajānāmi /
K09bsu016_u:10725: teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ parṣanmaṇḍalavibhaktīrapi prajānāmi /
K09bsu016_u:10726: teṣu ca parṣanmaṇḍaleṣu ye śrāvakāsteṣāṃ niryāṇanayamapi prajānāmi /
K09bsu016_u:10730: ye ca taistathāgataiḥ sattvāḥ pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpitāstānapi prajānāmi /
K09bsu016_u:10731: yāni ca teṣāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ pūrvakuśalamūlāni tānyapi prajānāmi /
K09bsu016_u:10732: ye ca teṣāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ pratyekabodhyadhigamāstānapi prajānāmi /
K09bsu016_u:10733: yāni ca teṣāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ śāntavihāravikurvitavimokṣamukhāni tānyapi prajānāmi /
K09bsu016_u:10734: yāni ca teṣāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ vividhavikurvitāni tānyapi prajānāmi /
K09bsu016_u:10739: yacca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ parinirvāṇaṃ tadapi prajānāmi /
K09bsu016_u:10740: ye ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bodhisattvaparṣanmaṇḍalasamudrāstānapi prajānāmi /
K09bsu016_u:10765: teṣāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ praticittakṣaṇaṃ nānāsamādhisamudrapratilābhānapi prajānāmi /
K09bsu016_u:10777: yathā ca ahaṃ kulaputra asyāṃ lokadhātau atītavartamānān kalpasamudrān nānāvidhānavatarāmi,
K09bsu016_u:10791: yathā cāsya samantadikprabhāsavairocanasya lokadhātuvaṃśasya daśadigānantaryaparaṃparāvasthitāsu sarvalokadhātuṣu prajānāmi,
K09bsu016_u:10792: evamiha sarvāvati kusumatalagarbhavyūhālaṃkāreṣu lokadhātusumeruṣu lokadhātusamudrāntargateṣu lokadhātuprasareṣu prajānāmi /
K09bsu016_u:10793: evaṃ lokadhātunayeṣu lokadhātucakreṣu lokadhātumaṇḍaleṣu lokadhātuvibhāgeṣu lokadhātunadīṣu
K09bsu016_u:10796: yathā ca asmin kusumatalagarbhavyūhālaṃkāre lokadhātusamudre prajānāmi,
K09bsu016_u:10797: evaṃ daśasu dikṣu anantaparyanteṣu dharmadhātuparameṣu ākāśadhātuparyavasāneṣu sarvalokadhātusamudreṣu vairocanasya pūrvapraṇidhānasāgarān prajānāmi avatarāmi anusmarāmi /
K09bsu016_u:10829: ye ca bhagavatā purvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā sattvasamudrāḥ paripācitāstānapyavatarāmi /
K09bsu016_u:10839: yathā ca bhagavato vairocanasya sarvasmin dharmadhātau bodhisattvacaritasamudrānapyavatarāmi prajānāmi abhinirharāmi,
K09bsu016_u:10840: evaṃ sarvatathāgatānāṃ daśasu dikṣu dharmadhātuparameṣvākāśadhātuparyavasāneṣu sarvalokadhātusamudreṣvasaṃbhinnasarvabodhisattvacaritasamudrānapyavatarāmi prajānāmi abhinirharāmi /
K09bsu016_u:10845: eṣa hi kulaputra asya sarvabodhisattvasamādhinayasāgaravyavalokanaviṣayasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya viṣayaḥ,
K09bsu016_u:10857: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako gopāṃ śākyakanyāmetadavocat - kiyaccirapratilabdhastvayāyamārye bodhisattvasamādhinayasāgaravyavalokanaviṣayo
K09bsu016_u:10858: āha - bhūtapūrvaṃ kulaputra atīte 'dhvani buddhakṣetraśataparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ kalpānāṃ pareṇa abhayaṃkarā nāma lokadhāturabhūt /
K09bsu016_u:10859: tasyāṃ khalu lokadhātau gatipravaro nāma kalpo 'bhūt /
K09bsu016_u:10860: tasyāḥ khalu punarlokadhātormadhye kṣemāvatī nāma cāturdvīpikā abhūt /
K09bsu016_u:10861: tasyāṃ khalu cāturdvīpikāyāṃ madhye jambudvīpasya drumameruśrīrnāma rājadhānyabhūccaturaśīternagarakoṭīsahasrāṇāṃ pramukhā /
K09bsu016_u:10870: teṣāṃ khalu punarmahānagarāṇāṃ sarvaratnavṛkṣahemajālālaṃkārādibhyo vātasaṃghaṭṭitebhyo bahutūryanirghoṣasamarutaniścaritebhyo 'yamevaṃrūpa ānandaśabdo niścarati sma - snāta,
K09bsu016_u:10877: tasyāṃ khalu drumameruśriyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ dhanapatirnāma rājā abhūt maṇḍalikaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:10880: rājñaḥ khalu punardhanapateḥ pañca putraśatānyabhūvan sarveṣāṃ śūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ
K09bsu016_u:10882: rājñaḥ khalu punardhanapateḥ padmaśrīgarbhasaṃbhavā nāma agramahiṣī abhūt teṣāṃ caturaśīteḥ strīsahasrāṇāṃ pramukhā /
K09bsu016_u:10889: pādatalayoścāsya cakrāṇi jātāni sahasrārāṇi sanābhīni sanemikāni sarvākāraparipūrṇāni surucirāṇi darśanīyāni /
K09bsu016_u:10892: ubhe cāsya hastapādatale jālinī abhūtāṃ vicitrasuvibhaktācchidrāparisrāviṇī,
K09bsu016_u:10900: sa tairyān spṛśati striyaṃ vā puruṣaṃ vā dārakaṃ vā dārikāṃ vā,
K09bsu016_u:10903: tasya jaṅghe anupurvasamudgate abhūtāṃ racite vṛtte sujāte eṇeyasyeva mṛgarajñaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:10907: tasya dvayoḥ pādayordvāvutsadau jātāvabhūtāṃ vṛttau sujātau suparipūrṇāvadṛśyasaṃdhī suracitau darśanīyau,
K09bsu016_u:10912: nāsya kaścitstrī vā puruṣo vā dārako vā dārikā vā vṛddho vā madhyo vā daharo vā gururvā gurusthānīyo vā nirvasanasyāpyapaśyadanyatra svaparibhogena naimittikena vā kāmopacitena /
K09bsu016_u:10916: khalu punarabhavat sūpacitaśarīraḥ suvibhaktasamucchrayaḥ sarvakāyasamabhāgapratiṣṭhitaḥ anūnagātraḥ anunnatagātro 'pariṇatagātro maṇiphalakavisṛṣṭātirekadyutigātraḥ
K09bsu016_u:10922: vṛhadṛjugātramahāpuruṣalakṣaṇapratilabdhaḥ sa khalu punarabhavat sarvāvaropetaparamāṇusamagātraḥ praśamagātro gurugātraḥ prasannagātraḥ prahlādagātraḥ
K09bsu016_u:10924: tasya yāvatyo grīvāsāmantakena mukhasāmantakena ca rasaharaṇyaḥ,
K09bsu016_u:10925: tāḥ sarvāḥ samā abhūvan samantāḥ suparipūrṇāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:10929: tasya kiṃcidbhaktaparibhogeṣu ekavāramapi mukhabhaktaṃ parivartamānamasaṃbhinnamabhyavahāramagamat antaśa ekodanabindurapi /
K09bsu016_u:10931: aviralā aviṣamā asya dantā abhūvan acchidrasaṃdhayaḥ samāṃ suvibhaktāḥ,
K09bsu016_u:10933: vā upakledo vā abhiṣyando vā paryavanāho vā atisarjanaṃ vā /
K09bsu016_u:10934: samadantatāmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇapratilabdhaḥ khalu punarabhavat samadanto nonadanto nādhikadanto
K09bsu016_u:10935: nonnatadanto na saṃnatadanto na saṃbhinnadantaḥ samantamadhyadanto 'nutsannadanto
K09bsu016_u:10937: suśukladaṃṣṭraśca kumāro 'bhūt nirupakleśadaṣṭraḥ suprasannadaṃṣṭraḥ supariśuddhadaṃṣṭraḥ susaṃsthitavicitradaṃṣṭraḥ /
K09bsu016_u:10939: (Gv 311) prabhūtā cāsya jihvā abhūt tanvī mṛdvī sukumārā karmaṇyā kamanīyā laghuparivartinī mukhamaṇḍalasaṃchādanī tathyapathyārthavyañjanapadaniruktyadhiṣṭhānasaṃprayuktā
K09bsu016_u:10944: abhinīlanetraśca sa kumāro 'bhūdacchanetraḥ pariśuddhanetraḥ prabhāsvaranetraḥ viprasannanetro 'bhirūpanetro
K09bsu016_u:10946: gopakṣmo sa kumāro 'bhūtpadmarāgasuviśuddhacakṣurāyatanaḥ samanetraraṅgaḥ samasadṛśanetraraṅgaḥ sujātanetraraṅgaḥ āyatanetraraṅgaḥ paripūrṇanetraraṅgaḥ supratiṣṭhitanetraraṅgaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:10947: bhruvontare cāsya ūrṇā jātābhūnmṛdvī karmaṇyā sukumārākulasaṃsparśā svacchā śuddhā prabhāsvarā himaguḍikātuṣāravarṇā suśuklaraśmimaṇḍalaprabhāvabhāsā
K09bsu016_u:10948: murdhni ca asyoṣṇīṣamabhinirvṛttamabhūt sujātaṃ samantaparimaṇḍalaṃ madhyābhinyastakeśālaṃkāraṃ
K09bsu016_u:10951: nāsya kāye rajo vā malo vā kledo vā jālaṃ vā valī vā śaithilyaṃ vā bhaṅgo vā prasaraṇaṃ vā visaraṇaṃ vā asamaṃ vā asthiṣata /
K09bsu016_u:10955: ekaikaromasya ekaikasmin romakūpe roma jātamabhūnnīlavaiḍūryavarṇapradakṣiṇāvartakuṇḍalajātaṃ suparisaṃcitaṃ suniviṣṭaṃ supratiṣṭhitam /
K09bsu016_u:10956: ūrdhvāṅgaromā ca sa kumāro 'bhūdavinivartanīyaromā apratyudāvartanīyaromā asaṃsṛṣṭaromā /
K09bsu016_u:10959: tasya nīlāḥ keśā abhūvan vairocanamaṇiratnanīlavarṇanirbhāsāḥ snigdhā mṛdavaḥ sukuñcitāḥ
K09bsu016_u:10960: pradakṣiṇāvartakuṇḍalinaḥ sujātamūlā anuddhatāḥ niṣpīḍitā asaṃlulitāḥ samasadṛśasthānasaṃsthitāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:10961: nyagrodhaparimaṇḍalatāmahāpuruṣalakṣaṇapratilabdhaḥ sa khalu punaḥ tejodhipatī rājakumāro 'bhūt samantabhadraparimaṇḍalaḥ samantabhadraḥ samantaprāsādikaḥ
K09bsu016_u:10963: pṛṣṭhato 'pi dakṣiṇato 'pi vāmato 'pi gacchannapi tiṣṭhannapi niṣaṇṇo 'pi bhāṣamāṇo 'pi tūṣṇībhūto 'pi atṛptikaramanāpacārudarśano 'bhut /
K09bsu016_u:10964: ebhiḥ kulaputra dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṃkṛtakāyaḥ sa tejodhipatī rājakumāro
K09bsu016_u:10966: sa khalu kulaputra tejodhipatī rājakumāro 'pareṇa samayena pitrābhyanujñāto drumameruśriyo rājadhānyā gandhāṅkuraprabhameghaṃ nāmodyānam,
K09bsu016_u:10967: tatra bhūmidarśanāya abhiniryayau viṃśatyā kanyāsahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ mahatā puṇyatejautaḥśrīsaubhāgyavikurvitavyūhena
K09bsu016_u:10976: tasya tathā vrajato 'ṣṭavartmā mārgaḥ samavasthiṣata nimnonnatavigato 'pagataśarkarakaṭhallotsado
K09bsu016_u:10980: tatra keṣucidratnavyomakeṣu vividharatnaparipūrṇāni ratnabhājanāni sthāpitānyabhūvan yācanakasaṃghapratipādanakārtham /
K09bsu016_u:10990: keṣucidvyomakeṣu sarvākāravividhadivyamanojñavarṇagandhāḥ sarvagandhavidhayaḥ sthāpitā abhuvan vilepanārthināṃ yathābhiprāyaparibhogārtham /
K09bsu016_u:10991: keṣucidvyomakeṣu sarvopakaraṇarāśayaḥ sthāpitā abhūvan sattvānāṃ yathāśayābhiprāyaparibhogārtham /
K09bsu016_u:10992: keṣucidvyomakeṣu nāryo 'bhirūpāḥ prāsādikā darśanīyā vividhacārurūpaveśā vicitramanojñavastrasaṃdhitāḥ
K09bsu016_u:10994: tena khalu punaḥ samayena tasyāmeva drumameruśriyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ sudarśanā nāma agragaṇikābhūdrājaparibhogyā /
K09bsu016_u:10995: tasyāḥ sucalitaratiprabhāsaśrīrnāma dārikābhūdabhirūpā prāsādikā darśanīyā nātidīrghā
K09bsu016_u:10996: nātihrasvā nātisthūlā nātikṛśā nātigaurā nātiśyāmā abhinīlanetrā abhinīlakeśī abhirāmavaktrā
K09bsu016_u:10997: brahmasvarā madhurapriyavādinī prājñā sarvakalāvidhijñā sarvaśāstrakovidā dakṣā analasā
K09bsu016_u:10998: sagauravā saprasādā maitracittā apratighātabahulā atṛptikaramanāpadarśanā mandarāgadoṣamohā
K09bsu016_u:10999: hryapatrāpyasaṃpannā mārdavā ṛjvī aśāṭyā amāyā (Gv 313) vinītā /
K09bsu016_u:11000: sā mātrā sārdhamanekakanyāparivṛtā ratnarathābhirūḍhā drumameruśriyo rājadhānyā niṣkramya
K09bsu016_u:11001: tejodhipate rājakumārasya purataḥ tejodhipatiṃ rājakumāraṃ parimārgayamāṇā rājājñāniyogādgacchantī
K09bsu016_u:11004: mātaraṃ sudarśanāmetadavocat - yatkhalu amba jānīyāḥ - sacenmāṃ tejodhipate rājakumārasya na dāsyasi,
K09bsu016_u:11011: api tu khalu punardārike gaṇikā vayaṃ sarvalokaratikarāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:11013: vayaṃ hi rājño dhanapaterājñayā tejodhipateḥ kumārasyopasthānāya niryātāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:11016: tena ceha samayena sūryagātrapravaro nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi
K09bsu016_u:11017: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān /
K09bsu016_u:11019: tatra sa bhagavān sūryagātrapravarastathāgataḥ prathamasaptāhābhisaṃbuddho vyāhārṣīt /
K09bsu016_u:11020: sa tayā dārikayā rathābhirūḍhayaiva pracalāyamānayā svapnāntare dṛṣṭaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:11021: prativibuddhāyāśca purāṇajñātisālohitayā devatayā ārocitam - eṣa dārike sūryagātrapravarastathāgato
K09bsu016_u:11025: ākāśadevatā abdevatā jvalanadevatā vāyudevatāḥ sāgaradevatāḥ nadīdevatā parvatadevatā
K09bsu016_u:11026: rātridevatā aruṇodgatadevatā vanadevatā vṛkṣadevatā auṣadhidevatāḥ sasyadevatā nagaradevatāḥ
K09bsu016_u:11028: sarvadigdevatāśca saṃnipatitāḥ tasya bhagavataḥ sūryagātrapravarasya tathāgatasya darśanāyeti //
K09bsu016_u:11029: sā tena tathāgatadarśanena tathāgataguṇaśravaṇena ca viśāradā bhūtvā avakāśapratilabdhā tejodhipate rājakumārasya puratastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K09bsu016_u:11030: rūpavareṇahu loki viśiṣṭā viśruta sarvadiśāsu guṇebhiḥ /
K09bsu016_u:11033: prāṇaśatā bahu naikasahasrā ye mama prekṣiṣu rāgavaśena /
K09bsu016_u:11034: nāpi ca rajyati mahya kumārā kasyacidantiki mānasu loke // 2 //
K09bsu016_u:11035: no ca mama pratihanyati cittaṃ nāpyanunīyati kutraci sattve /
K09bsu016_u:11036: nāpi ca me kvaci vairu na doṣaḥ sarvahite 'bhirataṃ mama cittam // 3 //
K09bsu016_u:11037: yada mi tvamapi dṛṣṭa kumāro rūpabalapravaro guṇadhārī /
K09bsu016_u:11038: tada indriya prīṇita sarve prīta mamo vipulā upajātā // 4 //
K09bsu016_u:11040: subhrulalāṭa sunāsā eṣa nivedayamī tava ātmā // 5 //
K09bsu016_u:11042: purato na virājami tubhyaṃ śyāmakṛtā maṣivigrahatulyā // 6 //
K09bsu016_u:11045: na ca te pratihanyati vācyaṃ agraruta pratigṛhṇami mahyam // 7 //
K09bsu016_u:11046: vadane tava jihva prabhūtā tāmratanū vipulā ratanābhā /
K09bsu016_u:11048: vadane sahitāstava dantā śaṅkhanibhā vimalā suvibhaktā /
K09bsu016_u:11050: smitu yehi vidarśayamānaḥ toṣayase janatāṃ naravīra // 9 //
K09bsu016_u:11051: tava lakṣaṇaśobhana kāyastriṃśa duveva prabhāsura śuddhaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:11052: samalaṃkṛtu yehi surūpaḥ cakradharo bhavitāsi narendrā // 10 //
K09bsu016_u:11053: atha khalu tejodhipatī rājaputraḥ sucalitaratiprabhāsaśriyaṃ dārikāmetadavocat - kasya tvaṃ dārike,
K09bsu016_u:11055: na mama dārike kalpate paraparigṛhīteṣu dāreṣu mamatāṃ kartum /
K09bsu016_u:11058: pṛcchāmi te brūhi mamaitamarthaṃ parigrahastvaṃ varagātri kasya // 11 //
K09bsu016_u:11059: mātā pitā vā tava kaccidasti bhartāpi vā svāmi parigraho vā /
K09bsu016_u:11060: sattvo 'pi cānyaḥ khalu yena saṃjñā kṛtā mameti tvayi saumyarūpe // 12 //
K09bsu016_u:11061: kaccinna hiṃsābhirataṃ manaste harasyadattaṃ khalu mā pareṣām /
K09bsu016_u:11062: mā kāmamithyācaraṇe ratiste mā vā mṛṣādya prasṛtaṃ manaste // 13 //
K09bsu016_u:11063: mā mitrabhedaprasṛtā matiste mā marmabhedīni vacāṃsi vakṣi /
K09bsu016_u:11064: mā te 'parakṣeṣu dhaneṣvabhidhyā vyāpādacittaṃ janatāsu cāpi // 14 //
K09bsu016_u:11065: mā dṛṣṭikāntārapathi sthitāsi mā karmavaṃśoddhuracetanā vā /
K09bsu016_u:11066: māyāvinī śāṭhyavaśānugā vā mā bādhase tvaṃ viṣameṇa lokam // 15 //
K09bsu016_u:11069: daridrabhūteṣu ca saṃgrahāya kaccitpradātuṃ prasṛtaṃ manaste // 16 //
K09bsu016_u:11070: premāsti kalyāṇasuhṛtsvatho vā dharmeṇa kāle ca vadanti ye tvām /
K09bsu016_u:11071: kāyasya cittasya ca kalyatāṃ te karmaṇyatāṃ vā janayanti samyak // 17 //
K09bsu016_u:11072: buddheṣu te gauravamasti kaccit premāpi vā buddhasuteṣu tīvram /
K09bsu016_u:11074: kaccitpare tiṣṭhasi dharmavaṃśe na cāpyadharmaṃ carituṃ matiste /
K09bsu016_u:11075: anantavarṇe ca guṇārṇave te kaccitparaṃ prema ca gauravaṃ ca // 19 //
K09bsu016_u:11077: āpāyike karmaṇi ca pravṛttā kaccidbhṛśārtā karuṇāyase tvam // 20 //
K09bsu016_u:11078: pareṣu saṃpattimudīkṣya cāgrāṃ kaccitparāṃ tuṣṭimupaiṣi ca tvam /
K09bsu016_u:11081: kalpānanantān caramāṇa caryāṃ kaccinna te prārthanayāsti khedaḥ // 22 //
K09bsu016_u:11082: atha khalu sudarśanā agragaṇikā sucalitaratiprabhāsaśriyo dārikāyā mātā tejodhipatiṃ
K09bsu016_u:11083: rājakumārametadavocat - mamaiṣā kumāra dārikā upapādukā padmagarbhasaṃbhūtā nābhiniṣkrāntapūrvā gṛhāt /
K09bsu016_u:11085: māṃ bhāṣamāṇāṃ śṛṇu rājaputra yaddārikā te paripṛcchateyam /
K09bsu016_u:11086: vakṣye 'nupūrvyā tava dārikeyaṃ jātā yathā saumya vivardhitā ca // 23 //
K09bsu016_u:11088: niśākṣaye yatra bhavān prasūtaḥ tatraiva jātā mama dārikeyam /
K09bsu016_u:11091: sālaprabhodyānavare madīye ciraṃ mayā tatra vinirgatāham // 25 //
K09bsu016_u:11095: vicitraratnāmbaradhāriṇībhiḥ gīte ca vādye ca suśikṣitābhiḥ // 27 //
K09bsu016_u:11101: āsaṃstadā saṃśayitā janaughā rātryāṃ kimabhyudgata eṣa sūryaḥ // 30 //
K09bsu016_u:11106: na karmaṇo hyasti kṛtasya nāśaḥ pūrve sucīrṇasya vipāka eṣaḥ // 32 //
K09bsu016_u:11112: rutaṃ ca divyaṃ madhuraṃ ruvatyā gandho mukhādvāti yathotpalasya // 35 //
K09bsu016_u:11113: smitaṃ yadaiṣā prakaroti caiva divyaṃ tadā tūryaravaṃ virauti /
K09bsu016_u:11114: strīratnametatkhalu jātu loke na prākṛtānāṃ vaśamabhyupaiti // 36 //
K09bsu016_u:11115: manuṣyaloke na hi vidyate 'sau bhartā hi yo 'syāstvadṛte paraḥ syāt /
K09bsu016_u:11117: hrasvā na ceyaṃ hi na cātidīrghā sthūlā na caiṣā na kṛśātimātram /
K09bsu016_u:11121: śilpāni yāvanti ca sarvaloke pāraṃgateyaṃ nikhileṣu teṣu // 39 //
K09bsu016_u:11122: iṣvastravijñāna paraṃ vidhijñā sattvāna yuktau suviniścitā ca /
K09bsu016_u:11123: ākarṣaṇe śatrumanaḥprasāde sarvatra pāraṃ paramaṃ gateyam // 40 //
K09bsu016_u:11126: ye vyādhayaḥ kecana jīvaloke teṣāṃ samutthānanaye vidhijñā /
K09bsu016_u:11128: jambudhvaje ye 'pi ca sarvamantraniruktibhedā nikhilā janānām /
K09bsu016_u:11129: sarvatra lokavyavahārasaṃghau citre gateyaṃ paramāṃ gatiṃ ca // 43 //
K09bsu016_u:11130: svarāṅganirhāranayāśca ye 'pi teṣāṃ prabhedeṣu naye praviṣṭā /
K09bsu016_u:11131: gītāni nṛtyāni ca yāni loke teṣvapyaśeṣeṣu paraṃ vidhijñā // 44 //
K09bsu016_u:11132: tūryeṣu vādyeṣu ratiprayoge hāsye ca lāsye ca gatiṃ gateyam /
K09bsu016_u:11134: strīṇāṃ rutānīha ca yāni loke viśeṣatastānyakhilānyavaiti /
K09bsu016_u:11135: ye cāprameyā vanitājanasya doṣā na teṣāṃ nikhilena santi // 46 //
K09bsu016_u:11138: niṣṭhāṃ gatā sarvakalāsu caiva manorathānāṃ paripūraṇī te // 47 //
K09bsu016_u:11139: amatsarā ceyamanīrṣukā ca na kāmalolā na pānagṛddhā /
K09bsu016_u:11143: jīrṇeṣu vṛddheṣu ca rogavatsu daridrabhūteṣu suduḥkhiteṣu /
K09bsu016_u:11146: sarvasya lokasya hitaiṣiṇī ca svalaṃkṛtā cittaguṇairudāraiḥ // 51 //
K09bsu016_u:11147: nityāpramattā smṛtisaṃprajanye sthitā niṣaṇṇā śayitā vrajantī /
K09bsu016_u:11148: tūṣṇīṃ prabhāṣatyapi ca smṛtaiva lokasya caivābhimatā sadaiṣā // 52 //
K09bsu016_u:11149: samantataḥ puṇyavatī vibhāti sadaiva ca premakarī janānām /
K09bsu016_u:11150: etāmudīkṣanna hi tṛptimeti loke na cāsyāḥ kvacidasti saktiḥ // 53 //
K09bsu016_u:11153: sadā svapuṇyaiḥ samalaṃkṛtaiṣā na vidyate 'syāḥ kvacidapyamitram /
K09bsu016_u:11155: jñāne na cāsyāḥ sadṛśāsti yoṣideṣānurūpā tava rājaputra // 55 //
K09bsu016_u:11156: atha khalu tejodhipatī rājaputro gandhāṅkuraśikharaprabhameghamudyānaṃ praviśya sucalitaratiprabhāsaśriyo
K09bsu016_u:11157: dārikāyā māturagragaṇikāyāḥ sudarśanāyāḥ samakṣaṃ sucalitaratiprabhāsaśriyaṃ dārikāmetadavocat
K09bsu016_u:11160: anantamadhyān kalpān bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā sarvapāramitāḥ pariśodhayitavyāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:11173: aparāntakoṭīgatān kalpān dānapāramitāyāṃ caratā annapānadānena sattvāḥ saṃtarpayitavyāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:11175: tena mayā sarvasvaparityāgitāyāṃ pratipadyamānena nāsti tadādhyātmikaṃ bāhyaṃ vā vastu yanna parityaktavyam /
K09bsu016_u:11178: sā tvaṃ mama tadā pareṣu pratipadyamānā dānāntarāyaṃ kariṣyasi /
K09bsu016_u:11182: mamāṅgapratyaṅgāni cchittvā yācanakebhyaḥ parityajyamānasya duḥkhitā durmanasvinī bhaviṣyasi /
K09bsu016_u:11183: bhaviṣyati ca sa kālo yadahaṃ tvāṃ parityajya tathāgataśāsane pravrajiṣyāmi /
K09bsu016_u:11185: atha khalu tejodhipatī rājaputraḥ tasyāṃ velāyāṃ sucalitaratiprabhāsaśriyaṃ dārikāṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata -
K09bsu016_u:11187: yataḥ kṛpāṃ sarvajagatsu kṛtvā saṃprasthito 'haṃ sucirāya bodhau // 56 //
K09bsu016_u:11191: tryadhvasthitānāṃ ca mayā jinānāṃ saṃśikṣitā pāramitāpatheṣu /
K09bsu016_u:11193: kṣetrāṇi sarvāṇyapi sarvadikṣu kliṣṭāni śodhyāni mayākhilāni /
K09bsu016_u:11194: sarvākṣaṇā durgatayaśca sarvā vyāvartanīyāḥ khalu sarvaloke // 59 //
K09bsu016_u:11195: sarve ca sattvā nikhilā viśodhyāḥ kleśāvṛtā mohatamondhabhūtāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:11197: bhūmīrasaṅgāśca mayā viśodhyā kalpārṇavāścaiva jināḥ prapūjyāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:11198: maitrīṃ ca saṃjanya jagatyaśeṣe deyāni dānānyakhilāni loke // 61 //
K09bsu016_u:11200: mā līnadīnā kṛpaṇā tadānīṃ bhūyā mama tvaṃ visabhāgacittā // 62 //
K09bsu016_u:11201: śirorthino me 'rthamudīkṣya dhīmān caryāmudārā ca ratastadānīm /
K09bsu016_u:11203: tvaṃ daurmanasyaṃ mama hastapādacchedān pradāsyāmyāpi yācakānām /
K09bsu016_u:11205: priyāṇi vastūni tathaiva putrān dāsyāmi ca tvāmahamarthinaḥ san /
K09bsu016_u:11206: śrutvaitamarthaṃ yadi te na sādaḥ sarvaṃ tathaivāstu yathā taveṣṭam // 65 //
K09bsu016_u:11208: evamukte sucalitaratiprabhāsaśrīrdārikā tejodhipatiṃ rājaputrametadavocat - tathā bhavatu kumāra yathā vadasi /
K09bsu016_u:11209: ahaṃ te yathākāmaṃ karaṇīyā yathecchāparibhogyā yenakāmaṃgamā sarvatrātyantānugāminī
K09bsu016_u:11210: nityānubaddhā sarvakāryotsukā āśayānukūlopacārā samyakparākramā aviṣamapratipattiprayogopacārā bhaviṣyāmi //
K09bsu016_u:11211: atha khalu sucalitaratiprabhāsaśrīrdārikā tejodhipatiṃ rājaputraṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata -
K09bsu016_u:11212: kāyo hi yanme narakāgnināyaṃ saṃtāpyamāno vilayaṃ prayāyāt /
K09bsu016_u:11215: tadutsahe 'haṃ sthiradhīracittā bhartā bhava tvaṃ mama sādhurūpa // 67 //
K09bsu016_u:11217: āklāntacittāpi tadutsahe 'haṃ svāmī bhava tvaṃ mama sādhvacintya // 68 //
K09bsu016_u:11218: jātyantarāṇyapyamitāni ca tvaṃ chittvāṅgamātmāni parasya dehi /
K09bsu016_u:11219: cetovaśitvaṃ mayi saṃniveśya dṛḍhaṃ pratiṣṭhāpaya māṃ svadharme // 69 //
K09bsu016_u:11221: caryāṃ caran kalpamahāsamudrān prayaccha māmarthijanāya hṛṣṭām // 70 //
K09bsu016_u:11227: śuddhābhinīlekṣaṇa maitracittā yathekṣase tvaṃ khalu sarvaloke /
K09bsu016_u:11228: āraktacittaḥ karuṇāyamāno niḥsaṃśayaṃ tvaṃ bhavitā munīndraḥ // 73 //
K09bsu016_u:11229: yathā kramātprakramato mahī te ratnojjvalā tiṣṭhati nirmaleyam /
K09bsu016_u:11230: sallakṣaṇālaṃkṛta cakravartī niḥsaṃśayaṃ tvaṃ bhavitā nṛloke // 74 //
K09bsu016_u:11234: svapnāntare murdhnyakarotsa me 'dya pāṇiṃ prabuddhā muditā tato 'ham // 76 //
K09bsu016_u:11237: abhūtpurā me khalu cetanaivamīkṣeya tejodhipatiṃ kumāram /
K09bsu016_u:11238: ārocitaṃ devatayā kumāraṃ tvaṃ drakṣyasītyadya niśāntare me // 78 //
K09bsu016_u:11239: svapnāntare me sugato 'dya dṛṣṭaḥ tvaṃ caiva dṛṣṭaḥ pariśuddhasattvaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:11241: atha khalu tejodhipatī rājaputraḥ sūryagātrapravarasya tathāgatasya nāmadheyaṃ śrutvā
K09bsu016_u:11245: saivaṃ satkṛtā na hṛpyati notpluvati na carati vā pramādaṃ vāgamat anyatra kṛtāñjalipuṭā animiṣanayanā tejodhipateḥ kumārasya vadanaṃ prekṣamāṇā sthitābhūt //
K09bsu016_u:11246: atha khalu sudarśanā agragaṇikā tejodhipatiṃ rājakumāraṃ gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata -
K09bsu016_u:11247: dadyāmimāṃ te khalu dārikāṃ hamityevamāsīnmama dirgharātram /
K09bsu016_u:11248: seyaṃ pradattā tava cārurūpā svalaṃkṛtā puṇyaguṇairupetā // 80 //
K09bsu016_u:11249: manuṣyaloke sadṛśī na kanyā saṃvidyate 'syāḥ kvaciduttamā yā /
K09bsu016_u:11250: śīlena buddhyātha guṇaistathānyaiḥ strīṇāṃ vareyaṃ svalu sarvaloke // 81 //
K09bsu016_u:11251: padmodbhaveyaṃ na hi jātivādaḥ saṃdūṣaṇāmarhati nirmalatvāt /
K09bsu016_u:11255: yo 'syāḥ śubho vāti hi gātragandho varāṃstadanyānabhibhūya gandhān /
K09bsu016_u:11257: asyā hi kāyaḥ kanakaprakāśo virocate nirmalapadmagarbhaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:11258: kruddhā yamudvīkṣya hi maitracittā bhavanti sarve nikhilena sattvāḥ // 85 //
K09bsu016_u:11259: snigdhaṃ vaco 'syā madhuraṃ manojñaṃ kāntaṃ janānāṃ śravaṇābhirāmam /
K09bsu016_u:11262: śuddhāśayā nirmalamānaseyaṃ sarvatra śāṭhyaṃ na hi vidyate 'syāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:11263: yadbhāṣate cetasi tattathaiva yato jagattoṣayati svareṇa // 87 //
K09bsu016_u:11264: na māyayā mohayate ca sattvān vilobhayatyeva ca nārthahetoḥ /
K09bsu016_u:11266: na jātigotreṇa na rūpamattā tathaiva neyaṃ parivāramattā /
K09bsu016_u:11267: madena mānena ca viprayuktā namrā jineṣu praṇatā sadaiva // 89 //
K09bsu016_u:11268: atha khalu tejodhipatī rājaputraḥ saparivārayā sucalitaratiprabhāsaśriyā dārikayā
K09bsu016_u:11269: viṃśatyā kanyāsahasraiḥ parivāreṇa ca sārdhaṃ tato gandhāṅkuraśikharaprabhameghādudyānānniṣkramya
K09bsu016_u:11270: yena dharmodgataprabhāso bodhimaṇḍo yena ca bhagavān sūryagātrapravaraḥ tathāgataḥ,
K09bsu016_u:11271: tenopasaṃkrānto 'bhūt bhagavataḥ sūryagātrapravarasya tathāgatasya darśanāya vandanāya pūjanāya paryupāsanāya /
K09bsu016_u:11272: sa yāvadyānasya bhūmistāvadyānena gatvā yānādavatīrya padbhyāmeva bhagavataḥ sūryagātrapravarasya
K09bsu016_u:11274: tathāgatarmahantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ dūrata eva prāsādikaṃ darśanīyaṃ śāntendriyaṃ
K09bsu016_u:11275: śāntamānasaṃ guptendriyaṃ nāgamiva sudāntaṃ hṛdamivācchaṃ anāvilaṃ viprasannam /
K09bsu016_u:11279: pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tasya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya sārdhaṃ sucalitaratiprabhāsaśrīdārikāpramukhena
K09bsu016_u:11281: pañca ca vihāraśātāni sarvagandhamaṇiratnamayāni sarvamaṇiratnarājavicitrāṇi tasya bhagavataḥ kārayāmāsa /
K09bsu016_u:11283: atha khalu kulaputra sa bhagavān sūryagātrapravarastathāgataḥ tejodhipate rājakumārasya adhyāśayaṃ viditvā samantanetradvārapradīpaṃ nāma sūtrāntaṃ saṃprakāśayāmāsa /
K09bsu016_u:11284: sa taṃ śrutvā sarvadharmanayeṣu daśa samādhimukhasamudrān pratyalabhata /
K09bsu016_u:11296: imāni daśa samādhimukhāni pramukhaṃ kṛtvā sarvadharmanayeṣu daśasamādhimukhasamudrān pratyalabhata /
K09bsu016_u:11297: sucalitaratiprabhāsaśrīśca dārikā duryodhanajñānasāgaragarbhaṃ ca nāma cittanidhyaptiṃ pratyalabhata,
K09bsu016_u:11299: atha khalu tejodhipatī rājaputraḥ bhagavataḥ sūryagātrapravarasya tathāgatasya pādau
K09bsu016_u:11301: dārikayā sarvaparivāreṇa ca sārdhaṃ tasya bhagavato 'ntikātprākrāmat /
K09bsu016_u:11304: upetya piturdhanapate rājñaḥ pādau śirasābhivandya etamarthamārocayāmāsa - yatkhalu
K09bsu016_u:11305: deva jānīyāḥ - sūryagātrapravaro nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi
K09bsu016_u:11306: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān /
K09bsu016_u:11307: ihaiva tava vijite dharmameghodgataprabhāse bodhimaṇḍe viharatyacirābhisaṃbuddhaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:11308: atha khalu rājā dhanapatistejodhipatiṃ kumārametadavocat - kena te kumāra ayamarthaṃ ārocito devena vā manuṣyeṇa vā?
K09bsu016_u:11310: atha khalu rājā dhanapatirbuddhotpādaśravaṇena mahānidhānapratilābhasaṃjñī sudurlabhabuddharatnaparilābhasaṃjñī
K09bsu016_u:11318: sa taṃ kumāraṃ rājye 'bhiṣicya sārdhaṃ daśabhiḥ prāṇisahasrairyena bhagavān sūryagātrapravarastathāgatastenopajagāma /
K09bsu016_u:11319: upetya tasya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya taṃ bhagavantamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tasya bhagavataḥ purastānnyaṣīdat sārdhaṃ svakena parivāreṇa //
K09bsu016_u:11320: atha khalu kulaputra sa bhagavān sūryagātrapravarastathāgato dhanapatiṃ rājānaṃ sarvāvacca
K09bsu016_u:11321: parṣanmaṇḍalamavalokya tasyāṃ velāyāmūrṇākośātsarvajagaccittapradīpaṃ nāma raśmiṃ prāmuñcat /
K09bsu016_u:11322: sā daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātūnavabhāsya sarvalokendrānabhimukhaṃ parisaṃsthāpya acintyāni buddhavikurvitāni (Gv 328)
K09bsu016_u:11323: saṃdarśya buddhavainayikānāṃ sattvānāmāśayān viśodhya tasyāṃ velāyāmacintyena buddhādhipateyena
K09bsu016_u:11326: atha rājño dhanapatestaddhāraṇīmukhaṃ śrutvā sarvadharmeṣu mahān dharmāvabhāsaḥ prādurabhūt /
K09bsu016_u:11327: tasyāṃ ca parṣadi jambudvīpaparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ sarvadharmavitimirārthapradīpāyā dhāraṇyāḥ pratilambho 'bhūt /
K09bsu016_u:11329: daśānāṃ ca prāṇisahasrāṇāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurviśuddham /
K09bsu016_u:11332: rājñaśca dhanapatermahādharmāvabhāsapratilabdhasya etadabhavat - na śakyamagāramadhyāvasatā imā evaṃrūpā dharmā adhimoktum,
K09bsu016_u:11335: atha khalu rājā dhanapatistaṃ bhagavantametadavocat - labheyāhaṃ bhagavato 'ntike pravrajyāmupasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam /
K09bsu016_u:11337: atha khalu rājā dhanapatiḥ sūryagātrapravarasya tathāgatasyāntike prāvrajat sārdhaṃ daśabhiḥ prāṇisahasraiḥ /
K09bsu016_u:11338: tena acireṇa pravrajitena sarvadharmavitimirārthapradīpaṃ dhāraṇīmukhaṃ saparivāraṃ niṣpāditaṃ bhāvitam,
K09bsu016_u:11342: asaṅgagocarā ca nāma kāyapariśuddhiḥ daśadiktathāgatopasaṃkramaṇeṣu pratilabdhā /
K09bsu016_u:11343: sa tasya bhagavato dharmacakraṃ pratīcchitavān saṃdhāritavān,
K09bsu016_u:11347: abhijñāpratilābhabalena ca sarvāvatīṃ lokadhātuṃ spharitvā yathāśayānāṃ sattvānāṃ
K09bsu016_u:11348: kāyaṃ saṃdarśya etaṃ buddhotpādaṃ prabhāvayan tāṃ sarvatathāgatasamudayadharmatāmabhidyotayan
K09bsu016_u:11349: tāṃ pūrvayogasaṃpadaṃ saṃprakāśayan taṃ buddhavikurvitaprabhāvaṃ saṃvarṇayamānaḥ
K09bsu016_u:11351: tejodhipatinā ca rājaputreṇa tatraiva divase pūrṇāyāṃ pūrṇamāsyāṃ sapta ratnāni pratilabdhāni /
K09bsu016_u:11358: sā ca sucalitaratiprabhāsaśrī dārikā strīratnaṃ prādurabhavat /
K09bsu016_u:11360: vimalanetraṃ ca nāma pariṇāyakaratnaṃ saptamaṃ prādurabhavat /
K09bsu016_u:11361: sa saptaratnasamanvāgato rājābhavaccakravartī caturdvīpeśvaro dhārmiko dharmarājo vijitāvī janapadasthāmavīryaprāptaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:11362: pūrṇaṃ khalu punarasya sahasraṃ putrāṇāmabhūcchūrāṇāṃ vīrāṇāṃ varāṅgarūpiṇāṃ parasainyapramardakānām /
K09bsu016_u:11364: sphītāṃ kṣemāṃ subhikṣāṃ ramaṇīyāmākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāṃ dharmeṇābhinirjitya adhyāvasati sma //
K09bsu016_u:11365: sa tasmin jambudvīpe caturaśītirājadhānīsahasreṣu ekaikasyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ pañca vihāraśatāni
K09bsu016_u:11368: sarvāsu ca tāsu rājadhānīṣu taṃ bhagavantaṃ sūryagātrapravaraṃ tathāgataṃ saparivāramupanimantrayāmāsa nagarapraveśāya /
K09bsu016_u:11369: sarvāsu rājadhānīṣu taṃ tathāgataṃ sarvākārayā acintyayā tathāgatapūjayā pūjayan praveśayāmāsa /
K09bsu016_u:11370: sa buddhanagarapraveśaprātihāryavikurvitena apramāṇānāṃ sattvānāṃ kuśalamūlāni saṃjanayamāsa /
K09bsu016_u:11385: ityevaṃrūpāṇāṃ sattvānāmimāmevaṃrūpārthasiddhiṃ saṃpraveśya tejodhipatī rājā sarvāsu
K09bsu016_u:11386: rājadhānīṣu taṃ sūryagātrapravaraṃ tathāgataṃ praveśayāmāsa acintyena buddhavikurvitaprātihāryasaṃdarśanena
K09bsu016_u:11388: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena tejodhipatirnāma rājaputro 'bhūt?
K09bsu016_u:11390: ayaṃ sa bhagavān śākyamunistathāgatastena kālena tena samayena tejodhipatirnāma rājaputro 'bhūt,
K09bsu016_u:11392: sa ca sūryagātrapravaro nāma tathāgata ārāgitaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:11393: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena dhanapatirnāma rājā abhūt tejodhipateḥ kumārasya pitā?
K09bsu016_u:11395: ratnakusumaprabho nāma tathāgatastena kālena tena samayena dhanapatirnāma rājā abhūt,
K09bsu016_u:11396: ya etarhi pūrvasyāṃ diśi lokadhātau sāgaraparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ lokadhātusamudrāṇāṃ
K09bsu016_u:11400: tena ca bhagavatā ratnakusumaprabheṇa tathāgatena pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caratā sarvadharmadhātugaganapratibhāsamegho lokadhātusamudraḥ pariśodhitaḥ
K09bsu016_u:11401: yāvantaśca tasmin lokadhātusamudre tathāgatā utpannāśca utpadyante ca utpatsyante ca,
K09bsu016_u:11402: te sarve ca bhagavatā ratnakusumaprabheṇa tathāgatena pūrvabodhisattvacaryāścaratā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paripācitāḥ //
K09bsu016_u:11403: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena padmaśrīgarbhasaṃbhavā nāma rājabhāryā abhūt tejodhipateḥ kumārasya mātā caturaśītistrīsahasrāṇāṃ
K09bsu016_u:11405: eṣā sā kulaputra māyādevī bhagavato mātā bodhisattvajananī samantāvabhāsānāvaraṇavimokṣapratiṣṭhitā
K09bsu016_u:11407: tena kālena tena samayena padmaśrīgarbhasaṃbhavā nāma rājño dhanateragramahiṣyabhūt /
K09bsu016_u:11408: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena sudarśanā nāma agragaṇikā abhūt?
K09bsu016_u:11410: eṣā sā sunetrā nāma daṇḍapāṇeḥ śākyasya bhāryā mama mātā tena kālena tena samayena sudarśanā nāma agragaṇikābhūt /
K09bsu016_u:11411: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena sucalitaratiprabhāsaśrīrnāma gaṇikādārikābhūt?
K09bsu016_u:11413: ahaṃ sā tena kālena tena samayena sucalitaratiprabhāsaśrīrgaṇikādārikā abhūt /
K09bsu016_u:11414: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena tejodhipate rājñaḥ parivāro 'bhūt?
K09bsu016_u:11425: sa khalu kulaputra sūryagātrapravarastathāgatastejodhipatinā cakravartinā ca mayā ca yāvajjīvamupasthito 'bhūt cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ
K09bsu016_u:11426: tasya khalu punaḥ kulaputra sūryagātrapravarasya tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasyānantaraṃ tasyāmeva lokadhātau prasannagātro nāma tathāgato loka udapādi /
K09bsu016_u:11428: tasyānantaraṃ sarvagātrajñānapratibhāsacandro nāma tathāgato loka udapādi /
K09bsu016_u:11480: iti hi kulaputra etāṃstathāgatān pramukhān kṛtvā tasyāṃ lokadhātau ṣaṣṭibuddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇyutpannāni (Gv 332)
K09bsu016_u:11481: abhūvan, yānyasmābhirārāgitāni satkṛtāni gurukṛtāni mānitāni pūjitāni cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ //
K09bsu016_u:11482: teṣāṃ khalu kulaputra ṣaṣṭerbuddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ sarvapaścimo vipuladharmādhimuktisaṃbhavatejo nāma tathāgata utpanno 'bhūt /
K09bsu016_u:11483: tasya bhagavato nagare praviṣṭasya mayā rājabhāryābhūtayā sārdhaṃ svāminā sarvākārapūjāmukhaṃ
K09bsu016_u:11484: prayuktayā tathāgatapūjayā pūjāṃ kṛtvā sarvatathāgatotpattisaṃbhavapradīpo nāma tathāgatadharmaparyāyastasya
K09bsu016_u:11488: sā khalvahaṃ kulaputra etaṃ vimokṣaṃ bhāvayamānā buddhakṣetraśataparamāṇurajaḥsamān kalpānāgatān bodhisattvena sārdhaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caramāṇā
K09bsu016_u:11489: teṣu ca me buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu kalpeṣu anantamadhyāstathāgatā ārāgitāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:11494: na ca me jātu bodhisattvasya kāyo jñātaḥ - kiṃpramāṇaḥ kīdṛksaṃsthānaḥ kīdṛgvarṇaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:11495: na kāyakarma jñātaṃ na vākkarma na manaskarma jñātaṃ na jñānadarśanaṃ na jñānagocaraṃ na jñānasamādhiviṣayo jñātaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:11496: ye khalu punaḥ kulaputra sattvā bodhisattvaṃ bodhisattvacārikāṃ carantaṃ dṛṣṭvā bodhisattvasyāntike 'nunayacittamutpādayāmāsuḥ,
K09bsu016_u:11498: sarve te bodhisattvena laukikalokottarairvividhairupāyaiḥ saṃgṛhītā bodhisattvasya parivārā bhavanti sma /
K09bsu016_u:11499: te bodhisattvasya bodhisattvacaryāṃ carataḥ parivārasaṃvāse na avaivartikā bhavanti sma anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau //
K09bsu016_u:11503: ye ca teṣu buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu kalpeṣu tathāgatā utpannāḥ,
K09bsu016_u:11504: sarve te mayā tathāgatā ārāgitāḥ pūjitā upasthitāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:11505: sarveṣāṃ ca me teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ dharmadeśanā śrutā,
K09bsu016_u:11507: sarveṣāṃ ca mayā teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmantikādeṣa vimokṣaḥ pratilabdho nānānayairvā
K09bsu016_u:11514: ākāśatalapraveśāpramāṇā hi kulaputra samantabhadrāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ vimokṣanayāḥ sarvasattvasaṃjñāgatatalāpramāṇāḥ tryadhvaparivartasāgaratalāpramāṇā (Gv 333)
K09bsu016_u:11516: tathāgataviṣayasamaśarīrā hi kulaputra samantabhadrāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ vimokṣanayāḥ //
K09bsu016_u:11517: sā ahaṃ kulaputra buddhakṣetraparmāṇurajaḥsamān kalpān bodhisattvaśarīraṃ prekṣamāṇā atṛptaiva darśanena /
K09bsu016_u:11518: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra ekāntarāgacaritayoḥ strīpuruṣayoranyonyasamāgame saṃketakṛtayorapramāṇā
K09bsu016_u:11520: evameva kulaputra mama bodhisattvasya śarīraṃ prekṣamāṇāyā ekaikasmādromavivarādanantamadhyāpramāṇanirdeśā
K09bsu016_u:11527: nānābodhimaṇḍālaṃkārā nānādharmacakrapravartanavikurvitā nānāsūtrāntanirghoṣavikurvitāḥ apratisrabdhayogena praticittakṣaṇaṃ cakṣuṣa ābhāsamāgacchanti
K09bsu016_u:11541: sā ahaṃ kulaputra teṣu buddhakṣetraśataparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu kalpeṣu bodhisattvasya
K09bsu016_u:11544: na pratilabdhapūrvaṃ pratilabhe yāvadantaḥpuramadhyagatasyāpyahaṃ kulaputra sarvārthasiddhasya strīgaṇaparivṛtasya nānāvimokṣanayasāgarāvatāraiḥ
K09bsu016_u:11554: ihaiva bhagavato vairocanasya pādamūle vividharatnavyūhamahāmaṇirājapadmagarbhāsananiṣaṇṇā bodhisattvajanetrī māyā nāma devī /
K09bsu016_u:11555: tāmupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvā bodhisattvacaryāṃ caranto 'nupaliptā bhavanti sarvalokadharmamalaiḥ /
K09bsu016_u:11565: atha khalu gopā śākyakanyā etameva vimokṣamukhanayaṃ saṃdarśayantī buddhādhiṣṭhānena tasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K09bsu016_u:11567: prasannacittāḥ pratighātino vā vrajanti te saṃgrahamasya sarve // 90 //
K09bsu016_u:11568: yāvanti hi kṣetraśate rajāṃsi smarāmi kalpāniha tāvato 'ham /
K09bsu016_u:11575: śūrāṇi vīrāṇyatha rūpavanti pañcābhavan putraśatāni tasya /
K09bsu016_u:11577: rājā saputraḥ sugate prasannaḥ pūjāmakārṣīdvipulāṃ jinasya /
K09bsu016_u:11581: rājyaṃ parityajya nṛṇāṃ sa pañcakoṭīvṛtaḥ pravrajitastadānīm /
K09bsu016_u:11582: sa pravrajitvā dṛḍhavīryayuktaḥ saṃdhārayāmāsa jinasya dharmam // 97 //
K09bsu016_u:11587: piṇḍāya dhīmān sa puraṃ viveśa prāsādikeryāpathaśāntaveṣaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:11590: tasyāhamāsaṃ duhitā manāpā bhānuprabhā nāma sucārurūpā // 101 //
K09bsu016_u:11594: yadā gṛhadvāragato mamābhūt pātre pradatto 'sya maṇistadā me /
K09bsu016_u:11597: ardhatṛtīyāni śatāni nāgāṃ kalpottamāyāṃ khalu jātvapāyān // 104 //
K09bsu016_u:11598: deveṣu devendrakuleṣu jātā narendraputrī manujeṣu cāham /
K09bsu016_u:11603: ātmānamasyaiva nivedayitvā bhūtāsmi vaśyā khalu tasya bhāryā // 107 //
K09bsu016_u:11604: saṃpūjitastena mayā sahābhūt sa sūryagātrapravaro maharṣiḥ /
K09bsu016_u:11605: prasannayā caiva tamīkṣya buddhamutpāditaṃ me varabodhicittam // 108 //
K09bsu016_u:11606: pūrṇā jinānāṃ khalu ṣaṣṭikoṭyastatraiva kalpe susamutthitānām /
K09bsu016_u:11614: dṛṣṭvā manasteṣu na sajjate me kliṣṭeṣu naiva pratihanyate ca // 112 //
K09bsu016_u:11615: kṣetreṣu teṣveva ca bodhimaṇḍe paśyāmi buddhān nikhileṣvaśeṣān /
K09bsu016_u:11619: caryāṃ ca teṣāṃ vipulāṃ dharemi bhūmīnayāṃścāvatarāmyaśeṣān /
K09bsu016_u:11621: saṃprekṣatī satpuruṣasya kāyaṃ kalpānanantāṃścaratī ca caryām /
K09bsu016_u:11629: dharmābhidhānairjanatāṃ vinītāṃ teṣveva paśyāmi jinān prayuktān // 119 //
K09bsu016_u:11630: na kāyakarmāsya mayāvabuddhaṃ na vāgna cittaṃ na tayośca karma /
K09bsu016_u:11631: ṛddhirna naivāsya pṛthagvikurvā kalpāṃścarantyā vipulāṃ sucaryām // 120 //
K09bsu016_u:11632: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako gopāyāḥ śākyakanyāyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya gopāṃ
K09bsu016_u:11633: śākyakanyāmanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ punaravalokya gopāyāḥ śākyakanyāyā
K09bsu016_u:11637: atha khalu sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya māyāyā devyāḥ sakāśaṃ gamanābhimukhasya buddhagocaravicārajñānapratipannasya
K09bsu016_u:11649: darśanamārāgayituṃ saṃmukhībhāvatāmanuprāptuṃ samavadhānaṃ cāptuṃ nimittaṃ codgrahītuṃ
K09bsu016_u:11650: ghoṣamaṇḍalaṃ vā vijñātuṃ mantravyavacārān vā ājñātumanuśāsanīṃ codgrahītum //
K09bsu016_u:11651: tamevaṃ cintāmanasikāraprayuktaṃ ratnanetrā nāma nagaradevatā gaganadevatāgaṇaparivṛtā
K09bsu016_u:11684: evaṃ cittanagarapariśuddhyabhiyuktena te kulaputra bodhisattvena śakyaṃ sarvakuśalasamārjanamanuprāptum /
K09bsu016_u:11686: tathā hi bodhisattvasya evaṃ cittanagarapariśuddhasya sarvāvaraṇāni purato na saṃtiṣṭhante
K09bsu016_u:11687: buddhadarśanāvaraṇaṃ vā dharmaśravaṇāvaraṇaṃ vā tathāgatapūjopasthānāvaraṇaṃ vā sattvasaṃgrahaprayogāvaraṇaṃ
K09bsu016_u:11689: sarvāvaraṇavigatena hi kulaputra cittādhyāśayena kalyāṇamitraparyeṣṭyabhiyuktasya bodhisattvasya alpakṛcchreṇa kalyāṇamitrāṇyābhāsamāgacchanti
K09bsu016_u:11692: māyāyā devyā varṇamudīrayamāṇā bodhimaṇḍānniṣkramya sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasyābhimukhaṃ
K09bsu016_u:11696: tāni vipulāni kṣetrāṇyavabhāsya sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya sarvatrānugataṃ samantābhimukhaṃ
K09bsu016_u:11697: sarvatathāgatakāyaṃ saṃdarśayitvā sarvāvantaṃ lokaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya
K09bsu016_u:11701: atha tāvadeva virajaḥprabhāsaṃ nāma cakṣuḥ pratilebhe,
K09bsu016_u:11724: atha khalu sunetro nāma rākṣasendro bodhisattvasaṃgītiprāsādadvārapālo daśānāṃ rākṣasasahasrāṇāṃ
K09bsu016_u:11725: pramukhaḥ sabhāryaḥ saputraḥ sasvajanaparivāraḥ sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ nānāvarṇamanojñagandhaiḥ
K09bsu016_u:11726: kusumairabhyavakīrya evamāha - daśabhiḥ kulaputra dharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattva
K09bsu016_u:11739: ebhiḥ kulaputra daśabhirdharmaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattva āsanno bhavati sarvakalyāṇamitrāṇām /
K09bsu016_u:11740: daśabhiśca samādhinidhyaptimukhairvyavalokayan bodhisattvaḥ saṃmukhībhāvaṃ pratilabhate sarvakalyāṇamitrāṇām /
K09bsu016_u:11758: evamukte sunetreṇa rākṣasendreṇa sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako gaganatalamavalokya evamāha - sādhu sādhu ārya,
K09bsu016_u:11764: āha - tena hi kulaputra samantadikpraṇipatitena śarīreṇa sarvārambaṇena kalyāṇamitrasmṛtyupanibaddhenāśayena
K09bsu016_u:11765: samantanirjavena samādhyanugamena svapnopamena cittajavena pratibhāsopamena manaḥśarīravicāragamanena
K09bsu016_u:11767: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako yathānuśiṣṭaḥ sunetreṇa rākṣasendreṇa pratipadyamāno
K09bsu016_u:11770: tasyāṃ ca mahāratnarājapadmakarkaṭikāyāṃ dharmadhātudiksamavasaraṇagarbhaṃ nāma kūṭāgāramapaśyaccitraṃ
K09bsu016_u:11833: ityevaṃprakāreṇa rūpeṇa sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako māyādevīmadrākṣīdarūpeṇa rūpapratibhāsena avedanena rūpeṇa lokaduḥkhavedanāpraśāntiparameṇa,
K09bsu016_u:11845: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ sarvajagadrūpasaṃjñāpagataḥ parasattvāśayānavataran
K09bsu016_u:11868: sa tāṃ dṛṣṭvā yatpramāṇā māyādevī tatpramāṇaṃ svakāyamadhiṣṭhāya samantadigabhimukhāṃ māyādevīṃ sarvatrānugatena kāyena praṇipatitaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:11870: sa tāni samādhimukhāni vyavalokya animittīkṛtvā prabhāvayitvā sārīkṛtvā anusmṛtya
K09bsu016_u:11871: spharitvā prasaritvā avalokayitvā vipulīkṛtvā abhinirhṛtya mudrayitvā tebhyaḥ samādhimukhebhyo vyutthāya (Gv 345)
K09bsu016_u:11872: māyādevīṃ saparivārāṃ sabhavanāsanāṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha
K09bsu016_u:11873: - ahamārye mañjuśriyā kumārabhūtena anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya kalyāṇamitraparyupāsanena samādāpitam /
K09bsu016_u:11875: tadvadatu me āryā - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ pariniṣpanno bhavati sarvajñatāyām /
K09bsu016_u:11876: sā avocat - ahaṃ kulaputra mahāpraṇidhānajñānamāyāgatavyūhasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya lābhinī /
K09bsu016_u:11877: sāhaṃ kulaputra anena vimokṣeṇa samanvāgatā yāvanti iha lokadhātusamudre bhagavato
K09bsu016_u:11879: sarveṣāṃ ca teṣāṃ caramabhavikānāṃ bodhisattvānāmahaṃ jananī /
K09bsu016_u:11880: sarve te bodhisattvā mama kukṣau saṃbhavanti /
K09bsu016_u:11882: ihaiva tāvadahaṃ kulaputra bhāgavatyāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāṃ kapilavastuni mahānagare rājñaḥ
K09bsu016_u:11883: śuddhodanasya kulabaddhakalpena siddhārthaṃ bodhisattvaṃ janitravatī mahatācintyena
K09bsu016_u:11885: sā khalvahaṃ kulaputra tadā rājñaḥ śuddhodanasya gṛhagatā bhavāmi /
K09bsu016_u:11889: lokadhātumavabhāsya mama śarīre nipatya mūrdhānamupādāya sarvaromakūpeṣvanuprāviśan /
K09bsu016_u:11891: atha tāvadeva mama kāye bodhisattvaraśmimukhamaṇḍalābhivijñaptāḥ sarvabodhisattvajanmavikurvitanayavyūhāḥ saṃdṛśyante sma antargatena parivāreṇa
K09bsu016_u:11893: atha tāvadeva yeṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ tāni bodhisattvaraśmimukhamaṇḍalāni vijñaptāni janmanayavikurvitāni pravartante,
K09bsu016_u:11895: yaduta bodhimaṇḍavarāgragatā buddhasiṃhāsananiṣaṇṇā bodhisattvaparṣanmaṇḍalaparivṛtā lokendrābhipūjitā dharmacakraṃ pravartayamānāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:11896: ye ca taistathāgataiḥ pūrvabodhisattvacaryāṃ caradbhistathāgatā ārāgitāḥ,
K09bsu016_u:11899: yāni ca teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ nirmāṇamaṇḍalāni praticittakṣaṇaṃ sarvadharmadhātuṃ spharanti,
K09bsu016_u:11901: tasyā mama kulaputra kāye tābhirbodhisattvaraśmibhiranupraviṣṭābhiḥ sarvajagadabhyudgataḥ kāyaḥ saṃsthito 'bhūt,
K09bsu016_u:11905: te sarve mama kāye 'ntargatā anupraviṣṭāḥ sarve saṃdṛśyante //
K09bsu016_u:11916: tuṣitabhavanāccyutvā sārdhaṃ saparivāreṇa mama kukṣau prāviśat //
K09bsu016_u:11917: te sarve mama kukṣau trisāhasralokadhātuvipulena yāvadanabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamalokadhātuvipulena ākramavikrameṇa anuvicaranti sma /
K09bsu016_u:11918: sarvāṇi ca daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuprasareṣu sarvatathāgatapādamūleṣu sarvabodhisattvaparṣanmaṇḍalāni
K09bsu016_u:11919: praticittakṣaṇamanabhilāpyāni mama kukṣau samavasaranti sma bodhisattvagarbhāvāsavikurvitaṃ draṣṭum /
K09bsu016_u:11923: na cāyaṃ mama kukṣistāvanti parṣanmaṇḍalāni pratīcchan vipulībhavati /
K09bsu016_u:11924: na cāsmānmanuṣyāśrayādayaṃ mama kāyo viśiṣṭataraḥ saṃtiṣṭhate /
K09bsu016_u:11929: yathā cāhaṃ kulaputra asyāṃ bhāgavatyāṃ cāturdvīpikāyāṃ jambudvīpe bodhisattvaṃ kukṣiṇā saṃpratīcchāmi,
K09bsu016_u:11930: evaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarvacāturdvīpikājambudvīpeṣu saṃpratīcchāmi anena ca vikurvitavyūhena /
K09bsu016_u:11931: na cāyaṃ mama kāyo dvayībhavati nādvayībhavati,
K09bsu016_u:11933: yathāpi nāma tadasyaiva mahāpraṇidhānajñānamāyāgatasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya subhāṣitatvāt /
K09bsu016_u:11934: yathā cāhaṃ kulaputra asya bhagavato vairocanasya mātā abhūvam,
K09bsu016_u:11936: yatra bodhisattvo loka upapāduka upāpadyata padmagarbhe,
K09bsu016_u:11943: iti hi kulaputra yāvadbhirupāyamukhaiścaramabhavikā bodhisattvā loka upapattiṃ saṃdarśayanti,
K09bsu016_u:11945: yathā ahaṃ kulaputra iha lokadhātau asya bhagavataḥ sarvabodhisattvajanmavikurvitasaṃdarśaneṣu janetryabhūvam,
K09bsu016_u:11950: tathā sarveṣāṃ bhadrakalpikānāmanāgatānāṃ tathāgatānāṃ janetrī bhaviṣyāmi /
K09bsu016_u:11951: tadyathā maitreyasya bodhisattvasya tuṣitabhavanagatasya cyutisaṃdarśanakāle pravṛtte
K09bsu016_u:11953: prabhāsiteṣu sarvadharmadhātunayataleṣu yāvanti mama dharmadhātunayatalāni cakṣuṣo
K09bsu016_u:11955: yeṣu maitreyeṇa bodhisattvena manuṣyaloke manuṣyendrakuleṣu janmopapattisaṃdarśanena sattvā vinayitavyāḥ,
K09bsu016_u:11959: tathā pradyotasya ketoḥ sunetrasya kusumasya kusumaśriyaḥ tiṣyasya puṣyasya sumanaso
K09bsu016_u:11960: vajrasya virajasaḥ candrolkādhāriṇo yaśaso vajraśuddhasya ekārthadarśino sitāṅgasya
K09bsu016_u:11961: pāraṃgatasya ratnārciḥparvatasya maholkādhāriṇaḥ padmottarasya vighuṣṭaśabdasya aparimitaguṇadharmasya
K09bsu016_u:11962: dīpaśriyo vibhūṣitāṅgasya suprayāṇasya maitraśriyo nirmitasyāniketasya jvalitatejaso
K09bsu016_u:11965: sāgaramateḥ śubharatnasya anihatamallasya paripūrṇamanorathasya maheśvarasya indraśriyo
K09bsu016_u:11967: vibhūteḥ keśaranandina īśvaradevasya īśvarasya uṣṇīṣaśriyo vajrajñānaparvatasya śrīgarbhasya
K09bsu016_u:11974: viśākhadevasya vajragiro jñānārcijvalitaśarīrasya kṣemaṃkarasya aupagamasya śārdūlasya
K09bsu016_u:11977: vaidyottamasya guṇacandrasya praharṣitatejaso guṇasaṃcayasya candrodgatasya bhāskaradevasya
K09bsu016_u:11978: bhīṣmayaśaso raśmimukhasya śālendraskadhasya yaśasaḥ auṣadhirājasya ratnavarasya
K09bsu016_u:11979: vajramateḥ sitaśriyo nirghautālayasya maṇirājasya mahāyaśaso vegadhāriṇo 'mitābhasya
K09bsu016_u:11980: mahāsanārciṣo mohadharmeśvarasya nihatadhīrasya devaśuddhasya dṛḍhaprabhasya viśvāmitrasya
K09bsu016_u:11982: viśiṣṭacandrasya ulkādhāriṇo vicitragātrasya anabhilāpyodgatasya jaganmitrasya prabhūtaraśmeḥ
K09bsu016_u:11993: iti hi kulaputra etān maitreyapramukhānanāgatāṃstathāgatān pramukhān kṛtvā sarveṣāṃ
K09bsu016_u:11997: tathā daśasu dikṣu aparimāṇeṣu lokadhātuṣu anantamadhyān dharmadhātunayānavataramāṇā yathā ca maitreyasya tathāgatasya anabhilāpyairguṇaviśeṣairjananī
K09bsu016_u:11998: evamanabhilāpyaguṇaviśeṣaiḥ siṃhasya evaṃ yāvadrocamasya tathāgatasya jananī bhaviṣyāmi /
K09bsu016_u:12005: evamukte sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako māyādevīmetadavocat - kiyaccirapratilabdhastvayā ayamārye mahāpraṇidhānajñānamāyāgatavyūho bodhisattvavimokṣaḥ?
K09bsu016_u:12008: tasmin khalu punaḥ śubhaprabhe kalpe merūdgataśrīrnāma lokadhāturabhūdviśuddhasaṃkliṣṭānekaratnamayī sacakravālasumerusāgarā pañcagatipracārā citrā darśanīyā /
K09bsu016_u:12009: tasyāṃ khalu merūdgataśriyāṃ lokadhātau daśa cāturdvīpikakoṭīśatānyabhūvan /
K09bsu016_u:12010: teṣāṃ khalu daśānāṃ cāturdvīpikakoṭīśatānāṃ madhye siṃhadhvajāgratejo nāma madhyamā cāturdvīpikābhūt,
K09bsu016_u:12012: teṣāṃ khalu aśītīnāṃ rājadhānīkotīśatānāṃ madhye dhvajāgravatī nāma madhyamarājadhānyabhūt /
K09bsu016_u:12014: tasyāṃ khalu punardhvajāgravatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ citramañjariprabhāso nāma bodhimaṇḍo 'bhūt /
K09bsu016_u:12016: tasmin khalu punaścitramañjariprabhāse bodhimaṇḍe vimaladhvajo nāma bodhisattvo niṣaṇṇo 'bhūt sarvajñatādharmādhigamāya /
K09bsu016_u:12017: tasya sarvajñatādharmādhigamāntarāyāya suvarṇaprabho nāma māro mahāsainyaparivāro 'ntardhitakāya upakrānto 'bhūt /
K09bsu016_u:12019: sa tato mahāsainyādvipulataramugrataraṃ ca mahāntaṃ balakāyamabhinirmāya taṃ bodhimaṇḍaṃ samantādanuparivārayāmāsa mārasainyaparājayāya /
K09bsu016_u:12021: tena ca bhagavatā vimaladhvajena tathāgatena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddhā /
K09bsu016_u:12022: atha khalu netraśrībodhimaṇḍadevatā mahātejaḥparākramasya cakravartino 'ntike putrasaṃjñāmutpādya
K09bsu016_u:12023: tasya tathāgatasya caraṇayoḥ praṇipatya praṇidhānamakārṣīt - yatra yatrāhaṃ bhagavan utpadyeyam,
K09bsu016_u:12024: tatra tatraiṣa me mahātejaḥparākramaścakravartī putro bhavet /
K09bsu016_u:12027: saivaṃ praṇidhānaṃ kṛtvā tasminneva citramañjariprabhāse bodhimaṇḍe tasminneva śubhaprabhe kalpe daśa nayutāni tathāgatānāmārāgayāmāsa //
K09bsu016_u:12028: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyā sā tena kālena tena samayena netraśrīrnāma bodhimaṇḍadevatā abhūt?

K09bsu016_u:12031: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra - anyaḥ sa tena kālena tena samayena mahātejaḥparākramo
K09bsu016_u:12035: ayaṃ sa bhagavān vairocanastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ tena kālena tena samayena mahātejaḥparākramo nāma rājā cakravartyabhūt /
K09bsu016_u:12036: sā ahaṃ kulaputra tata upādāya yatratatropapannāḥ,
K09bsu016_u:12037: sarvatra eṣa mama putratvamupāgataḥ sarvabuddhakṣetreṣu bodhisattvacaryāṃ caran sarvagatimukheṣu
K09bsu016_u:12042: carame ca bhave 'sya ahameva sarvatrānugatā jananyabhūvam /
K09bsu016_u:12047: pratyutpannānāmapi daśasu dikṣu anantamadhyānāmaparimāṇānāṃ tathāgatānāmahameva jananītvaṃ pratyanubhavāmi /
K09bsu016_u:12048: yāvatāṃ ca tathāgatānāmahaṃ carame bhave bodhisattvamātā abhūvam,
K09bsu016_u:12049: sarveṣāṃ ca teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ nābhimaṇḍalebhyo raśmayo niścaritvā mahākāyamāsanaṃ cāvabhāsayāmāsuḥ /

K09bsu016_u:12057: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako māyāyā devyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya māyādevīmanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ punaravalokya māyādevyā antikātprakrāntaḥ // 42 //
K09bsu016_u:12060: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako yena tridaśendrabhavanaṃ yena ca surendrābhā devakanyā smṛtimato devaputrasya duhitā,
K09bsu016_u:12062: upetya surendrābhāyā devakanyāyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya surendrābhāṃ devakanyāmanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ

K09bsu016_u:12067: śrutaṃ ca me āryā bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ dadātīti /

K09bsu016_u:12070: evamukte surendrābhā nāma devakanyā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat - ahaṃ kulaputra asaṅgasmṛtiviśuddhavyūhasya bodhisattvavimokṣasya lābhinī
K09bsu016_u:12071: sā ahaṃ kulaputra abhijānāmi - utpalako nāma kalpo 'bhūt /
K09bsu016_u:12080: tatsarvaṃ prathamacittotpādāya yāvatsaddharmaparyantaniṣṭhaṃ prajānāmi smarāmi anusmarāmi dhārayāmi saṃdhārayāmi upadhārayāmi anusarāmi /
K09bsu016_u:12083: subhago nāma kalpo 'bhūttatra me buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāstathāgatā ārāgitāḥ /

K09bsu016_u:12099: sarveṣāṃ ca me teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmantikādayamasaṅgasmṛtiviśuddhavyūho bodhisattvavimokṣaḥ śrutaḥ /
