K09bsu016_u:12327: na ca jānāmi - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:12329: śrutaṃ ca me āryau bodhisattvānāmavavādānuśāsanīṃ datta iti /
K09bsu016_u:12330: tadvadatāṃ me āryau - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:12332: atha khalu śrīsaṃbhavo dārakaḥ śrīmatiśca dārikā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocatām - iha āvābhyāṃ kulaputra māyāgato nāma bodhisattvavimokṣaḥ pratilabdhaḥ sākṣātkṛtaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:12333: tāvāvāṃ kulaputra anena vimokṣeṇa samanvāgatau māyāgataṃ sarvalokaṃ paśyāvo hetupratyayamāyāsaṃbhūtam /
K09bsu016_u:12344: kimāvābhyāṃ śakyamanantakarmamāyāviṭhapajālānugatānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum //
K09bsu016_u:12345: atha khalu śrīsaṃbhavo dārakaḥ śrīmatiśca dārikā sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakamacintyena kuśalamūlavegena abhiṣyandayitvā svaṃ ca vimokṣaviṣayaṃ śrāvya etadavocatām - gaccha kulaputra,
K09bsu016_u:12352: tatra maitreyo nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prativasati janmabhūmikānāṃ manuṣyāṇāmanugrahāya /
K09bsu016_u:12357: (Gv 361) sarvatrānugatāṃ ca bodhisattvopapattivaśitāṃ prabhāvayan sarvasattvajanmasaṃdarśanābhimukhatayā ca sattvaparipākāriñcanatāyai /
K09bsu016_u:12361: tamupasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryā paripraṣṭavyā,
K09bsu016_u:12374: sa hi kulaputra maitreyo bodhisattvo 'vatīrṇaḥ sarvabodhisattvacaryāsu gatiṃgataḥ /
K09bsu016_u:12385: sa te kulaputra kalyāṇamitro 'bhiṣyandayiṣyati sarvakuśalamūlāni vivardhayiṣyati /
K09bsu016_u:12394: na ca te kulaputra ekakuśalamūlatanmayena bhavitavyaṃ naikadharmamukhālokāvabhāsaparameṇa naikacaryāparisaṃtuṣṭena naikapraṇidhānābhinirhāraparameṇa
K09bsu016_u:12402: apramāṇāni hi kulaputra bodhisattvena kuśalamūlāni samudānetavyāni /
K09bsu016_u:12502: saṃkṣiptena kulaputra sarvasattvasamoktā bodhisattvānāṃ caryā sattvaparipācanatayā /
K09bsu016_u:12512: tasmāttarhi kulaputra na te parikheda utpādayitavyaḥ kalyāṇamitraparimārgaṇāsu /
K09bsu016_u:12560: kalyāṇamitrasaṃdhāritāḥ kulaputra bodhisattvā na patanti durgatiṣu /
K09bsu016_u:12615: api ca kulaputra mātṛbhūtāni kalyāṇamitrāṇi buddhakuleṣu janayitrīṇi /
K09bsu016_u:12625: tasmāttarhi kulaputra evaṃ manasikārāt pratiprasrabdhena kalyāṇamitrāṇyupasaṃkramitavyāni pṛthivīsamacittena sarvabhāravahanāpariṇamanatayā
K09bsu016_u:12690: evaṃ kalyāṇamitrādhyāśayapariśuddhā hi kulaputra bodhisattvāḥ kalyāṇamitrājñāsu pratipadyamānā vivardhante sarvakuśalamūlaiḥ himavatsaṃniśritā iva tṛṇagulmauṣadhivanaspatayaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:12704: saṃkṣiptena kulaputra kalyāṇamitrānuśāsanīṣu pratipannā bodhisattvā daśānabhilāpyaguṇakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi pratigṛhṇanti /
K09bsu016_u:12723: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ imāmevaṃrūpāṃ kalyāṇamitrāguṇavarṇānuśāsanīṃ bodhisattvacaryāpramāṇatāṃ
K09bsu016_u:12724: buddhadharmavistīrṇatāṃ ca śrutvā tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātaḥ
K09bsu016_u:12725: śrīsaṃbhavasya dārakasya śrīmatyāśca dārikāyāḥ pādau śirasābhivandya śrīsaṃbhavaṃ
K09bsu016_u:12726: dārakaṃ śrīmatīṃ dārikāṃ ca anekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ punaravalokya
K09bsu016_u:12730: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ kalyāṇamitrānuśāsanyabhiṣyanditacitto yena samudrakaccho janapadastenopasaṃkrāntaḥ tāmeva bodhisattvacaryānuśāsanīmanuvicintayan,
K09bsu016_u:12758: sarvadigjālasaṃbhedānugatena manaāyatanena dharmadhātutalabhedaspharaṇena praṇidhyabhinirhārabalena ākāśadhātuparamaparyavasānena sarvatrānugatena tryadhvāsaṃbhinnena (Gv 369)
K09bsu016_u:12763: sa imamevaṃrūpamabhinirhāraprayogaṃ muhūrtaṃ vicārya adhimuktiśraddhāsamutthitena adhyāśayapraṇidhyabhinirhārabalena apratiprasrabdhamātmānamadhyatiṣṭhat
K09bsu016_u:12822: ye te lokaniketoccalitāśca sarvajagadbhavaneṣu saṃdṛśyante sarvasattvaparipācanāya
K09bsu016_u:12823: / ye te sarvakṣetrāniśritāśca sarvakṣetreṣu ca anuvicaranti tathāgatapūjākarmaṇe /
K09bsu016_u:12824: ye te sarvakṣetrāṇi ca anuvicaranti sarvabuddhakṣetravyūhaparigrahaṇatāyai,
K09bsu016_u:12832: ye te sarvalokadhātvantargatakāyā na ca dharmadhātusaṃbhedavihāriṇaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:12902: na ca mahāyānacyavanavihāriṇaḥ teṣāmayaṃ sarvaguṇavihāriṇāṃ vihāraḥ //
K09bsu016_u:12903: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakastasyāṃ velāyāmimā gāthā abhāṣata -
K09bsu016_u:12904: iha so mahākaruṇa lābhi viśuddhabuddhirmaitreya maitraśiri lokahitābhiyuktaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:12906: abhiṣekabhūmisthita jyeṣṭhasuto jinānāṃ viharāti buddhaviṣayaṃ anucintayantaḥ // 1 //
K09bsu016_u:12907: sarveṣa yo jinasutāna mahāyaśānāṃ mahājñānagocara vimokṣapratiṣṭhitānām /
K09bsu016_u:12908: ye dharmadhātu vicaranti asajjamānā āvāsu teṣamayamapratipudgalānām // 2 //
K09bsu016_u:12914: na karonti niśrayu kvacidgagane va pakṣī teṣāṃ vihāru ayu jñānaviśāradānām // 5 //
K09bsu016_u:12915: ye rāgadoṣamatha mohasvabhāva jñātvā saṃkalpahetujanitāṃ vitathapravṛttim /
K09bsu016_u:12916: nirvikalpayanti ca virāgamayīha teṣāṃ śāntapraśāntyumagatānamayaṃ vihāraḥ // 6 //
K09bsu016_u:12918: praparīkṣamāṇa na patanti vidū praśāntiprajñāupāyakuśalānamayaṃ vihāraḥ // 7 //
K09bsu016_u:12919: ye te anāvaraṇajñānadiśaṃ praviṣṭā jinakṣetra sattvaparikalpavikalpaśāntā /
K09bsu016_u:12920: bhāvasvabhāvarahitā na vimṛṣanti dharmān āvāsu teṣamaya śāntiparāyaṇānām // 8 //
K09bsu016_u:12921: ye te asaṅgacaritā ima dharmadhātuṃ vicaranti bhāvavigatā khagavāyubhūtāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:12924: ye dṛṣṭidurgatigatāṃ janatāmakhinnāṃ duḥkhāntarāṃ kaṭuka vedana vedayantīm /
K09bsu016_u:12925: maitraprabhāya śamayanti apāya sarvān āvāsu teṣamaya maitrakṛpāśayānām // 10 //
K09bsu016_u:12927: ye prekṣya lokamiha mokṣapathe praṇenti sārthātivāhasadṛśānamayaṃ vihāraḥ // 11 //
K09bsu016_u:12932: parimocayanti vipulāṃ karuṇāṃ janitvā mahavaidyarājadṛśānamayaṃ vihāraḥ // 13 //
K09bsu016_u:12933: ye te niśāmya janatāṃ dukhitāmatrāṇāṃ śokākare patita mṛtyusamudragāmi /
K09bsu016_u:12934: tārenti kṛva mahatīṃ śubhadharmanāvaṃ teṣāṃ vihāramaya dāśasutopamānām // 14 //
K09bsu016_u:12943: yatha eki sattvi tatha sarvajagatyaśeṣam āvāsu teṣamaya lokaparāyaṇānām // 18 //
K09bsu016_u:12944: ye ekakṣetraprasare aparāntakalpān vicaranti cārika jagārthamakhinnavīryāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:12945: yatha ekakṣetri tatha sarvadaśaddiśāsu āvāsu teṣamaya vajradṛḍhāśayānām // 19 //
K09bsu016_u:12946: ye dharmamegha sugatāna daśaddiśāsu ekāsane sthita pibanti asaṃpramūḍhāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:12948: ye kṣetrasāgara vrajanti anābhilāpyān praviśanti co pariṣasāgara nāyakānām /
K09bsu016_u:12949: ye pūjasāgara vicitra jine karonti teṣāmasaṅgacaraṇānamayaṃ vihāraḥ // 21 //
K09bsu016_u:12951: bahukalpasāgara caranti jagaddhitārthā teṣāṃ vihāru ayu sarvaguṇākarāṇām // 22 //
K09bsu016_u:12952: ye eki vālapathi uttaramāna kṣetrāt buddhāṃśca sattva tatha kalpa anantamadhyān /
K09bsu016_u:12953: praviśanti enta na punā ca upenti sīmāṃ teṣāmasaṅganayanānamayaṃ vihāraḥ // 23 //
K09bsu016_u:12954: ye ekacittakṣaṇi kalpamahāsamudrān praviśanti kṣetra tatha buddhajagatpracārān /
K09bsu016_u:12957: ye sarvakṣetraparamāṇurajān gaṇitvā bindupramāṇa tulayitva jalaugha sarvam /
K09bsu016_u:12960: abhinirharanti vicaranti anantakalpān iha te praviṣṭa sugatāna sutāḥ smṛtīmāḥ // 26 //
K09bsu016_u:12961: iha te sthitā jinasutā vividhā vicitrā abhinirharanti bahuśāstrakathārthayuktāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:12962: saukhyāvahāni jagatāmiha śilpasthānānyanucintayanta viharanti satāṃ vihāraḥ // 27 //
K09bsu016_u:12963: iha te sthitā mahaabhijñaupāyajñāne yāvanta sattvagatibheda daśaddiśāsu /
K09bsu016_u:12964: sarvatra janmacyutibheda vidarśayanti māyāgate sthita vimokṣa asaṅgacaryāḥ // 28 //
K09bsu016_u:12965: iha te sthitā prathamacittasamudbhavādyāṃ darśenti dharmacaryāṃ vasudharmaniṣṭhām /
K09bsu016_u:12967: ye ekacittaprasareṇa vibuddha bodhiṃ praviśanti jñānamatikarma anantamadhyā /
K09bsu016_u:12968: saṃmohaketvavraji loku ya cintayāna evaṃ durāsadagatānamayaṃ vihāraḥ // 30 //
K09bsu016_u:12975: iha te kṛpāśayamatī sthitvā jagadīkṣya duḥkhaśokahatam /
K09bsu016_u:12980: iha te sthitā jinasutāḥ sarvajinānāṃ ca pādamūleṣu /
K09bsu016_u:12984: iha te praviṣṭa śūrāḥ sarvaṃ jinagocaraṃ tulayamānā /
K09bsu016_u:12998: iha sarvakṣetrasaṃkhyāṃ kalpānāṃ caiva dharmasaṃkhyāṃ ca /
K09bsu016_u:13000: iha te sthitā jinasutā yāvat kṣetrāstriyadhvasaṃkhyātāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:13002: iha te sthitā jinānāṃ caryāṃ praṇidhiṃ ca indriyaṃ jagatām /
K09bsu016_u:13011: sthitveha sattvasamatāṃ dharmeṣu buddhasamatāṃ ca prekṣya /
K09bsu016_u:13014: vimṛṣantyapare dharmāniha te bhavanavare sthitā dhīrāḥ // 52 //
K09bsu016_u:13016: śakyā mayā hi vaktuṃ vistīrṇo 'nantu buddhīnām // 53 //
K09bsu016_u:13022: ca apramāṇairbodhisattvastavairabhiṣṭutya vanditvā namaskṛtya praṇipatya udvīkṣa
K09bsu016_u:13029: dṛṣṭvā ca tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto yena maitreyo bodhisattvastenābhimukho bhūtvā dūrata eva maitreyasya bodhisattvasya sarvaśarīreṇa praṇipatitaḥ //
K09bsu016_u:13030: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvaḥ sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ vyavalokya sarvaparṣado dakṣiṇena hastenopadarśya bhūtairguṇaiḥ saṃvarṇayan gāthābhiradhyabhāṣata
K09bsu016_u:13034: svāgataṃ praśamaśāntilocana mā kilāmyasi carantu cārikām // 57 //
K09bsu016_u:13037: ehi svāgatamalīnaindriyā mā kilāmyāsi carantu sūrata // 58 //
K09bsu016_u:13039: sarvamitrabhajanāya prasthitā svāgataṃ ti acalā dṛḍhavratā // 59 //
K09bsu016_u:13040: svāgataṃ śubhapathena āgatā svāgataṃ guṇapathe pratiṣṭhitā /
K09bsu016_u:13041: svāgataṃ jinapathena prasthitā mā śramaṃ kila samarthasva kvacit // 60 //
K09bsu016_u:13042: ehi svāgatu guṇeṣu tanmayā svāgataṃ ti kuśalāni(bhi)syandita(?) /
K09bsu016_u:13043: sādhu svāgatamanantagocarā darśanaṃ tava sudurlabhaṃ jage // 61 //
K09bsu016_u:13047: krodharoṣavigatā anunnata sādhu te darśanaṃ sudarśanam // 63 //
K09bsu016_u:13054: ehi sarvajinaputrapreṣita darśayāmi ti anāvṛtāṃ diśam // 66 //
K09bsu016_u:13057: eṣamāṇu sugatāna gocaraṃ mārgamāṇu virajāna cārikām /
K09bsu016_u:13059: yatra śikṣita atīta nāyakāḥ śikṣiṣenti tatha ye anāgatāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:13060: tiṣṭhatāṃ ca sugatāna yā carī pṛcchamāṇu ayu tāmihāgataḥ // 69 //
K09bsu016_u:13063: bodhisattva mama buddhivardhikā buddhaputra mama bodhidāyakāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:13064: eti mitra mama buddhavarṇitā evacittakuśalo ihāgataḥ // 71 //
K09bsu016_u:13073: nāyakā mama sukhaṃdadā ime evacitta ayu mitra sevate // 75 //
K09bsu016_u:13075: sarvadurgatiapāyaśodhakā eti mitra mama sādhu darśakāḥ // 76 //
K09bsu016_u:13077: eti sarvajinaguhyadhārakā eva mitra bhajateṣa paṇḍitaḥ // 77 //
K09bsu016_u:13080: paśyathā ayamudāraāśayaḥ sevamāna ima mitra paṇḍitaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:13081: yādṛśīṃ pratijaneti sūrata eva yūyamanuśikṣatho sadā // 79 //
K09bsu016_u:13083: anuśāsti ayu tasya kurvato paśyathā kathamaṭatyakhedavān // 80 //
K09bsu016_u:13084: eṣa sarvasukhasaukhya ujjhiya utsṛjitva amaropamaṃ gṛham /
K09bsu016_u:13087: eṣa āśaya viśodhya paṇḍitaḥ svāśrayaṃ jahiya mānuṣaṃ imam /
K09bsu016_u:13098: śūrabhūta abhayasya dāyako deśiko hi jagatāṃ bhaviṣyati // 87 //
K09bsu016_u:13117: durlabho jagi sadevamānuṣe yādṛśo ayu viśuddhamānasaḥ // 96 //
K09bsu016_u:13131: eṣa lokaśaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ eṣa sarvajagati prabhākaraḥ /
K09bsu016_u:13138: yādṛśaṃ tava prayoga sūrataḥ śraddha yādṛśa tavā aninditaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:13140: sarvabuddha nacireṇa drakṣyasi sarvakṣetra nacireṇa yāsyasi /
K09bsu016_u:13141: sarvadharma nacireṇa jñāsyasi tādṛśaṃ ti śubhamātmanā kṛtam // 106 //
K09bsu016_u:13144: tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi guṇān bhājanaṃ tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi śubhāna saṃbhavaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:13145: tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi jinaurasaiḥ samo yādṛśaṃ ti adhimuktimaṇḍalam // 108 //
K09bsu016_u:13146: māramaṇḍala parājitaṃ tvayā karmamaṇḍala viśodhitaṃ ca te /
K09bsu016_u:13147: kleśamaṇḍala viśodhitaṃ tvayā yādṛśaṃ ti praṇidhānamaṇḍalam // 109 //
K09bsu016_u:13156: duḥkhajāla jagu mocayiṣyase tādṛśaḥ praṇidhijālu śodhitaḥ // 113 //
K09bsu016_u:13166: mokṣadvāramupaneṣyase jagat dvāru tādṛśu viśodhitaṃ tvayā // 118 //
K09bsu016_u:13169: bodhimārga tatha tvaṃ anuddhato mārgase dṛḍhamate atandritaḥ // 119 //
K09bsu016_u:13176: kṣetrasāgara bahu pravekṣyasi drakṣyase pariṣasāgarān bahūn /
K09bsu016_u:13182: tvaṃ samādhibhavanaṃ pravekṣyase tvaṃ vimokṣabhavanāni lapsyase /
K09bsu016_u:13190: nocireṇa spharamāṇu paśyase māruto va gagane asaṅgavān // 129 //
K09bsu016_u:13193: maiva kheda janayāhi sūratā tuṣṭi vindi vipulāṃ nirāmiṣam /
K09bsu016_u:13194: yena te imu vimokṣu īdṛśo dṛṣṭu paśyasi ca bhūyu drakṣyase // 131 //
K09bsu016_u:13196: tvaṃ samartha imu dhārituṃ nayaṃ tena paśyasi idaṃ vikurvitam // 132 //
K09bsu016_u:13197: yeṣa kalpanayutaiḥ sudurlabhaṃ darśanaṃ kutu guṇaprabhāvana /
K09bsu016_u:13198: tehi dṛṣṭa carato sucārikāṃ buddhaputra aniketagocarāḥ // 133 //
K09bsu016_u:13199: lābha bhūya vipulā acintiyā svāgataṃ ca tava mānuṣo bhava /
K09bsu016_u:13200: yena mañjuśiri dṛṣṭa saṃmukhamīdṛśaṃ kṛtu guṇān bhājanam // 134 //
K09bsu016_u:13203: duḥkhadharma tvayi sarva ujjhitāḥ sarvakheda ca vivarjitā bhava // 135 //
K09bsu016_u:13205: jñānabhūmi paripūrya uttamā buddhabhūmi nacireṇa lapsyase // 136 //
K09bsu016_u:13209: ye bhajanti ima mitra īdṛśāḥ te bhavanti nacireṇa nāyakāḥ // 138 //
K09bsu016_u:13210: dṛṣṭva sattva vinayaṃgatā bahu bodhisattvacari citra yāvat /
K09bsu016_u:13211: mā tu jātu vimatiṃ kariṣyase sarvadharmamukha bodhicārikam // 139 //
K09bsu016_u:13213: yena saṃpada imā tvamīdṛśī buddhaputra iha adya paśyasi // 140 //
K09bsu016_u:13214: paśya lābha tava kīdṛśo mahān paśyato jinasutā nirantaram /
K09bsu016_u:13217: tena co jinasutā nirantaraṃ te vimokṣanaya darśayanti mām // 142 //
K09bsu016_u:13218: kalpakoṭinayutāni te janā saṃvasanti sugatātmajaiḥ saha /
K09bsu016_u:13220: te 'pi teṣu na vidanti gocaraṃ nātma tairhi guṇabhājanaṃ kṛtam // 143 //
K09bsu016_u:13221: tvaṃ śṛṇoṣi ima īdṛśaṃ nayaṃ paśyase ca sudurlabhaṃ jage /
K09bsu016_u:13223: sarvabuddha samanvāharanti te bodhisattva tava saṃgrahasthitāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:13224: tvaṃ ca teṣa anuśāsanisthitaḥ sādhu sūdhana sujīvitaṃ tava // 145 //
K09bsu016_u:13225: bodhisattvakuladharmi vartase śikṣase jinasutāna tvaṃ guṇaiḥ /
K09bsu016_u:13226: bheṣyase sugatavaṃśavardhanaḥ prīti vindahi udāra sudhanā // 146 //
K09bsu016_u:13227: sarvabuddha pitarastavāsamā bodhisattva tava sarvi bhrātaraḥ /
K09bsu016_u:13228: bodhiaṅga tava sarvi jñātayaḥ tvaṃ sujātu sugatāna orasaḥ // 147 //
K09bsu016_u:13230: dharmarājamacireṇa lapsyase sūdhanā tuṣṭa bhava prīṇitendriyaḥ // 148 //
K09bsu016_u:13233: yādṛśaṃ vapati bīja yo naro tādṛśaṃ labhati tasya so phalam /
K09bsu016_u:13234: prīti vinda vipulāmacintiyāṃ eṣa te 'dya samanvāsayāmyaham // 150 //
K09bsu016_u:13236: cīrṇa kalpanayutāna ye carī bodhisattvanayutā acintiyā /
K09bsu016_u:13237: ta 'pi saṃpada labhanti nedṛśīmekajanmi pratilabdha yā tvayā // 151 //
K09bsu016_u:13238: sarvametadiha muktitaḥ phalaṃ āśayasya dṛḍhavīryatāya ca /
K09bsu016_u:13239: yasya cārika bhavediyaṃ priyā so dhareya sudhanasya yā carī // 152 //
K09bsu016_u:13241: sudhana eva samudānitāstvayā nityameṣa hi viśeṣacārikā // 153 //
K09bsu016_u:13244: eṣa bhotu tava darśito tayā bhadranāmacariyāya sūdhana /
K09bsu016_u:13245: eta jñātva sa kadāci bheṣyate sevamāna iha mitra tanmayaḥ // 155 //
K09bsu016_u:13246: kāyakoṭi smara pūrvikā tvayā kāmahetu kṣayitā nirarthakam /
K09bsu016_u:13247: adya bodhiya mārgaṇo hyayaṃ kāya tarjatu vratena suvrataḥ // 156 //
K09bsu016_u:13249: gaṅgavālikasamatā virāgitā buddha no ca śruta īdṛśo nayaḥ // 157 //
K09bsu016_u:13250: so idāni kṣaṇa labdha mānuṣo buddhapādu imu mitru īdṛśāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:13251: śrūyate ca varabodhicārikā viśuddhi na bhaviṣyate katham // 158 //
K09bsu016_u:13253: bhoti bhūya sugatāna saṃbhavo mitradharmaśravaṇaṃ ca śrūyate /
K09bsu016_u:13254: no ca śrūyati ayaṃ punarnayo āśayo yadi na bhoti śodhitaḥ // 159 //
K09bsu016_u:13257: teṣa lābha paramā acintiyāsteṣa mānuṣabhavaḥ suāgataḥ /
K09bsu016_u:13258: yairiyaṃ cari praveśamīdṛśaṃ śrutva eva praṇidhī bhirnirhṛtā // 161 //
K09bsu016_u:13259: tasya sarvi sugatā na durlabhā tasya sarvi jinaputra nārataḥ /
K09bsu016_u:13260: tasya bodhayi na bhūyu saṃśayo yena eva adhimukti śodhitā // 162 //
K09bsu016_u:13261: tena sarvi vinayā na varjitāḥ tena sarvadukhadharma ujjhitāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:13262: tena sarvaguṇasaṃgrahaḥ kṛtaḥ yo imaṃ nayu praviṣṭa īdṛśam // 163 //
K09bsu016_u:13263: nocireṇa imu kāyu ujjhiyā buddhakṣetra pariśuddha yāsyasi /
K09bsu016_u:13265: pūrvahetughana tubhya sūdhana pratyutpanna adhimukti niścitā /
K09bsu016_u:13266: mitra sevasi viśeṣaarthikaḥ tena vardhayi jale yathotpalam // 165 //
K09bsu016_u:13272: yādṛśāya adhimuktisaṃpadā vandanaṃ kṛtamidaṃ tvayā mama /
K09bsu016_u:13277: bhadranāma vara carya uttamāṃ tanumantime praveśayiṣyati // 170 //
K09bsu016_u:13278: eva maitraku asaṅgagocaro dṛṣṭa sūdhana guṇaiḥ samudgatam /
K09bsu016_u:13279: darśayitva pariṣāya saṃmukhaṃ varṇakośamimu tasya vyāhari // 171 //
K09bsu016_u:13280: śrutva sūdhana tadānuśāsanīmīdṛśīṃ ca anuśāsti uttamām /
K09bsu016_u:13283: utthihitva sudhanaḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ maitra nāma kurute pradakṣiṇam // 173 //
K09bsu016_u:13284: tasya mañjuśiri tena tejasā puṣpahāraratanā ca pāṇiṣu /
K09bsu016_u:13287: sūdhano varaprahṛṣṭamānaso maitrakasya kṣipi tāni harṣitaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:13288: tasya śīrṣu parimārjate tadā maitranātha sudhanaṃ ca bhāṣate // 175 //
K09bsu016_u:13289: sādhu sādhu jinaputra sūdhana yasya te aparikheda īdṛśaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:13290: tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi guṇāna bhājanaṃ mañjughoṣu yatha yādṛśo va ham // 176 //
K09bsu016_u:13291: śrutva sūdhana udānudānayi durlabhā bhavaśateṣu īdṛśāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:13292: mitra yebhiriha me samāgamaḥ sādu āgamanamadya me iha // 177 //
K09bsu016_u:13294: mitra labdha maya durlabhā ime bhotu me laghu samāgamasvayi // 178 //
K09bsu016_u:13295: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako maitreyasya bodhisattvasya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha - ahamārya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāvabhisaṃprasthitaḥ
K09bsu016_u:13296: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:13348: tadvadatu me āryaḥ - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ
K09bsu016_u:13355: mahābodhicaryārambhaṃ samāśvāsayati sadevakaṃ lokaṃ na visaṃvadati,
K09bsu016_u:13359: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvaḥ sarvaṃ tatparṣanmaṇḍalamavalokya sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakamupadarśayannevamāha - paśyatha kulaputrā imaṃ śreṣṭhiputram,
K09bsu016_u:13371: paryupāsīno mañjuśriyā kumārabhūtena saṃpreṣito dhanyākarānnagarādupādāya sarvadakṣiṇāpathamaṭan
K09bsu016_u:13377: mahādharmayajñasaṃbhāropacayodyuktānāṃ nāmadheyaśravaṇaṃ vā rūpakāyadarśanaṃ vā gocarasaṃvāso
K09bsu016_u:13380: eṣa hi kulaputrāḥ satpuruṣaḥ sarvajagatparitrāṇāya abhyutthitaḥ,
K09bsu016_u:13390: eṣa hi kulaputrāḥ satpuruṣaḥ sattvānāṃ caturoghottaraṇatāyai mahādānaṃ mahādharmanāvaṃ
K09bsu016_u:13395: mahāśvāsaṃ dātukāmo bhavacārakāvaruddhānāṃ jñānaprahāṇaṃ dātukāmo dṛṣṭibandhanabaddhānāṃ
K09bsu016_u:13404: sa eṣa kulaputrāḥ satpuruṣaḥ evaṃ sattvaparitrāṇāya apratiprasrabdho bodhicittotpādaviśuddhiṃ parimārgamāṇo 'yamaparikhinno mahāyānasamudānayāya,
K09bsu016_u:13428: na hi kulaputrastāmanye bodhisattvāḥ kalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrairbodhisattvacaryāpraṇidhiparipūrimadhigamiṣyante buddhabodhau vasanto bhaviṣyanti buddhakṣetrapariśuddhau vā,
K09bsu016_u:13439: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya bhūtaguṇavarṇakīrtanaṃ
K09bsu016_u:13440: kṛtvā tadārambaṇaṃ ca prāṇiśatasahasrāṇāṃ bodhyaṅgāśayaṃ dṛḍhīkṛtya sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat
K09bsu016_u:13442: yena te sarvalokahitasukhāya sarvasattvadhātuparitrāṇāya sarvabuddhadharmapratilambhāya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam /
K09bsu016_u:13583: tasmāttarhi kulaputra yena anuttarāyāṃ samaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam,
K09bsu016_u:13593: evameva kulaputra sarvajñatācittauṣadhiparigṛhīto bodhisattvo rāgāgninā na dahyate,
K09bsu016_u:13600: evameva bodhicittajñānauṣadhiparigṛhītasya bodhisattvasya sarvasaṃsāropakramabhayāni na bhavanti /
K09bsu016_u:13605: tadyathā kulaputra aparājitabhaiṣajyagṛhītaḥ puruṣo 'jayo bhavati sarvaśatrumaṇḍalena,
K09bsu016_u:13606: evameva sarvajñatācittāparājitabhaiṣajyagṛhīto bodhisattvo durgharṣo bhavati sarvamārapratyarthikamaṇḍalena /
K09bsu016_u:13607: tadyathā kulaputra asti vigamo nāma bhaiṣajyam /
K09bsu016_u:13610: tadyathā kulaputra asti sudarśano nāma mahābhaiṣajyarājaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:13613: tadyathā kulaputra asti saṃtāno nāma mahābhaiṣajyavṛkṣaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:13616: evameva bodhisattvabījasaṃbhūtaḥ sarvajñatāsaṃtānavṛkṣaḥ sahadarśanena śrāddhānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ karmakleśavraṇān saṃrohayati /
K09bsu016_u:13634: evameva bodhicittādṛśyamahauṣadhigṛhīto vyavakīrṇavihārī bodhisattvaḥ sarvamāraviṣaye na dṛśyate /
K09bsu016_u:13635: tadyathā kulaputra asti sarvamaṇiratnasamuccayaṃ nāma mahāmaṇiratnarājaṃ mahāsamudre /
K09bsu016_u:13636: tasya anyalokadhātvasaṃkrāntasya asthānamanavakāśo yanmahāsamudrasya sarvakalpoddāhāgninā śakyaṃ tālamātramapi pariśoṣayitum /
K09bsu016_u:13648: tadyathā kulaputra udakasaṃvāsamaṇiratnāvabaddhaḥ kaivarta udake na mriyate,
K09bsu016_u:13649: evameva sarvajñatācittodakasaṃvāsamaṇiratnagṛhīto bodhisattvaḥ sarvasaṃsārasāgare na mriyate /
K09bsu016_u:13651: tena sahagate kaivartādayo jalajīvinaḥ sarvanāgabhavanāni praviśanto 'dhṛṣyā bhavanti sarvanāgoragaiḥ /
K09bsu016_u:13653: tadyathā kulaputra śakrābhilagnamaṇiratnāvabaddhaḥ śakro devarājo sarvadevagaṇānabhibhavati,
K09bsu016_u:13655: tadyathā kulaputra cintārājamahāmaṇiratnagṛhītaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvadāridryānna bibheti,
K09bsu016_u:13659: tadyathā kulaputra candrakāntaṃ nāma mahāmaṇiratnaṃ candrābhayā spṛṣṭamudakadhārāṃ pramuñcati,
K09bsu016_u:13662: tadyathā kulaputra cintārājamaṇimakuṭāvabaddhānāṃ mahānāgarājānāṃ nāsti paropakramabhayam,
K09bsu016_u:13664: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra jagadvyūhagarbhaṃ nāma mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sarvasattvābhiprāyaparipūraṇatayā na kadācitkṣayamupaiti,
K09bsu016_u:13666: tadyathā kulaputra rājñaścakravartino mahāmaṇiratnaḥ sa tamondhakāravidhamaṃ gacchati,
K09bsu016_u:13676: tadyathā kulaputra vaiḍūryamaṇiratnaṃ varṣaśatasahasramapi amedhyamadhyagataṃ tiṣṭhat sarvadaurgandhyena sārdhaṃ na saṃvasati,
K09bsu016_u:13678: tadyathā kulaputra ekamāgneyaṃ nāma mahāmaṇiratnaṃ sarvatamondhakāraṃ vidhamati,
K09bsu016_u:13679: evameva ekasarvajñatācittotpādāgneyamahāmaṇiratnaṃ vipaśyanāsaṃprayuktaṃ yoniśo manasikārataḥ sarvamajñānatamondhakāraṃ vidhamati /
K09bsu016_u:13680: tadyathā kulaputra mahāsamudre potāropitamanardhyeyamaṇiratnaṃ vaṇigghastagataṃ nagarapratiṣṭhāni kācamaṇiśatasahasrāṇyabhibhavati varṇataśca
K09bsu016_u:13684: tadyathāsti vaśirājaṃ nāma maṇiratnaṃ yajjambudvīpagatameva catvāriṃśadyojanasahasrasthitānāṃ candrasūryamaṇḍalānāṃ bhavanavimānapratibhāsavyūhān
K09bsu016_u:13689: sarve te vaśirājamaṇiratnasya mūlyaṃ na kṣamante,
K09bsu016_u:13692: sarvāṇi tāni bodhicittotpādavaśirājamahāmaṇiratnasya mūlyaṃ na kṣamante /
K09bsu016_u:13693: tadyathā kulaputra asti sāgaravyūhagarbhaṃ nāma mahāmaṇiratnaṃ yatsarvamahāsāgaravyūhān saṃdarśayati,
K09bsu016_u:13695: tadyathā kulaputra cintārājamaṇiratnaṃ sthāpayitvā nāsti kiṃcitprativiśiṣṭataraṃ divyena jāmbūnadasuvarṇena,
K09bsu016_u:13698: tadyathā kulaputra nāgamaṇḍalasiddha āhituṇḍikaḥ sarvanāgoragān vaśe sthāpayati,
K09bsu016_u:13700: tadyathā kulaputra praharaṇagṛhītaḥ śūro durgharṣo bhavati śatrumaṇḍalena,
K09bsu016_u:13701: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādapraharaṇagṛhīto bodhisattvo durgharṣo bhavati sarvakleśaśatrumaṇḍalena /
K09bsu016_u:13702: tadyathā kulaputra divyoragasāracandanasya ekacūrṇadhāraṇaṃ sāhasraṃ lokadhātuṃ gandhena spharati,
K09bsu016_u:13703: karṣapramāṇaṃ sarvatrisāhasre lokadhāturatnaparipūrṇena mūlyaṃ na kṣamate,
K09bsu016_u:13706: tadyathā kulaputra himavaccandanaṃ nāma mahācandanaratnaṃ sarvadāhaṃ praśamayati,
K09bsu016_u:13711: sarve te ekavarṇā bhavanti yaduta suvarṇavarṇāḥ,
K09bsu016_u:13713: sarve te ekavarṇā bhavanti yaduta sarvajñatāvarṇāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:13714: tadyathā kulaputra yaḥ pāriyātrakasya kovidārasya cchavigandhaḥ pravāti,
K09bsu016_u:13715: sa sarvajambudvīpe sarvavārṣikājātisumanādīnāṃ puṣpajātīnāṃ na saṃvidyate,
K09bsu016_u:13718: tadyathā kulaputra pāriyātrakasya kovidārasya śuṅgībhūtasya veditavyaṃ bahūnāṃ puṣpaśatasahasrāṇāmāyadvāraṃ bhaviṣyatīti,
K09bsu016_u:13719: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādapāriyātrakavṛkṣasya kuśalamūlaśuṅgībhūtasya veditavyamasaṃkhyeyānāṃ devamanuṣyāṇāṃ sāsravanāsravabodhikusumāyadvāraṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
K09bsu016_u:13720: tadyathā kulaputra yaḥ ekadivasaparibhāvitasya pāriyātrakusumairvastrasya tailasya vā gandhaḥ pravāti,
K09bsu016_u:13721: sa divasatasahasraparibhāvitasya campakavārṣikāsumanābhivastrasya vā tailasya vā na saṃvidyate /
K09bsu016_u:13722: evameva ya ekajanmaparibhāvitasya sarvajñatācittasaṃtānasya bodhisattvaguṇajñānagandho daśasu dikṣu sarvabuddhapādamūleṣu pravāti,
K09bsu016_u:13724: tadyathā kulaputra asti nālīkerī nāma vṛkṣajātiḥ udyatake samudre saṃbhūtā /
K09bsu016_u:13725: sā mūlata upādāya yāvatpuṣpaphalaparyantātsarvakālaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ na kadācinnopajīvyā bhavati /
K09bsu016_u:13726: evameva mahākaruṇāpraṇidhimūlasaṃjāto bodhisattvasya prathamasarvajñatācittotpādo yāvatsaddharmasthitiparyavasānāt sadevakasya lokasya na kadācinnopajīvyo bhavati /
K09bsu016_u:13727: tadyathā kulaputra asti hāṭakaprabhāsaṃ nāma rasajātam /
K09bsu016_u:13729: na ca tadrasapalaṃ śakyaṃ tena lohapalasahasreṇa paryādātuṃ na lohīkartum /
K09bsu016_u:13732: na ca sarvajñatācittotpādarasadhātuḥ śakyaṃ sarvakarmakleśalohaiḥ saṃkleśayituṃ paryādātuṃ vā /
K09bsu016_u:13733: tadyathā kulaputra kiyatparītto 'pyagniryāvadupādānaṃ labhate tāvatīṃ jvālāṃ pramuñcati,
K09bsu016_u:13737: akṣaya eva pradīpo bhavatyaparyādattaḥ sarvapradīpaniryāṇaiḥ evameva ekasmātsarvajñatācittotpādapradīpādatītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ
K09bsu016_u:13738: sarvatathāgatānāṃ sarvajñatācittotpādapradīpānāṃ dīpyamānānāmakṣaya eva sa ekaḥ sarvajñatācittotpādapradīpo
K09bsu016_u:13740: tadyathā kulaputra ekaḥ pradīpo yādṛśe gṛhe vātāyane vā praveśyate,
K09bsu016_u:13741: sahapraveśito varṣasahasrasaṃcitamapi tamondhakāraṃ vidhamati avabhāsaṃ ca karoti,
K09bsu016_u:13745: tadyathā kulaputra yādṛśī pradīpavartirbhavati tādṛśaṃ pradīpo 'vabhāsaṃ karoti,
K09bsu016_u:13747: evameva yasya bodhisattvasya yādṛśī praṇidhānavartiviśeṣatā bhavati,
K09bsu016_u:13751: tadyathā kulaputra divyajāmbūnadasuvarṇālaṃkāro vaśavartino devarājasya mūrdhnāvabaddho 'saṃhāryo bhavati sarvakāmāvacarairdevaputraiḥ,
K09bsu016_u:13755: tadyathā kulaputra siṃhasya mṛgarājasya nādena acirajātāḥ siṃhapotāḥ puṣyanti,
K09bsu016_u:13757: evameva tathāgatapuruṣasiṃhasya bodhicittasaṃvarṇanasarvajñatānādena prayuktena sarvādikarmikabodhisattvasiṃhapotāḥ puṣyanti buddhadharmaiḥ,
K09bsu016_u:13764: evameva kalpaśatasahasrasaṃcitaḥ karmakleśakṣīramahāsamudraḥ tathāgatamahāpuruṣasiṃhasarvajñatācittotpādadugdhaikabinduprakṣepeṇa sarvo 'navaśeṣaḥ kṣayaṃ gacchanti,
K09bsu016_u:13767: tadyathā kulaputra aṇḍakośādanirgatasya kalaviṅkapotasya yo nādabalaviśeṣaḥ sarvabalavegasaṃpannānāṃ himavannivāsināṃ sarvapakṣigaṇānāṃ na saṃvidyate,
K09bsu016_u:13768: evameva yaḥ saṃsārāṇḍakośagatasyādikarmikabodhisattvakalaviṅkapotasya mahākaruṇābodhicittanādabalaviśeṣaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhānāṃ na saṃvidyate
K09bsu016_u:13769: tadyathā kulaputra yo 'cirajātasya mahāgaruḍendrapotasya pakṣavātabalaparākramo nayanapariśuddhiguṇaśca, (Gv 403)
K09bsu016_u:13770: sa sarvaśarīrapravṛddhānāṃ tadanyeṣāṃ pakṣiṇāṃ na saṃvidyate,
K09bsu016_u:13774: tadyathā kulaputra mahāpuruṣahastagato nārācaḥ kiyaddṛḍhamapi varma nirbhinatti,
K09bsu016_u:13779: evameva mahāmaitrīmahākarūṇāviṣṭasya bodhisattvamahānagnasya yāvadadhyāśayavadane sarvajñatācittotpādapiṭakā na vigacchanti,
K09bsu016_u:13781: tadyathā kulaputra yaḥ śikṣitasyeṣvastrāntevāsina iṣvastrajñāne kṛtābhyāsasya śilpasthānayogabalaviśeṣaḥ,
K09bsu016_u:13783: evameva yaḥ sarvādikarmikasya sarvajñatābhūmyā kṛtābhyāsasya bodhisattvājāneyasya praṇidhijñānādhimukticaryābalaviśeṣaḥ,
K09bsu016_u:13785: tadyathā kulaputra iṣvastraṃ śikṣamāṇasya prathamaḥ padabandhayogyābhyāsaḥ pūrvaṃgamo bhavati sarveṣvastrajñānasya,
K09bsu016_u:13786: evameva bodhisattvasya sarvajñabhūmau śikṣamāṇasya prathamaṃ sarvajñatācittādhyāśayasaṃprasthānaṃ pūrvagamaṃ bhavati sarvabuddhadharmādhigamāya
K09bsu016_u:13787: tadyathā kulaputra māyākārasya māyāgataviṣayaṃ saṃdarśayamānasya prathamamantrapadasiddhyabhinirhārameva manasikurvāṇasya sarvakriyāsiddhirbhavati,
K09bsu016_u:13788: evameva bodhisattvasya sarvabuddhabodhisattvaviṣayavikurvāḥ saṃdarśayataḥ prathamacittotpādapraṇidhānābhinirhāra evotthāpako bhavati sarvabuddhabodhisattvaviṣayasya
K09bsu016_u:13789: tadyathā kulaputra sarvamāyāvidyāmantrāścārūpiṇo 'nidarśanāḥ sarvamāyānirmāṇarūpagatāni saṃdarśayanti cittotpādena,
K09bsu016_u:13791: tadyathā kulaputra mārjārasya sahadṛṣṭavicāramātreṇa sarvamūṣikā vilayamāpadyante,
K09bsu016_u:13793: tadyathā kulaputra jāmbūnadasuvarṇālaṃkāra ābaddhaḥ sarvābharaṇāni jihmīkaroti,
K09bsu016_u:13795: tadyathā kulaputra ayaskāntarājasya kiyatparītto 'pi dhātuḥ sarvadṛḍhamāyasaṃ bandhanaṃ sphoṭayati,
K09bsu016_u:13801: evameva yatra yatraiva sarvajñatācittotpādadhāturvicāryate kārmeṣu vā kleśeṣu vā śrāvakapratyekabuddhavimuktau vā,
K09bsu016_u:13802: tatastata eva karmakleśāḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhavimuktayaśca palāyante na tiṣṭhanti,
K09bsu016_u:13804: tadyathā kulaputra makaraviddhāśritaḥ kaivartaḥ sarvodakaprāṇibhayavinirvṛto bhavatyanupaghātaśarīro makaramukhagato 'pi,
K09bsu016_u:13807: tadyathā kulaputra amṛtapānapītaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvaparopakramairna mriyate,
K09bsu016_u:13808: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādāmṛtapānapīto bodhisattvaḥ sarvaśrāvakabhūmiṣu na mriyate,
K09bsu016_u:13810: tadyathā kulaputra añjanasiddhaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvamanuṣyabhavaneṣu cānuvicarati na ca sarvamanuṣyairdṛśyate,
K09bsu016_u:13813: tadyathā kulaputra mahārājasaṃniśritaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvaprākṛtajanāt na bibheti,
K09bsu016_u:13817: tadyathā kulaputra śūrasaṃniśritaḥ puruṣaḥ sarvaśatrubhyo na bibheti,
K09bsu016_u:13818: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādaśūrasaṃniśrito bodhisattvaḥ sarvaduścaritaśatrubhyo na bibheti /
K09bsu016_u:13819: tadyathā kulaputra vajrapraharaṇagṛhītaḥ śakro devendraḥ sarvāsuragaṇaṃ pramardayati,
K09bsu016_u:13821: tadyathā kulaputra rasāyanopayuktaḥ puruṣo dīrghamāyuḥ pālayati na ca durbalībhavati,
K09bsu016_u:13822: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādarasāyanasaṃbhāraprayukto bodhisattvo 'saṃkhyeyān kalpān saṃsāre saṃsaranna parikhidyate,
K09bsu016_u:13824: tadyathā kulaputra sarvabhaiṣajyarasasaṃprayogeṣu pānīyaṃ pūrvaṃgamaṃ na kvacidduṣyati,
K09bsu016_u:13827: tadyathā kulaputra puruṣasya sarvakāryeṣu jīvitendriyaṃ pūrvaṃgamam,
K09bsu016_u:13829: tadyathā kulaputra jīvitendriyavimuktaḥ puruṣo nirupajīvyo bhavati mātāpitṛjñātivargasya sarvakarmāsamarthatvāt,
K09bsu016_u:13830: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādaviyukto bodhisattvaḥ sarvajñatāguṇanirupajīvyo bhavati sarvasattvānāṃ buddhajñānapratilambhāsamarthatvāt /
K09bsu016_u:13836: tadyathā kulaputra acirajāto rājaputro mūrdhaprāptān sarvavṛddhāmātyānabhibhavati kulābhijātyādhipatyena,
K09bsu016_u:13838: tadyathā kulaputra kiyadvṛddhenāpyamātyena kiyadbālasyāpi rājakumārasya praṇipatitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:13839: na ca rājaputreṇa vṛddhāmātyasya gauravaṃ na karaṇīyam,
K09bsu016_u:13840: evameva kiyadvṛddhairapi ciracaritabrahmacaryaiḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhairādikarmikasya bodhisattvasya avanamitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:13841: na ca bodhisattvena pratyekabuddheṣu gauravaṃ na karaṇīyam /
K09bsu016_u:13843: sarvāparibhūto rājaputro 'virahito rājalakṣaṇena sarvāgratāprāptairapi rājāmātyairna samo jātyadhyakṣatvāt,
K09bsu016_u:13848: tadyathā kulaputra sarvavidyauṣadhisaṃgrahasaṃprayukto bhaiṣajyavigraho darśanasparśanasaṃvāsanaiḥ sattvānāṃ vyādhīn śamayati,
K09bsu016_u:13852: tadyathā kulaputra haṃsalakṣaṇaṃ vastraṃ sarvakardamadoṣairna kliśyate,
K09bsu016_u:13854: tadyathā kulaputra mūrdhaśalyasaṃgṛhīto dāruvigraho na vikīryate,
K09bsu016_u:13858: tadyathā kulaputra śalyavimuktaṃ yantramakāryasamarthaṃ bhavati tānyeva dārupratyaṅgāni,
K09bsu016_u:13861: tadyathā kulaputra rājñaścakravartino hastigarbhaṃ nāma kālāgaruratnam /
K09bsu016_u:13862: tena saha dhūpitamātraḥ sarvarājñaścaturaṅgabalakāyo vihāyase tiṣṭhati /
K09bsu016_u:13863: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādāgarudhūpitāni bodhisattvasya kuśalamūlāni sarvatraidhātukavyativṛttāni bhavanti asaṃskṛtasarvatathāgatajñānagaganagocaraparyavasānāni
K09bsu016_u:13868: tasya mūlapratiṣṭhānaṃ nopalabhyate sarvaśākhāpatrapalāśasaṃkusumitā ca vṛkṣeṣu jālībhūtā ca saṃdṛśyate,
K09bsu016_u:13871: tadyathā kulaputra vajraṃ netare bhājane tiṣṭhacchobhate,
K09bsu016_u:13873: evameva sarvajñatācittotpādavajraṃ na hīnādhimuktikeṣu sattvabhājaneṣu matsariṣu duḥśīleṣu vyāpannacitteṣu kusīdeṣu muṣitasmṛtiṣu duḥprajñeṣu
K09bsu016_u:13879: tadyathā kulaputra bhinnamapi vajraratnaṃ sarvaratnaprativiśiṣṭaṃ suvarṇālaṃkāramabhibhavati,
K09bsu016_u:13881: (Gv 406) tadyathā kulaputra bhinnamapi vajraratnaṃ sarvadāridryaṃ vinivartayati,
K09bsu016_u:13885: tadyathā kulaputra vajraratnaṃ na prākṛtajanahastagataṃ bhavati,
K09bsu016_u:13888: tadyathā kulaputra ratnaparīkṣānabhijñaḥ puruṣo vajramaṇiratnaguṇānajānan nāsya guṇaviśeṣamanubhavati,
K09bsu016_u:13890: tadyathā kulaputra vajraṃ na śakyaṃ jarayitum,
K09bsu016_u:13891: evameva sarvajñatāhetubhūtaṃ bodhicittotpādavajraṃ na śakyaṃ jarayitum /
K09bsu016_u:13892: tadyathā kulaputra vajraṃ mahāpraharaṇaṃ na śakyaṃ mahānagnenāpi saṃdhārayitumanyatra mahānārāyaṇasthāmabalavegena,
K09bsu016_u:13895: tadyathā kulaputra yatra sarvapraharaṇāni na prasahante tatra vajraṃ prasahate,
K09bsu016_u:13897: evameva yatra sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhapraṇidhijñānapraharaṇāni na prasahante sattvaparipākavinaye vā tryadhvakalpacaryāduḥkhasaṃvāse vā,
K09bsu016_u:13900: tadyathā kulaputra vajraṃ na śakyaṃ kenacitpṛthivī pradeśena saṃdhārayitumanyatra vajratalena,
K09bsu016_u:13903: evameva bodhisattvavajrācchidradṛḍhatalapariṇāmanāpratiṣṭhitāni bodhisattvasya kuśalamūlāni na kṣīyante sarvabhavopapattiṣu /
K09bsu016_u:13904: tadyathā kulaputra vajratalapratiṣṭhitā mahāpṛthivī na vidīryate na saṃsīdati,
K09bsu016_u:13905: evameva bodhicittotpādavajradṛḍhatalapratiṣṭhitāni bodhisattvapraṇidhānāni sarvatraidhātuke na vidīryante na saṃsīdanti /
K09bsu016_u:13907: evameva bodhicittotpādavajraṃ sarvakarmakleśodakena sarvakarmasaṃvāsairna klidyate na svidyate /
K09bsu016_u:13908: tadyathā kulaputra vajraṃ sarvāgnidāhairna dahyate na saṃtapyate,
K09bsu016_u:13912: niṣīdatāṃ māraṃ yodhayatāṃ sarvajñatābhisaṃbuddhamānānāṃ nānyena pṛthivīpradeśena śakyamāsanaṃ saṃdhārayitumanyatra trisāhasramahāsāhasravajranābhidharaṇitalena,
K09bsu016_u:13913: evameva bodhisattvānāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau praṇidadhatāṃ caryāṃ caratāṃ pāramitāḥ
K09bsu016_u:13914: paripūrayatāṃ kṣāntimavakrāmatāṃ bhūmiṃ pratilabhamānānāṃ kuśalamūlāni pariṇāmayatāṃ
K09bsu016_u:13916: mahādharmameghān saṃdhārayatāṃ te mahākuśalamūlabalādhānavegā nānyena cittena śakyāḥ
K09bsu016_u:13918: iti hi (Gv 407) kulaputra ebhiśca anyaiśca apramāṇairyāvadanabhilāpyānabhilāpyairguṇaviśeṣaiḥ samanvāgataḥ sarvajñatācittotpādaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:13919: te 'pi sattvā evaṃguṇadharmasamanvāgatā bhūtāśca bhaviṣyanti ca,
K09bsu016_u:13922: yastvamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya bodhisattvacaryāṃ parimārgasi eṣāṃ guṇānāṃ pratilābhāya //
K09bsu016_u:13923: api ca kulaputra yadvadasi - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:13926: asya vairocanavyūhālaṃkāragarbhasya mahākūṭāgārasya abhyantaraṃ praviśya vyavalokaya /
K09bsu016_u:13929: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtvā evamāha - vivṛṇu ārya asya kūṭāgārasya dvāram /
K09bsu016_u:13931: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo vairocanavyūhālaṃkāragarbhasya kūṭāgārasya dvāramūlamupasaṃkramya dakṣiṇena pāṇinā acchaṭāśabdamakārṣīt /
K09bsu016_u:13934: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ paramāścaryaprāptastatkūṭāgāraṃ prāviśat /
K09bsu016_u:13936: so 'drākṣīt taṃ kūṭāgāraṃ vipulavistīrṇaṃ bahuyojanaśatasahasravistīrṇaṃ gaganatalāpramāṇaṃ
K09bsu016_u:13960: te cāsya kūṭāgāravyūhā anyonyāsaṃbhinnā anyonyāmaitrībhūtā anyonyāsaṃkīrṇāḥ pratibhāsayogena ābhāsamagaman ekasminnārambaṇe /
K09bsu016_u:13963: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako vairocanavyūhālaṃkāragarbhasya mahākūṭāgārasya
K09bsu016_u:13969: samanantarapraṇipatitamātraśca sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako maitreyasya bodhisattvasya adhiṣṭhānabalena sarveṣu teṣu kūṭāgāreṣvabhyantarapraviṣṭamātmānaṃ saṃjānīte sma /
K09bsu016_u:13971: kvacitkūṭāgāre yatra maitreyeṇa bodhisattvena prathamaṃ praṇidhānacittamutpāditamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
K09bsu016_u:13972: yannāmagotropapannena yena kuśalamūlena yayā samādāpanayā yena kalyāṇamitrasaṃcodanena
K09bsu016_u:13973: yadāyuḥpramāṇena yannāmake kalpe yatratathāgate yadvyūhe yādṛśyāṃ parṣadi yādṛśena
K09bsu016_u:13977: yāvacca teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tasya ca tathāgatasya tena samayenāyuḥpramāṇamabhūt,
K09bsu016_u:13978: tāvatkāle tasya tathāgatasya pādamulagatamātmānaṃ saṃjānīte sma /
K09bsu016_u:13980: kvacitkūṭāgāre yatra maitreyeṇa bodhisattvena prathamo maitrasamādhiḥ pratilabdhaḥ,
K09bsu016_u:13981: yata upādāya asya maitreya iti saṃjñodapādi tadadrākṣīt /
K09bsu016_u:13990: yathā vyākṛto yena vyākṛto yāvaccireṇa ca vyākṛtastatsarvamadrākṣīt /
K09bsu016_u:13991: sa kvacitkūṭāgāre maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ cakravartirājabhūtaṃ sattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpayamānamapaśyat /
K09bsu016_u:14004: tatra maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ prabhayā mahānarakānavabhāsya narakopapannānāṃ sattvānāṃ sarvanirayaduḥkhaṃ praśamayamānamadrākṣīt /
K09bsu016_u:14006: tatra maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ pretabhavanopapannānāṃ sattvānāṃ vipulamannapānamupasaṃhṛtya kṣutpipāsāṃ praśamayamānamadrākṣīt /
K09bsu016_u:14007: kvacitkūṭāgāre tiryagyonau vividhopapatyāyatanavimātratayā tiryagyonigatān sattvān vinayantamadrākṣīt /
K09bsu016_u:14021: kvacidyāvaddaśabhūmisthitairbodhisattvaiḥ saha maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ sarvabhūmivaiśeṣikatāṃ saṃgāyantamapaśyat /
K09bsu016_u:14047: teṣāṃ ca tathāgatānāṃ nānāvimātratāṃ janmakulavimātratāṃ kāyavyūhāpramāṇavimātratāmāyurvimātratāṃ
K09bsu016_u:14050: madhye ca vairocanavyūhālaṃkāragarbhasya mahākūṭāgārasya ekamudārataraṃ vistīrṇataraṃ ca tadanyasarvakūṭāgārāśeṣasarvavyūhātiriktataravyūhasamalaṃkṛtaṃ kūṭāgāramadrākṣīt /
K09bsu016_u:14052: tasmiṃśca trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau koṭīśataṃ cāturdvīpikānāṃ koṭīśataṃ jambudvīpakānāṃ koṭīśataṃ tuṣitabhavanānāmadrākṣīt /
K09bsu016_u:14053: sa tatra jambudvīpeṣu maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ padmagarbhagataṃ jāyamānamapaśyat /
K09bsu016_u:14054: śakrabrahmābhyāṃ pratīkṣyamāṇaṃ saptapadāni prakrāntaṃ daśa diśo vyavalokayamānaṃ
K09bsu016_u:14055: mahāsiṃhanādaṃ nadantaṃ sarvakumārabhūmiṃ saṃdarśayamānaṃ antaḥpuramadhye gatamudyānabhūmiṃ
K09bsu016_u:14057: paribhuñjānaṃ bodhimaṇḍamupasaṃkrāntaṃ māraṃ dharṣayamāṇaṃ bodhiṃ vibudhyamānaṃ bodhivṛkṣamanimiṣaṃ
K09bsu016_u:14063: sarvatra ca tatra sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ pādamūlagatamātmānaṃ saṃjānīte sma //
K09bsu016_u:14065: smṛtyadhiṣṭhānajñānena sarvasaṃjñāgatavyavasitāyāṃ jñānabhūmau sthito yāvanti teṣu
K09bsu016_u:14072: bodhicittamutpādayati amukaṃ dharmamukhaṃ śrutvā amukena kalyāṇamitreṇa samādāpito
K09bsu016_u:14073: 'mukasya tathāgatasya pādamūle evaṃnāmni kalpe īdṛśe buddhakṣetre īdṛkparṣanmadhyagate
K09bsu016_u:14074: īdṛśaṃ kuśalamūlamūlamavaropya īdṛśāṃstathāgataguṇān śrutvā īdṛśenādhyāśayena īdṛśyā
K09bsu016_u:14076: iyataḥ kalpān bodhisattvacaryāṃ caritvā iyadbhiḥ kalpairanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate /
K09bsu016_u:14079: tasya parinirvṛtasya iyataḥ kalpān saddharmaḥ sthāsyati,
K09bsu016_u:14081: kvacinnirghoṣamaśrauṣīt - amuṣmiṃllokadhātāvamuko nāma bodhisattvo dānapāramitāyāṃ carannīdṛśāni duṣkaraparityāgaśatāni karoti /
K09bsu016_u:14089: amuko nāma bodhisattvaḥ tathāgataśāsanamabhyudgato dharmabhāṇakatvaṃ karoti,
K09bsu016_u:14101: kvacinnirghoṣamaśrauṣīt - amuṣmiṃllokadhātāvamuko nāma tathāgata etarhi tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati,
K09bsu016_u:14102: dharmaṃ ca deśayati evaṃnāmnābhiṣekeṇa īdṛśyāṃ parṣadi īdṛśe buddhakṣetre īdṛśe kalpe īdṛśenāyuḥpramāṇena īdṛśyā dharmadeśanayā īdṛśena sattvavinayena īdṛkpraṇidhyabhisaṃbodhena /
K09bsu016_u:14104: sarveṣāṃ ca teṣāṃ nirghoṣāṇāṃ śraveṇa sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako vipulaprītivegābhiṣyandita cittastāni dharmamukhāni śṛṇoti /
K09bsu016_u:14127: teṣu ca caṃkrameṣu niṣadya svāsaneṣu ca asaṃkhyeyān bodhisattvān nānākāryaprayuktānapaśyat /
K09bsu016_u:14137: mālyadāmapāṇīn chatradhvajapatākāpāṇīn gandhadhūpavilepanapāṇīn vividharatnavicitrasuvarṇasūtrapāṇīn vividhamuktāhārapāṇīn nānāratnahārapāṇīn sarvavyūhaparigṛhītapāṇīn /
K09bsu016_u:14146: yaduta strīrūpān puruṣarūpān dārakarūpān dārikārūpān śakrarūpān brahmarūpān lokapālarūpān
K09bsu016_u:14166: teṣu ca sarvaratnāṣṭāpadeṣu maitreyasya bodhisattvasya sarvabodhisattvacaryākramamapaśyat yathā pūrvaṃ bodhisattvāścaryāmacaran /
K09bsu016_u:14179: nadīpathe nāvaṃ vāhayamānaṃ kvacidbālāhāśvarājabhūtaṃ mahāsamudre rākṣasīdvīpagatān
K09bsu016_u:14181: daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu sattvān pratiṣṭhāpayamānaṃ kvacidvaidyabhūtamāturāṇāṃ cikitsāṃ
K09bsu016_u:14188: daśasu kuśalamūleṣu karmapatheṣu sattvān pratiṣṭhāpayamānaṃ pañcasu śikṣāpadeṣu aṣṭāṅgapoṣadheṣu
K09bsu016_u:14194: sa kvacitkūṭāgāre yāvanti maitreyeṇa bodhisattvena kalyāṇamitrāṇi paryupāsitāni teṣāṃ vikurvitavyūhānadrākṣīt /
K09bsu016_u:14195: sarveṣu ca teṣu kalyāṇamitreṣu upasaṃkrāntamābhāṣyamāṇamātmānaṃ saṃjānīte sma - ehi sudhana svāgatam /
K09bsu016_u:14198: iti hi sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakastata ekaikasmātkūṭāgārādekaikasmādārambaṇādimāni ca anyāni ca avicintyavyūhaviṣayavikurvitānyadrākṣīt /
K09bsu016_u:14203: tadyathā puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnāntaragato vividhān rūpārambaṇaviśeṣān paśyet yaduta
K09bsu016_u:14206: udyānārāmatapovanaramaṇīyāni vā vṛkṣanadīpuṣkiriṇīparvataramaṇīyāni vā mātāpitṛmitrajñātisālohitasamavadhānagataṃ vā ātmānaṃ saṃjānīte /
K09bsu016_u:14207: mahāsamudraṃ vā paśyet sumeruṃ vā parvatarājānaṃ sarvadevabhavanāni vā jambudvīpaṃ vā,
K09bsu016_u:14209: tacca gṛhaṃ vā avacarakaṃ vā vipulaṃ paśyet /
K09bsu016_u:14211: na rātridīrghaṃ ca saṃjānīte na hrasvam,
K09bsu016_u:14214: sa prasrabdhakāyasaṃskāro vigatastyānamiddhaḥ sarvaratyapakarṣito vipulaprītisukhasaṃvedī dīrghaṃ ca vipulaṃ ca saṃjānīte /
K09bsu016_u:14215: divasaṃ vā saptāhaṃ vā ardhamāsaṃ vā saṃvatsaraṃ vā varṣaśataṃ vā tato vā uttari saṃjānīte /
K09bsu016_u:14222: tadyathā glānaḥ puruṣaścarame cittotpāde vartamāna upapatyānantaryacitte pratyupasthite karmabhave āmukhībhūte yathākṛtakarmopacayavipākena aśubhakarmapratyayena narakaṃ vā paśyet,
K09bsu016_u:14223: tiryagyoniṃ vā pretaviṣayaṃ vā yamapuruṣān vā dṛḍhapraharaṇagṛhītān ruṣitānākrośato ruditākrośitaśabdaṃ ca nārakāṇāṃ śruṇuyāt /
K09bsu016_u:14238: tadāyuḥkālaṃ ca saṃjānīyāt - itaścyutastatra vopapanno 'nantarhita eva karmaviṣayācintyatayā etāṃ kriyāṃ paśyet saṃjānīta anubhavet /
K09bsu016_u:14240: tadyathā bhūtagrahāviṣṭaḥ puruṣo vividhāni rupagatāni paśyati /
K09bsu016_u:14243: evameva sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako bodhisattvajñānādhiṣṭhānabalena tān sarvavyūhānadrākṣīt /
K09bsu016_u:14244: tadyathā nāgabhavanapraviṣṭaḥ puruṣo nāgasaṃjñāgatapraveśena divasaṃ vā saptāhaṃ vā ardhamāsaṃ vā māsaṃ vā saṃvatsaraṃ vā varṣaśataṃ vā saṃjñāmātraṃ
K09bsu016_u:14246: evameva sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako bodhisattvasaṃjñāgatānusmṛtabuddhistanmaitreyasya bodhisattvasya adhiṣṭhānavaśena tanmuhūrtaṃ bahūni kalpakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi saṃjānīte sma /
K09bsu016_u:14249: evameva sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ tān sarvān vyūhānanyonyāsaṃkīrṇān sarvārambaṇeṣu
K09bsu016_u:14251: vā caṃkrame vā niṣadyāyāṃ vā utthito vā niṣaṇṇo vā yathākṛtsnasamāpattiviṣayāvatāreṇa
K09bsu016_u:14253: evameva sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ tān sarvān vyūhān yathāviṣayāvatāreṇa paśyati saṃjānīte /
K09bsu016_u:14256: tadyathā yakṣavimānapraviṣṭāni manuṣyavimānāni yakṣavimānāntargatānyanyonyāsaṃbhinnāni yathākāmaviṣayapariśuddhyā saṃdṛśyante /
K09bsu016_u:14257: tadyathā mahāsamudre sarvasya trisāhasramahāsāhasrasya lokadhātoḥ pratibhāsasamudrāḥ saṃdṛśyante /
K09bsu016_u:14258: tadyathā māyākāro mantravidyauṣadhibalādhiṣṭhānena sarvarūpagatāni sarvakriyāśca saṃpaśyati /
K09bsu016_u:14261: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvastatkūṭāgāraṃ praviśya tadadhiṣṭhānamavasṛjya sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakamacchaṭāśabdaṃ kṛtvā etadavocata - uttiṣṭha kulaputra /
K09bsu016_u:14265: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ tenācchaṭāśabdena tataḥ samādhervyutthitaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:14266: taṃ maitreyo bodhisattva āha - dṛṣṭā te kulaputra bodhisattvādhiṣṭhānavikurvāḥ?
K09bsu016_u:14276: api tu khalu ārya ko nāmaiṣa vimokṣaḥ?
K09bsu016_u:14277: maitreya āha - sarvatryadhvārambaṇajñānapraveśāsaṃmoṣasmṛtivyūhagarbho nāma kulaputra eṣa vimokṣaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:14279: sudhana āha - kva asau ārya vyūho gataḥ?
K09bsu016_u:14284: na kvacidgato nāgato na rāśībhūto na saṃcayabhūto na kūṭastho na bhāvastho na bhāvasthito na deśastho na pradeśasthaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:14285: tadyathā kulaputra nāgānāṃ meghajālaṃ na kāyena cittena abhyantarībhūtaṃ na saṃcayasthitaṃ na saṃdṛśyate /
K09bsu016_u:14287: evameva kulaputra te vyūhā nādhyātmagatā na bahirdhāgatā na ca na saṃdṛśyante,
K09bsu016_u:14290: tadyathā kulaputra māyākārasya sarvamāyāgataviṣayaṃ saṃdarśayamānasya māyā na kutaścidāgacchanti na vigacchanti na kvacitsaṃkrāntim,
K09bsu016_u:14292: evameva kulaputrate vyūhā na kvacidgatā na kutaścidāgatā na kvacidrāśībhūtāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:14315: ahamasmin kulaputra āgacchāmi janmabhūmermāladebhyo janapadebhyaḥ kuṭigrāmakāt /
K09bsu016_u:14317: taṃ buddhadharmeṣu pratiṣṭhāpya janmabhūmakānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ yathābhājanatayā dharmaṃ deśayitvā mātāpitṛjñātisaṃbandhinaśca brāhmaṇagṛhapatīn mahāyāne samādāpya /
K09bsu016_u:14318: sudhana āha - katamā ārya bodhisattvānāṃ janmabhūmiḥ?
K09bsu016_u:14347: evaṃ hi kulaputra bodhisattvo 'tikrānto bhavati bālapṛthagjanabhūmim /
K09bsu016_u:14356: adoṣaḥ sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāṃ prajāyām /
K09bsu016_u:14358: evaṃ kulajātisamṛddhāśca kulaputra bodhisattvāḥ pratibhāsāyatanasarvadharmaparijñātatvānna vijugupsante sarvalokopapattiṣu /
K09bsu016_u:14375: paripācanārthaṃ jambudvīpe ca janmopapattisaṃdarśanārthamiha dakṣiṇāpathe māladeṣu
K09bsu016_u:14378: so 'haṃ kulaputra iha dakṣiṇāpathe anenopāyena yathāśayānāṃ sattvānāṃ yathāvineyānāṃ paripākavinayaṃ kurvan ihaiva vairocanavyūhālaṃkāragarbhe kūṭāgāre (Gv 418)
K09bsu016_u:14380: itaścāhaṃ cyutaḥ tuṣitabhavane upapattiṃ saṃdarśayiṣyāmi yathāśaye sattvānuvartanatāyai,
K09bsu016_u:14390: bodhiprāptaṃ ca māṃ kulaputra tvaṃ punarapi drakṣyasi sārdhaṃ mañjuśriyā kalyāṇamitreṇa //
K09bsu016_u:14391: api tu khalu punaḥ kulaputra - gaccha tvaṃ tameva mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtam /
K09bsu016_u:14392: upasaṃkramya paripṛccha - kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
K09bsu016_u:14404: sa kulaputra bodhisattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇāṃ praṇidhānaviśeṣaḥ saṃvidyate yo mañjuśriyaḥ kumārabhūtasya /
K09bsu016_u:14406: apramāṇo mañjuśriyaḥ kumārabhūtasya praṇidhānābhinirhāraḥ apratiprasrabdho mañjuśriyaḥ kumārabhūtasya sarvabodhisattvaguṇaviśeṣābhinirhāraḥ
K09bsu016_u:14426: tasmāttarhi tvaṃ kulaputra mañjuśrīpādamūlagataḥ eva mā parīttamanamutpādaya,
K09bsu016_u:14435: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako maitreyasya bodhisattvasya pādau śirāsābhivandya
K09bsu016_u:14436: maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punaḥ punaravalokya
K09bsu016_u:14440: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako daśottaraṃ nagaraśatamaṭitvā sumanāmukhadikpratyuddeśaṃ
K09bsu016_u:14441: gatvā atiṣṭhat mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtaṃ cintayan anuvilokayan mañjuśriyaḥ kumārabhūtasya
K09bsu016_u:14443: atha khalu mañjuśrīḥ kumārabhūto daśottarādyojanaśatātpāṇiṃ prasārya sumanāmukhanagarasthitasyaiva
K09bsu016_u:14444: sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya mūrdhni pratiṣṭhāpya evamāha - sādhu sādhu kulaputra
K09bsu016_u:14447: eṣa nayaḥ eṣa gocaraḥ eṣa vihāro jñātuṃ vā avagāhayituṃ vā avatarituṃ vā adhimoktuṃ vā kalpayituṃ vā pratyavagantuṃ vā pratilabdhuṃ vā iti //
K09bsu016_u:14448: sa taṃ dharmakathayā saṃdarśayitvā samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣayitvā asaṃkhyeyadharmamukhasamanvāgataṃ
K09bsu016_u:14450: kṛtvā samantabhadracaryāmaṇḍale 'vatārayitvā svadeśe ca pratiṣṭhāpya sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasyāntikāt prakrāntaḥ // 53 //
K09bsu016_u:14468: samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya nāmadheyaṃ śrutvā bodhicaryāṃ śrutvā praṇidhānaviśeṣaṃ
K09bsu016_u:14470: ca śrutvā samantabhadrabhūmyācāravicāraṃ ca śrutvā bhūmisaṃbhāraṃ ca śrutvā lambhaviśeṣaṃ
K09bsu016_u:14471: ca śrutvā bhūmipratilambhavegaṃ ca śrutvā bhūmyākramaṇaṃ ca śrutvā bhūmipratiṣṭhānaṃ
K09bsu016_u:14472: ca śrutvā bhūmiparākramavikramaṃ ca śrutvā bhūmigauravaṃ ca śrutvā bhūmyadhiṣṭhānaṃ
K09bsu016_u:14487: evaṃ cittamanasikāraprayuktasya khalu punaḥ sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya pūrvakuśalamūlābhiṣyanditasarvatathāgatādhiṣṭhānena
K09bsu016_u:14488: ca samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya pūrvakuśalamūlasabhāgatayā samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya
K09bsu016_u:14503: imāni daśa pūrvanimittāni prādurabhavan samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya darśanāya //
K09bsu016_u:14504: apare daśa mahāvabhāsāḥ prādurabhavan samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya darśanapūrvanimittam /
K09bsu016_u:14506: yaduta sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajaḥsu ekaikasmin paramāṇurajasi sarvatathāgatajālāni vidyotayanti sma /
K09bsu016_u:14507: sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajobhya ekaikasmātparamāṇurajasaḥ sarvabuddhaprabhāmaṇḍalameghā niścarya anekavarṇā nānāvarṇā anekaśatasahasravarṇāḥ sarvadharmadhātuṃ spharanti sma /
K09bsu016_u:14508: sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajobhya ekaikasmātparamāṇurajasaḥ sarvaratnameghāḥ sarvatathāgatapratibhāsavijñapanānniścaritvā sarvadharmadhātuṃ spharanti sma /
K09bsu016_u:14509: sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajobhya ekaikasmātparamāṇurajasaḥ sarvatathāgatārciścakramaṇḍalameghā niścaritvā sarvadharmadhātuṃ spharanti sma /
K09bsu016_u:14513: sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajobhya ekaikasmātparamāṇurajasaḥ sarvacandrasūryajyotirmeghā niścaritvā samantabhadrabodhisattvaprabhāṃ pramuñcamānāḥ sarvadharmadhātuṃ spharanti sma /
K09bsu016_u:14514: sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajobhya ekaikasmātparamāṇurajasaḥ sarvasattvakāyasaṃsthānapradīpameghā niścaritvā buddharaśmivatprabhāsamānāḥ sarvadharmadhātuṃ spharanti sma /
K09bsu016_u:14515: sarvalokadhātuparamāṇurajobhya ekaikasmātparamāṇurajasaḥ sarvatathāgatakāyapratibhāsamaṇiratnavigrahameghā niścaritvā daśasu dikṣu sarvadharmadhātuṃ spharanti sma /
K09bsu016_u:14521: ime daśa mahāvabhāsāḥ prādurabhūvan samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya darśanapūrvanimittam //
K09bsu016_u:14522: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidāraka imān daśa pūrvanimittāvabhāsān dṛṣṭvā samantabhadrasya
K09bsu016_u:14534: samanvāgato 'drākṣīt samantabhadraṃ bodhisattvaṃ bhagavato vairocanasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ
K09bsu016_u:14535: samyaksaṃbuddhasya purato mahāratnapadmagarbhe siṃhāsane niṣaṇṇaṃ bodhisattvaparṣanmaṇḍalasamudragataṃ
K09bsu016_u:14542: sa tasya kāyāt sarvabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān prabhāmaṇḍalameghānniścaritvā nānāvarṇān sarvabodhisattvānudāraprītiprāmodyavegān vivardhayamānānapaśyat
K09bsu016_u:14543: mūrdhatoṃ 'sakūṭābhyāṃ sarvaromavivarebhyaśca nānāvarṇān gandhārcimeghānniścārya sarvatathāgataparṣanmaṇḍalāni spharitvā abhipravarṣamāṇānapaśyat
K09bsu016_u:14554: sarvaromavivarebhya ekaikasmādromavivarātsarvabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān rūpadhātudevanikāyameghānniścārya bodhisattvaṃ saṃvarṇayataḥ sarvalokadhātuṃ spharamāṇānapaśyat /
K09bsu016_u:14563: sarvadharmadhātuṃ spharitvā udārādhimuktikānāṃ sattvānāṃ viśuddhaye vartamānānapaśyat /
K09bsu016_u:14586: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya idamṛddhiviṣayavikurvitaṃ
K09bsu016_u:14587: dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭaḥ tuṣṭaḥ udagraḥ āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhūyasyā mātrayā
K09bsu016_u:14588: samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya kāyamupanidhyāyan adrākṣīt samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya
K09bsu016_u:14593: satejaḥskandhaṃ sasāgaraṃ sadvīpaṃ sanadīkaṃ saratnaparvataṃ sasumeruṃ sacakravālaṃ
K09bsu016_u:14595: satiryagyonilokaṃ sayamalokaṃ sāsuralokaṃ sanāgalokaṃ sagaruḍalokaṃ samanujalokaṃ
K09bsu016_u:14596: sadevalokaṃ sabrahmalokaṃ sakāmadhātuviṣayaṃ sārūpyadhātuviṣayaṃ sādhiṣṭhānaṃ sapratiṣṭhānaṃ
K09bsu016_u:14597: sasaṃsthānaṃ sameghaṃ savidyutaṃ sajyotiṣaṃ sarātriṃdivasārdhamāsaṃ samāsartuṃ sasaṃvatsaraṃ
K09bsu016_u:14605: yāśceha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau pūrvāntakoṭīgatāḥ sarvalokadhātuparaṃparāḥ tā api sarvāḥ
K09bsu016_u:14609: yathā ceha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau pūrvāntāparāntakoṭīgatāḥ sarvalokadhātuparaṃparā adrākṣīt,
K09bsu016_u:14610: evaṃ daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu pūrvāntāparāntakoṭīgatāḥ sarvalokadhātuparaṃparāḥ
K09bsu016_u:14613: yathā ca samantabhadraṃ bodhisattvaṃ bhagavato vairocanasya tathāgatasya purato mahāratnapadmagarbhasiṃhāsane niṣaṇṇamadrākṣīt etadvikrīḍitaṃ
K09bsu016_u:14614: evaṃ pūrvasyāṃ diśi bhagavato bhadraśriyastathāgatasya padmaśriyāṃ lokadhātāvetadeva vikrīḍitaṃ saṃdarśayamānamadrākṣīt /
K09bsu016_u:14616: evaṃ samantātsarvadigvidikṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu sarvatathāgatapādamūleṣu samantabhadraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāratnapadmagarbhasiṃhāsane niṣaṇṇametadeva
K09bsu016_u:14619: evaṃ sarvalokadhātuṣu tathāgatapādamūleṣu mahāratnapadmagarbhasiṃhāsane niṣaṇṇametadeva vikrīḍitaṃ saṃdarśayamānamadrākṣīt /
K09bsu016_u:14620: evaṃ samantāddaśasu dikṣu sarvabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsameṣu ekaikasmin paramāṇurajasi
K09bsu016_u:14627: sa tadacintyaṃ samantabhadramahābodhisattvavikrīḍitaṃ dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca daśa jñānapāramitāvihārān pratyalabhata /
K09bsu016_u:14640: tasyaivaṃ jñānapāramitāvihārasamanvāgatasya sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya samantabhadrao bodhisattvo dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇiṃ prasārya mūrdhni pratiṣṭhāpayāmāsa
K09bsu016_u:14641: samanantarapratiṣṭhāpitaśca sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya samantabhadreṇa bodhisattvena mūrdhni pāṇiḥ,
K09bsu016_u:14652: yathā ceha sahāyāṃ lokadhātau bhagavato vairocanasya pādamūlagataḥ samantabhadro bodhisattvo dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇiṃ prasārya sudhanasya murdhni pratiṣṭhāpayāmāsa,
K09bsu016_u:14653: tathā sarvalokadhātuṣu sarvatathāgatapādamūleṣu niṣaṇṇaḥ samantabhadro bodhisattvo dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇiṃ prasārya sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya mūrdhni pratiṣṭhāpayāmāsa /
K09bsu016_u:14655: sarvatathāgatapādamūleṣu niṣaṇṇaḥ samantabhadro bodhisattvo dakṣiṇaṃ pāṇiṃ prasārya
K09bsu016_u:14657: yathā bhagavato vairocanasya pādamūlagatena samantabhadreṇa bodhisattvena pāṇinā spṛṣṭasya sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya
K09bsu016_u:14659: evaṃ sarvasamantabhadrātmabhāvaprasṛtaiḥ pāṇimeghaiḥ spṛṣṭasya sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya dharmamukhānyavakrāntānyabhūvan nānānayaiḥ //
K09bsu016_u:14660: atha khalu samantabhadro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakametadavocat - dṛṣṭaṃ te kulaputra mama vikurvitam?
K09bsu016_u:14662: api tu tathāgataḥ prajānan prajānīyāttāvadacintyamidaṃ vikurvitam /
K09bsu016_u:14663: so 'vocat - ahaṃ kulaputra anabhilāpyānabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān kalpān vicaritaḥ sarvajñatācittamabhilaṣamāṇaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:14665: ekaikasmiṃśca mahākalpe sarvatyāgasamāyuktāḥ sarvalokavighuṣṭā mahāyajñā yaṣṭāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:14685: ekaikasmiṃśca mahākalpe 'nabhilāpyānabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamāstathāgatāḥ parameśvarabhūtena satkṛtā gurukṛtā mānitāḥ pūjitāḥ,
K09bsu016_u:14687: teṣāṃ ca asmiṃstathāgatānāṃ śāsane pravrajitā sarvabuddhānuśāsanīṣu pratipannaḥ śāsanaṃ ca me teṣāṃ saṃdhāritam //
K09bsu016_u:14688: nābhijānāmi kulaputra tāvadbhiḥ kalpasamudrerekacittotpādamapi tathāgaśāsane vilopamutpādayituṃ nābhijānāmi /
K09bsu016_u:14690: vā ātmagrahaparigrahacittaṃ vā ātmaparanānātvacittaṃ vā bodhimārgavipravāsacittaṃ
K09bsu016_u:14691: vā saṃsārasaṃvāsaparikhedacittaṃ vā avalīnacittaṃ vā āvaraṇasaṃmohacittaṃ vā utpādayitumanyatra
K09bsu016_u:14693: iti hi kulaputra sarvakalpasāgarāḥ kṣayaṃ vrajeyuḥ tānnirdiśato ye mama pūrvayogasaṃbuddhakṣetrapariśuddhiprayogāḥ,
K09bsu016_u:14699: tāvadbhyo me kulaputra dharmasamudrebhyo na kiṃcidekapadavyañjanamapi yanna cakravartirājyaparityāgena krītam,
K09bsu016_u:14705: tena mayā kulaputra anena evaṃrūpeṇa saṃbhārabalena mūlahetūpacayabalena udārādhimuktibalena
K09bsu016_u:14710: sarvalokābhudgataḥ sarvajagadyathāśayavijñapanaḥ sarvatrānugataḥ sarvabuddhakṣetraprasṛtaḥ samantapratiṣṭhānaḥ sarvataḥ sarvavikurvitasaṃdarśanaḥ sarvajagadabhilakṣaṇīyaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:14712: nāhaṃ kulaputra anavaropitakuśalamūlānāṃ sattvānāṃ śravaṇapathamapyāgacchāmi prāgeva darśanam /
K09bsu016_u:14714: ye mama nāmadheyaśravaṇamātreṇa avaivartikā bhavantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
K09bsu016_u:14720: santi svapne nāmadheyaśravaṇena avaivartikā bhavantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
K09bsu016_u:14722: kecidardhamāsaṃ kecinmāsaṃ kecidvarṣaṃ kecidvarṣaśataṃ kecitkalpaṃ kecitkalpaśataṃ
K09bsu016_u:14733: iti hi kulaputra buddhākṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamairupāyaiḥ sattvā avaivartikā bhavantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
K09bsu016_u:14734: ye khalu punaḥ kulaputra sattvā mama buddhakṣetrapariśuddhiṃ śṛṇvanti,
K09bsu016_u:14739: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya kāyamupanidhyāyannadrākṣīt ekaikasmin romavivare 'nabhilāpyabuddhakṣetrasāgarān buddhotpādaparipūrṇān /
K09bsu016_u:14741: sarvāṃśca tān kṣetrasāgarān nānāpratiṣṭhānān nānāsaṃsthānān nānāvyūhān nānācakravālān nānāmeghagaganasaṃchannān nānābuddhotpādān nānādharmacakranirghoṣānapaśyat
K09bsu016_u:14743: tathā anavaśeṣataḥ sarvaromavivareṣu sarvalakṣaṇeṣu sarvānuvyañjaneṣu sarvāṅgapratyaṅgeṣu /
K09bsu016_u:14745: daśasu dikṣu sarvalokadhātūn spharitvā anuttarāyāṃ samyakaṃbodhau sattvān paripācayamānānapaśyat //
K09bsu016_u:14746: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ samantabhadrabodhisattvāvavādānuśāsanyanuśiṣṭaḥ samantabhadrabodhisattvakāyāntargateṣu sarvalokadhātuṣvavatīrya sattvān paripācayāmāsa /
K09bsu016_u:14747: ye ca khalu punaḥ sudhanasya śreṣṭhidārakasya buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamakalyāṇamitropasaṃkramadarśanaparyupāsanajñānālokakuśalamūlopacayāḥ,
K09bsu016_u:14748: te samantabhadrabodhisattvasahadarśanena kuśalamūlopacayasya śatatamīmapi kalāṃ nopayānti,
K09bsu016_u:14750: saṃkhyāmapi kalāmapi gaṇanāmapi upamāmapi upanisāmapi na kṣamante saprathamacittotpādāya yāvatsamantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya darśanam /
K09bsu016_u:14755: pareṇa aparāntakoṭīgatakalpādhiṣṭhānalokadhātuṃ pareṇa vikrameṇa paryantaṃ nopajagāma /
K09bsu016_u:14768: cittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe ca anantamadhyān kṣetrasāgarānavatarati sma,
K09bsu016_u:14775: atha khalu samantabhadro bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ evameva lokadhātuparaṃparānabhilāpyānabhilāpyabuddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamān
K09bsu016_u:14776: kalpān kalpaprasarānabhidyotayamāno bhūyasyā mātrayā gāthābhigītena praṇidhānamakārṣīt -
K09bsu016_u:14777: yāvata keci daśaddiśi loke sarvatriyadhvagatā narasiṃhāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:14778: tānahu vandami sarvi aśeṣān kāyatu vāca manena prasannaḥ // 1 //
K09bsu016_u:14785: sarvajināna guṇān bhaṇamānastān sugatān stavamī ahu sarvān // 4 //
K09bsu016_u:14787: dīpavarebhi ca dhūpavarebhiḥ pūjana teṣa jināna karomi // 5 //
K09bsu016_u:14790: yā ca anuttara pūja udārā tānadhimucyami sarvajinānām /
K09bsu016_u:14792: yacca kṛtaṃ mayi pāpu bhaveyyā rāgatu dveṣatu mohavaśena /
K09bsu016_u:14793: kāyatu vāca manena tathaiva taṃ pratideśayamī ahu sarvam // 8 //
K09bsu016_u:14794: yacca daśaddiśi puṇya jagasya śaikṣa aśaikṣapratyekajinānām /
K09bsu016_u:14795: buddhasutānatha sarvajinānāṃ taṃ anumodayamī ahu sarvam // 9 //
K09bsu016_u:14796: ye ca daśaddiśi lokapradīpā bodhivibuddha asaṅgataprāptāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:14797: tānahu sarvi adhyeṣami nāthāṃ cakru anuttaru vartanatāyai // 10 //
K09bsu016_u:14802: yacca śubhaṃ mayi saṃcitu kiṃcidbodhayi nāmayamī ahu sarvam // 12 //
K09bsu016_u:14803: pūjita bhontu atītaka buddhā ye ca ghriyanti daśaddiśi loke /
K09bsu016_u:14804: ye ca anāgata te laghu bhontu pūrṇamanoratha bodhivibuddhāḥ // 13 //
K09bsu016_u:14805: yāvat keci daśaddiśi kṣetrāste pariśuddha bhavantu udārāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:14807: yāvat keci daśaddiśi sattvāste sukhitāḥ sada bhontu arogāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:14808: sarvajagasya ca dharmiku artho bhontu pradakṣiṇu ṛdhyatu āśā // 15 //
K09bsu016_u:14809: bodhicariṃ ca ahaṃ caramāṇo bhavi jātismaru sarvagatīṣu /
K09bsu016_u:14810: sarvasu janmasu cyutyupapattī pravrajito ahu nityu bhaveyyā // 16 //
K09bsu016_u:14814: yāni ca sarvarutāni jagasya sarvaruteṣvahu deśayi dharmam // 18 //
K09bsu016_u:14815: ye khalu pāramitāsvabhiyukto bodhiyi cittu ma jātu vimuhyet /
K09bsu016_u:14817: ye 'pi ca pāpaka āvaraṇīyāsteṣu parikṣayu bhotu aśeṣam // 19 //
K09bsu016_u:14818: karmatu kleśatu mārapathāto lokagatīṣu vimuktu careyam /
K09bsu016_u:14819: padma yathā salilena aliptaḥ sūrya śaśī gaganeva asaktaḥ // 20 //
K09bsu016_u:14820: sarvi apāyadukhāṃ praśamanto sarvajagat sukhi sthāpayamānaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:14821: sarvajagasya hitāya careyaṃ yāvata kṣetrapathā diśatāsu // 21 //
K09bsu016_u:14823: bhadracariṃ ca prabhāvayamānaḥ sarvi anāgatakalpa careyam // 22 //
K09bsu016_u:14824: ye ca sabhāgata mama caryāye tebhi samāgamu nityu bhaveyyā /
K09bsu016_u:14825: kāyatu vācatu cetanato vā ekacari praṇidhāna careyam // 23 //
K09bsu016_u:14826: ye 'pi ca mitrā mama hitakāmā bhadracarīya nidarśayitāraḥ /
K09bsu016_u:14827: tebhi samāgamu nityu bhaveyyā tāṃśca ahaṃ na virāgayi jātu // 24 //
K09bsu016_u:14828: saṃmukha nityamahaṃ jina paśye buddhasutebhi parīvṛtu nāthān /
K09bsu016_u:14829: teṣu ca pūja kareya udārāṃ sarvi anāgatakalpamakhinnaḥ // 25 //
K09bsu016_u:14831: bhadracariṃ ca viśodhayamānaḥ sarvi anāgatakalpa careyam // 26 //
K09bsu016_u:14833: sarvabhaveṣu ca saṃsaramāṇaḥ puṇyatu jñānatu akṣayaprāptaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:14835: ekarajāgri rajopamakṣetrā tatra ca kṣetri acintiya buddhān /
K09bsu016_u:14836: buddhasutāna niṣaṇṇaku madhye paśyiya bodhicariṃ caramāṇaḥ // 28 //
K09bsu016_u:14843: ekakṣaṇena anāgata sarvān kalpapraveśa ahaṃ praviśeyam /
K09bsu016_u:14844: ye 'pi ca kalpa triyadhvapramāṇāstān kṣaṇakoṭipraviṣṭa careyam // 32 //
K09bsu016_u:14845: ye ca triyadhvagatā narasiṃhāstānahu paśyiya ekakṣaṇena /
K09bsu016_u:14846: teṣu ca gocarimotari nityaṃ māyagatena vimokṣabalena // 33 //
K09bsu016_u:14850: ye ca ānāgata lokapradīpāsteṣu vibudhyana cakrapravṛttim /
K09bsu016_u:14851: nirvṛtidarśananiṣṭha praśāntiṃ sarvi ahaṃ upasaṃkrami nāthān // 35 //
K09bsu016_u:14863: tānahu pūrayi sarvi aśeṣān bhadracarīya vibudhyiya bodhim // 41 //
K09bsu016_u:14865: jyeṣṭhaku yaḥ sutu sarvajinānāṃ yasya ca nāma samantatabhadraḥ /
K09bsu016_u:14866: tasya vidusya sabhāgacarīye nāmayamī kuśalaṃ imu sarvam // 42 //
K09bsu016_u:14868: yādṛśa nāmana bhadra vidusya tādṛśa bhotu samaṃ mama tena // 43 //
K09bsu016_u:14870: sarvi anāgata kalpamakhinnaḥ pūrayi tāṃ kriya sarvi aśeṣām // 44 //
K09bsu016_u:14871: no ca pramāṇu bhaveyya carīye no ca pramāṇu bhaveyya guṇānām /
K09bsu016_u:14872: apramāṇa cariyāya sthihitvā jānami sarvi vikurvitu teṣām // 45 //
K09bsu016_u:14873: yāvata niṣṭha nabhasya bhaveyyā sattva aśeṣata niṣṭha tathaiva /
K09bsu016_u:14874: karmatu kleśatu yāvata niṣṭhā tāvataniṣṭha mama praṇidhānam // 46 //
K09bsu016_u:14875: ye ca daśaddiśi kṣetra anantā rathaalaṃkṛtu dadyu jinānām /
K09bsu016_u:14876: divya ca mānuṣa saukhyaviśiṣṭāṃ kṣetrarajopama kalpa dadeyam // 47 //
K09bsu016_u:14879: varjita tena bhavanti apāyā varjita tena bhavanti kumitrāḥ /
K09bsu016_u:14880: kṣipru sa paśyati taṃ amitābhaṃ yasyimu bhadracaripraṇidhānam // 49 //
K09bsu016_u:14882: lābha sulabdha sujīvitu teṣāṃ svāgata te imu mānuṣa janma /
K09bsu016_u:14883: yādṛśa so hi samantatabhadraste 'pi tathā nacireṇa bhavanti // 50 //
K09bsu016_u:14884: pāpaka pañca anantariyāṇi yena ajñānavaśena kṛtāni /
K09bsu016_u:14885: so imu bhadracariṃ bhaṇamānaḥ kṣipru parikṣayu neti aśeṣam // 51 //
K09bsu016_u:14886: jñānatu rūpatu lakṣaṇataśca varṇatu gotratu bhotirupetaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:14888: kṣipru sa gacchati bodhidrumendraṃ gatva niṣīdati sattvahitāya /
K09bsu016_u:14889: budhyati bodhi pravartayi cakraṃ dharṣati māru sasainyaku sarvam // 53 //
K09bsu016_u:14890: yo imu bhadracaripraṇidhānaṃ dhārayi vācayi deśayito vā /
K09bsu016_u:14891: buddha vijānati yo 'tra vipāko bodhi viśiṣṭa ma kāṅkṣa janetha // 54 //
K09bsu016_u:14892: mañjuśirī yatha jānati śūraḥ so ca samantatabhadra tathaiva /
K09bsu016_u:14893: teṣu ahaṃ anuśikṣayamāṇo nāmayamī kuśalaṃ imu sarvam // 55 //
K09bsu016_u:14895: tāya ahaṃ kuśalaṃ imu sarvaṃ nāmayamī varabhadracarīye // 56 //
K09bsu016_u:14896: kālakriyāṃ ca ahaṃ karamāṇo āvaraṇān vinivartiya sarvān /
K09bsu016_u:14897: saṃmukha paśyiya taṃ amitābhaṃ taṃ ca sukhāvatikṣetra vrajeyam // 57 //
K09bsu016_u:14899: tatra gatasya imi praṇidhānā āmukhi sarvi bhaveyyu samagrā /
K09bsu016_u:14900: tāṃśca ahaṃ paripūrya aśeṣān sattvahitaṃ kari yāvata loke // 58 //
K09bsu016_u:14901: tahi jinamaṇḍali śobhani ramye padmavare rucire upapannaḥ /
K09bsu016_u:14902: vyākaraṇaṃ ahu tatra labheyyā saṃmukhato abhitābhajinasya // 59 //
K09bsu016_u:14904: sattvahitāni bahūnyahu kuryāṃ dikṣu daśasvapi buddhibalena // 60 //
K09bsu016_u:14905: bhadracaripraṇidhāna paṭhitvā yatkuśalaṃ mayi saṃcitu kiṃcit /
K09bsu016_u:14906: ekakṣaṇena samṛdhyatu sarvaṃ tena jagasya śubhaṃ praṇidhānam // 61 //
K09bsu016_u:14913: te cāryasamantabhadrabodhisattvapramukhā yauvarājyābhiṣiktāḥ paramāṇurajaḥsamā mahābodhisattvā nānālokadhātusaṃnipatitāḥ,
K09bsu016_u:14916: sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavataḥ samantabhadrasya bodhisattvasya bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti //
K09bsu016_u:14918: ye dharmā hetuprabhāvā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tethāgato hyavadat /
K09bsu016_u:14919: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodho evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
